   13: %% distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,

   15: %% See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
   16: %% limitations under the License.
   17: %% 
   18: %% %CopyrightEnd%
   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %% There are some environment variables that can be used to "manipulate"
   22: %% the test suite: 
   23: %%
   24: %% Variable that controls which 'groups' are to run (with default values)
   25: %%
   26: %%         ESOCK_TEST_API:         include
   27: %%         ESOCK_TEST_REG:         include
   28: %%         ESOCK_TEST_MON:         include
   29: %%         ESOCK_TEST_IOCTL:       include
   30: %%         ESOCK_TEST_SOCK_CLOSE:  include
   31: %%         ESOCK_TEST_TRAFFIC:     include
   32: %%         ESOCK_TEST_TICKETS:     include
   33: %%         ESOCK_TEST_TTEST:       include
   34: %%
   35: %% Variable that controls "verbosity" of the test case(s):
   36: %%
   37: %%         ESOCK_TEST_QUIET: true (default) | false
   38: %%
   39: %% Defines the runtime of the ttest cases
   40: %% (This is the time during which "measurement" is performed. 
   41: %%  the actual time it takes for the test case to complete
   42: %%  will be longer; setup, completion, ...)
   43: %%
   44: %%          ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_RUNTIME: 1 second
   45: %%              Format of values: <integer>[<unit>]
   46: %%              Where unit is: ms | s | m
   47: %%                 ms - milli seconds
   48: %%                 s  - seconds (default)
   49: %%                 m  - minutes
   50: %%
   51: %% The ttest takes a long time to run, even when the runtime is small,
   52: %% because there are such a large number of test cases.
   53: %% So, by default only the 'small' test cases are included in a test run.
   54: %% The following environment variables control which are included and 
   55: %% excluded.
   56: %%
   57: %%          ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_SMALL:  included
   58: %%          ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_MEDIUM: excluded
   59: %%          ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_LARGE:  excluded
   60: %%
   61: 
   62: %% Run the entire test suite: 
   63: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, [batch]).
   64: %%
   65: %% Run a specific group:
   66: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, {group, foo}, [batch]).
   67: %%
   68: %% Run a specific test case:
   69: %% ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, foo, [batch]).
   70: %%
   71: %% (cd /mnt/c/$LOCAL_TESTS/26/kernel_test/ && $ERL_TOP/bin/win32/erl.exe -sname kernel-26-tester -pa c:$LOCAL_TESTS/26/test_server)
   72: %% application:set_env(kernel, test_inet_backends, true).
   73: %% S = fun() -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, [batch]) end.
   74: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, [batch]) end.
   75: %% S = fun() -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}]) end.
   76: %% S = fun(SUITE) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}]) end.
   77: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   78: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ts:run(kernel, SUITE, {group, GROUP}, [batch]) end.
   79: %% G = fun(GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   80: %% G = fun(SUITE, GROUP) -> ct:run_test([{suite, SUITE}, {group, GROUP}]) end.
   81: %% T = fun(TC) -> ts:run(kernel, socket_SUITE, TC, [batch]) end.
   82: %% T = fun(TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, socket_SUITE}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   83: %% T = fun(S, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   84: %% T = fun(S, G, TC) -> ct:run_test([{suite, S}, {group, G}, {testcase, TC}]) end.
   85: %%
   86: %% Some official info about AF_UNIX
   87: %% https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/windowswsl-interop-with-af_unix/
   88: 
   89: 
   90: 
   91: -module(socket_SUITE).
   92: 
   93: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   94: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   95: -include("socket_test_evaluator.hrl").
   96: 
   97: %% Suite exports
   98: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
   99: -export([init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
  100:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
  101:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
  102: 
  103: %% Test cases
  104: -export([
  105:          %% *** API Misc ***
  106:          api_m_info/1,
  107:          api_m_debug/1,

  420:          traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4/1,
  421:          traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6/1,
  422:          traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL/1,
  423: 
  424:          traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4/1,
  425:          traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6/1,
  426:          traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL/1,
  427:          traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp4/1,

  773:          %% Tickets
  774:          otp16359_maccept_tcp4/1,
  775:          otp16359_maccept_tcp6/1,
  776:          otp16359_maccept_tcpL/1,
  777:          otp18240_accept_mon_leak_tcp4/1,

  780:          otp19063/1
  781:         ]).
  782: 
  783: 
  784: %% Internal exports
  785: %% -export([]).
  786: 
  787: 
  788: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  789: 
  790: -define(LIB,        socket_test_lib).
  791: -define(KLIB,       kernel_test_lib).
  792: -define(TTEST_LIB,  socket_test_ttest_lib).
  793: -define(LOGGER,     socket_test_logger).
  794: 
  795: -define(BASIC_REQ,  <<"hejsan">>).
  796: -define(BASIC_REP,  <<"hoppsan">>).
  797: 
  798: -define(DATA,       <<"HOPPSAN">>). % Temporary
  799: -define(FAIL(R),    exit(R)).
  800: 
  801: -define(SLEEP(T),   receive after T -> ok end).
  802: 
  803: -define(MINS(M),    timer:minutes(M)).
  804: -define(SECS(S),    timer:seconds(S)).
  805: 
  806: -define(TT(T),      ct:timetrap(T)).
  807: 
  808: -define(F(F, A),    ?LIB:f(F, A)).
  809: -define(P(F),       ?LIB:print(F)).
  810: -define(P(F, A),    ?LIB:print(F, A)).
  811: 
  812: 
  813: -define(TPP_SMALL,  lists:seq(1, 8)).
  814: -define(TPP_MEDIUM, lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(100, ?TPP_SMALL))).
  815: -define(TPP_LARGE,  lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(100, ?TPP_MEDIUM))).
  816: 
  817: -define(TPP_SMALL_NUM,  5000).
  818: -define(TPP_MEDIUM_NUM, 500).
  819: -define(TPP_LARGE_NUM,  50).
  820: -define(TPP_NUM(Config, Base), (Base) div lookup(kernel_factor, 1, Config)).
  821: 
  822: -define(WINDOWS, {win32,nt}).
  823: 
  824: -define(TTEST_RUNTIME,                       ?SECS(1)).
  825: -define(TTEST_MIN_FACTOR,                    3).
  826: -define(TTEST_MIN_FACTOR_WIN,                ?TTEST_MIN_FACTOR-1).
  827: -define(TTEST_DEFAULT_SMALL_MAX_OUTSTANDING, 50).
  828: -define(TTEST_DEFAULT_MEDIUM_MAX_OUTSTANDING,
  829:         ?TTEST_MK_DEFAULT_MAX_OUTSTANDING(
  830:            ?TTEST_DEFAULT_SMALL_MAX_OUTSTANDING)).
  831: -define(TTEST_DEFAULT_LARGE_MAX_OUTSTANDING,
  832:         ?TTEST_MK_DEFAULT_MAX_OUTSTANDING(
  833:            ?TTEST_DEFAULT_MEDIUM_MAX_OUTSTANDING)).
  834: 
  835: -define(TTEST_MK_DEFAULT_MAX_OUTSTANDING(__X__),
  836:         if ((__X__) >= 5) ->
  837:                 (__X__) div 5;
  838:            true ->
  839:                 1
  840:         end).
  841: 
  842: -define(START_NODE(NamePre),
  843:         ?START_NODE(NamePre, 5000)).
  844: -define(START_NODE(NamePre, Timeout),
  845:         start_node(?CT_PEER_NAME(NamePre), Timeout)).
  846: 
  847: 
  848: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  849: 
  850: suite() ->
  851:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]},
  852:      {timetrap, {minutes,1}}].
  853: 
  854: all() -> 
  855:     Groups = [{api,          "ESOCK_TEST_API",        include},
  856:               {reg,          "ESOCK_TEST_REG",        include},
  857:               {monitor,      "ESOCK_TEST_MON",        include},
  858:               {ioctl,        "ESOCK_TEST_IOCTL",      include},
  859: 	      {socket_close, "ESOCK_TEST_SOCK_CLOSE", include},
  860: 	      {traffic,      "ESOCK_TEST_TRAFFIC",    include},
  861: 	      {ttest,        "ESOCK_TEST_TTEST",      include},
  862: 	      {tickets,      "ESOCK_TEST_TICKETS",    include}],
  863:     [use_group(Group, Env, Default) || {Group, Env, Default} <- Groups].
  864: 
  865: use_group(_Group, undefined, exclude) ->
  866:     [];
  867: use_group(Group, undefined, _Default) ->
  868:     [{group, Group}];
  869: use_group(Group, Env, Default) ->
  870: 	case os:getenv(Env) of
  871: 	    false when (Default =:= include) ->
  872: 		[{group, Group}];
  873: 	    false ->
  874: 		[];
  875: 	    Val ->
  876: 		case list_to_atom(string:to_lower(Val)) of
  877: 		    Use when (Use =:= include) orelse 
  878: 			     (Use =:= enable) orelse 
  879: 			     (Use =:= true) ->
  880: 			[{group, Group}];
  881: 		    _ ->
  882: 			[]
  883: 		end
  884: 	end.
  885:     
  886: 
  887: groups() -> 
  888:     [{api,                         [], api_cases()},
  889:      {api_misc,                    [], api_misc_cases()},
  890:      {api_basic,                   [], api_basic_cases()},
  891:      {api_sendfile,                [], api_sendfile_cases()},
  892:      {api_from_fd,                 [], api_from_fd_cases()},
  893:      {api_async,                   [], api_async_cases()},
  894:      {api_async_ref,               [], api_async_cases()},
  895:      {api_options,                 [], api_options_cases()},
  896:      {api_options_otp,             [], api_options_otp_cases()},
  897:      {api_options_socket,          [], api_options_socket_cases()},
  898:      {api_option_sock_acceptconn,  [], api_option_sock_acceptconn_cases()},
  899:      {api_option_sock_passcred,    [], api_option_sock_passcred_cases()},
  900:      {api_option_sock_priority,    [], api_option_sock_priority_cases()},
  901:      {api_option_sock_buf,         [], api_option_sock_buf_cases()},
  902:      {api_option_sock_lowat,       [], api_option_sock_lowat_cases()},
  903:      {api_option_sock_timeo,       [], api_option_sock_timeo_cases()},
  904:      {api_option_sock_timestamp,   [], api_option_sock_timestamp_cases()},
  905:      {api_options_ip,              [], api_options_ip_cases()},
  906:      {api_options_ipv6,            [], api_options_ipv6_cases()},
  907:      {api_options_tcp,             [], api_options_tcp_cases()},
  908:      {api_options_udp,             [], api_options_udp_cases()},
  909:      %% {api_options_sctp,            [], api_options_sctp_cases()},
  910:      {api_op_with_timeout,         [], api_op_with_timeout_cases()},
  911:      {reg,                         [], reg_simple_cases()},
  912:      {monitor,                     [], monitor_cases()},
  913:      {socket_close,                [], socket_close_cases()},
  914:      {sc_ctrl_proc_exit,           [], sc_cp_exit_cases()},
  915:      {sc_local_close,              [], sc_lc_cases()},
  916:      {sc_remote_close,             [], sc_rc_cases()},
  917:      {sc_remote_shutdown,          [], sc_rs_cases()},
  918:      {ioctl,                       [], ioctl_cases()},
  919:      {ioctl_simple,                [], ioctl_simple_cases()},
  920:      {ioctl_get,                   [], ioctl_get_cases()},
  921:      {ioctl_set,                   [], ioctl_set_cases()},
  922:      {traffic,                     [], traffic_cases()},
  923:      {traffic_counters,            [], traffic_counters_cases()},
  924:      {traffic_chunks,              [], traffic_chunks_cases()},
  925:      {traffic_ping_pong,           [], traffic_ping_pong_cases()},
  926:      {traffic_pp_send_recv,        [], traffic_pp_send_recv_cases()},
  927:      {traffic_pp_sendto_recvfrom,  [], traffic_pp_sendto_recvfrom_cases()},
  928:      {traffic_pp_sendmsg_recvmsg,  [], traffic_pp_sendmsg_recvmsg_cases()},
  929:      {ttest,                       [], ttest_cases()},
  930:      {ttest_sgenf,                 [], ttest_sgenf_cases()},
  931:      {ttest_sgenf_cgen,            [], ttest_sgenf_cgen_cases()},
  932:      {ttest_sgenf_cgenf,           [], ttest_sgenf_cgenf_cases()},
  933:      {ttest_sgenf_cgeno,           [], ttest_sgenf_cgeno_cases()},

  997:     ].
  998:      
  999: api_cases() ->
 1000:     [
 1001:      {group, api_misc},
 1002:      {group, api_basic},
 1003:      {group, api_sendfile},
 1004:      {group, api_async},
 1005:      {group, api_async_ref},
 1006:      {group, api_options},
 1007:      {group, api_op_with_timeout}
 1008:     ].
 1009:

 1011:     [
 1012:      api_m_info,
 1013:      api_m_debug,
 1014:      api_m_error_open,
 1015:      api_m_error_bind
 1016:     ].
 1017:

 1224: api_options_ip_cases() ->
 1225:     [
 1226:      api_opt_ip_add_drop_membership,
 1227:      api_opt_ip_pktinfo_udp4,
 1228:      api_opt_ip_recvopts_udp4,
 1229:      api_opt_ip_recvorigdstaddr_udp4,
 1230:      api_opt_ip_recvtos_udp4,
 1231:      api_opt_ip_recvttl_udp4,
 1232:      api_opt_ip_tos_udp4,
 1233:      api_opt_ip_recverr_udp4,
 1234: 
 1235:      %% Should be last!
 1236:      api_opt_ip_mopts_udp4
 1237:     ].
 1238:

 1249:     ].

 1323: %% These cases tests what happens when the socket is closed/shutdown,
 1324: %% locally or remotely.

 1331:     ].

 1391:     ].

 1432: traffic_cases() ->

 1439: traffic_counters_cases() ->
 1440:     [
 1441:      traffic_send_and_recv_counters_tcp4,

 1444:      traffic_send_and_recv_counters_sctp4,
 1445:      traffic_send_and_recv_counters_sctp6,
 1446:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_tcp4,
 1447:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_tcp6,
 1448:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_tcpL,
 1449:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_sctp4,
 1450:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_sctp6,
 1451:      traffic_sendto_and_recvfrom_counters_udp4,
 1452:      traffic_sendto_and_recvfrom_counters_udp6,
 1453:      traffic_sendto_and_recvfrom_counters_udpL,
 1454:      traffic_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_counters_udp4,

 1481:      traffic_ping_pong_small_send_and_recv_sctp6,
 1482:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_send_and_recv_tcp4,
 1483:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_send_and_recv_tcp6,
 1484:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_send_and_recv_tcpL,
 1485:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_send_and_recv_sctp4,
 1486:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_send_and_recv_sctp6,
 1487:      traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_tcp4,
 1488:      traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_tcp6,
 1489:      traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_tcpL,
 1490:      traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_sctp4,
 1491:      traffic_ping_pong_large_send_and_recv_sctp6
 1492:     ].    
 1493:

 1497:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6,
 1498:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL,
 1499:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4,
 1500:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6,
 1501:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL
 1502:     ].
 1503: 
 1504: traffic_pp_sendmsg_recvmsg_cases() ->
 1505:     [
 1506:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
 1507:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6,
 1508:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
 1509:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp4,
 1510:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp6,
 1511:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
 1512:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6,
 1513:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
 1514:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp4,
 1515:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp6,
 1516:      traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
 1517:      traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6,
 1518:      traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
 1519:      traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp4,
 1520:      traffic_ping_pong_large_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_sctp6,
 1521: 
 1522:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 1523:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6,
 1524:      traffic_ping_pong_small_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL,
 1525:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 1526:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6,
 1527:      traffic_ping_pong_medium_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL
 1528:     ].
 1529: 
 1530: %% Condition for running the ttest cases.
 1531: %% No point in running these cases unless the machine is
 1532: %% reasonably fast.
 1533: ttest_condition(Config) ->
 1534:     OsType = os:type(),
 1535:     case ?config(kernel_factor, Config) of
 1536:         Factor when (OsType =:= ?WINDOWS) andalso
 1537:                     is_integer(Factor) andalso
 1538:                     (Factor =< ?TTEST_MIN_FACTOR_WIN) ->
 1539:             ok;
 1540:         Factor when is_integer(Factor) andalso (Factor =< ?TTEST_MIN_FACTOR) ->
 1541:             ok;
 1542:         Factor when is_integer(Factor) ->
 1543:             {skip, ?F("Too slow for TTest (~w)", [Factor])};
 1544:         _ ->
 1545:             {skip, "Too slow for TTest (undef)"}
 1546:     end.
 1547: 
 1548: ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config) ->
 1549:     EnvKey                = "ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_SMALL_MAX_OUTSTANDING",
 1550:     Default               = ?TTEST_DEFAULT_SMALL_MAX_OUTSTANDING,
 1551:     DefaultMaxOutstanding = ttest_max_outstanding(Config, EnvKey, Default),
 1552:     ttest_max_outstanding(Config, DefaultMaxOutstanding).
 1553: 
 1554: ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config) ->
 1555:     SmallMaxOutstanding   = ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config),
 1556:     EnvKey                = "ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_MEDIUM_MAX_OUTSTANDING",
 1557:     Default               = ?TTEST_MK_DEFAULT_MAX_OUTSTANDING(
 1558:                                SmallMaxOutstanding),
 1559:     DefaultMaxOutstanding = ttest_max_outstanding(Config, EnvKey, Default),
 1560:     ttest_max_outstanding(Config, DefaultMaxOutstanding).
 1561: 
 1562: ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config) ->
 1563:     MediumMaxOutstanding  = ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config),
 1564:     EnvKey                = "ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_LARGE_MAX_OUTSTANDING",
 1565:     Default               = ?TTEST_MK_DEFAULT_MAX_OUTSTANDING(
 1566:                                MediumMaxOutstanding),
 1567:     DefaultMaxOutstanding = ttest_max_outstanding(Config, EnvKey, Default),
 1568:     ttest_max_outstanding(Config, DefaultMaxOutstanding).
 1569: 
 1570: ttest_max_outstanding(Config, Default)
 1571:   when is_integer(Default) andalso (Default > 1) ->
 1572:     %% Note that we should not even get here if factor > 4
 1573:     case ?config(kernel_factor, Config) of
 1574:         1                     -> Default;
 1575:         2 when (Default >= 2) -> Default div 2;
 1576:         3 when (Default >= 4) -> Default div 4;
 1577:         _ when (Default >= 8) -> Default div 8;
 1578:         _                     -> 1
 1579:     end;
 1580: ttest_max_outstanding(_, _) ->
 1581:     1.
 1582: 
 1583: ttest_max_outstanding(Config, EnvKey, Default) ->
 1584:     Key = list_to_atom(string:to_lower(EnvKey)),
 1585:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 1586:         {value, {Key, MO}} when is_integer(MO) andalso (MO > 0) ->
 1587:             MO;
 1588:         _ ->
 1589:             case os:getenv(EnvKey) of
 1590:                 false ->
 1591:                     Default;
 1592:                 Val ->
 1593:                     try list_to_integer(Val) of
 1594:                         MO when (MO > 0) ->
 1595:                             MO;
 1596:                         _ ->
 1597:                             1
 1598:                     catch
 1599:                         _:_:_ ->
 1600:                             Default
 1601:                     end
 1602:             end
 1603:     end.
 1604: 
 1605: ttest_cases() ->
 1606:     [
 1607:      %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1608:      {group, ttest_sgenf},
 1609: 
 1610:      %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = once
 1611:      {group, ttest_sgeno},
 1612: 
 1613:      %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = true
 1614:      {group, ttest_sgent},
 1615: 
 1616:      %% Server: transport = gen_tcp(socket), active = false
 1617:      {group, ttest_sgsf},
 1618: 
 1619:      %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = false
 1620:      {group, ttest_ssockf},
 1621: 
 1622:      %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = once
 1623:      {group, ttest_ssocko},
 1624: 
 1625:      %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 1626:      {group, ttest_ssockt},
 1627: 
 1628:      %% simple: Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 1629:      {group, ttest_simple_ssockt}
 1630: 
 1631:     ].
 1632: 
 1633: 
 1634: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1635: ttest_sgenf_cases() ->
 1636:     [
 1637:      {group, ttest_sgenf_cgen},
 1638:      {group, ttest_sgenf_csock}
 1639:     ].
 1640: 
 1641: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1642: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp
 1643: ttest_sgenf_cgen_cases() ->
 1644:     [
 1645:      {group, ttest_sgenf_cgenf},
 1646:      {group, ttest_sgenf_cgeno},
 1647:      {group, ttest_sgenf_cgent}
 1648:     ].
 1649: 
 1650: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp(socket), active = false
 1651: ttest_sgsf_cases() ->
 1652:     [
 1653:      %% {group, ttest_sgenf_cgen},
 1654:      {group, ttest_sgsf_csock}
 1655:     ].
 1656: 
 1657: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1658: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1659: 
 1660: ttest_conditional_cases(Env, Default, Cases) ->
 1661:     case os:getenv(Env) of
 1662:         false ->
 1663:             Default;
 1664:         Val ->
 1665:             case list_to_atom(string:to_lower(Val)) of
 1666:                 Use when (Use =:= include) orelse 
 1667:                          (Use =:= enable) orelse 
 1668:                          (Use =:= true) ->
 1669:                     Cases;
 1670:                 _ -> % Assumed to be explicitly *disabled*
 1671:                     []
 1672:             end
 1673:     end.
 1674: 
 1675: ttest_small_conditional_cases(Cases) ->
 1676:     ttest_conditional_cases("ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_SMALL", Cases, Cases).
 1677: 
 1678: ttest_medium_conditional_cases(Cases) ->
 1679:     ttest_conditional_cases("ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_MEDIUM", [], Cases).
 1680: 
 1681: ttest_large_conditional_cases(Cases) ->
 1682:     ttest_conditional_cases("ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_LARGE", [], Cases).
 1683: 
 1684: ttest_select_conditional_cases(Small, Medium, Large) ->
 1685:     ttest_small_conditional_cases(Small) ++
 1686:         ttest_medium_conditional_cases(Medium) ++
 1687:         ttest_large_conditional_cases(Large).
 1688: 
 1689: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_cases() ->
 1690:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1691:       %% Small
 1692:       [ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp4,
 1693:        ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp6],
 1694:       %% Medium
 1695:       [ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp4,
 1696:        ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp6],
 1697:       %% Large
 1698:       [ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp4,
 1699:        ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp6]).
 1700: 
 1701: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1702: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp, active = once
 1703: ttest_sgenf_cgeno_cases() ->
 1704:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1705:       %% Small
 1706:       [ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp4,
 1707:        ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp6],
 1708:       %% Medium
 1709:       [ttest_sgenf_cgeno_medium_tcp4,
 1710:        ttest_sgenf_cgeno_medium_tcp6],
 1711:       %% Large
 1712:       [ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp4,
 1713:        ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp6]).
 1714: 
 1715: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1716: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp, active = true
 1717: ttest_sgenf_cgent_cases() ->
 1718:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1719:       %% Small
 1720:       [ttest_sgenf_cgent_small_tcp4,
 1721:        ttest_sgenf_cgent_small_tcp6],
 1722:       %% Medium
 1723:       [ttest_sgenf_cgent_medium_tcp4,
 1724:        ttest_sgenf_cgent_medium_tcp6],
 1725:       %% Large
 1726:       [ttest_sgenf_cgent_large_tcp4,
 1727:        ttest_sgenf_cgent_large_tcp6]).
 1728: 
 1729: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp, active = false
 1730: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp)
 1731: ttest_sgenf_csock_cases() ->
 1732:     [
 1733:      {group, ttest_sgenf_csockf},
 1734:      {group, ttest_sgenf_csocko},
 1735:      {group, ttest_sgenf_csockt}
 1736:     ].
 1737: 
 1738: ttest_sgenf_csockf_cases() ->
 1739:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1740:       %% Small
 1741:       [ttest_sgenf_csockf_small_tcp4,
 1742:        ttest_sgenf_csockf_small_tcp6],
 1743:       %% Medium
 1744:       [ttest_sgenf_csockf_medium_tcp4,
 1745:        ttest_sgenf_csockf_medium_tcp6],
 1746:       %% Large
 1747:       [ttest_sgenf_csockf_large_tcp4,
 1748:        ttest_sgenf_csockf_large_tcp6]).
 1749: 
 1750: ttest_sgenf_csocko_cases() ->
 1751:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1752:       %% Small
 1753:       [ttest_sgenf_csocko_small_tcp4,
 1754:        ttest_sgenf_csocko_small_tcp6],
 1755:       %% Medium
 1756:       [ttest_sgenf_csocko_medium_tcp4,
 1757:        ttest_sgenf_csocko_medium_tcp6],
 1758:       %% Large
 1759:       [ttest_sgenf_csocko_large_tcp4,

 1761: 
 1762: ttest_sgenf_csockt_cases() ->
 1763:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 1764:       %% Small
 1765:       [ttest_sgenf_csockt_small_tcp4,
 1766:        ttest_sgenf_csockt_small_tcp6],
 1767:       %% Medium
 1768:       [ttest_sgenf_csockt_medium_tcp4,
 1769:        ttest_sgenf_csockt_medium_tcp6],
 1770:       %% Large
 1771:      [ttest_sgenf_csockt_large_tcp4,
 1772:       ttest_sgenf_csockt_large_tcp6]).
 1773: 
 1774: %% Server: transport = gen_tcp(socket), active = false
 1775: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp)
 1776: ttest_sgsf_csock_cases() ->
 1777:     [
 1778:      {group, ttest_sgsf_csockf}%% ,
 1779:      %% {group, ttest_sgsf_csocko},
 1780:      %% {group, ttest_sgsf_csockt}
 1781:     ].
 1782:

 1785:       %% Small
 1786:       [ttest_sgsf_csockf_small_tcp4,

 1788:       %% Medium

 1791:       %% Large
 1792:       [ttest_sgsf_csockf_large_tcp4,

 2290: 
 2291: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2292: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp, active = once
 2293: ttest_ssockt_cgeno_cases() ->
 2294:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2295:       %% Small
 2296:       [ttest_ssockt_cgeno_small_tcp4,
 2297:        ttest_ssockt_cgeno_small_tcp6],
 2298:       %% Medium
 2299:       [ttest_ssockt_cgeno_medium_tcp4,
 2300:        ttest_ssockt_cgeno_medium_tcp6],
 2301:       %% Large
 2302:       [ttest_ssockt_cgeno_large_tcp4,
 2303:        ttest_ssockt_cgeno_large_tcp6]).
 2304: 
 2305: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2306: %% Client: transport = gen_tcp, active = true
 2307: ttest_ssockt_cgent_cases() ->
 2308:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2309:       %% Small
 2310:       [ttest_ssockt_cgent_small_tcp4,
 2311:        ttest_ssockt_cgent_small_tcp6],
 2312:       %% Medium
 2313:       [ttest_ssockt_cgent_medium_tcp4,
 2314:        ttest_ssockt_cgent_medium_tcp6],
 2315:       %% Large
 2316:       [ttest_ssockt_cgent_large_tcp4,
 2317:        ttest_ssockt_cgent_large_tcp6]).
 2318: 
 2319: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2320: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp)
 2321: ttest_ssockt_csock_cases() ->
 2322:     [
 2323:      {group, ttest_ssockt_csockf},
 2324:      {group, ttest_ssockt_csocko},
 2325:      {group, ttest_ssockt_csockt}
 2326:     ].
 2327: 
 2328: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2329: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp), active = false
 2330: ttest_ssockt_csockf_cases() ->
 2331:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2332:       %% Small
 2333:       [ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcp4,
 2334:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcp6,
 2335:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcpL],
 2336:       %% Medium
 2337:       [ttest_ssockt_csockf_medium_tcp4,
 2338:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_medium_tcp6,
 2339:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_medium_tcpL],
 2340:       %% Large
 2341:       [ttest_ssockt_csockf_large_tcp4,
 2342:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_large_tcp6,
 2343:        ttest_ssockt_csockf_large_tcpL]).
 2344: 
 2345: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2346: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp), active = once
 2347: ttest_ssockt_csocko_cases() ->
 2348:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2349:       %% Small
 2350:       [ttest_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp4,
 2351:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp6,
 2352:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_small_tcpL],
 2353:       %% Medium
 2354:       [ttest_ssockt_csocko_medium_tcp4,
 2355:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_medium_tcp6,
 2356:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_medium_tcpL],
 2357:       %% Large
 2358:       [ttest_ssockt_csocko_large_tcp4,
 2359:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_large_tcp6,
 2360:        ttest_ssockt_csocko_large_tcpL]).
 2361: 
 2362: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2363: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2364: ttest_ssockt_csockt_cases() ->
 2365:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2366:       %% Small
 2367:       [ttest_ssockt_csockt_small_tcp4,
 2368:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_small_tcp6,
 2369:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_small_tcpL],
 2370:       %% Medium
 2371:       [ttest_ssockt_csockt_medium_tcp4,
 2372:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_medium_tcp6,
 2373:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_medium_tcpL],
 2374:       %% Large
 2375:       [ttest_ssockt_csockt_large_tcp4,
 2376:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_large_tcp6,
 2377:        ttest_ssockt_csockt_large_tcpL]).
 2378: 
 2379: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2380: ttest_simple_ssockt_cases() ->
 2381:     [
 2382:      {group, ttest_simple_ssockt_csock}
 2383:     ].
 2384: 
 2385: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2386: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp)
 2387: ttest_simple_ssockt_csock_cases() ->
 2388:     [
 2389:      %% {group, ttest_simple_ssockt_csockf},
 2390:      {group, ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko}%% ,
 2391:      %% {group, ttest_simple_ssockt_csockt}
 2392:     ].
 2393: 
 2394: %% Server: transport = socket(tcp), active = true
 2395: %% Client: transport = socket(tcp), active = once
 2396: ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_cases() ->
 2397:     ttest_select_conditional_cases(
 2398:       %% Small
 2399:       [ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp4,
 2400:        ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp6,
 2401:        ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcpL],
 2402:       %% Medium
 2403:       [],
 2404:       %% Large
 2405:       []).
 2406: 
 2407: tickets_cases() ->
 2408:     [
 2409:      {group, otp16359},
 2410:      {group, otp18240},
 2411:      otp18635,
 2412:      otp19063
 2413:     ].
 2414: 
 2415: otp16359_cases() ->
 2416:     [
 2417:      otp16359_maccept_tcp4,
 2418:      otp16359_maccept_tcp6,
 2419:      otp16359_maccept_tcpL
 2420:     ].
 2421: 
 2422: 
 2423: otp18240_cases() ->
 2424:     [
 2425:      otp18240_accept_mon_leak_tcp4,
 2426:      otp18240_accept_mon_leak_tcp6
 2427:     ].
 2428: 
 2429: 
 2430: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2431: 
 2432: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
 2433:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
 2434:        "~n      Config: ~p"
 2435:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
 2436:     
 2437:     try socket:info() of
 2438:         #{} ->
 2439:             case ?KLIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
 2440:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
 2441:                     SKIP;
 2442: 
 2443:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
 2444: 
 2445:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
 2446:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
 2447: 
 2448:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
 2449:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
 2450: 
 2451:                     socket:use_registry(false),
 2452:                     case quiet_mode(Config1) of
 2453:                         default ->
 2454:                             case ?LOGGER:start() of
 2455:                                 ok ->
 2456:                                     Config1;
 2457:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 2458:                                     ?P("init_per_suite -> "
 2459:                                        "Failed starting logger"
 2460:                                        "~n   Reason: ~p"
 2461:                                        "~n", [Reason]),
 2462:                                     {skip, "Failed starting logger"}
 2463:                             end;
 2464:                         Quiet ->
 2465:                             case ?LOGGER:start(Quiet) of
 2466:                                 ok ->
 2467:                                     [{esock_test_quiet, Quiet} | Config1];
 2468:                                 {error, Reason} ->
 2469:                                     ?P("init_per_suite -> "
 2470:                                        "Failed starting logger"
 2471:                                        "~n   Reason: ~p"
 2472:                                        "~n", [Reason]),
 2473:                                     {skip, "Failed starting logger"}
 2474:                             end
 2475:                     end
 2476:             end
 2477:     catch
 2478:         error : notsup ->
 2479:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
 2480:         error : undef ->
 2481:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
 2482:     end.
 2483: 
 2484: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
 2485: 
 2486:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
 2487:        "~n      Config: ~p"
 2488:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
 2489: 
 2490:     %% Stop the local monitor
 2491:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
 2492: 
 2493:     (catch ?LOGGER:stop()),
 2494: 
 2495:     Config1 = ?KLIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
 2496: 
 2497:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
 2498:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
 2499: 
 2500:     Config1.
 2501: 
 2502: 
 2503: init_per_group(api_sendfile = GroupName, Config) ->
 2504:     io:format("init_per_group(~w) -> entry with"
 2505:               "~n   Config: ~p"
 2506:               "~n", [GroupName, Config]),
 2507:     case socket:is_supported(sendfile) of
 2508:         true ->
 2509:             Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2510:             HeaderSize = 1021, % I like prime numbers
 2511:             DataSize = 1031,  Pow2 = 16, % About 64 MB
 2512:             Header = rand:bytes(HeaderSize),
 2513:             Filler = rand:bytes(DataSize),
 2514:             Trailer = rand:bytes(HeaderSize),
 2515:             FileName = filename:join(Dir, "sendfile.bin"),
 2516:             file:write_file(
 2517:               FileName,
 2518:               [Header, double_data(Pow2, Filler), Trailer]),
 2519:             N = 1 bsl Pow2,
 2520:             [{sendfile_file,
 2521:               {FileName,
 2522:                HeaderSize + (N * DataSize) + HeaderSize,
 2523:                [Header, {N, Filler}, Trailer]}}
 2524:              | Config];
 2525:         false ->
 2526:             Config
 2527:     end;
 2528: init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
 2529:   when (GroupName =:= sc_remote_close) orelse
 2530:        (GroupName =:= sc_remote_shutdown) orelse
 2531:        (GroupName =:= traffic) ->
 2532:     io:format("init_per_group(~w) -> entry with"
 2533:               "~n   Config: ~p"
 2534:               "~n", [GroupName, Config]),
 2535:     %% Maybe we should skip the entire suite for this platform,
 2536:     %% but for now we just skip these groups, which seem to 
 2537:     %% have problems (node start).
 2538:     %% As stated elsewhere, its not really Fedora 16, but 
 2539:     %% the *really* slow VM that is the issue.
 2540:     try is_old_fedora16() of
 2541:         ok ->
 2542:             Config
 2543:     catch
 2544:         throw:{skip, _} = SKIP ->
 2545:             SKIP
 2546:     end;
 2547: init_per_group(ttest = _GroupName, Config) ->
 2548:     io:format("init_per_group(~w) -> entry with"
 2549:               "~n   Config: ~p"
 2550:               "~n", [_GroupName, Config]),
 2551:     case ttest_condition(Config) of
 2552:         ok ->
 2553:             ttest_manager_start(),
 2554:             case lists:keysearch(esock_test_ttest_runtime, 1, Config) of
 2555:                 {value, _} ->
 2556:                     Config;
 2557:                 false ->
 2558:                     [{esock_test_ttest_runtime, which_ttest_runtime_env()} |
 2559:                      Config]
 2560:             end;
 2561:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
 2562:             SKIP
 2563:     end;
 2564: init_per_group(api_async_ref, Config) ->
 2565:     [{select_handle, true} | Config];
 2566: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
 2567:     Config.
 2568: 
 2569: end_per_group(ttest = _GroupName, Config) ->
 2570:     io:format("init_per_group(~w) -> entry with"
 2571:               "~n   Config: ~p"
 2572:               "~n", [_GroupName, Config]),
 2573:     ttest_manager_stop(),
 2574:     lists:keydelete(esock_test_ttest_runtime, 1, Config);
 2575: end_per_group(api_async_ref, Config) ->
 2576:     lists:keydelete(select_handle, 1, Config);
 2577: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
 2578:     Config.
 2579: 
 2580: 
 2581: init_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
 2582:     io:format("init_per_testcase(~w) -> entry with"
 2583:               "~n   Config: ~p"
 2584:               "~n", [_TC, Config]),
 2585:     %% case quiet_mode(Config) of
 2586:     %%     default ->
 2587:     %%         ?LOGGER:start();
 2588:     %%     Quiet ->
 2589:     %%         ?LOGGER:start(Quiet)
 2590:     %% end,
 2591:     Config.
 2592: 
 2593: end_per_testcase(_TC, Config) ->
 2594:     %% ?LOGGER:stop(),
 2595:     Config.
 2596: 
 2597: 
 2598: quiet_mode(Config) ->
 2599:     case lists:keysearch(esock_test_quiet, 1, Config) of
 2600:         {value, {esock_test_quiet, Quiet}} ->
 2601:             Quiet;
 2602:         false ->
 2603:             case os:getenv("ESOCK_TEST_QUIET") of
 2604:                 "true"  -> true;
 2605:                 "false" -> false;
 2606:                 _       -> default
 2607:             end
 2608:     end.
 2609: 
 2610: double_data(0, Data) ->
 2611:     Data;
 2612: double_data(N, Data) ->
 2613:     double_data(N - 1, [Data, Data]).
 2614: 
 2615: 
 2616: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2617: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2618: %%                                                                     %%
 2619: %%                           API MISC                                  %%
 2620: %%                                                                     %%
 2621: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2622: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2623: 
 2624: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2625: 
 2626: %% This is an extremely rudimentary test case, that just tests
 2627: %% that we can call the "global" info function and that it returns
 2628: %% a non-empty map...
 2629: 
 2630: api_m_info(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2631:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2632:     tc_try(api_m_info,
 2633:            fun() ->
 2634:                    ok = api_m_info()
 2635:            end).
 2636: 
 2637: api_m_info() ->
 2638:     case socket:info() of
 2639:         Info when is_map(Info) ->
 2640:             Sz = maps:size(Info),
 2641:             if
 2642:                 (Sz > 0) ->
 2643:                     ok;
 2644:                 true ->
 2645:                     ?FAIL(no_info)
 2646:             end;
 2647:         Info ->
 2648:             ?FAIL({invalid_info, Info})
 2649:     end.
 2650: 
 2651: 
 2652: 
 2653: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2654: 
 2655: %% A simple test case that tests that the global debug can be changed.
 2656: %% At the same time, it will test the info function (since it uses it
 2657: %% for verification).
 2658: 
 2659: api_m_debug(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2660:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2661:     tc_try(api_m_debug,
 2662:            fun() -> has_bugfree_gcc() end,
 2663:            fun() ->
 2664:                    ok = api_m_debug()
 2665:            end).
 2666: 
 2667: %% For some reason this test case triggers a gcc bug, which causes
 2668: %% a segfault, on an ancient Fedora 16 VM. So, check the version of gcc...
 2669: %% Not pretty, but the simplest way to skip (without actually testing
 2670: %% for the host).
 2671: has_bugfree_gcc() ->
 2672:     has_bugfree_gcc(os:type()).
 2673: 
 2674: %% Make sure we are on linux
 2675: has_bugfree_gcc({unix, linux}) ->
 2676:     has_bugfree_gcc2(string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")));
 2677: has_bugfree_gcc(_) ->
 2678:     ok.
 2679: 
 2680: %% Make sure we are on Fedora 16
 2681: has_bugfree_gcc2("Fedora release 16 " ++ _) ->
 2682:     has_bugfree_gcc3(os:cmd("gcc --version"));
 2683: has_bugfree_gcc2("Welcome to SUSE Linux " ++ _) ->
 2684:     has_bugfree_gcc4(os:cmd("gcc --version"));
 2685: has_bugfree_gcc2(_) ->
 2686:     ok.
 2687: 
 2688: has_bugfree_gcc3("gcc (GCC) 4.6.3 20120306 (Red Hat 4.6.3-2" ++ _) ->
 2689:     skip("Buggy GCC");
 2690: has_bugfree_gcc3(_) ->
 2691:     ok.
 2692: 
 2693: has_bugfree_gcc4("gcc (SUSE Linux) 4.3.2" ++ _) ->
 2694:     skip("Buggy GCC");
 2695: has_bugfree_gcc4(_) ->
 2696:     ok.
 2697: 
 2698: api_m_debug() ->
 2699:     i("get initial info"),
 2700:     #{debug := D0} = socket:info(),
 2701:     D1 = not D0,
 2702:     i("set new debug (~w => ~w)", [D0, D1]),
 2703:     ok = socket:debug(D1),
 2704:     i("get updated info (~w)", [D1]),
 2705:     #{debug := D1} = socket:info(),
 2706:     D2 = not D1,
 2707:     i("set new debug (~w => ~w)", [D1, D2]),
 2708:     ok = socket:debug(D2),
 2709:     i("get updated info (~w)", [D2]),
 2710:     #{debug := D2} = socket:info(),
 2711:     i("ok"),
 2712:     ok.
 2713:     
 2714: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2715: 
 2716: %% Some tests for API misuses
 2717: 
 2718: -define(
 2719:    EXCEPTION(Code),
 2720:    exception(fun () -> begin Code end end)).
 2721: 
 2722: exception(Fun) ->
 2723:     try Fun() of
 2724:         Result ->
 2725:             error({unexpected_return, Result})
 2726:     catch
 2727:         Class : Reason ->
 2728:             {Class, Reason}
 2729:     end.
 2730: 
 2731: 
 2732: api_m_error_open(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2733:     %%
 2734:     %% open/1
 2735:     {error, badarg} =
 2736:         ?EXCEPTION(
 2737:            socket:open(should_be_fd) ),
 2738:     %%
 2739:     %% open/2
 2740:     {error, badarg} =
 2741:         ?EXCEPTION(
 2742:            socket:open(should_be_fd, #{}) ),
 2743:     %%
 2744:     %% A non-atom, non-integer protocol causes an exception
 2745:     %% in prim_socket, whilst a non-atom, non-integer type
 2746:     %% or domain causes an error return tuple from the NIF
 2747:     %% code.  This is a bit inconsistent.  Should we change
 2748:     %% that, if so - how, and consolidate in tests?
 2749:     %%
 2750:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
 2751:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram),
 2752:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
 2753:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type),
 2754:     %%
 2755:     %% open/3
 2756:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
 2757:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram, #{}),
 2758:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
 2759:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type, #{}),
 2760:     {error,{invalid,{protocol,should_be_protocol}}} =
 2761:         socket:open(inet, dgram, should_be_protocol),
 2762:     %%
 2763:     %% open/4
 2764:     {error,{invalid,{domain,should_be_domain}}} =
 2765:         socket:open(should_be_domain, dgram, default, #{}),
 2766:     {error,{invalid,{type,should_be_type}}} =
 2767:         socket:open(inet, should_be_type, default, #{}),
 2768:     {error,{invalid,{protocol,should_be_protocol}}} =
 2769:         socket:open(inet, dgram, should_be_protocol, #{}),
 2770:     {error, badarg} =
 2771:         ?EXCEPTION(
 2772:            socket:open(inet, dgram, default, should_be_options) ).
 2773: 
 2774: 
 2775: api_m_error_bind(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2776:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
 2777:     try
 2778:         %%
 2779:         %% bind/2
 2780:         {error, badarg} =
 2781:             ?EXCEPTION(
 2782:                socket:bind(should_be_socket, any) ),
 2783:         {error, badarg} =
 2784:             ?EXCEPTION(
 2785:                socket:bind(make_ref(), any) ),
 2786:         %%
 2787:         %% A non-map, non-atom Addr causes an {invalid,_}
 2788:         %% exception.  Should that instead be an error
 2789:         %% return?
 2790:         %%
 2791:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,should_be_sockaddr}}} =
 2792:             socket:bind(S, should_be_sockaddr),
 2793:         EmptyMap = #{},
 2794:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,family,EmptyMap}}} =
 2795:             socket:bind(S, EmptyMap),
 2796:         InvalidKey = #{family => inet, invalid_key => []},
 2797:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,{keys,[invalid_key]},InvalidKey}}} =
 2798:             socket:bind(S, InvalidKey),
 2799:         InvalidFamily = #{family => invalid_family},
 2800:         {error,{invalid,{sockaddr,InvalidFamily}}} =
 2801:             socket:bind(S, InvalidFamily)
 2802:     after
 2803:         _ = socket:close(S)
 2804:     end,
 2805:     ok.
 2806: 
 2807: 
 2808: %% XXX Lots of missing error tests here, for all other API functions...
 2809: 
 2810: 
 2811: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2812: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2813: %%                                                                     %%
 2814: %%                           API BASIC                                 %%
 2815: %%                                                                     %%
 2816: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2817: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2818: 
 2819: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2820: 
 2821: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 2822: api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2823:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2824:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2825:            fun() ->
 2826:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2827:                                  type     => dgram,
 2828:                                  protocol => udp},
 2829:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 2830:            end).
 2831: 
 2832: 
 2833: 
 2834: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2835: 
 2836: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 2837: api_b_simple_open_and_close_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2838:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2839:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2840:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 2841:            fun() ->
 2842:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 2843:                                  type     => dgram,
 2844:                                  protocol => udp},
 2845:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 2846:            end).
 2847: 
 2848: 
 2849: 
 2850: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2851: 
 2852: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 2853: api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2854:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2855:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2856:            fun() ->
 2857:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2858:                                  type     => stream,
 2859:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2860:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 2861:            end).
 2862: 
 2863: 
 2864: 
 2865: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2866: 
 2867: %% Basically open (create) and then close.
 2868: api_b_simple_open_and_close_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2869:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2870:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2871:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 2872:            fun() ->
 2873:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 2874:                                  type     => stream,
 2875:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2876:                    ok = api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState)
 2877:            end).
 2878: 
 2879: 
 2880: 
 2881: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2882: 
 2883: api_b_simple_open_and_close(InitState) ->
 2884:     Seq = 
 2885:         [
 2886:          #{desc => "open",
 2887:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 2888:                          type     := Type,
 2889:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 2890:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 2891:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2892:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 2893:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2894:                                    ERROR
 2895:                            end
 2896:                    end},
 2897: 
 2898:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 2899: 
 2900:          #{desc => "close socket",
 2901:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 2902:                            socket:close(Sock)
 2903:                    end},
 2904: 
 2905:          %% *** We are done ***
 2906:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 2907:         ],
 2908:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 2909:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 2910: 
 2911: 
 2912: 
 2913: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2914: 
 2915: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 2916: %% With some extra checks...
 2917: api_b_open_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2918:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2919:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_udp4,
 2920:            fun() ->
 2921:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2922:                                  type     => dgram,
 2923:                                  protocol => udp},
 2924:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 2925:            end).
 2926: 
 2927: 
 2928: 
 2929: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2930: 
 2931: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 2932: %% With some extra checks...
 2933: api_b_open_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2934:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2935:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_udp6,
 2936:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 2937:            fun() ->
 2938:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 2939:                                  type     => dgram,
 2940:                                  protocol => udp},
 2941:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 2942:            end).
 2943: 
 2944: 
 2945: 
 2946: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2947: 
 2948: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 2949: %% With some extra checks...
 2950: api_b_open_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2951:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2952:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_tcp4,
 2953:            fun() ->
 2954:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 2955:                                  type     => stream,
 2956:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2957:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 2958:            end).
 2959: 
 2960: 
 2961: 
 2962: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2963: 
 2964: %% Basically open (create) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 2965: %% With some extra checks...
 2966: api_b_open_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 2967:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 2968:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_info_tcp6,
 2969:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 2970:            fun() ->
 2971:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 2972:                                  type     => stream,
 2973:                                  protocol => tcp},
 2974:                    ok = api_b_open_and_info(InitState)
 2975:            end).
 2976: 
 2977: 
 2978: 
 2979: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2980: 
 2981: api_b_open_and_info(InitState) ->
 2982:     Seq = 
 2983:         [
 2984:          #{desc => "open",
 2985:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 2986:                          type     := Type,
 2987:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 2988:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 2989:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 2990:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 2991:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 2992:                                    ERROR
 2993:                            end
 2994:                    end},
 2995:          #{desc => "get socket info",
 2996:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 2997:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 2998:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got (some) Info: "
 2999:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 3000:                            {ok, State#{info => Info}}
 3001:                    end},
 3002:          #{desc => "validate socket info",
 3003:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 3004:                          type     := Type,
 3005:                          protocol := Protocol,
 3006:                          info     := #{domain        := Domain,
 3007:                                        type          := Type,
 3008:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 3009:                                        counters      := _,
 3010:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 3011:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 3012:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 3013:                            ok;
 3014:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 3015:                          type     := Type,
 3016:                          protocol := Protocol,
 3017:                          info     := Info}) ->
 3018:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info: "
 3019:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:   ~p"
 3020:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:     ~p"
 3021:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol: ~p"
 3022:                                        "~n   ~p",
 3023:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol, Info]),
 3024:                            {error, unexpected_infio}
 3025:                    end},
 3026:          #{desc => "close socket",
 3027:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 3028:                            socket:close(Sock)
 3029:                    end},
 3030: 
 3031:          %% *** We are done ***
 3032:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3033:         ],
 3034:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 3035:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 3036: 
 3037: 
 3038: 
 3039: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3040: 
 3041: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 3042: %% With some extra checks...
 3043: api_b_open_and_close_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3044:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3045:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udp4,
 3046:            fun() ->
 3047:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3048:                                  type     => dgram,
 3049:                                  protocol => udp},
 3050:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3051:            end).
 3052: 
 3053: 
 3054: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3055: 
 3056: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 3057: %% With some extra checks...
 3058: api_b_open_and_close_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3059:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3060:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udp6,
 3061:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 3062:            fun() ->
 3063:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 3064:                                  type     => dgram,
 3065:                                  protocol => udp},
 3066:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3067:            end).
 3068: 
 3069: 
 3070: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3071: 
 3072: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 3073: %% With some extra checks...
 3074: api_b_open_and_close_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3075:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3076:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcp4,
 3077:            fun() ->
 3078:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3079:                                  type     => stream,
 3080:                                  protocol => tcp},
 3081:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3082:            end).
 3083: 
 3084: 
 3085: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3086: 
 3087: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 3088: %% With some extra checks...
 3089: api_b_open_and_close_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3090:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3091:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcp6,
 3092:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 3093:            fun() ->
 3094:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3095:                                  type     => stream,
 3096:                                  protocol => tcp},
 3097:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3098:            end).
 3099: 
 3100: 
 3101: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3102: 
 3103: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain dgram (UDP) socket.
 3104: %% With some extra checks...
 3105: api_b_open_and_close_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3106:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3107:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_udpL,
 3108:            fun() ->
 3109: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3110: 		   is_not_windows()
 3111: 	   end,
 3112:            fun() ->
 3113:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 3114:                                  type     => dgram,
 3115:                                  protocol => default},
 3116:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3117:            end).
 3118: 
 3119: 
 3120: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3121: 
 3122: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain stream (TCP) socket.
 3123: %% With some extra checks...
 3124: api_b_open_and_close_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3125:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3126:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_close_tcpL,
 3127:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
 3128:            fun() ->
 3129:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 3130:                                  type     => stream,
 3131:                                  protocol => default},
 3132:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3133:            end).
 3134: 
 3135: 
 3136: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3137: 
 3138: %% Basically open (create) and close an Unix Domain dgram (UDP) socket.
 3139: %% With some extra checks...
 3140: api_b_open_and_close_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3141:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3142:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3143:            fun() ->
 3144: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3145:                    is_not_windows()
 3146: 	   end,
 3147:            fun() ->
 3148:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
 3149:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 3150:                                  protocol => default},
 3151:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3152:            end).
 3153: 
 3154: 
 3155: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3156: 
 3157: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 SCTP (seqpacket) socket.
 3158: %% With some extra checks...
 3159: api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3160:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3161:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3162:            fun() -> has_support_sctp() end,
 3163:            fun() ->
 3164:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3165:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 3166:                                  protocol => sctp},
 3167:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3168:            end).
 3169: 
 3170: 
 3171: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3172: 
 3173: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 SCTP (seqpacket) socket.
 3174: %% With some extra checks...
 3175: api_b_open_and_close_seqp_sctp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3176:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3177:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3178:            fun() ->
 3179:                    has_support_sctp(),
 3180:                    has_support_ipv6()
 3181:            end,
 3182:            fun() ->
 3183:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 3184:                                  type     => seqpacket,
 3185:                                  protocol => sctp},
 3186:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3187:            end).
 3188: 
 3189: 
 3190: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3191: 
 3192: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket.
 3193: %% With some extra checks...
 3194: api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3195:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3196:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3197:            fun() -> has_support_sctp() end,
 3198:            fun() ->
 3199:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3200:                                  type     => stream,
 3201:                                  protocol => sctp},
 3202:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3203:            end).
 3204: 
 3205: 
 3206: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3207: 
 3208: %% Basically open (create) and close an IPv6 SCTP (stream) socket.
 3209: %% With some extra checks...
 3210: api_b_open_and_close_stream_sctp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3211:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3212:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3213:            fun() ->
 3214:                    has_support_sctp(),
 3215:                    has_support_ipv6()
 3216:            end,
 3217:            fun() ->
 3218:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 3219:                                  type     => stream,
 3220:                                  protocol => sctp},
 3221:                    ok = api_b_open_and_close(InitState)
 3222:            end).
 3223: 
 3224: 
 3225: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3226: 
 3227: api_b_open_and_close(InitState) ->
 3228:     Seq = 
 3229:         [
 3230:          #{desc => "open",
 3231:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 3232:                          type     := Type,
 3233:                          protocol := Protocol} = S) -> 
 3234:                            Res = socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol), 
 3235:                            {ok, {S, Res}} 
 3236:                    end},
 3237:          #{desc => "validate open",
 3238:            cmd  => fun({S, {ok, Sock}}) -> 
 3239:                            NewS = S#{socket => Sock},
 3240:                            {ok, NewS};
 3241:                       ({_, {error, epfnosupport = Reason}}) ->
 3242:                            {skip, Reason};
 3243:                       ({_, {error, eprotonosupport = Reason}}) ->
 3244:                            {skip, Reason};
 3245:                       ({_, {error, esocktnosupport = Reason}}) ->
 3246:                            {skip, Reason};
 3247:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3248:                            ERROR
 3249:                    end},
 3250:          #{desc => "get domain (maybe)",
 3251:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = S) ->
 3252:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, domain),
 3253:                            {ok, {S, Res}}
 3254:                    end},
 3255:          #{desc => "validate domain (maybe)",
 3256:            cmd  => fun({#{domain := Domain} = S, {ok, Domain}}) -> 
 3257:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 3258:                            {ok, S};
 3259:                       ({#{domain := ExpDomain}, {ok, Domain}}) ->
 3260:                            {error, {unexpected_domain, ExpDomain, Domain}};
 3261:                       %% Some platforms do not support this option
 3262:                       ({S, {error, {invalid, _}} = ERROR}) ->
 3263:                            case
 3264:                                socket:is_supported(options, socket, domain)
 3265:                            of
 3266:                                true ->
 3267:                                    ERROR;
 3268:                                false ->
 3269:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket option 'domain' "
 3270:                                                "not supported"),
 3271:                                    {ok, S}
 3272:                            end;
 3273:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3274:                            ERROR
 3275:                    end},
 3276:          #{desc => "get type",
 3277:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 3278:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, type), 
 3279:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 3280:                    end},
 3281:          #{desc => "validate type",
 3282:            cmd  => fun({#{type := Type} = State, {ok, Type}}) ->
 3283:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected type: ~p", [Type]),
 3284:                            {ok, State};
 3285:                       ({#{type := ExpType}, {ok, Type}}) ->
 3286:                            {error, {unexpected_type, ExpType, Type}};
 3287:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3288:                            ERROR
 3289:                    end},
 3290:          #{desc => "get protocol (maybe)",
 3291:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 3292:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, protocol),
 3293:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 3294:                    end},
 3295:          #{desc => "validate protocol",
 3296:            cmd  => fun({#{protocol := Protocol} = State, {ok, Protocol}}) ->
 3297:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("expected protocol: ~p", [Protocol]),
 3298:                            {ok, State};
 3299:                       ({#{domain   := Domain,
 3300: 			  protocol := ExpProtocol}, {ok, Protocol}}) ->
 3301: 			   %% On OpenBSD (at least 6.6) something screwy happens
 3302: 			   %% when domain = local.
 3303: 			   %% It will report a completely different protocol
 3304: 			   %% (icmp) but everything still works.
 3305:                            %% So we skip if this happens on OpenBSD...
 3306: 			   case os:type() of
 3307: 			       {unix, openbsd} when (Domain =:= local) ->
 3308: 				   {skip, ?F("Unexpected protocol: ~p instead of ~p",
 3309: 					     [Protocol, ExpProtocol])};
 3310: 			       _ ->
 3311: 				   {error, {unexpected_protocol,
 3312: 					    ExpProtocol, Protocol}}
 3313: 			   end;
 3314:                       %% Some platforms do not support this option
 3315:                       ({State, {error, {invalid, _}} = ERROR}) ->
 3316: 			   case socket:is_supported(options, socket, protocol) of
 3317: 			       true ->
 3318:                                    ERROR;
 3319: 			       false ->
 3320:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket option 'protocol' "
 3321:                                                "not supported"),
 3322:                                    {ok, State}
 3323: 			   end;
 3324:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3325:                            ERROR
 3326:                    end},
 3327:          #{desc => "get controlling-process",
 3328:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 3329:                            Res = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process),
 3330:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 3331:                    end},
 3332:          #{desc => "validate controlling-process",
 3333:            cmd  => fun({State, {ok, Pid}}) ->
 3334:                            case self() of
 3335:                                Pid ->
 3336:                                    {ok, State};
 3337:                                _ ->
 3338:                                    {error, {unexpected_owner, Pid}}
 3339:                            end;
 3340:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3341:                            ERROR
 3342:                    end},
 3343:          #{desc => "close socket",
 3344:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 3345:                            Res = socket:close(Sock),
 3346:                            {ok, {State, Res}}
 3347:                    end},
 3348:          #{desc => "validate socket close",
 3349:            cmd  => fun({_, ok}) ->
 3350:                            ok;
 3351:                       ({_, {error, _} = ERROR}) ->
 3352:                            ERROR
 3353:                    end},
 3354: 
 3355:          %% *** We are done ***
 3356:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3357:         ],
 3358:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 3359:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 3360: 
 3361: 
 3362: 
 3363: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3364: 
 3365: %% Basically open (create) and (maybe) close an RAW socket.
 3366: 
 3367: api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3368:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3369:     tc_try(api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw,
 3370:            fun() ->
 3371:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 3372:                                  type     => raw,
 3373:                                  protocol => {raw, 255}},
 3374:                    ok = do_api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(InitState)
 3375:            end).
 3376: 
 3377: do_api_b_open_and_maybe_close_raw(InitState) ->
 3378:     Tester = 
 3379:         [
 3380:          #{desc => "open",
 3381:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 3382:                          type     := Type,
 3383:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 3384:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try open with:"
 3385:                                        "~n   Domain:   ~p"
 3386:                                        "~n   Type:     ~p"
 3387:                                        "~n   Protocol: ~p",
 3388:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol]),
 3389:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 3390:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 3391:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 3392:                                {error, Reason} when (Reason =:= eperm) orelse
 3393:                                                     (Reason =:= eacces) ->
 3394:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("not allowed (~w) => SKIP",
 3395:                                                [Reason]),
 3396:                                    {skip, Reason};
 3397:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3398:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("open failed:"
 3399:                                                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 3400:                                    ERROR
 3401:                            end
 3402:                    end},
 3403:          #{desc => "close socket",
 3404:            cmd  => fun(#{socket := Sock} = State) ->
 3405:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try socket close"),
 3406:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
 3407:                                ok ->
 3408:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket closed"),
 3409:                                    {ok, maps:remote(sock, State)};
 3410:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3411:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("close failed:"
 3412:                                                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
 3413:                                    ERROR
 3414:                            end
 3415:                    end},
 3416: 
 3417:          %% *** We are done ***
 3418:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3419:         ],
 3420:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Tester, InitState),
 3421:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 3422: 
 3423: 
 3424: 
 3425: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3426: 
 3427: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 3428: %% sendto and recvfrom..
 3429: api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3430:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3431:     tc_try(api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4,
 3432:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3433:            fun() ->
 3434:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 3435:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 3436:                           end,
 3437:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3438:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 3439:                           end,
 3440:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3441:                                  proto  => udp,
 3442:                                  send   => Send,
 3443:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3444:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 3445:            end).
 3446: 
 3447: 
 3448: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3449: 
 3450: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 3451: %% sendto and recvfrom.
 3452: api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3453:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3454:     tc_try(api_b_sendto_and_recvfrom_udpL,
 3455:            fun() ->
 3456:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3457: 		   is_not_windows(),
 3458:                    unix_domain_socket_host_cond()
 3459:            end,
 3460:            fun() ->
 3461:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 3462:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 3463:                           end,
 3464:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3465:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 3466:                           end,
 3467:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 3468:                                  proto  => default,
 3469:                                  send   => Send,
 3470:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3471:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 3472:            end).
 3473: 
 3474: 
 3475: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3476: 
 3477: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket
 3478: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 3479: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3480:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3481:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 3482:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3483:            fun() ->
 3484:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 3485:                                   %% We need tests for this,
 3486:                                   %% but this is not the place it.
 3487:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => ip,
 3488:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 3489:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 3490:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 3491:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 3492:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 3493:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 3494:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3495:                           end,
 3496:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3497:                                   %% We have some issues on old darwin...
 3498:                                   %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, {otp,debug}, true),
 3499:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3500:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 3501:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3502:                                           %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 3503:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 3504:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3505:                                           ERROR
 3506:                                   end
 3507:                           end,
 3508:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3509:                                  proto  => udp,
 3510:                                  send   => Send,
 3511:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3512:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 3513:            end).
 3514: 
 3515: 
 3516: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3517: 
 3518: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket
 3519: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 3520: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3521:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 3522:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udpL,
 3523:            fun() ->
 3524:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3525: 		   is_not_windows(),
 3526:                    unix_domain_socket_host_cond()
 3527:            end,
 3528:            fun() ->
 3529:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 3530:                                   %% We need tests for this,
 3531:                                   %% but this is not the place it.
 3532:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => ip,
 3533:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 3534:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 3535:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 3536:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 3537:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 3538:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 3539:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3540:                           end,
 3541:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3542:                                   %% We have some issues on old darwing...
