 3543:                                   %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 3544:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3545:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 3546:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3547:                                           %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 3548:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 3549:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3550:                                           ERROR
 3551:                                   end
 3552:                           end,
 3553:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 3554:                                  proto  => default,
 3555:                                  send   => Send,
 3556:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3557:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 3558:            end).
 3559: 
 3560: 
 3561: 
 3562: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3563: 
 3564: api_b_send_and_recv_udp(InitState) ->
 3565:     Seq = 
 3566:         [
 3567:          #{desc => "local address",
 3568:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain} = State) ->
 3569:                            LSASrc = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3570:                            LSADst = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3571:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSASrc,
 3572:                                        lsa_dst => LSADst}};
 3573:                       (#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 3574:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3575:                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
 3576:                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
 3577:                    end},
 3578: 
 3579:          #{desc => "open src socket",
 3580:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3581:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3582:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 3583:                            {ok, State#{sock_src => Sock}}
 3584:                    end},
 3585:          #{desc => "bind src socket",
 3586:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, lsa_src := LSA}) ->
 3587:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3588:                                ok ->
 3589:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 3590:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound (to ~p)", [Port]),
 3591:                                    ok;
 3592:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3593:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 3594:                                    ERROR
 3595:                            end
 3596:                    end},
 3597:          #{desc => "sockname src socket",
 3598:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 3599:                            SASrc = sock_sockname(Sock),
 3600:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("src sockaddr: "
 3601:                                        "~n   ~p", [SASrc]),
 3602:                            {ok, State#{sa_src => SASrc}}
 3603:                    end},
 3604: 
 3605:          #{desc => "open dst socket",
 3606:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 3607:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 3608:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, Proto),
 3609:                            {ok, State#{sock_dst => Sock}}
 3610:                    end},
 3611:          #{desc => "bind dst socket",
 3612:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, lsa_dst := LSA}) ->
 3613:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 3614:                                ok ->
 3615:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 3616:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound (to ~p)", [Port]),
 3617:                                    ok;
 3618:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 3619:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 3620:                                    ERROR
 3621:                            end
 3622:                    end},
 3623:          #{desc => "sockname dst socket",
 3624:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 3625:                            SADst = sock_sockname(Sock),
 3626:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("dst sockaddr: "
 3627:                                        "~n   ~p", [SADst]),
 3628:                            {ok, State#{sa_dst => SADst}}
 3629:                    end},
 3630:          #{desc => "send req (to dst)",
 3631:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
 3632:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst)
 3633:                    end},
 3634:          #{desc => "recv req (from src)",
 3635:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
 3636:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 3637:                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 3638:                                    ok;
 3639:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 3640:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 3641:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3642:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 3643:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 3644:                                    ERROR
 3645:                            end
 3646:                    end},
 3647:          #{desc => "send rep (to src)",
 3648:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 3649:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 3650:                    end},
 3651:          #{desc => "recv rep (from dst)",
 3652:            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, recv := Recv}) ->
 3653:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 3654:                                {ok, {Dst, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 3655:                                    ok;
 3656:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 3657:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 3658:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3659:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 3660:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 3661:                                    ERROR
 3662:                            end
 3663:                    end},
 3664:          #{desc => "close src socket",
 3665:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 3666:                          sock_src := Sock,
 3667:                          lsa_src  := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 3668:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3669:                            State1 =
 3670:                                unlink_path(Path,
 3671:                                            fun() -> maps:remove(lsa_src, State) end,
 3672:                                            fun() -> State end),
 3673:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State1)};
 3674:                       (#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 3675:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3676:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
 3677:                    end},
 3678:          #{desc => "close dst socket",
 3679:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 3680:                          sock_dst := Sock,
 3681:                          lsa_dst  := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 3682:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3683:                            State1 =
 3684:                                unlink_path(Path,
 3685:                                            fun() -> maps:remove(lsa_dst, State) end,
 3686:                                            fun() -> State end),
 3687:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State1)};
 3688:                       (#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 3689:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 3690:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
 3691:                    end},
 3692: 
 3693:          %% *** We are done ***
 3694:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 3695:         ],
 3696:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 3697:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 3698: 
 3699: 
 3700: 
 3701: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3702: 
 3703: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 3704: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 3705: api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3706:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3707:     tc_try(api_b_send_and_recv_tcp4,
 3708:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3709:            fun() ->
 3710:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3711:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 3712:                           end,
 3713:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3714:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 3715:                           end,
 3716:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3717:                                  type   => stream,
 3718:                                  proto  => tcp,
 3719:                                  send   => Send,
 3720:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3721:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3722:            end).
 3723: 
 3724: 
 3725: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3726: 
 3727: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 3728: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket.
 3729: api_b_send_and_recv_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3730:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3731:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3732:            fun() ->
 3733:                    has_support_sctp(),
 3734:                    has_support_ipv4()
 3735:            end,
 3736:            fun() ->
 3737:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3738:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 3739:                           end,
 3740:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3741:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 3742:                           end,
 3743:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3744:                                  type   => stream,
 3745:                                  proto  => sctp,
 3746:                                  send   => Send,
 3747:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3748:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3749:            end).
 3750: 
 3751: 
 3752: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3753: 
 3754: %% Basically send and receive using the sendv and recv functions
 3755: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 3756: api_b_sendv_and_recv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3757:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3758:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3759:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 3760:            fun() ->
 3761:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3762:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 3763:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 3764:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 3765:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, [Data]),
 3766:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 3767:                                   Res
 3768:                           end,
 3769:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3770:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 3771:                           end,
 3772:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3773:                                  type   => stream,
 3774:                                  proto  => tcp,
 3775:                                  send   => Send,
 3776:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3777:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3778:            end).
 3779: 
 3780: 
 3781: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3782: 
 3783: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 3784: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 3785: api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3786:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3787:     tc_try(api_b_send_and_recv_tcpL,
 3788:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
 3789:            fun() ->
 3790:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3791:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 3792:                           end,
 3793:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3794:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 3795:                           end,
 3796:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 3797:                                  type   => stream,
 3798:                                  proto  => default,
 3799:                                  send   => Send,
 3800:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3801:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3802:            end).
 3803: 
 3804: 
 3805: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3806: 
 3807: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 3808: %% on an Unix Domain seqpacket socket.
 3809: api_b_send_and_recv_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3810:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3811:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3812:            fun() ->
 3813: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3814:                    is_not_windows()
 3815: 	   end,
 3816:            fun() ->
 3817:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3818:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 3819:                           end,
 3820:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3821:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 3822:                           end,
 3823:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 3824:                                  type   => seqpacket,
 3825:                                  proto  => default,
 3826:                                  send   => Send,
 3827:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3828:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3829:            end).
 3830: 
 3831: 
 3832: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3833: 
 3834: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 3835: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 3836: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3837:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3838:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4,
 3839:            fun() ->
 3840:                    is_not_windows(),
 3841:                    has_support_ipv4()
 3842:            end,
 3843:            fun() ->
 3844:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3845:                                   Msg = #{%% ctrl => CMsgs,
 3846:                                           iov => [Data]},
 3847:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3848:                           end,
 3849:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3850:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3851:                                       {ok, #{addr  := _} = Addr} ->
 3852:                                           {error, {addr, Addr}};
 3853:                                       {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3854:                                           {ok, Data};
 3855:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 3856:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3857:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3858:                                           ERROR
 3859:                                   end
 3860:                           end,
 3861:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 3862:                                  type   => stream,
 3863:                                  proto  => tcp,
 3864:                                  send   => Send,
 3865:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3866:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3867:            end).
 3868: 
 3869: 
 3870: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3871: 
 3872: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 3873: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 3874: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3875:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3876:     tc_try(api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcpL,
 3877:            fun() ->
 3878: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3879: 		   is_not_windows()
 3880: 	   end,
 3881:            fun() ->
 3882:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3883:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 3884:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3885:                           end,
 3886:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3887:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3888:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 3889:                                       %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 3890:                                       {ok, #{addr  := #{family := local},
 3891:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3892:                                           socket:setopt(Sock, 
 3893:                                                         otp, 
 3894:                                                         debug, 
 3895:                                                         false),
 3896:                                           {ok, Data};
 3897:                                       {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 3898:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3899:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 3900:                                       %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 3901:                                       {ok, #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3902:                                           {ok, Data};
 3903:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 3904:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3905:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3906:                                           socket:setopt(Sock, 
 3907:                                                         otp, 
 3908:                                                         debug, 
 3909:                                                         false),
 3910:                                           ERROR
 3911:                                   end
 3912:                           end,
 3913:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
 3914:                                  type   => stream,
 3915:                                  proto  => default,
 3916:                                  send   => Send,
 3917:                                  recv   => Recv},
 3918:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3919:            end).
 3920: 
 3921: 
 3922: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3923: 
 3924: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 3925: %% on an Unix Domain (stream) socket (TCP).
 3926: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_seqpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 3927:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 3928:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 3929:            fun() ->
 3930: 		   has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 3931:                    is_not_windows()
 3932: 	   end,
 3933:            fun() ->
 3934:                    Send =
 3935:                        fun(Sock, Data) ->
 3936:                                Msg =
 3937:                                    #{iov => [Data]},
 3938:                                socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 3939:                        end,
 3940:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 3941:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 3942:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 3943:                                       %% *is* provided (e.g. linux)
 3944:                                       {ok,
 3945:                                        #{addr  := #{family := local},
 3946:                                          iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3947:                                           socket:setopt(
 3948:                                             Sock, otp, debug, false),
 3949:                                           {ok, Data};
 3950:                                       {ok, #{addr := _} = Msg} ->
 3951:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3952:                                       %% On some platforms, the address
 3953:                                       %% is *not* provided (e.g. FreeBSD)
 3954:                                       {ok,
 3955:                                        #{iov   := [Data]}} ->
 3956:                                           {ok, Data};
 3957:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 3958:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 3959:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 3960:                                           socket:setopt(
 3961:                                             Sock, otp, debug, false),
 3962:                                           ERROR
 3963:                                   end
 3964:                           end,
 3965:                    InitState =
 3966:                        #{domain => local,
 3967:                          type   => seqpacket,
 3968:                          proto  => default,
 3969:                          send   => Send,
 3970:                          recv   => Recv},
 3971:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 3972:            end).
 3973: 
 3974: 
 3975: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 3976: 
 3977: api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState) ->
 3978:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3979: 
 3980:     ServerSeq = 
 3981:         [
 3982:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 3983:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 3984:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 3985:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 3986:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 3987:                    end},
 3988:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 3989:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 3990:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 3991:                            ok
 3992:                    end},
 3993: 
 3994:          %% *** Init part ***
 3995:          #{desc => "which local address",
 3996:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 3997:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 3998: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
 3999:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 4000:                    end},
 4001:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 4002:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 4003:                          type := Type,
 4004:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 4005:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4006:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4007:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 4008:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 4009:                                    {skip, Reason};
 4010:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4011:                                    ERROR
 4012:                            end
 4013:                    end},
 4014:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 4015:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 4016:                          lsock  := LSock,
 4017:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 4018: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try bind to: "
 4019: 				       "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 4020: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 4021:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 4022:                                ok ->
 4023:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
 4024: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4025:                                    ok;
 4026:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4027: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4028: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 4029: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4030:                                    ERROR
 4031:                            end;
 4032:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 4033:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 4034:                                ok ->
 4035:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 4036:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 4037:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 4038:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4039:                                    ERROR
 4040:                            end
 4041:                    end},
 4042:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 4043:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 4044:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 4045:                    end},
 4046:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4047:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 4048:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
 4049:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 4050:                            ok;
 4051:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 4052:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 4053:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 4054:                            ok
 4055:                    end},
 4056: 
 4057:          %% The actual test
 4058:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 4059:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4060:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 4061:                    end},
 4062:          #{desc => "await connection",
 4063:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 4064: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept"),
 4065:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 4066:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4067:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 4068:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 4069:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4070:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("accept failed: "
 4071: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4072:                                    ERROR
 4073:                            end
 4074:                    end},
 4075:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 4076:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4077:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 4078:                            ok
 4079:                    end},
 4080:          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 4081:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 4082:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 4083:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 4084:                                    ok;
 4085:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4086:                                    ERROR
 4087:                            end
 4088:                    end},
 4089:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 4090:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4091:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 4092:                            ok
 4093:                    end},
 4094:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 4095:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4096:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 4097:                    end},
 4098:          #{desc => "send reply",
 4099:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 4100:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 4101:                    end},
 4102:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 4103:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4104:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 4105:                            ok
 4106:                    end},
 4107: 
 4108:          %% *** Termination ***
 4109:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4110:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4111:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4112:                                ok ->
 4113:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4114:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4115:                                    ERROR
 4116:                            end
 4117:                    end},
 4118:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 4119:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 4120:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4121:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 4122:                    end},
 4123:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 4124:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 4125:                          lsock    := Sock,
 4126:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 4127:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4128:                            State1 =
 4129:                                unlink_path(Path,
 4130:                                            fun() ->
 4131:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 4132:                                            end,
 4133:                                            fun() -> State end),
 4134:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 4135:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 4136:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 4137:                                ok ->
 4138:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 4139:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4140:                                    ERROR
 4141:                            end
 4142:                    end},
 4143: 
 4144:          %% *** We are done ***
 4145:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4146:         ],
 4147: 
 4148:     ClientSeq =
 4149:         [
 4150:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 4151:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4152:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
 4153:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4154:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
 4155:                       (State) ->
 4156:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4157:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 4158:                    end},
 4159:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4160:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4161:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4162:                            ok
 4163:                    end},
 4164: 
 4165:          %% *** The init part ***
 4166:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 4167:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
 4168:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
 4169:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4170:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
 4171:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
 4172:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 4173:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4174:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 4175:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 4176:                    end},
 4177:          #{desc => "create socket",
 4178:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 4179:                          type := Type,
 4180:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 4181:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4182:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4183:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 4184:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4185:                                    ERROR
 4186:                            end
 4187:                    end},
 4188:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 4189:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 4190:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 4191:                                ok ->
 4192:                                    ok;
 4193:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4194:                                    ERROR
 4195:                            end
 4196:                    end},
 4197:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4198:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4199:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 4200:                            ok
 4201:                    end},
 4202: 
 4203:          %% *** The actual test ***
 4204:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 4205:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4206:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 4207:                    end},
 4208:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 4209:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 4210:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 4211:                    end},
 4212:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 4213:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4214:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 4215:                            ok
 4216:                    end},
 4217:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 4218:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4219:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 4220:                    end},
 4221:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 4222:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 4223:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 4224:                    end},
 4225:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 4226:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4227:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 4228:                            ok
 4229:                    end},
 4230:          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 4231:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 4232:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 4233:                            ok
 4234:                    end},
 4235:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 4236:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4237:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 4238:                            ok
 4239:                    end},
 4240: 
 4241:          %% *** Termination ***
 4242:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4243:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4244:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4245:                                ok ->
 4246:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4247:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4248:                                    ERROR
 4249:                            end
 4250:                    end},
 4251:          #{desc => "close socket",
 4252:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 4253:                          sock     := Sock,
 4254:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 4255:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4256:                            State1 =
 4257:                                unlink_path(Path,
 4258:                                            fun() ->
 4259:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 4260:                                            end,
 4261:                                            fun() -> State end),
 4262:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 4263:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 4264:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4265:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 4266:                    end},
 4267: 
 4268:          %% *** We are done ***
 4269:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4270:         ],
 4271: 
 4272:     TesterSeq =
 4273:         [
 4274:          %% *** Init part ***
 4275:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 4276:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 4277:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4278:                            ok
 4279:                    end},
 4280:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 4281:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 4282:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4283:                            ok
 4284:                    end},
 4285: 
 4286:          %% Start the server
 4287:          #{desc => "order server start",
 4288:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 4289:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4290:                            ok
 4291:                    end},
 4292:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 4293:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 4294:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 4295:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 4296:                    end},
 4297: 
 4298:          %% Start the client
 4299:          #{desc => "order client start",
 4300:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 4301:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 4302:                            ok
 4303:                    end},
 4304:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 4305:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 4306:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 4307:                    end},
 4308: 
 4309:          %% *** The actual test ***
 4310:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 4311:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4312:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 4313:                            ok
 4314:                    end},
 4315:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 4316:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 4317:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4318:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 4319:                            ok
 4320:                    end},
 4321:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 4322:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4323:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 4324:                    end},
 4325:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 4326:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4327:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 4328:                    end},
 4329:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 4330:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4331:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 4332:                            ok
 4333:                    end},
 4334:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 4335:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4336:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 4337:                    end},
 4338:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 4339:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4340:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 4341:                    end},
 4342:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 4343:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4344:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 4345:                            ok
 4346:                    end},
 4347:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 4348:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4349:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 4350:                    end},
 4351:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 4352:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4353:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 4354:                    end},
 4355: 
 4356: 
 4357:          %% *** Termination ***
 4358:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 4359:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4360:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 4361:                            ok
 4362:                    end},
 4363:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 4364:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 4365:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 4366:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 4367:                            {ok, State1}
 4368:                    end},
 4369:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 4370:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4371:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 4372:                            ok
 4373:                    end},
 4374:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 4375:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 4376:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 4377:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 4378:                            {ok, State1}
 4379:                    end},
 4380: 
 4381:          %% *** We are done ***
 4382:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4383:         ],
 4384: 
 4385:     i("start server evaluator"),
 4386:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 4387: 
 4388:     i("start client evaluator"),
 4389:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4390:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 4391: 
 4392:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 4393:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 4394:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 4395:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 4396: 
 4397:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 4398: 
 4399: 
 4400: 
 4401: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4402: 
 4403: -define(REQ_IOV_SND, [<<0:32>>,
 4404:                       <<1:32>>,
 4405:                       <<2:32>>,
 4406:                       <<3:32>>,
 4407:                       <<4:32>>,
 4408:                       <<5:32>>,
 4409:                       <<6:32>>,
 4410:                       <<7:32>>,
 4411:                       <<8:32>>,
 4412:                       <<9:32>>]).
 4413: -define(REQ_IOV_RCV, erlang:iolist_to_binary(?REQ_IOV_SND)).
 4414: -define(REP_IOV_SND, [<<10:32>>,
 4415:                       <<11:32>>,
 4416:                       <<12:32>>,
 4417:                       <<13:32>>,
 4418:                       <<14:32>>,
 4419:                       <<15:32>>,
 4420:                       <<16:32>>,
 4421:                       <<17:32>>,
 4422:                       <<18:32>>,
 4423:                       <<19:32>>]).
 4424: -define(REP_IOV_RCV, erlang:iolist_to_binary(?REP_IOV_SND)).
 4425: 
 4426: ensure_sufficient_iov_max() ->
 4427:     case socket:info() of
 4428:         #{iov_max := IOVMax} ->
 4429:             IOVUsed = length(?REQ_IOV_SND),
 4430:             if
 4431:                 IOVMax >= IOVUsed ->
 4432:                     ok;
 4433:                 true ->
 4434:                     skip({iov_max, IOVMax, IOVUsed})
 4435:             end;
 4436:         _ ->
 4437:             skip(no_info)
 4438:     end.
 4439:     
 4440: 
 4441: %% Basically send a I/O vector and receive using the sendv and recv
 4442: %% functions on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 4443: api_b_sendv_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4444:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 4445:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4446:            fun() ->
 4447:                    has_support_ipv4(),
 4448:                    ensure_sufficient_iov_max()
 4449:            end,
 4450:            fun() ->
 4451:                    Send = fun(Sock, IOV) when is_list(IOV) ->
 4452:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 4453:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 4454:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 4455:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, IOV),
 4456:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 4457:                                   Res
 4458:                           end,
 4459:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 4460:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 4461:                           end,
 4462:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4463:                                  type   => stream,
 4464:                                  proto  => tcp,
 4465:                                  send   => Send,
 4466:                                  recv   => Recv},
 4467:                    ok = api_b_sendv(InitState)
 4468:            end).
 4469: 
 4470: 
 4471: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4472: 
 4473: %% Basically send a I/O vector and receive using the sendv and recv
 4474: %% functions on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 4475: api_b_sendv_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4476:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 4477:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4478:            fun() ->
 4479:                    has_support_ipv6(),
 4480:                    ensure_sufficient_iov_max()
 4481:            end,
 4482:            fun() ->
 4483:                    Send = fun(Sock, IOV) when is_list(IOV) ->
 4484:                                   %% Since we are just reusing this test case,
 4485:                                   %% the I/O vector is just one binary.
 4486:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 4487:                                   Res = socket:sendv(Sock, IOV),
 4488:                                   %% _ = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 4489:                                   Res
 4490:                           end,
 4491:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 4492:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
 4493:                           end,
 4494:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 4495:                                  type   => stream,
 4496:                                  proto  => tcp,
 4497:                                  send   => Send,
 4498:                                  recv   => Recv},
 4499:                    ok = api_b_sendv(InitState)
 4500:            end).
 4501: 
 4502: 
 4503: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4504: 
 4505: api_b_sendv(InitState) ->
 4506:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4507: 
 4508:     ServerSeq = 
 4509:         [
 4510:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 4511:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4512:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 4513:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4514:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 4515:                    end},
 4516:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4517:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4518:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4519:                            ok
 4520:                    end},
 4521: 
 4522:          %% *** Init part ***
 4523:          #{desc => "which local address",
 4524:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 4525:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4526: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
 4527:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 4528:                    end},
 4529:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 4530:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 4531:                          type   := Type,
 4532:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 4533:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4534:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4535:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 4536:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 4537:                                    {skip, Reason};
 4538:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4539:                                    ERROR
 4540:                            end
 4541:                    end},
 4542:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 4543:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 4544:                          lsock  := LSock,
 4545:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
 4546: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try bind to: "
 4547: 				       "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
 4548: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 4549:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 4550:                                ok ->
 4551:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
 4552: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4553:                                    ok;
 4554:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4555: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4556: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 4557: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4558:                                    ERROR
 4559:                            end;
 4560:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 4561:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 4562:                                ok ->
 4563:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 4564:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 4565:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 4566:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4567:                                    ERROR
 4568:                            end
 4569:                    end},
 4570:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 4571:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 4572:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 4573:                    end},
 4574:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4575:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
 4576:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
 4577:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
 4578:                            ok;
 4579:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 4580:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 4581:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 4582:                            ok
 4583:                    end},
 4584: 
 4585:          %% The actual test
 4586:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 4587:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4588:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 4589:                    end},
 4590:          #{desc => "await connection",
 4591:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 4592: 			   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 4593: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept"),
 4594:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 4595:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4596: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4597:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 4598:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 4599:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 4600: 				   %% _ = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 4601:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("accept failed: "
 4602: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 4603:                                    ERROR
 4604:                            end
 4605:                    end},
 4606:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 4607:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4608:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 4609:                            ok
 4610:                    end},
 4611: 
 4612:          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 4613:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 4614:                            Rep = ?REQ_IOV_RCV,
 4615:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 4616:                                {ok, Rep} ->
 4617:                                    ok;
 4618:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4619:                                    ERROR
 4620:                            end
 4621:                    end},
 4622: 
 4623:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 4624:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4625:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 4626:                            ok
 4627:                    end},
 4628:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 4629:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4630:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 4631:                    end},
 4632:          #{desc => "send reply",
 4633:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 4634:                            Send(Sock, ?REP_IOV_SND)
 4635:                    end},
 4636:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 4637:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4638:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 4639:                            ok
 4640:                    end},
 4641: 
 4642:          %% *** Termination ***
 4643:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4644:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4645:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4646:                                ok ->
 4647:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4648:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4649:                                    ERROR
 4650:                            end
 4651:                    end},
 4652:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 4653:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 4654:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4655:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 4656:                    end},
 4657:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 4658:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 4659:                          lsock    := Sock,
 4660:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 4661:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4662:                            State1 =
 4663:                                unlink_path(Path,
 4664:                                            fun() ->
 4665:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 4666:                                            end,
 4667:                                            fun() -> State end),
 4668:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
 4669:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 4670:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 4671:                                ok ->
 4672:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 4673:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4674:                                    ERROR
 4675:                            end
 4676:                    end},
 4677: 
 4678:          %% *** We are done ***
 4679:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4680:         ],
 4681: 
 4682:     ClientSeq =
 4683:         [
 4684:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 4685:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 4686:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
 4687:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4688:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
 4689:                       (State) ->
 4690:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 4691:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 4692:                    end},
 4693:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 4694:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4695:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 4696:                            ok
 4697:                    end},
 4698: 
 4699:          %% *** The init part ***
 4700:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 4701:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
 4702:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
 4703:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4704:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
 4705:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
 4706:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 4707:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4708:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 4709:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 4710:                    end},
 4711:          #{desc => "create socket",
 4712:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 4713:                          type := Type,
 4714:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 4715:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
 4716:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 4717:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 4718:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4719:                                    ERROR
 4720:                            end
 4721:                    end},
 4722:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 4723:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 4724:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 4725:                                ok ->
 4726:                                    ok;
 4727:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4728:                                    ERROR
 4729:                            end
 4730:                    end},
 4731:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 4732:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 4734:                            ok
 4735:                    end},
 4736: 
 4737:          %% *** The actual test ***
 4738:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 4739:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4740:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 4741:                    end},
 4742:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 4743:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 4744:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 4745:                    end},
 4746:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 4747:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4748:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 4749:                            ok
 4750:                    end},
 4751:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 4752:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 4753:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 4754:                    end},
 4755: 
 4756:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 4757:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 4758:                            Send(Sock, ?REQ_IOV_SND)
 4759:                    end},
 4760: 
 4761:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 4762:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4763:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 4764:                            ok
 4765:                    end},
 4766:          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 4767:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 4768:                            Rep = ?REP_IOV_RCV,
 4769:                            {ok, Rep} = Recv(Sock),
 4770:                            ok
 4771:                    end},
 4772:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 4773:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 4774:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 4775:                            ok
 4776:                    end},
 4777: 
 4778:          %% *** Termination ***
 4779:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 4780:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 4781:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 4782:                                ok ->
 4783:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 4784:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4785:                                    ERROR
 4786:                            end
 4787:                    end},
 4788:          #{desc => "close socket",
 4789:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 4790:                          sock     := Sock,
 4791:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
 4792:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4793:                            State1 =
 4794:                                unlink_path(Path,
 4795:                                            fun() ->
 4796:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
 4797:                                            end,
 4798:                                            fun() -> State end),
 4799:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
 4800:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 4801:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 4802:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 4803:                    end},
 4804: 
 4805:          %% *** We are done ***
 4806:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4807:         ],
 4808: 
 4809:     TesterSeq =
 4810:         [
 4811:          %% *** Init part ***
 4812:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 4813:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 4814:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4815:                            ok
 4816:                    end},
 4817:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 4818:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 4819:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 4820:                            ok
 4821:                    end},
 4822: 
 4823:          %% Start the server
 4824:          #{desc => "order server start",
 4825:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 4826:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 4827:                            ok
 4828:                    end},
 4829:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 4830:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 4831:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 4832:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 4833:                    end},
 4834: 
 4835:          %% Start the client
 4836:          #{desc => "order client start",
 4837:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 4838:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 4839:                            ok
 4840:                    end},
 4841:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 4842:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 4843:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 4844:                    end},
 4845: 
 4846:          %% *** The actual test ***
 4847:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 4848:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4849:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 4850:                            ok
 4851:                    end},
 4852:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 4853:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 4854:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4855:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 4856:                            ok
 4857:                    end},
 4858:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 4859:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4860:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 4861:                    end},
 4862:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 4863:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4864:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 4865:                    end},
 4866:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 4867:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4868:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 4869:                            ok
 4870:                    end},
 4871:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 4872:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4873:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 4874:                    end},
 4875:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 4876:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4877:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 4878:                    end},
 4879:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 4880:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4881:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 4882:                            ok
 4883:                    end},
 4884:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 4885:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4886:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 4887:                    end},
 4888:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 4889:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4890:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 4891:                    end},
 4892: 
 4893: 
 4894:          %% *** Termination ***
 4895:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 4896:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 4897:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 4898:                            ok
 4899:                    end},
 4900:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 4901:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 4902:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 4903:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 4904:                            {ok, State1}
 4905:                    end},
 4906:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 4907:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 4908:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 4909:                            ok
 4910:                    end},
 4911:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 4912:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 4913:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 4914:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 4915:                            {ok, State1}
 4916:                    end},
 4917: 
 4918:          %% *** We are done ***
 4919:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 4920:         ],
 4921: 
 4922:     i("start server evaluator"),
 4923:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 4924: 
 4925:     i("start client evaluator"),
 4926:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 4927:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 4928: 
 4929:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 4930:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 4931:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 4932:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 4933: 
 4934:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 4935: 
 4936: 
 4937: 
 4938: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4939: 
 4940: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket
 4941: %% using sendmsg and recvmsg.
 4942: api_b_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_stream_sctp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 4943:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 4944:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 4945:            fun() ->
 4946: 		   has_support_sctp(),
 4947:                    has_support_ipv4()%% ,
 4948: 		   %% not_yet_implemented()
 4949: 	   end,
 4950:            fun() ->
 4951:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 4952:                                   %% CMsg  = #{level => sctp,
 4953:                                   %%              type  => tos,
 4954:                                   %%              data  => reliability},
 4955:                                   %% CMsgs = [CMsg],
 4956:                                   Msg = #{%% ctrl => CMsgs,
 4957:                                           iov  => [Data]},
 4958:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 4959:                           end,
 4960:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 4961:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
 4962:                                       {ok, #{flags := [eor],
 4963:                                              addr  := _,
 4964:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 4965:                                           {ok, Data};
 4966:                                       {ok, Msg} ->
 4967:                                           {error, {msg, Msg}};
 4968:                                       %% {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 4969:                                       %%        iov   := [Data]}} ->
 4970:                                       %%     {ok, {Source, Data}};
 4971:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 4972:                                           ERROR
 4973:                                   end
 4974:                           end,
 4975:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 4976:                                  type   => stream,
 4977:                                  proto  => sctp,
 4978:                                  send   => Send,
 4979:                                  recv   => Recv},
 4980:                    %% ok = api_b_send_and_recv_sctp(InitState)
 4981:                    ok = api_b_send_and_recv_conn(InitState)
 4982:            end).
 4983: 
 4984: 
 4985: 
 4986: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 4987: 
 4988: %% api_b_send_and_recv_sctp(_InitState) ->
 4989: %%     Seq = 
 4990: %%         [
 4991: %%          #{desc => "local address",
 4992: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 4993: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 4994: %%                            {ok, State#{lsa_src => LSA,
 4995: %%                                        lsa_dst => LSA}}
 4996: %%                    end},
 4997: 
 4998: %%          #{desc => "open src socket",
 4999: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 5000: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 5001: %%                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto),
 5002: %%                            {ok, State#{sock_src => Sock}}
 5003: %%                    end},
 5004: %%          #{desc => "bind src",
 5005: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, lsa_src := LSA}) ->
 5006: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5007: %%                                ok ->
 5008: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 5009: %%                                    ok;
 5010: %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5011: %%                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 5012: %%                                    ERROR
 5013: %%                            end
 5014: %%                    end},
 5015: %%          #{desc => "sockname src socket",
 5016: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 5017: %%                            SASrc = sock_sockname(Sock),
 5018: %%                            ?SEV_IPRINT("src sockaddr: "
 5019: %%                                        "~n   ~p", [SASrc]),
 5020: %%                            {ok, State#{sa_src => SASrc}}
 5021: %%                    end},
 5022: 
 5023: %%          #{desc => "open dst socket",
 5024: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 5025: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 5026: %%                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto),
 5027: %%                            {ok, State#{sock_dst => Sock}}
 5028: %%                    end},
 5029: %%          #{desc => "bind dst",
 5030: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, lsa_dst := LSA}) ->
 5031: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5032: %%                                ok ->
 5033: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("src bound"),
 5034: %%                                    ok;
 5035: %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5036: %%                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("src bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
 5037: %%                                    ERROR
 5038: %%                            end
 5039: %%                    end},
 5040: %%          #{desc => "sockname dst socket",
 5041: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 5042: %%                            SADst = sock_sockname(Sock),
 5043: %%                            ?SEV_IPRINT("dst sockaddr: "
 5044: %%                                        "~n   ~p", [SADst]),
 5045: %%                            {ok, State#{sa_dst => SADst}}
 5046: %%                    end},
 5047: %%          #{desc => "send req (to dst)",
 5048: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, send := Send}) ->
 5049: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Dst)
 5050: %%                    end},
 5051: %%          #{desc => "recv req (from src)",
 5052: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, recv := Recv}) ->
 5053: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5054: %%                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 5055: %%                                    ok;
 5056: %%                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 5057: %%                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 5058: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5059: %%                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 5060: %%                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 5061: %%                                    ERROR
 5062: %%                            end
 5063: %%                    end},
 5064: %%          #{desc => "send rep (to src)",
 5065: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock, sa_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 5066: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 5067: %%                    end},
 5068: %%          #{desc => "recv rep (from dst)",
 5069: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock, sa_dst := Dst, recv := Recv}) ->
 5070: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5071: %%                                {ok, {Dst, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 5072: %%                                    ok;
 5073: %%                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 5074: %%                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 5075: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5076: %%                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 5077: %%                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 5078: %%                                    ERROR
 5079: %%                            end
 5080: %%                    end},
 5081: %%          #{desc => "close src socket",
 5082: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_src := Sock} = State) ->
 5083: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5084: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_src, State)}
 5085: %%                    end},
 5086: %%          #{desc => "close dst socket",
 5087: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock_dst := Sock} = State) ->
 5088: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5089: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock_dst, State)}
 5090: %%                    end},
 5091: 
 5092: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 5093: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5094: %%         ],
 5095: %%     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 5096: %%     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 5097: 
 5098: %%     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5099: %%     ServerSeq = 
 5100: %%         [
 5101: %%          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5102: %%          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5103: %%            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5104: %%                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5105: %%                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5106: %%                    end},
 5107: %%          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5108: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5109: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5110: %%                            ok
 5111: %%                    end},
 5112: 
 5113: %%          %% *** Init part ***
 5114: %%          #{desc => "which local address",
 5115: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5116: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5117: %%                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 5118: %%                    end},
