 5119: %%          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
 5120: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 5121: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 5122: %%                            case socket:open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto) of
 5123: %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5124: %%                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 5125: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5126: %%                                    ERROR
 5127: %%                            end
 5128: %%                    end},
 5129: %%          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5130: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 5131: %%                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
 5132: %%                                ok ->
 5133: %%                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 5134: %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 5135: %%                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 5136: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5137: %%                                    ERROR
 5138: %%                            end
 5139: %%                    end},
 5140: %%          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 5141: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 5142: %%                            socket:listen(LSock)
 5143: %%                    end},
 5144: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5145: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 5146: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 5147: %%                            ok
 5148: %%                    end},
 5149: 
 5150: %%          %% The actual test
 5151: %%          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 5152: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5153: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 5154: %%                    end},
 5155: %%          #{desc => "accepting (await connection) FAKE",
 5156: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5157: %% 			   {ok, State#{csock => LSock}}
 5158: %%                    end},
 5159: %% %%          #{desc => "accepting (await connection)",
 5160: %% %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5161: %% %% 			   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
 5162: %% %%                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 5163: %% %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5164: %% %% 				   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 5165: %% %%                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 5166: %% %%                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 5167: %% %%                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5168: %% %% 				   socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, false),
 5169: %% %% 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed accepting: "
 5170: %% %% 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5171: %% %%                                    ERROR
 5172: %% %%                            end
 5173: %% %%                    end},
 5174: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 5175: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5176: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 5177: %%                            ok
 5178: %%                    end},
 5179: %%          #{desc => "await (recv) request",
 5180: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5181: %%                            case Recv(Sock) of
 5182: %%                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 5183: %%                                    ok;
 5184: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5185: %%                                    ERROR
 5186: %%                            end
 5187: %%                    end},
 5188: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 5189: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5190: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 5191: %%                            ok
 5192: %%                    end},
 5193: %%          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
 5194: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5195: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 5196: %%                    end},
 5197: %%          #{desc => "send reply",
 5198: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5199: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 5200: %%                    end},
 5201: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 5202: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5203: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 5204: %%                            ok
 5205: %%                    end},
 5206: 
 5207: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 5208: %%          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5209: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5210: %%                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5211: %%                                ok ->
 5212: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5213: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5214: %%                                    ERROR
 5215: %%                            end
 5216: %%                    end},
 5217: %%          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 5218: %%            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 5219: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5220: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 5221: %%                    end},
 5222: %%          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 5223: %%            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 5224: %%                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 5225: %%                                ok ->
 5226: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 5227: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5228: %%                                    ERROR
 5229: %%                            end
 5230: %%                    end},
 5231: 
 5232: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 5233: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5234: %%         ],
 5235: 
 5236: %%     ClientSeq = 
 5237: %%         [
 5238: %%          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 5239: %%          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5240: %%            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5241: %%                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5242: %%                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 5243: %%                    end},
 5244: %%          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5245: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5246: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5247: %%                            ok
 5248: %%                    end},
 5249: 
 5250: %%          %% *** The init part ***
 5251: %%          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 5252: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 5253: %%                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5254: %%                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 5255: %%                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 5256: %%                    end},
 5257: %%          #{desc => "create socket",
 5258: %%            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 5259: %%                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
 5260: %%                            case socket:open(Domain, seqpacket, Proto) of
 5261: %%                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5262: %%                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5263: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5264: %%                                    ERROR
 5265: %%                            end
 5266: %%                    end},
 5267: %%          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5268: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 5269: %%                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5270: %%                                ok ->
 5271: %%                                    ok;
 5272: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5273: %%                                    ERROR
 5274: %%                            end
 5275: %%                    end},
 5276: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5277: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5278: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 5279: %%                            ok
 5280: %%                    end},
 5281: 
 5282: %%          %% *** The actual test ***
 5283: %%          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 5284: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5285: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 5286: %%                    end},
 5287: %%          #{desc => "connect to server",
 5288: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 5289: %%                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
 5290: %% 			       ok ->
 5291: %% 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("connected"),
 5292: %% 				   ok;
 5293: %% 			       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5294: %% 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed connect: "
 5295: %% 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5296: %% 				   ERROR
 5297: %% 			   end
 5298: %%                    end},
 5299: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 5300: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5301: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 5302: %%                            ok
 5303: %%                    end},
 5304: %%          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 5305: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5306: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 5307: %%                    end},
 5308: %%          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 5309: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 5310: %%                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 5311: %%                    end},
 5312: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 5313: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5314: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 5315: %%                            ok
 5316: %%                    end},
 5317: %%          #{desc => "await recv reply (from server)",
 5318: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 5319: %%                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 5320: %%                            ok
 5321: %%                    end},
 5322: %%          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 5323: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5324: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 5325: %%                            ok
 5326: %%                    end},
 5327: 
 5328: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 5329: %%          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5330: %%            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5331: %%                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5332: %%                                ok ->
 5333: %%                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5334: %%                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5335: %%                                    ERROR
 5336: %%                            end
 5337: %%                    end},
 5338: %%          #{desc => "close socket",
 5339: %%            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5340: %%                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 5341: %%                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5342: %%                    end},
 5343: 
 5344: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 5345: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5346: %%         ],
 5347: 
 5348: %%     TesterSeq =
 5349: %%         [
 5350: %%          %% *** Init part ***
 5351: %%          #{desc => "monitor server",
 5352: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5353: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5354: %%                            ok
 5355: %%                    end},
 5356: %%          #{desc => "monitor client",
 5357: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5358: %%                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5359: %%                            ok
 5360: %%                    end},
 5361: 
 5362: %%          %% Start the server
 5363: %%          #{desc => "order server start",
 5364: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 5365: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 5366: %%                            ok
 5367: %%                    end},
 5368: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 5369: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 5370: %%                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 5371: %%                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 5372: %%                    end},
 5373: 
 5374: %%          %% Start the client
 5375: %%          #{desc => "order client start",
 5376: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 5377: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 5378: %%                            ok
 5379: %%                    end},
 5380: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 5381: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 5382: %%                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 5383: %%                    end},
 5384: 
 5385: %%          %% *** The actual test ***
 5386: %%          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 5387: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5388: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 5389: %%                            ok
 5390: %%                    end},
 5391: %%          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5392: %%          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 5393: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5394: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 5395: %%                            ok
 5396: %%                    end},
 5397: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 5398: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5399: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 5400: %%                    end},
 5401: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 5402: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5403: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 5404: %%                    end},
 5405: %%          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request)",
 5406: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5407: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 5408: %%                            ok
 5409: %%                    end},
 5410: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request)",
 5411: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5412: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 5413: %%                    end},
 5414: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv)",
 5415: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5416: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 5417: %%                    end},
 5418: %%          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
 5419: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5420: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 5421: %%                            ok
 5422: %%                    end},
 5423: %%          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
 5424: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5425: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 5426: %%                    end},
 5427: %%          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 5428: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5429: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
 5430: %%                    end},
 5431: 
 5432: 
 5433: %%          %% *** Termination ***
 5434: %%          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 5435: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 5436: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 5437: %%                            ok
 5438: %%                    end},
 5439: %%          #{desc => "await client termination",
 5440: %%            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 5441: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 5442: %%                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 5443: %%                            {ok, State1}
 5444: %%                    end},
 5445: %%          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 5446: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 5447: %%                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 5448: %%                            ok
 5449: %%                    end},
 5450: %%          #{desc => "await server termination",
 5451: %%            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 5452: %%                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 5453: %%                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 5454: %%                            {ok, State1}
 5455: %%                    end},
 5456: 
 5457: %%          %% *** We are done ***
 5458: %%          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5459: %%         ],
 5460: 
 5461: %%     i("start server evaluator"),
 5462: %%     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 5463: 
 5464: %%     i("start client evaluator"),
 5465: %%     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 5466: %%     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 5467: 
 5468: %%     i("start tester evaluator"),
 5469: %%     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 5470: %%                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 5471: %%     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 5472: 
 5473: %%     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 5474: 
 5475: %%     ok.
 5476: 
 5477: 
 5478: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5479: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5480: %%                                                                     %%
 5481: %%                           API IOV                                   %%
 5482: %%                                                                     %%
 5483: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5484: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5485: 
 5486: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5487:     has_support_ipv4(),
 5488:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(inet).
 5489: %%
 5490: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5491:     has_support_ipv6(),
 5492:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(inet6).
 5493: %%
 5494: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5495:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 5496:     is_not_windows(), % on Windows, local only works for stream sockets
 5497:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(local).
 5498: 
 5499: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5500:     has_support_ipv4(),
 5501:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 5502:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(inet).
 5503: %%
 5504: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5505:     has_support_ipv6(),
 5506:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 5507:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(inet6).
 5508: %%
 5509: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5510:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 5511:     is_not_windows(), % sendmsg does not work on Windows
 5512:     api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(local).
 5513: 
 5514: 
 5515: api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram(Domain) ->
 5516:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> entry with"
 5517:        "~n   Domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 5518:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5519:     #{iov_max := IOVMax} = socket:info(),
 5520:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> IOVMax: ~p", [IOVMax]),
 5521:     IOV =
 5522:         lists:map(
 5523:           fun (N) -> <<(rand:uniform(N) - 1)>> end,
 5524:           lists:duplicate(IOVMax, 256)),
 5525:     IOVTooLarge = IOV ++ IOV,
 5526:     Data = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOV),
 5527:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: create socket"),
 5528:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, dgram, #{debug => true}),
 5529:     try
 5530: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: create socket"),
 5531:         {ok, Sb} = socket:open(Domain, dgram),
 5532:         try
 5533: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: bind socket"),
 5534:             ok = socket:bind(Sa, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 5535: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: bind socket"),
 5536:             ok = socket:bind(Sb, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 5537: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: get sockname"),
 5538:             {ok, Aa} = socket:sockname(Sa),
 5539: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: get sockname"),
 5540:             {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sb),
 5541:             %%
 5542: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: sendmsg"),
 5543:             ok = socket:sendmsg(Sa, #{addr => Ab, iov => IOV}),
 5544: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: recvfrom"),
 5545:             {ok, {Aa, Data}} = socket:recvfrom(Sb),
 5546:             %%
 5547: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: sendmsg (too large => fail)"),
 5548:             {error, {invalid, _}} =
 5549:                 socket:sendmsg(Sb, #{addr => Aa, iov => IOVTooLarge}),
 5550: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> done"),
 5551:             ok
 5552:         after
 5553: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> b: close socket"),
 5554:             socket:close(Sb)
 5555:         end
 5556:     after
 5557: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_dgram -> a: close socket"),
 5558:         socket:close(Sa)
 5559:     end.
 5560: 
 5561: api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream(Domain) ->
 5562:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> entry with"
 5563:        "~n   Domain: ~p", [Domain]),
 5564:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 5565:     #{iov_max := IOVMax} = socket:info(),
 5566:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> IOVMax: ~p", [IOVMax]),
 5567:     IOV =
 5568:         lists:map(
 5569:           fun (N) -> <<(rand:uniform(N) - 1)>> end,
 5570:           lists:duplicate(IOVMax, 256)),
 5571:     IOVTooLarge = IOV ++ IOV,
 5572:     Data = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOV),
 5573:     DataTooLarge = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOVTooLarge),
 5574:     ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> create stream socket a"),
 5575:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 5576:     try
 5577:         case os:type() of
 5578:             {win32,nt} ->
 5579: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream-> [win] a: bind socket"),
 5580:                 ok = socket:bind(Sa, which_local_socket_addr(Domain));
 5581:             _ ->
 5582:                 ok
 5583:         end,
 5584: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> create stream socket b"),
 5585:         {ok, Sb} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 5586:         try
 5587: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: bind socket"),
 5588:             ok = socket:bind(Sb, which_local_socket_addr(Domain)),
 5589: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: get sockname"),
 5590:             {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sb),
 5591: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> b: make socket listen"),
 5592:             ok = socket:listen(Sb),
 5593: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: connect socket to b"),
 5594:             ok = socket:connect(Sa, Ab),
 5595: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: get sockname"),
 5596:             {ok, Aa} = socket:sockname(Sa),
 5597: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: get peername"),
 5598:             {ok, Ab} = socket:peername(Sa),
 5599: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> accept connection (=> c)"),
 5600:             {ok, Sc} = socket:accept(Sb),
 5601:             try
 5602: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: get sockname"),
 5603:                 {ok, Ab} = socket:sockname(Sc),
 5604: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: get peername"),
 5605:                 {ok, Aa} = socket:peername(Sc),
 5606:                 %%
 5607: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: sendmsg"),
 5608:                 ok = socket:sendmsg(Sa, #{iov => IOV}),
 5609: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: recv"),
 5610:                 {ok, Data} =
 5611:                     socket:recv(Sc, byte_size(Data)),
 5612: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> c: sendmsg (too large)"),
 5613:                 ok = socket:sendmsg(Sc, #{iov => IOVTooLarge}),
 5614: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> a: recv"),
 5615:                 {ok, DataTooLarge} =
 5616:                     socket:recv(Sa, byte_size(DataTooLarge)),
 5617: 		?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> done"),
 5618:                 ok
 5619:             catch
 5620:                 error:notsup = Reason:_ ->
 5621: 		    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> notsup"),
 5622:                     exit({skip, Reason})
 5623:             after
 5624:                 socket:close(Sc)
 5625:             end
 5626:         after
 5627: 	    ?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> after - b: close socket"),
 5628:             socket:close(Sb)
 5629:         end
 5630:     after
 5631: 	?P("api_b_sendmsg_iov_stream -> after - a: close socket"),
 5632:         socket:close(Sa)
 5633:     end.
 5634: 
 5635: 
 5636: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5637: 
 5638: %% Basically connect, send and receive using the "common" functions
 5639: %% (send and recv) on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 5640: api_b_dgram_connect_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5641:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 5642:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 5643:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 5644:            fun() ->
 5645:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
 5646:                                  type   => dgram,
 5647:                                  proto  => udp},
 5648:                    ok = api_b_dgram_connect(InitState)
 5649:            end).
 5650: 
 5651: 
 5652: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5653: 
 5654: %% Basically connect, send and receive using the "common" functions
 5655: %% (send and recv) on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 5656: api_b_dgram_connect_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 5657:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 5658:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 5659:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 5660:            fun() ->
 5661:                    InitState = #{domain => inet6,
 5662:                                  type   => dgram,
 5663:                                  proto  => udp},
 5664:                    ok = api_b_dgram_connect(InitState)
 5665:            end).
 5666: 
 5667: 
 5668: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5669: 
 5670: api_b_dgram_connect(InitState) ->
 5671:     PeerSeq = 
 5672:         [
 5673:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 5674:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 5675:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 5676:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 5677:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 5678:                    end},
 5679:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 5680:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 5681:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 5682:                            ok
 5683:                    end},
 5684: 
 5685:          %% *** Init part ***
 5686:          #{desc => "which local address",
 5687:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 5688:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 5689:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 5690:                    end},
 5691: 
 5692:          #{desc => "open",
 5693:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
 5694:                          type   := Type,
 5695:                          proto  := Protocol} = State) ->
 5696:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 5697:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 5698:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 5699:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason}
 5700:                                  when (Reason =:= epfnosupport)    orelse
 5701:                                       (Reason =:= eprotonosupport) orelse
 5702:                                       (Reason =:= esocktnosupport) ->
 5703:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("failed open: ~p => SKIP",
 5704:                                                [Reason]),
 5705:                                    {skip, Reason};
 5706:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5707:                                    ERROR
 5708:                            end
 5709:                    end},
 5710: 
 5711:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 5712:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
 5713:                          sock     := Sock,
 5714:                          local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 5715:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
 5716:                                ok ->
 5717:                                    {ok, State#{sock_sa => LSA}};
 5718:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 5719: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("failed binding: "
 5720: 					       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 5721:                                    ERROR
 5722:                            end;
 5723:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 5724:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA#{port => 0}) of
 5725:                                ok ->
 5726:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 5727:                                    {ok, State#{sock_sa => LSA#{port => Port}}};
 5728:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5729:                                    ERROR
 5730:                            end
 5731:                    end},
 5732: 
 5733:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 5734:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock_sa := SSA}) ->
 5735:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, SSA),
 5736:                            ok
 5737:                    end},
 5738: 
 5739:          %% The actual test
 5740:          #{desc => "await continue (peer sa)",
 5741:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5742:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect) of
 5743:                                {ok, PeerSA} ->
 5744:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Peer SA:"
 5745:                                                "~n   ~p", [PeerSA]),
 5746:                                    {ok, State#{peer_sa => PeerSA}};
 5747:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5748:                                    ERROR
 5749:                            end
 5750:                    end},
 5751: 
 5752:          #{desc => "connect",
 5753:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, peer_sa := PSA}) ->
 5754:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try connect"),
 5755:                            socket:connect(Sock, PSA)
 5756:                    end},
 5757: 
 5758:          #{desc => "announce ready (connected)",
 5759:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5760:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connected),
 5761:                            ok
 5762:                    end},
 5763: 
 5764:          %% The actual test
 5765:          #{desc => "await continue (send and recv)",
 5766:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5767:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester,
 5768:                                                     tester, send_and_recv) of
 5769:                                {ok, Role} ->
 5770:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("role: ~p", [Role]),
 5771:                                    {ok, State#{role => Role}};
 5772:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5773:                                    ERROR
 5774:                            end
 5775:                    end},
 5776: 
 5777:          #{desc => "send (client) or recv (server) request",
 5778:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, role := client}) ->
 5779:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[client] try send request"),
 5780:                            socket:send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ);
 5781:                       (#{sock := Sock, role := server}) ->
 5782:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[server] try recv request"),
 5783:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
 5784:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 5785:                                    ok;
 5786:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5787:                                    ERROR
 5788:                            end
 5789:                    end},
 5790: 
 5791:          #{desc => "recv (client) send (server) reply",
 5792:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, role := client}) ->
 5793:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[client] try recv reply"),
 5794:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
 5795:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REP} ->
 5796:                                    ok;
 5797:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5798:                                    ERROR
 5799:                            end;
 5800:                       (#{sock := Sock, role := server}) ->
 5801:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[server] try send reply"),
 5802:                            socket:send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 5803:                    end},
 5804: 
 5805:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_and_recv)",
 5806:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 5807:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_and_recv),
 5808:                            ok
 5809:                    end},
 5810: 
 5811: 
 5812:          %% *** Termination ***
 5813:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 5814:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 5815:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 5816:                                ok ->
 5817:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 5818:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 5819:                                    ERROR
 5820:                            end
 5821:                    end},
 5822:          #{desc => "close socket",
 5823:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 5824:                            socket:close(Sock),
 5825:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 5826:                    end},
 5827: 
 5828:          %% *** We are done ***
 5829:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5830:         ],
 5831: 
 5832: 
 5833:     TesterSeq =
 5834:         [
 5835:          %% *** Init part ***
 5836:          #{desc => "monitor peer 1",
 5837:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5838:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5839:                            ok
 5840:                    end},
 5841:          #{desc => "monitor peer 2",
 5842:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5843:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 5844:                            ok
 5845:                    end},
 5846: 
 5847:          #{desc => "order peer 1 start",
 5848:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid}) ->
 5849:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid)
 5850:                    end},
 5851:          #{desc => "order peer 2 start",
 5852:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid}) ->
 5853:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid)
 5854:                    end},
 5855: 
 5856:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (init)",
 5857:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = State) ->
 5858:                            {ok, PeerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, init),
 5859:                            {ok, State#{peer_1_sa => PeerSA}}
 5860:                    end},
 5861:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (init)",
 5862:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = State) ->
 5863:                            {ok, PeerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, init),
 5864:                            {ok, State#{peer_2_sa => PeerSA}}
 5865:                    end},
 5866: 
 5867: 
 5868:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to continue (with connect)",
 5869:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid, peer_2_sa := PeerSA} = _State) ->
 5870:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, PeerSA),
 5871:                            ok
 5872:                    end},
 5873:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to continue (with connect)",
 5874:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid, peer_1_sa := PeerSA} = _State) ->
 5875:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect, PeerSA),
 5876:                            ok
 5877:                    end},
 5878: 
 5879: 
 5880:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (connected)",
 5881:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5882:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, connected)
 5883:                    end},
 5884:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (connected)",
 5885:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5886:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, connected)
 5887:                    end},
 5888: 
 5889: 
 5890: 
 5891:          %% We should pick one to issue the request
 5892:          %% (and the other is then to *await* the request
 5893:          %%  and respond).
 5894: 
 5895: 
 5896: 
 5897:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to continue (with send_and_recv)",
 5898:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5899:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_and_recv, client),
 5900:                            ok
 5901:                    end},
 5902:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to continue (with send_and_recv)",
 5903:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5904:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_and_recv, server),
 5905:                            ok
 5906:                    end},
 5907: 
 5908: 
 5909:          #{desc => "await peer 1 ready (send_and_recv)",
 5910:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5911:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer1, send_and_recv)
 5912:                    end},
 5913:          #{desc => "await peer 2 ready (send_and_recv)",
 5914:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5915:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, peer2, send_and_recv)
 5916:                    end},
 5917: 
 5918: 
 5919:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5920: 
 5921: 
 5922:          %% *** Termination ***
 5923:          #{desc => "order peer 1 to terminate",
 5924:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5925:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5926:                            ok
 5927:                    end},
 5928:          #{desc => "await peer 1 termination",
 5929:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_1 := Pid} = State) ->
 5930:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid),
 5931:                            State1 = maps:remove(peer_1, State),
 5932:                            {ok, State1}
 5933:                    end},
 5934:          #{desc => "order peer 2 to terminate",
 5935:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 5936:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 5937:                            ok
 5938:                    end},
 5939:          #{desc => "await peer 2 termination",
 5940:            cmd  => fun(#{peer_2 := Pid} = State) ->
 5941:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid),
 5942:                            State1 = maps:remove(peer_2, State),
 5943:                            {ok, State1}
 5944:                    end},
 5945: 
 5946: 
 5947:          %% *** We are done ***
 5948:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 5949:         ],
 5950: 
 5951: 
 5952:     Peer1  = ?SEV_START("peer 1", PeerSeq,   InitState),
 5953:     Peer2  = ?SEV_START("peer 2", PeerSeq,   InitState),
 5954:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, #{peer_1 => Peer1#ev.pid,
 5955:                                                peer_2 => Peer2#ev.pid}),
 5956:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Peer1, Peer2, Tester]).
 5957: 
 5958: 
 5959: 
 5960: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5961: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5962: %%                                                                     %%
 5963: %%                           API SENDFILE                              %%
 5964: %%                                                                     %%
 5965: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5966: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 5967: 
 5968: api_sendfile_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5969:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5970:     has_support_ipv4(),
 5971:     api_sendfile(inet, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 5972: 
 5973: api_sendfile_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5974:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5975:     has_support_ipv6(),
 5976:     api_sendfile(inet6, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 5977: 
 5978: api_sendfile_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5979:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5980:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 5981:     api_sendfile(local, Config, fun socket:sendfile/2).
 5982: 
 5983: 
 5984: 
 5985: api_sendfile_loop_inet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5986:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5987:     has_support_ipv4(),
 5988:     api_sendfile(inet, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 5989: 
 5990: api_sendfile_loop_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5991:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5992:     has_support_ipv6(),
 5993:     api_sendfile(inet6, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 5994: 
 5995: api_sendfile_loop_local(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5996:     has_support_sendfile(),
 5997:     has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
 5998:     api_sendfile(local, Config, fun sendfile_loop/2).
 5999: 
 6000: 
 6001: sendfile_loop(Sa, F) ->
 6002:     sendfile_loop(Sa, F, 0).
 6003: 
 6004: sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont, Offset) ->
 6005:     SelectHandle = make_ref(),
 6006:     case socket:sendfile(Sa, Cont, Offset, 0, SelectHandle) of
 6007:         {select, Select} ->
 6008:             receive
 6009:                 {'$socket', Sa, select, SelectHandle} ->
 6010:                     case Select of
 6011:                         {{select_info, _, _} = Cont_1, BytesSent} ->
 6012:                             sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont_1, Offset + BytesSent);
 6013:                         {select_info, _, _} = Cont_1 ->
 6014:                             sendfile_loop(Sa, Cont_1, Offset)
 6015:                     end;
 6016:                 {'$socket', Sa, abort, {SelectHandle, Reason}} ->
 6017:                     {error, {Reason, Offset}}
 6018:             end;
 6019:         {ok, BytesSent} ->
 6020:             {ok, Offset + BytesSent};
 6021:         {error, Reason} = Error ->
 6022:             io:format(
 6023:               "sendfile_loop(~p, ~p, ~p) -> ~p.~n",
 6024:               [Sa, Cont, Offset, Error]),
 6025:             {error, {Reason, Offset}}
 6026:     end.
 6027: 
 6028: 
 6029: 
 6030: api_sendfile(Domain, Config, Sendfile) ->
 6031:     case proplists:get_value(sendfile_file, Config) of
 6032:         undefined ->
 6033:             {skip, sendfile_not_supported};
 6034:         {File, Size, Data} ->
 6035:             api_sendfile(Domain, File, Size, Data, Sendfile)
 6036:     end.
 6037: 
 6038: api_sendfile(Domain, File, Size, Data, Sendfile) ->
 6039:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 6040:     TC = self(),
 6041:     BufSize = Size bsr 10, % /1k
 6042:     BindAddr = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6043:     case BindAddr of
 6044:         #{family := local, path := Path} ->
 6045:             _ =
 6046:                 spawn(
 6047:                   fun () ->
 6048:                           Mref = monitor(process, TC),
 6049:                           receive
 6050:                               {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, _} ->
 6051:                                   unlink_path(Path)
 6052:                           end
 6053:                   end),
 6054:             ok;
 6055:         #{family := _} ->
 6056:             ok
 6057:     end,
 6058:     io:format("BindAddr = ~p~n", [BindAddr]),
 6059:     {ok, F} = file:open(File, [raw, read, binary]),
 6060:     io:format("F = ~p~n", [F]),
 6061:     {ok, L} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 6062:     io:format("L = ~p~n", [L]),
 6063:     ok = socket:bind(L, BindAddr),
 6064:     ok = socket:listen(L),
 6065:     {ok, Addr} = socket:sockname(L),
 6066:     io:format("Addr = ~p~n", [Addr]),
 6067:     {ok, Sa} = socket:open(Domain, stream),
 6068:     io:format("Sa = ~p~n", [Sa]),
 6069:     ok = socket:setopt(Sa, {socket,sndbuf}, BufSize),
 6070:     ok = socket:connect(Sa, Addr),
 6071:     {ok, Sb} = socket:accept(L),
 6072:     io:format("Sb = ~p~n", [Sb]),
 6073:     ok = socket:setopt(Sb, {socket,rcvbuf}, BufSize),
 6074:     Verifyer =
 6075:         spawn_link(
 6076:           fun () ->
 6077:                   TC ! {self(), api_sendfile_verify(Sb, Data, 0)}
 6078:           end),
 6079:     io:format("Verifyer = ~p~n", [Verifyer]),
 6080:     %%
 6081:     SendfileResult = Sendfile(Sa, F),
 6082:     io:format("SendfileResult = ~p~n", [SendfileResult]),
 6083:     %%
 6084:     receive
 6085:         {Verifyer, VerifyerResult} ->
 6086:             io:format("VerifyerResult = ~p~n", [VerifyerResult]),
 6087:             case {SendfileResult, VerifyerResult} of
 6088:                 {{ok, Size}, {ok, Size}} ->
 6089:                     ok;
 6090:                 Other ->
 6091:                     ?FAIL({bad_result, Other})
 6092:             end
 6093:     end.
 6094: 
 6095: api_sendfile_verify(_S, [], M) ->
 6096:     {ok, M};
 6097: api_sendfile_verify(S, [Block | Data], M) when is_binary(Block) ->
 6098:     api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, 1);
 6099: api_sendfile_verify(S, [{N, Block} | Data], M) ->
 6100:     api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, N).
 6101: 
 6102: api_sendfile_verify_block(S, Data, M, Block, N) ->
 6103:     if
 6104:         0 < N ->
 6105:             ByteSize = byte_size(Block),
 6106:             case socket:recv(S, ByteSize, 2000) of
 6107:                 {ok, Block} ->
 6108:                     api_sendfile_verify_block(
 6109:                       S, Data, M + ByteSize, Block, N - 1);
 6110:                 Other ->
 6111:                     {error_at, M, Other}
 6112:             end;
 6113:         true ->
 6114:             api_sendfile_verify(S, Data, M)
 6115:     end.
 6116: 
 6117: 
 6118: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6119: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6120: %%                                                                     %%
 6121: %%                           API FROM FD                               %%
 6122: %%                                                                     %%
 6123: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6124: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6125: 
 6126: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6127: 
 6128: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6129: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6130: %% With some extra checks...
 6131: %% IPv4
 6132: %% Without dup
 6133: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6134:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6135:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp4,
 6136:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6137:            fun() ->
 6138:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6139:                                  type     => dgram,
 6140:                                  protocol => udp,
 6141:                                  dup      => false},
 6142:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6143:            end).
 6144: 
 6145: 
 6146: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6147: 
 6148: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6149: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6150: %% With some extra checks...
 6151: %% IPv6
 6152: %% Without dup
 6153: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6154:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6155:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_udp6,
 6156:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6157:            fun() ->
 6158:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6159:                                  type     => dgram,
 6160:                                  protocol => udp,
 6161:                                  dup      => false},
 6162:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6163:            end).
 6164: 
 6165: 
 6166: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6167: 
 6168: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6169: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6170: %% With some extra checks...
 6171: %% IPv4
 6172: %% With dup
 6173: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6174:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6175:     tc_try(api_ffd_wd_open_and_info_udp4,
 6176:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6177:            fun() ->
 6178:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6179:                                  type     => dgram,
 6180:                                  protocol => udp,
 6181:                                  dup      => true},
 6182:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6183:            end).
 6184: 
 6185: 
 6186: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6187: 
 6188: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6189: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6190: %% With some extra checks...
 6191: %% IPv6
 6192: %% With dup
 6193: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6194:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6195:     tc_try(api_ffd_wd_open_and_info_udp6,
 6196:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6197:            fun() ->
 6198:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6199:                                  type     => dgram,
 6200:                                  protocol => udp,
 6201:                                  dup      => true},
 6202:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6203:            end).
 6204: 
 6205: 
 6206: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6207: 
 6208: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6209: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 6210: %% With some extra checks...
 6211: %% IPv6
 6212: %% Without dup
 6213: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6214:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6215:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp4,
 6216:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6217:            fun() ->
 6218:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6219:                                  type     => stream,
 6220:                                  protocol => tcp,
 6221:                                  dup      => false},
 6222:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6223:            end).
 6224: 
 6225: 
 6226: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6227: 
 6228: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6229: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 6230: %% With some extra checks...
 6231: %% IPv6
 6232: %% Without dup
 6233: api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6234:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6235:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wod_and_info_tcp6,
 6236:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6237:            fun() ->
 6238:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6239:                                  type     => stream,
 6240:                                  protocol => tcp,
 6241:                                  dup      => false},
 6242:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6243:            end).
 6244: 
 6245: 
 6246: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6247: 
 6248: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6249: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 6250: %% With some extra checks...
 6251: %% IPv6
 6252: %% With dup
 6253: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6254:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6255:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp4,
 6256:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6257:            fun() ->
 6258:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6259:                                  type     => stream,
 6260:                                  protocol => tcp,
 6261:                                  dup      => true},
 6262:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6263:            end).
 6264: 
 6265: 
 6266: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6267: 
 6268: %% Basically open (create) a socket from an already existing 
 6269: %% file descriptor (FD) and info of an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 6270: %% With some extra checks...
 6271: %% IPv6
 6272: %% With dup
 6273: api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6274:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6275:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_wd_and_info_tcp6,
 6276:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6277:            fun() ->
 6278:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6279:                                  type     => stream,
 6280:                                  protocol => tcp,
 6281:                                  dup      => true},
 6282:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState)
 6283:            end).
 6284: 
 6285: 
 6286: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6287: 
 6288: api_ffd_open_and_info(InitState) ->
 6289:     Seq = 
 6290:         [
 6291:          #{desc => "open",
 6292:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 6293:                          type     := Type,
 6294:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) -> 
 6295:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Protocol) of
 6296:                                {ok, Sock1} ->
 6297:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1}};
 6298:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6299:                                    ERROR
 6300:                            end
 6301:                    end},
 6302:          #{desc => "get socket (1) FD",
 6303:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1} = State) ->
 6304:                            case socket:getopt(Sock1, otp, fd) of
 6305:                                {ok, FD} ->
 6306:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 6307:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 6308:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6309:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 6310:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6311:                                    ERROR
 6312:                            end
 6313:                    end},
 6314:          #{desc => "check if we need to provide protocol or not",
 6315:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1} = State) ->
 6316:                            case socket:getopt(Sock1, socket, protocol) of
 6317:                                {ok, _} ->
 6318:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("protocol accessible"),
 6319:                                    {ok, State#{provide_protocol => false}};
 6320:                                {error, Reason} ->
 6321:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("failed get protocol: "
 6322:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6323:                                    {ok, State#{provide_protocol => true}}
 6324:                            end
 6325:                    end},
 6326:          #{desc => "open with FD",
 6327:            cmd  => fun(#{fd               := FD,
 6328:                          dup              := DUP,
 6329:                          provide_protocol := true,
 6330:                          protocol         := Protocol} = State) -> 
 6331:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup      => DUP,
 6332:                                                   protocol => Protocol}) of
 6333:                                {ok, Sock2} ->
 6334:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket 2 open"),
 6335:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock2}};
 6336:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6337:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed open socket with FD (~w): "
 6338:                                                "~n   ~p", [FD, Reason]),
 6339:                                    ERROR
 6340:                            end;
 6341:                       (#{fd               := FD,
 6342:                          dup              := DUP,
 6343:                          provide_protocol := false} = State) -> 
 6344:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup => DUP}) of
 6345:                                {ok, Sock2} ->
 6346:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("socket 2 open"),
 6347:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock2}};
 6348:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6349:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed open socket with FD (~w): "
 6350:                                                "~n   ~p", [FD, Reason]),
 6351:                                    ERROR
 6352:                            end
 6353:                    end},
 6354:          #{desc => "get socket (1) info",
 6355:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
 6356:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6357:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 6358:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6359:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got Info: "
 6360:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 6361:                            {ok, State#{info1 => Info}}
 6362:                    end},
 6363:          #{desc => "get socket (2) info",
 6364:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State) ->
 6365:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
 6366:                            Info = socket:info(Sock),
 6367:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
 6368:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Got Info: "
 6369:                                        "~n   ~p", [Info]),
 6370:                            {ok, State#{info2 => Info}}
 6371:                    end},
 6372:          #{desc => "validate socket (1) info",
 6373:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 6374:                          type     := Type,
 6375:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6376:                          info1    := #{domain        := Domain,
 6377:                                        type          := Type,
 6378:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 6379:                                        ctype         := normal,
 6380:                                        counters      := _,
 6381:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 6382:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 6383:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 6384:                            ok;
 6385:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 6386:                          type     := Type,
 6387:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6388:                          info     := Info}) ->
 6389:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 1: "
 6390:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 6391:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 6392:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 6393:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 6394:                                        "~n   ~p",
 6395:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol, normal, Info]),
 6396:                            {error, unexpected_infio}
 6397:                    end},
 6398:          #{desc => "validate socket (2) info",
 6399:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 6400:                          type     := Type,
 6401:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6402:                          fd       := _FD,
 6403:                          dup      := false,
 6404:                          info2    := #{domain        := Domain,
 6405:                                        type          := Type,
 6406:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 6407:                                        ctype         := fromfd,
 6408:                                        counters      := _,
 6409:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 6410:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 6411:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 6412:                            ok;
 6413:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 6414:                          type     := Type,
 6415:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6416:                          fd       := _FD,
 6417:                          dup      := false,
 6418:                          info     := Info}) ->
 6419:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 2: "
 6420:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 6421:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 6422:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 6423:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 6424:                                        "~n   ~p",
 6425:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol,
 6426:                                         fromfd, Info]),
 6427:                            {error, unexpected_info};
 6428:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 6429:                          type     := Type,
 6430:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6431:                          fd       := FD,
 6432:                          dup      := true,
 6433:                          info2    := #{domain        := Domain,
 6434:                                        type          := Type,
 6435:                                        protocol      := Protocol,
 6436:                                        ctype         := {fromfd, FD},
 6437:                                        counters      := _,
 6438:                                        num_readers   := 0,
 6439:                                        num_writers   := 0,
 6440:                                        num_acceptors := 0}}) ->
 6441:                            ok;
 6442:                       (#{domain   := Domain,
 6443:                          type     := Type,
 6444:                          protocol := Protocol,
 6445:                          fd       := FD,
 6446:                          dup      := true,
 6447:                          info     := Info}) ->
 6448:                            ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Info for socket 2: "
 6449:                                        "~n   (expected) Domain:      ~p"
 6450:                                        "~n   (expected) Type:        ~p"
 6451:                                        "~n   (expected) Protocol:    ~p"
 6452:                                        "~n   (expected) Create Type: ~p"
 6453:                                        "~n   ~p",
 6454:                                        [Domain, Type, Protocol,
 6455:                                         {fromfd, FD}, Info]),
 6456:                            {error, unexpected_info}
 6457:                    end},
 6458:          #{desc => "close socket (1)",
 6459:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
 6460:                            socket:close(Sock)
 6461:                    end},
 6462:          #{desc => "close socket (2)",
 6463:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
 6464:                            socket:close(Sock)
 6465:                    end},
 6466: 
 6467:          %% *** We are done ***
 6468:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6469:         ],
 6470:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
 6471:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
 6472: 
 6473: 
 6474: 
 6475: 
 6476: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6477: 
 6478: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 6479: %% its file descriptor *without* dup.
 6480: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 6481: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 6482: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 6483: %% IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6484: %%
 6485: %% <WARNING>
 6486: %%
 6487: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 6488: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 6489: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convient way
 6490: %% to test it!
 6491: %%
 6492: %% </WARNING>
 6493: %%
 6494: api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6495:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6496:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp4,
 6497:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6498:            fun() ->
 6499:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6500:                                  type     => dgram,
 6501:                                  protocol => udp,
 6502:                                  dup      => false},
 6503:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 6504:            end).
 6505: 
 6506: 
 6507: 
 6508: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6509: 
 6510: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 6511: %% its file descriptor *without* dup.
 6512: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 6513: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 6514: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 6515: %% IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6516: %%
 6517: %% <WARNING>
 6518: %%
 6519: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 6520: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 6521: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convient way
 6522: %% to test it!
 6523: %%
 6524: %% </WARNING>
 6525: %%
 6526: api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6527:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6528:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wod_and_send_udp6,
 6529:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6530:            fun() ->
 6531:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6532:                                  type     => dgram,
 6533:                                  protocol => udp,
 6534:                                  dup      => false},
 6535:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 6536:            end).
 6537: 
 6538: 
 6539: 
 6540: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6541: 
 6542: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 6543: %% its file descriptor *with* dup.
 6544: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 6545: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 6546: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 6547: %% IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6548: %%
 6549: api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6550:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6551:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp4,
 6552:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 6553:            fun() ->
 6554:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 6555:                                  type     => dgram,
 6556:                                  protocol => udp,
 6557:                                  dup      => true},
 6558:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 6559:            end).
 6560: 
 6561: 
 6562: 
 6563: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6564: 
 6565: %% Basically open a socket (1) and then create another socket (2) from
 6566: %% its file descriptor *with* dup.
 6567: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 6568: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 6569: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 6570: %% IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket.
 6571: %%
 6572: api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 6573:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 6574:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_and_open_wd_and_send_udp6,
 6575:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 6576:            fun() ->
 6577:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 6578:                                  type     => dgram,
 6579:                                  protocol => udp,
 6580:                                  dup      => true},
 6581:                    ok = api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState)
 6582:            end).
 6583: 
 6584: 
 6585: 
 6586: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 6587: 
 6588: api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp(InitState) ->
 6589:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 6590:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 6591:            end,
 6592:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 6593:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock)
 6594:            end,
 6595:     api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp2(InitState#{send   => Send,
 6596:                                                            recv   => Recv}).
 6597: 
 6598: api_ffd_open_and_open_and_send_udp2(InitState) ->
 6599:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 6600:     ServerSeq = 
 6601:         [
 6602:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 6603:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6604:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6605:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6606:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 6607:                    end},
 6608:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6609:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6610:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6611:                            ok
 6612:                    end},
 6613: 
 6614:          %% *** Init part ***
 6615:          #{desc => "which local address",
 6616:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 6617:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6618:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 6619:                    end},
 6620:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6621:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 6622:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6623:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6624:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6625:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6626:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6627:                                    ERROR
 6628:                            end
 6629:                    end},
 6630:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6631:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 6632:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6633:                                ok ->
 6634:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 6635:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 6636:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 6637:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6638:                                    ERROR
 6639:                            end
 6640:                    end},
 6641:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6642:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, port := Port}) ->
 6643:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 6644:                            ok
 6645:                    end},
 6646: 
 6647:          #{desc => "await request 1 (recv)",
 6648:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 6649:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6650:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 6651:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (1) from: "
 6652:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 6653:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 6654:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6655:                                    ERROR
 6656:                            end
 6657:                    end},
 6658:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv request)",
 6659:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6660:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 6661:                            ok
 6662:                    end},
 6663:          #{desc => "await continue 1 (with send reply)",
 6664:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6665:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 6666:                    end},
 6667:          #{desc => "send reply 1",
 6668:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 6669:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 6670:                    end},
 6671:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (send reply)",
 6672:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6673:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 6674:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 6675:                    end},
 6676: 
 6677:          #{desc => "await request 2 (recv)",
 6678:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 6679:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6680:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} -> 
 6681:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (2) from: "
 6682:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 6683:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 6684:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6685:                                    ERROR
 6686:                            end
 6687:                    end},
 6688:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv request)",
 6689:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6690:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 6691:                            ok
 6692:                    end},
 6693:          #{desc => "await continue 2 (with send reply)",
 6694:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6695:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 6696:                    end},
 6697:          #{desc => "send reply 2",
 6698:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 6699:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 6700:                    end},
 6701:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (send reply)",
 6702:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6703:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 6704:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 6705:                    end},
 6706: 
 6707:          #{desc => "await request 3 (recv)",
 6708:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv} = State) ->
 6709:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 6710:                                {ok, {Source, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 6711:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received request (2) from: "
 6712:                                                "~n   ~p", [Source]),
 6713:                                    {ok, State#{source => Source}};
 6714:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6715:                                    ERROR
 6716:                            end
 6717:                    end},
 6718:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv request)",
 6719:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6720:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 6721:                            ok
 6722:                    end},
 6723:          #{desc => "await continue 3 (with send reply)",
 6724:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6725:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 6726:                    end},
 6727:          #{desc => "send reply 3",
 6728:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, source := Source}) ->
 6729:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Source)
 6730:                    end},
 6731:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (send reply)",
 6732:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 6734:                            {ok, maps:remove(source, State)}
 6735:                    end},
 6736: 
 6737:          %% *** Termination ***
 6738:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6739:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6740:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6741:                                ok ->
 6742:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6743:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6744:                                    ERROR
 6745:                            end
 6746:                    end},
 6747:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6748:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6749:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6750:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 6751:                    end},
 6752: 
 6753:          %% *** We are done ***
 6754:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6755:         ],
 6756: 
 6757: 
 6758:     Client1Seq =
 6759:         [
