 6760:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 6761:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6762:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6763:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6764:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 6765:                    end},
 6766:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6767:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6768:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6769:                            ok
 6770:                    end},
 6771: 
 6772:          %% *** The init part ***
 6773:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 6774:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 6775:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6776:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6777:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 6778:                    end},
 6779:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6780:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 6781:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 6782:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
 6783:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6784:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6785:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6786:                                    ERROR
 6787:                            end
 6788:                    end},
 6789:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 6790:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 6791:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 6792:                                ok ->
 6793:                                    ok;
 6794:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6795:                                    ERROR
 6796:                            end
 6797:                    end},
 6798:          #{desc => "get socket FD",
 6799:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6800:                            case socket:getopt(Sock, otp, fd) of
 6801:                                {ok, FD} ->
 6802:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 6803:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 6804:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 6805:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 6806:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6807:                                    ERROR
 6808:                            end
 6809:                    end},
 6810:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6811:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 6812:                          fd     := FD}) ->
 6813:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, FD),
 6814:                            ok
 6815:                    end},
 6816: 
 6817:          %% *** The actual test ***
 6818:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 1)",
 6819:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6820:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 6821:                    end},
 6822:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
 6823:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 6824:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 6825:                    end},
 6826:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 1)",
 6827:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6828:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 6829:                            ok
 6830:                    end},
 6831:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server)",
 6832:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 6833:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 6834:                            ok
 6835:                    end},
 6836:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 1)",
 6837:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6838:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 6839:                            ok
 6840:                    end},
 6841: 
 6842:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
 6843:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6844:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 6845:                    end},
 6846:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
 6847:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 6848:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 6849:                    end},
 6850:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
 6851:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6852:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 6853:                            ok
 6854:                    end},
 6855:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server)",
 6856:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 6857:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 6858:                            ok
 6859:                    end},
 6860:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 3)",
 6861:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6862:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 6863:                            ok
 6864:                    end},
 6865: 
 6866:          %% *** Termination ***
 6867:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6868:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6869:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6870:                                ok ->
 6871:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6872:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6873:                                    ERROR
 6874:                            end
 6875:                    end},
 6876:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6877:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6878:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6879:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 6880:                    end},
 6881: 
 6882:          %% *** We are done ***
 6883:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6884:         ],
 6885: 
 6886: 
 6887:     Client2Seq =
 6888:         [
 6889:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 6890:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 6891:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 6892:                            {Tester, {Port, FD}} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 6893:                            {ok, State#{tester      => Tester,
 6894:                                        server_port => Port,
 6895:                                        fd          => FD}}
 6896:                    end},
 6897:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 6898:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6899:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 6900:                            ok
 6901:                    end},
 6902: 
 6903:          %% *** The init part ***
 6904:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 6905:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 6906:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 6907:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 6908:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => SSA}}
 6909:                    end},
 6910:          #{desc => "create socket",
 6911:            cmd  => fun(#{fd  := FD,
 6912:                          dup := DUP} = State) ->
 6913:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup => DUP}) of
 6914:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 6915:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 6916:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6917:                                    ERROR
 6918:                            end
 6919:                    end},
 6920:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 6921:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6922:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 6923:                            ok
 6924:                    end},
 6925: 
 6926:          %% *** The actual test ***
 6927:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
 6928:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 6929:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 6930:                    end},
 6931:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
 6932:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 6933:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, SSA)
 6934:                    end},
 6935:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
 6936:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6937:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 6938:                            ok
 6939:                    end},
 6940:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server)",
 6941:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 6942:                            {ok, {_, ?BASIC_REP}} = Recv(Sock),
 6943:                            ok
 6944:                    end},
 6945:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 2)",
 6946:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 6947:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 6948:                            ok
 6949:                    end},
 6950: 
 6951:          %% *** Termination ***
 6952:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 6953:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 6954:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 6955:                                ok ->
 6956:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 6957:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 6958:                                    ERROR
 6959:                            end
 6960:                    end},
 6961:          #{desc => "close socket",
 6962:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 6963:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 6964:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 6965:                    end},
 6966: 
 6967:          %% *** We are done ***
 6968:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 6969:         ],
 6970: 
 6971: 
 6972:     TesterSeq =
 6973:         [
 6974:          %% *** Init part ***
 6975:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 6976:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6977:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6978:                            ok
 6979:                    end},
 6980:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
 6981:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6982:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6983:                            ok
 6984:                    end},
 6985:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
 6986:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 6987:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 6988:                            ok
 6989:                    end},
 6990: 
 6991:          %% Start the server
 6992:          #{desc => "order server start",
 6993:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 6994:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 6995:                            ok
 6996:                    end},
 6997:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 6998:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 6999:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 7000:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 7001:                    end},
 7002: 
 7003:          %% Start the client 1
 7004:          #{desc => "order client 1 start",
 7005:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 7006:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 7007:                            ok
 7008:                    end},
 7009:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
 7010:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
 7011:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init) of
 7012:                                {ok, FD} ->
 7013:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 7014:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7015:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Client 1 init error: "
 7016:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7017:                                    ERROR
 7018:                            end
 7019:                    end},
 7020: 
 7021:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7022: 
 7023:          %% Start the client 2
 7024:          #{desc => "order client 2 start",
 7025:            cmd  => fun(#{client2     := Pid,
 7026:                          server_port := Port,
 7027:                          fd          := FD} = _State) ->
 7028:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, {Port, FD}),
 7029:                            ok
 7030:                    end},
 7031:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
 7032:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7033:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
 7034:                    end},
 7035: 
 7036:          %% *** The actual test ***
 7037: 
 7038:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 1)",
 7039:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7040:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7041:                            ok
 7042:                    end},
 7043:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 1)",
 7044:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7045:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 7046:                    end},
 7047:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
 7048:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7049:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7050:                    end},
 7051:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 1)",
 7052:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7053:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7054:                            ok
 7055:                    end},
 7056:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 1 sent)",
 7057:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7058:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7059:                    end},
 7060:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 1)",
 7061:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7062:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 7063:                    end},
 7064: 
 7065: 
 7066:          #{desc => "order client 2 to continue (with send request 2)",
 7067:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7068:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7069:                            ok
 7070:                    end},
 7071:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (with send request 2)",
 7072:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7073:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, send_req)
 7074:                    end},
 7075:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
 7076:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7077:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7078:                    end},
 7079:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
 7080:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7081:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7082:                            ok
 7083:                    end},
 7084:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 2 sent)",
 7085:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7086:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7087:                    end},
 7088:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (reply recv 2)",
 7089:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7090:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, recv_reply)
 7091:                    end},
 7092: 
 7093: 
 7094:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
 7095:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7096:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 7097:                            ok
 7098:                    end},
 7099:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
 7100:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = State) ->
 7101:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 7102:                            State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
 7103:                            {ok, State1}
 7104:                    end},
 7105: 
 7106: 
 7107:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 3)",
 7108:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7109:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7110:                            ok
 7111:                    end},
 7112:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 3)",
 7113:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7114:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 7115:                    end},
 7116:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
 7117:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7118:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7119:                    end},
 7120:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
 7121:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7122:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7123:                            ok
 7124:                    end},
 7125:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 3 sent)",
 7126:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7127:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7128:                    end},
 7129:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 3)",
 7130:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7131:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 7132:                    end},
 7133: 
 7134: 
 7135:          %% *** Termination ***
 7136:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
 7137:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7138:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 7139:                            ok
 7140:                    end},
 7141:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
 7142:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = State) ->
 7143:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 7144:                            State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
 7145:                            {ok, State1}
 7146:                    end},
 7147:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 7148:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7149:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 7150:                            ok
 7151:                    end},
 7152:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 7153:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 7154:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 7155:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 7156:                            {ok, State1}
 7157:                    end},
 7158: 
 7159:          %% *** We are done ***
 7160:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7161:         ],
 7162: 
 7163:     i("start server evaluator"),
 7164:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 7165: 
 7166:     i("start (socket origin) client 1 evaluator"),
 7167:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", Client1Seq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 7168:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 7169: 
 7170:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 7171:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", Client2Seq, InitState),
 7172:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 7173: 
 7174:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 7175:     TesterInitState = #{server  => Server#ev.pid,
 7176:                         client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 7177:                         client2 => Client2#ev.pid},
 7178:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 7179: 
 7180:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client1, Client2, Tester]).
 7181: 
 7182: 
 7183: 
 7184: 
 7185: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7186: 
 7187: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 7188: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *without* dup.
 7189: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 7190: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 7191: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 7192: %% IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 7193: %%
 7194: %% <WARNING>
 7195: %%
 7196: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 7197: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 7198: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convient way
 7199: %% to test it!
 7200: %%
 7201: %% </WARNING>
 7202: %%
 7203: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7204:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 7205:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp4,
 7206:            fun() ->
 7207:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 7208:                                  type     => stream,
 7209:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7210:                                  dup      => false},
 7211:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 7212:            end).
 7213: 
 7214: 
 7215: 
 7216: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7217: 
 7218: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 7219: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *without* dup.
 7220: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 7221: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 7222: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 7223: %% IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 7224: %%
 7225: %% <WARNING>
 7226: %%
 7227: %% This is *not* how its intended to be used.
 7228: %% That an erlang process creating a socket and then handing over the
 7229: %% file descriptor to another erlang process. *But* its a convient way
 7230: %% to test it!
 7231: %%
 7232: %% </WARNING>
 7233: %%
 7234: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7235:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 7236:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wod_and_send_tcp6,
 7237:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 7238:            fun() ->
 7239:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 7240:                                  type     => stream,
 7241:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7242:                                  dup      => false},
 7243:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 7244:            end).
 7245: 
 7246: 
 7247: 
 7248: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7249: 
 7250: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 7251: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *with* dup.
 7252: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 7253: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 7254: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 7255: %% IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
 7256: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7257:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 7258:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp4,
 7259:            fun() ->
 7260:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 7261:                                  type     => stream,
 7262:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7263:                                  dup      => true},
 7264:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 7265:            end).
 7266: 
 7267: 
 7268: 
 7269: 
 7270: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7271: 
 7272: %% Basically open a socket (1), connect to a server and then create
 7273: %% another socket (2) from its file descriptor *with* dup.
 7274: %% Exchange some data from via both "client" sockets.
 7275: %% Finally close the second socket. Ensure that the original socket
 7276: %% has not been closed (test by sending some data).
 7277: %% IPv6 TCP (stream) socket.
 7278: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
 7279:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 7280:     tc_try(api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_wd_and_send_tcp6,
 7281:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 7282:            fun() ->
 7283:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 7284:                                  type     => stream,
 7285:                                  protocol => tcp,
 7286:                                  dup      => true},
 7287:                    ok = api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState)
 7288:            end).
 7289: 
 7290: 
 7291: 
 7292: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7293: 
 7294: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp(InitState) ->
 7295:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7296:                    socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7297:            end,
 7298:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7299:                    socket:recv(Sock)
 7300:            end,
 7301:     api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp2(InitState#{send   => Send,
 7302:                                                            recv   => Recv}).
 7303: 
 7304: api_ffd_open_connect_and_open_and_send_tcp2(InitState) ->
 7305:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 7306:     ServerSeq = 
 7307:         [
 7308:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7309:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7310:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7311:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7312:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 7313:                    end},
 7314:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7315:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7316:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7317:                            ok
 7318:                    end},
 7319: 
 7320:          %% *** Init part ***
 7321:          #{desc => "which local address",
 7322:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 7323:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7324:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 7325:                    end},
 7326:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 7327:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 7328:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 7329:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 7330:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7331:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 7332:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7333:                                    ERROR
 7334:                            end
 7335:                    end},
 7336:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 7337:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 7338:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 7339:                                ok ->
 7340:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 7341:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
 7342:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 7343:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7344:                                    ERROR
 7345:                            end
 7346:                    end},
 7347:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 7348:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 7349:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 7350:                    end},
 7351:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7352:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 7353:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
 7354:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 7355:                            ok
 7356:                    end},
 7357: 
 7358:          %% The actual test
 7359:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 7360:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7361:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 7362:                    end},
 7363:          #{desc => "await connection",
 7364:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 7365:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 7366:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7367:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 7368:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 7369:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7370:                                    ERROR
 7371:                            end
 7372:                    end},
 7373:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 7374:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7375:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 7376:                            ok
 7377:                    end},
 7378: 
 7379:          #{desc => "await request 1 (recv)",
 7380:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7381:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7382:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 7383:                                    ok;
 7384:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7385:                                    ERROR
 7386:                            end
 7387:                    end},
 7388:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv request)",
 7389:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7390:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 7391:                            ok
 7392:                    end},
 7393:          #{desc => "await continue 1 (with send reply)",
 7394:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7395:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 7396:                    end},
 7397:          #{desc => "send reply 1",
 7398:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7399:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 7400:                    end},
 7401:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (send reply)",
 7402:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7403:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 7404:                            ok
 7405:                    end},
 7406: 
 7407:          #{desc => "await request 2 (recv)",
 7408:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7409:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7410:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 7411:                                    ok;
 7412:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7413:                                    ERROR
 7414:                            end
 7415:                    end},
 7416:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv request)",
 7417:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7418:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 7419:                            ok
 7420:                    end},
 7421:          #{desc => "await continue 2 (with send reply)",
 7422:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7423:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 7424:                    end},
 7425:          #{desc => "send reply 2",
 7426:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7427:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 7428:                    end},
 7429:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (send reply)",
 7430:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7431:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 7432:                            ok
 7433:                    end},
 7434: 
 7435:          #{desc => "await request 3 (recv)",
 7436:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7437:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 7438:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 7439:                                    ok;
 7440:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7441:                                    ERROR
 7442:                            end
 7443:                    end},
 7444:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv request)",
 7445:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7446:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 7447:                            ok
 7448:                    end},
 7449:          #{desc => "await continue 3 (with send reply)",
 7450:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7451:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 7452:                    end},
 7453:          #{desc => "send reply 3",
 7454:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7455:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 7456:                    end},
 7457:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (send reply)",
 7458:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7459:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
 7460:                            ok
 7461:                    end},
 7462: 
 7463:          %% *** Termination ***
 7464:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 7465:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7466:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7467:                                ok ->
 7468:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7469:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7470:                                    ERROR
 7471:                            end
 7472:                    end},
 7473:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 7474:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 7475:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7476:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 7477:                    end},
 7478:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 7479:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 7480:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
 7481:                                ok ->
 7482:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
 7483:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7484:                                    ERROR
 7485:                            end
 7486:                    end},
 7487: 
 7488:          %% *** We are done ***
 7489:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7490:         ],
 7491: 
 7492: 
 7493:     Client1Seq =
 7494:         [
 7495:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7496:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7497:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7498:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7499:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 7500:                    end},
 7501:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7502:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7503:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7504:                            ok
 7505:                    end},
 7506: 
 7507:          %% *** The init part ***
 7508:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 7509:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 7510:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 7511:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 7512:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 7513:                    end},
 7514:          #{desc => "create socket",
 7515:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
 7516:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
 7517:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 7518:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7519:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 7520:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7521:                                    ERROR
 7522:                            end
 7523:                    end},
 7524:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 7525:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 7526:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 7527:                                ok ->
 7528:                                    ok;
 7529:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7530:                                    ERROR
 7531:                            end
 7532:                    end},
 7533:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7534:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7535:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7536:                            ok
 7537:                    end},
 7538: 
 7539: 
 7540:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 7541:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7542:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 7543:                    end},
 7544:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 7545:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 7546:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 7547:                    end},
 7548:          #{desc => "get socket FD",
 7549:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7550:                            case socket:getopt(Sock, otp, fd) of
 7551:                                {ok, FD} ->
 7552:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("FD: ~w", [FD]),
 7553:                                    {ok, State#{fd => FD}};
 7554:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 7555:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed get FD: "
 7556:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 7557:                                    ERROR
 7558:                            end
 7559:                    end},
 7560:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 7561:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
 7562:                          fd     := FD}) ->
 7563:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect, FD),
 7564:                            ok
 7565:                    end},
 7566: 
 7567: 
 7568:          %% *** The actual test ***
 7569:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 1)",
 7570:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7571:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 7572:                    end},
 7573:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
 7574:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7575:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 7576:                    end},
 7577:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 1)",
 7578:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7579:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 7580:                            ok
 7581:                    end},
 7582:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server)",
 7583:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7584:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 7585:                            ok
 7586:                    end},
 7587:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 1)",
 7588:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7589:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 7590:                            ok
 7591:                    end},
 7592: 
 7593:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
 7594:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7595:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 7596:                    end},
 7597:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
 7598:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7599:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 7600:                    end},
 7601:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
 7602:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7603:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 7604:                            ok
 7605:                    end},
 7606:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server)",
 7607:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7608:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 7609:                            ok
 7610:                    end},
 7611:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 3)",
 7612:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7613:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 7614:                            ok
 7615:                    end},
 7616: 
 7617:          %% *** Termination ***
 7618:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 7619:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7620:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7621:                                ok ->
 7622:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7623:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7624:                                    ERROR
 7625:                            end
 7626:                    end},
 7627:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7628:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7629:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7630:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 7631:                    end},
 7632: 
 7633:          %% *** We are done ***
 7634:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7635:         ],
 7636: 
 7637: 
 7638:     Client2Seq =
 7639:         [
 7640:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7641:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7642:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7643:                            {Tester, FD} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 7644:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, fd => FD}}
 7645:                    end},
 7646:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 7647:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7648:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 7649:                            ok
 7650:                    end},
 7651: 
 7652:          %% *** The init part ***
 7653:          #{desc => "create socket",
 7654:            cmd  => fun(#{fd  := FD,
 7655:                          dup := DUP} = State) ->
 7656:                            case socket:open(FD, #{dup => DUP}) of
 7657:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 7658:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 7659:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7660:                                    ERROR
 7661:                            end
 7662:                    end},
 7663:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 7664:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7665:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 7666:                            ok
 7667:                    end},
 7668: 
 7669:          %% *** The actual test ***
 7670:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
 7671:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 7672:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 7673:                    end},
 7674:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
 7675:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 7676:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 7677:                    end},
 7678:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
 7679:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7680:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 7681:                            ok
 7682:                    end},
 7683:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server)",
 7684:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 7685:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 7686:                            ok
 7687:                    end},
 7688:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply 2)",
 7689:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 7690:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
 7691:                            ok
 7692:                    end},
 7693: 
 7694:          %% *** Termination ***
 7695:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 7696:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 7697:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 7698:                                ok ->
 7699:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 7700:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 7701:                                    ERROR
 7702:                            end
 7703:                    end},
 7704:          #{desc => "close socket",
 7705:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 7706:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 7707:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 7708:                    end},
 7709: 
 7710:          %% *** We are done ***
 7711:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7712:         ],
 7713: 
 7714: 
 7715:     TesterSeq =
 7716:         [
 7717:          %% *** Init part ***
 7718:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 7719:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7720:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7721:                            ok
 7722:                    end},
 7723:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
 7724:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7725:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7726:                            ok
 7727:                    end},
 7728:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
 7729:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7730:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 7731:                            ok
 7732:                    end},
 7733: 
 7734:          %% Start the server
 7735:          #{desc => "order server start",
 7736:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 7737:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 7738:                            ok
 7739:                    end},
 7740:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 7741:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 7742:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 7743:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 7744:                    end},
 7745: 
 7746:          %% Start the client 1
 7747:          #{desc => "order client 1 start",
 7748:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 7749:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 7750:                            ok
 7751:                    end},
 7752:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
 7753:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7754:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
 7755:                    end},
 7756: 
 7757:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 7758:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7759:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 7760:                            ok
 7761:                    end},
 7762:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 7763:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with connect)",
 7764:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7765:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
 7766:                            ok
 7767:                    end},
 7768:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (connect)",
 7769:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
 7770:                            {ok, FD} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, connect),
 7771:                            {ok, State#{fd => FD}}
 7772:                    end},
 7773:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 7774:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7775:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 7776:                    end},         
 7777: 
 7778:          %% Start the client 2
 7779:          #{desc => "order client 2 start",
 7780:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, fd := FD} = _State) ->
 7781:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, FD),
 7782:                            ok
 7783:                    end},
 7784:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
 7785:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
 7786:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
 7787:                    end},
 7788: 
 7789:          %% *** The actual test ***
 7790: 
 7791:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 1)",
 7792:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7793:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7794:                            ok
 7795:                    end},
 7796:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 1)",
 7797:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7798:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 7799:                    end},
 7800:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
 7801:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7802:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7803:                    end},
 7804:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 1)",
 7805:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7806:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7807:                            ok
 7808:                    end},
 7809:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 1 sent)",
 7810:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7811:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7812:                    end},
 7813:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 1)",
 7814:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7815:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 7816:                    end},
 7817: 
 7818: 
 7819:          #{desc => "order client 2 to continue (with send request 2)",
 7820:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7821:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7822:                            ok
 7823:                    end},
 7824:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (with send request 2)",
 7825:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7826:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, send_req)
 7827:                    end},
 7828:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
 7829:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7830:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7831:                    end},
 7832:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
 7833:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7834:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7835:                            ok
 7836:                    end},
 7837:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 2 sent)",
 7838:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7839:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7840:                    end},
 7841:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (reply recv 2)",
 7842:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7843:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client2, recv_reply)
 7844:                    end},
 7845: 
 7846: 
 7847:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
 7848:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = _State) ->
 7849:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 7850:                            ok
 7851:                    end},
 7852:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
 7853:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Client} = State) ->
 7854:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 7855:                            State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
 7856:                            {ok, State1}
 7857:                    end},
 7858: 
 7859: 
 7860:          #{desc => "order client 1 to continue (with send request 3)",
 7861:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7862:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 7863:                            ok
 7864:                    end},
 7865:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (with send request 3)",
 7866:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7867:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, send_req)
 7868:                    end},
 7869:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
 7870:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7871:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 7872:                    end},
 7873:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
 7874:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7875:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
 7876:                            ok
 7877:                    end},
 7878:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply 3 sent)",
 7879:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7880:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
 7881:                    end},
 7882:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (reply recv 3)",
 7883:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7884:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client1, recv_reply)
 7885:                    end},
 7886: 
 7887: 
 7888:          %% *** Termination ***
 7889:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
 7890:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = _State) ->
 7891:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 7892:                            ok
 7893:                    end},
 7894:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
 7895:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Client} = State) ->
 7896:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 7897:                            State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
 7898:                            {ok, State1}
 7899:                    end},
 7900:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 7901:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 7902:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 7903:                            ok
 7904:                    end},
 7905:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 7906:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 7907:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 7908:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 7909:                            {ok, State1}
 7910:                    end},
 7911: 
 7912:          %% *** We are done ***
 7913:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 7914:         ],
 7915: 
 7916:     i("start server evaluator"),
 7917:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 7918: 
 7919:     i("start (socket origin) client 1 evaluator"),
 7920:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", Client1Seq, maps:remove(dup, InitState)),
 7921:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 7922: 
 7923:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
 7924:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", Client2Seq, InitState),
 7925:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 7926: 
 7927:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 7928:     TesterInitState = #{server  => Server#ev.pid,
 7929:                         client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
 7930:                         client2 => Client2#ev.pid},
 7931:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 7932: 
 7933:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client1, Client2, Tester]).
 7934: 
 7935: 
 7936: 
 7937: 
 7938: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7939: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7940: %%                                                                     %%
 7941: %%                           API ASYNC                                 %%
 7942: %%                                                                     %%
 7943: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7944: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7945: 
 7946: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7947: 
 7948: %% Basically establish a TCP connection via an async connect. IPv4.
 7949: api_a_connect_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7950:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7951:     tc_try(api_a_connect_tcp4,
 7952:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 7953:            fun() ->
 7954:                    ok = api_a_connect_tcpD(inet, nowait(Config))
 7955:            end).
 7956: 
 7957: 
 7958: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7959: 
 7960: %% Basically establish a TCP connection via an async connect. IPv6.
 7961: api_a_connect_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7962:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 7963:     tc_try(api_a_connect_tcp6,
 7964:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 7965:            fun() ->
 7966:                    ok = api_a_connect_tcpD(inet6, nowait(Config))
 7967:            end).
 7968: 
 7969: 
 7970: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7971: 
 7972: api_a_connect_tcpD(Domain, Nowait) ->
 7973:     Connect = fun(Sock, SockAddr) ->
 7974:                       socket:connect(Sock, SockAddr, Nowait)
 7975:               end,
 7976:     Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 7977:                    socket:send(Sock, Data)
 7978:            end,
 7979:     Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 7980:                    socket:recv(Sock)
 7981:            end,
 7982:     InitState = #{domain => Domain,
 7983:                   connect => Connect,
 7984:                   send => Send,
 7985:                   recv => Recv,
 7986:                   connect_ref => Nowait},
 7987:     api_a_connect_tcp(InitState).
 7988: 
 7989: 
 7990: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7991: 
 7992: api_a_connect_tcp(InitState) ->
 7993:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 7994:     ServerSeq = 
 7995:         [
 7996:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 7997:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 7998:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 7999:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8000:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 8001:                    end},
 8002:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8003:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8004:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8005:                            ok
 8006:                    end},
 8007: 
 8008:          %% *** Init part ***
 8009:          #{desc => "which local address",
 8010:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8011:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8012:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 8013:                    end},
 8014:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 8015:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8016:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 8017:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8018:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 8019:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8020:                                    ERROR
 8021:                            end
 8022:                    end},
 8023:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 8024:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 8025:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 8026:                                ok ->
 8027:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 8028:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 8029:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8030:                                    ERROR
 8031:                            end
 8032:                    end},
 8033:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 8034:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 8035:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 8036:                    end},
 8037:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8038:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 8039:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 8040:                            ok
 8041:                    end},
 8042: 
 8043:          %% The actual test
 8044:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 8045:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8046:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 8047:                    end},
 8048:          #{desc => "await connection",
 8049:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 8050:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
 8051:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8052:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
 8053:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 8054:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8055:                                    ERROR
 8056:                            end
 8057:                    end},
 8058:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 8059:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8060:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 8061:                            ok
 8062:                    end},
 8063: 
 8064:          #{desc => "await continue (recv_req)",
 8065:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8066:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_req)
 8067:                    end},
 8068:          #{desc => "recv req",
 8069:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 8070:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8071:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 8072:                                    ok;
 8073:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 8074:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 8075:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8076:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 8077:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 8078:                                    ERROR
 8079:                            end
 8080:                    end},
 8081:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_req)",
 8082:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8083:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 8084:                            ok
 8085:                    end},
 8086:          #{desc => "await continue (send_rep)",
 8087:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8088:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_rep)
 8089:                    end},
 8090:          #{desc => "send rep",
 8091:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 8092:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 8093:                    end},
 8094:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_rep)",
 8095:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8096:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_rep),
 8097:                            ok
 8098:                    end},
 8099: 	 
 8100: 
 8101:          %% *** Termination ***
 8102:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 8103:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8104:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8105:                                ok ->
 8106:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 8107:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8108:                                    ERROR
 8109:                            end
 8110:                    end},
 8111:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 8112:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
 8113:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 8114:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
 8115:                    end},
 8116:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 8117:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
 8118:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 8119:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
 8120:                    end},
 8121: 
 8122:          %% *** We are done ***
 8123:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8124:         ],
 8125: 
 8126:     ClientSeq = 
 8127:         [
 8128:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 8129:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 8130:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 8131:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8132:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 8133:                    end},
 8134:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8135:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8136:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8137:                            ok
 8138:                    end},
 8139: 
 8140:          %% *** The init part ***
 8141:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 8142:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 8143:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8144:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 8145:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 8146:                    end},
 8147:          #{desc => "create socket",
 8148:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8149:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
 8150:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8151:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 8152:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8153:                                    ERROR
 8154:                            end
 8155:                    end},
 8156:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 8157:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 8158:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 8159:                                ok ->
 8160:                                    ok;
 8161:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8162:                                    ERROR
 8163:                            end
 8164:                    end},
 8165:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8166:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8167:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 8168:                            ok
 8169:                    end},
 8170: 
 8171:          %% *** The actual test ***
 8172:          #{desc => "await continue (async connect)",
 8173:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8174:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, async_connect)
 8175:                    end},
 8176:          #{desc => "connect (async) to server",
 8177:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 8178:                          server_sa   := SSA,
 8179:                          connect     := Connect,
 8180:                          connect_ref := SR} = State) ->
 8181:                            case Connect(Sock, SSA) of
 8182:                                ok ->
 8183:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("ok -> "
 8184: 					       "unexpected success => SKIP", 
 8185:                                                []),
 8186:                                    {skip, unexpected_success};
 8187: 
 8188:                                {select, {select_info, ST, SelectRef}}
 8189:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 8190:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select nowait ->"
 8191:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 8192:                                                "~n   ref: ~p",
 8193:                                                [ST, SelectRef]),
 8194:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => select,
 8195:                                                connect_tag => ST,
 8196:                                                connect_ref => SelectRef}};
 8197:                                {select, {select_info, ST, SR}}
 8198:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 8199:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select ref ->"
 8200:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 8201:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [ST, SR]),
 8202:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => select,
 8203:                                                connect_tag => ST}};
 8204: 
 8205:                                {completion,
 8206:                                 {completion_info, CT, CompletionRef}}
 8207:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 8208:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion nowait ->"
 8209:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 8210:                                                "~n   ref: ~p",
 8211:                                                [CT, CompletionRef]),
 8212:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
 8213:                                                connect_tag => CT,
 8214:                                                connect_ref => CompletionRef}};
 8215:                                {completion,
 8216:                                 {completion_info, CT, CR}}
 8217:                                  when is_reference(CR) ->
 8218:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion ref ->"
 8219:                                                "~n   tag: ~p"
 8220:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [CT, CR]),
 8221:                                    {ok, State#{asynch_tag  => completion,
 8222:                                                connect_tag => CT}};
 8223: 
 8224:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8225:                                    ERROR
 8226:                            end
 8227:                    end},
 8228:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect select|completion)",
 8229:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8230:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect_select),
 8231:                            ok
 8232:                    end},
 8233:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 8234:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 8235:                          asynch_tag  := select,
 8236:                          connect_tag := connect,
 8237:                          connect_ref := Ref}) ->
 8238:                            receive
 8239:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 8240:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select message ->"
 8241:                                                "~n   ref: ~p", [Ref]),
 8242:                                    ok
 8243:                            after 5000 ->
 8244:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout: "
 8245:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
 8246:                                                [mq()]),
 8247:                                    {error, timeout}
 8248:                            end;
 8249:                       (#{sock        := Sock,
 8250:                          asynch_tag  := completion,
 8251:                          connect_tag := connect,
 8252:                          connect_ref := Ref}) ->
 8253:                            receive
 8254:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, ok = Res}} ->
 8255:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion message ->"
 8256:                                                "~n   ref: ~p"
 8257:                                                "~n   res: ~p", [Ref, Res]),
 8258:                                    ok
 8259:                            after 5000 ->
 8260:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout: "
 8261:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
 8262:                                                [mq()]),
 8263:                                    {error, timeout}
 8264:                            end
 8265:                    end},
 8266:          #{desc => "announce ready (select|completion)",
 8267:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8268:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 8269:                            ok
 8270:                    end},
 8271:          #{desc => "(maybe) connect (async) to server",
 8272:            cmd  => fun(#{sock        := Sock,
 8273:                          server_sa   := SSA,
 8274:                          asynch_tag  := select,
 8275:                          connect_tag := connect,
 8276:                          connect     := Connect}) ->
 8277:                            case Connect(Sock, SSA) of
 8278:                                ok ->
 8279:                                    ok;
 8280:                                {select, SelectInfo} ->
 8281:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, SelectInfo}};
 8282:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8283:                                    ERROR
 8284:                            end;
 8285:                       (#{sock        := _Sock,
 8286:                          server_sa   := _SSA,
 8287:                          asynch_tag  := completion,
 8288:                          connect_tag := connect,
 8289:                          connect     := _Connect}) ->
 8290:                            ok
 8291:                    end},
 8292:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 8293:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8294:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 8295:                            ok
 8296:                    end},
 8297:          #{desc => "get peername",
 8298:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
 8299:                            case socket:peername(Sock) of
 8300:                                {ok, SockAddr} ->
 8301:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Peer Name: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 8302:                                    ok;
 8303:                                 {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8304:                                    ERROR
 8305:                            end
 8306:                    end},
 8307: 
 8308:          #{desc => "await continue (send_req)",
 8309:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8310:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 8311:                    end},
 8312:          #{desc => "send req",
 8313:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 8314:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 8315:                    end},
 8316:          #{desc => "announce ready (send_req)",
 8317:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8318:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 8319:                            ok
 8320:                    end},
 8321:          #{desc => "await continue (recv_rep)",
 8322:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8323:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_rep)
 8324:                    end},
 8325:          #{desc => "recv rep",
 8326:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 8327:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8328:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REP} ->
 8329:                                    ok;
 8330:                                {ok, UnexpData} ->
 8331:                                    {error, {unexpected_data, UnexpData}};
 8332:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8333:                                    %% At the moment there is no way to get
 8334:                                    %% status or state for the socket...
 8335:                                    ERROR
 8336:                            end
 8337:                    end},
 8338:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_rep)",
 8339:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8340:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 8341:                            ok
 8342:                    end},
 8343: 
 8344:          %% *** Termination ***
 8345:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 8346:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8347:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8348:                                ok ->
 8349:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 8350:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8351:                                    ERROR
 8352:                            end
 8353:                    end},
 8354:          #{desc => "close socket",
 8355:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 8356:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 8357:                            State2 = maps:remove(sock,         State),
 8358:                            State3 = maps:remove(connect_stag, State2),
 8359:                            State4 = maps:remove(connect_sref, State3),
 8360:                            {ok, State4}
 8361:                    end},
 8362: 
 8363:          %% *** We are done ***
 8364:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8365:         ],
 8366: 
 8367:     TesterSeq =
 8368:         [
 8369:          %% *** Init part ***
