 8370:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 8371:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8372:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8373:                            ok
 8374:                    end},
 8375:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 8376:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8377:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8378:                            ok
 8379:                    end},
 8380: 
 8381:          %% Start the server
 8382:          #{desc => "order server start",
 8383:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 8384:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 8385:                            ok
 8386:                    end},
 8387:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 8388:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 8389:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 8390:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 8391:                    end},
 8392: 
 8393:          %% Start the client
 8394:          #{desc => "order client start",
 8395:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 8396:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 8397:                            ok
 8398:                    end},
 8399:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 8400:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 8401:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 8402:                    end},
 8403: 
 8404: 
 8405:          %% *** The actual test ***
 8406:          #{desc => "order client to continue (async connect)",
 8407:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8408:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, async_connect),
 8409:                            ok
 8410:                    end},
 8411:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect select)",
 8412:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8413:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect_select)
 8414:                    end},
 8415: 
 8416:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 8417: 
 8418:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 8419:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8420:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 8421:                            ok
 8422:                    end},
 8423:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 8424:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8425:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, select)
 8426:                    end},
 8427:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 8428:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8429:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
 8430:                    end},
 8431:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 8432:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8433:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
 8434:                    end},
 8435: 
 8436:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 8437: 
 8438:          #{desc => "order server to recv test req (recv req)",
 8439:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8440:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv_req),
 8441:                            ok
 8442:                    end},
 8443:          #{desc => "order client to send test req (send req)",
 8444:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8445:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
 8446:                            ok
 8447:                    end},
 8448:          #{desc => "await client ready (send_req)",
 8449:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8450:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 8451:                    end},
 8452:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv_req)",
 8453:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8454:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
 8455:                    end},
 8456:          #{desc => "order client to recv test rep (send rep)",
 8457:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8458:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, recv_rep),
 8459:                            ok
 8460:                    end},
 8461:          #{desc => "order server to send test rep (send rep)",
 8462:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8463:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_rep),
 8464:                            ok
 8465:                    end},
 8466:          #{desc => "await server ready (send_rep)",
 8467:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8468:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_rep)
 8469:                    end},
 8470:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv_rep)",
 8471:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8472:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_rep)
 8473:                    end},
 8474: 
 8475: 
 8476:          %% *** Termination ***
 8477:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 8478:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 8479:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 8480:                            ok
 8481:                    end},
 8482:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 8483:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 8484:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 8485:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 8486:                            {ok, State1}
 8487:                    end},
 8488:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 8489:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 8490:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
 8491:                            ok
 8492:                    end},
 8493:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 8494:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
 8495:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
 8496:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 8497:                            {ok, State1}
 8498:                    end},
 8499: 
 8500:          %% *** We are done ***
 8501:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8502:         ],
 8503: 
 8504:     i("start server evaluator"),
 8505:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
 8506: 
 8507:     i("start client evaluator"),
 8508:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
 8509:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
 8510: 
 8511:     i("start tester evaluator"),
 8512:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 8513:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 8514:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 8515: 
 8516:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 8517: 
 8518: 
 8519: 
 8520: 
 8521: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8522: 
 8523: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 8524: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 8525: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 8526: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvfrom,
 8527: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendto.
 8528: %%
 8529: api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8530:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 8531:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8532:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8533:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8534:            fun() ->
 8535:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 8536:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 8537:                           end,
 8538:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8539:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 8540:                           end,
 8541:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8542:                                  send     => Send,
 8543:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8544:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8545:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 8546:            end).
 8547: 
 8548: 
 8549: 
 8550: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8551: 
 8552: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket using
 8553: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 8554: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 8555: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvfrom,
 8556: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendto.
 8557: %%
 8558: api_a_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8559:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 8560:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8561:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 8562:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8563:            fun() ->
 8564:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 8565:                                   socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
 8566:                           end,
 8567:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8568:                                   socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 8569:                           end,
 8570:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 8571:                                  send     => Send,
 8572:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8573:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8574:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 8575:            end).
 8576: 
 8577: 
 8578: 
 8579: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8580: 
 8581: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv4 UDP (dgram) socket using
 8582: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 8583: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 8584: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 8585: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 8586: %%
 8587: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8588:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 8589:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8590:     tc_try(api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp4,
 8591:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 8592:            fun() ->
 8593:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 8594:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 8595:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 8596:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 8597:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 8598:                           end,
 8599:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8600:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 8601:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 8602:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 8603:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 8604:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8605:                                           OK;
 8606:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8607:                                           SELECT;
 8608:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8609:                                           COMPLETION;
 8610:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8611:                                           ERROR
 8612:                                   end
 8613:                           end,
 8614:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
 8615:                                  send     => Send,
 8616:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8617:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8618:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 8619:            end).
 8620: 
 8621: 
 8622: 
 8623: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8624: 
 8625: %% Basically send and receive on an IPv6 UDP (dgram) socket using
 8626: %% sendto and recvfrom. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 8627: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 8628: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 8629: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 8630: %%
 8631: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8632:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
 8633:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 8634:     tc_try(api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp6,
 8635:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 8636:            fun() ->
 8637:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
 8638:                                   Msg = #{addr => Dest,
 8639:                                              %% ctrl => CMsgs,
 8640:                                              iov  => [Data]},
 8641:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 8642:                           end,
 8643:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 8644:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 8645:                                       {ok, #{addr  := Source,
 8646:                                              iov   := [Data]}} ->
 8647:                                           {ok, {Source, Data}};
 8648:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
 8649:                                           OK;
 8650:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 8651:                                           SELECT;
 8652:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
 8653:                                           COMPLETION;
 8654:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8655:                                           ERROR
 8656:                                   end
 8657:                           end,
 8658:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
 8659:                                  send     => Send,
 8660:                                  recv     => Recv,
 8661:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
 8662:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState)
 8663:            end).
 8664: 
 8665: 
 8666: 
 8667: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8668: 
 8669: api_a_send_and_recv_udp(InitState) ->
 8670:     ServerSeq = 
 8671:         [
 8672:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 8673:          #{desc => "await start",
 8674:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 8675:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8676:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 8677:                    end},
 8678:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8679:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8680:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8681:                            ok
 8682:                    end},
 8683: 
 8684:          %% *** Init part ***
 8685:          #{desc => "which local address",
 8686:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8687:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8688:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
 8689:                    end},
 8690:          #{desc => "create socket",
 8691:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8692:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
 8693:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 8694:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 8695:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8696:                                    ERROR
 8697:                            end
 8698:                    end},
 8699:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 8700:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
 8701:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 8702:                                ok ->
 8703:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
 8704:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
 8705:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8706:                                    ERROR
 8707:                            end
 8708:                    end},
 8709:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8710:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
 8711:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 8712:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
 8713:                            ok
 8714:                    end},
 8715: 
 8716:          %% The actual test
 8717:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 8718:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8719:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 8720:                    end},
 8721:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 8722:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 8723:                          recv     := Recv,
 8724:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 8725:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8726:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 8727:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8728:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: "
 8729:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8730:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, RecvRef]),
 8731:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 8732:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 8733:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 8734:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8735:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8736:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select ref: "
 8737:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8738:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 8739:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 8740:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 8741: 
 8742:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 8743:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8744:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected select nowait: "
 8745:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8746:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, RecvRef]),
 8747:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 8748:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 8749:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 8750:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8751:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8752:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("expected completion ref: "
 8753:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 8754:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 8755:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 8756:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 8757: 
 8758:                                {ok, X} ->
 8759:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 8760: 
 8761:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8762:                                    ERROR
 8763:                            end
 8764:                    end},
 8765:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 8766:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8767:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 8768:                            ok
 8769:                    end},
 8770:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 8771:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 8772:                          sock      := Sock,
 8773:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 8774:                            receive
 8775:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 8776:                                    ok
 8777:                            after 5000 ->
 8778:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
 8779:                                                "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 8780:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 8781:                                                [socket:info(Sock), mq()]),
 8782:                                    {error, timeout}
 8783:                            end;
 8784:                       (#{async_tag := completion,
 8785:                          sock      := Sock,
 8786:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef} = State) ->
 8787:                            receive
 8788:                                %% Recvfrom
 8789:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8790:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}}}} ->
 8791:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 8792:                                %% Recvmsg
 8793:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8794:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, #{addr := Src,
 8795:                                                  iov  := [?BASIC_REQ]}}}} ->
 8796:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 8797:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8798:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, Unexpected}}} ->
 8799:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected success result: "
 8800:                                                "~n   ~p", [Unexpected]),
 8801:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_result,
 8802:                                             Unexpected}};
 8803:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8804:                                 {RecvRef, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
 8805:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("completion with error: "
 8806:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 8807:                                    ERROR
 8808:                            after 5000 ->
 8809:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
 8810:                                                "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 8811:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 8812:                                                [socket:info(Sock), mq()]),
 8813:                                    {error, timeout}
 8814:                            end
 8815:                    end},
 8816:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 8817:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8818:                            %% We are actually done *if* this was
 8819:                            %% a completion event, but to make the
 8820:                            %% test case simple...
 8821:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 8822:                            ok
 8823:                    end},
 8824:          #{desc => "now read the data (request), for select",
 8825:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 8826:                          sock      := Sock,
 8827:                          recv      := Recv} = State) ->
 8828:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8829:                                {ok, {Src, ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
 8830:                                    {ok, State#{req_src => Src}};
 8831:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8832:                                    ERROR
 8833:                            end;
 8834:                       (#{async_tag := completion} = _State) ->
 8835:                            %% We are already done!
 8836:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Already done!"),
 8837:                            ok
 8838:                    end},
 8839:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 8840:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8841:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 8842:                            ok
 8843:                    end},
 8844: 
 8845:          #{desc => "await continue (send reply)",
 8846:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8847:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
 8848:                    end},
 8849:          #{desc => "send reply",
 8850:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, req_src := Src, send := Send}) ->
 8851:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP, Src)
 8852:                    end},
 8853:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
 8854:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8855:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
 8856:                            ok
 8857:                    end},
 8858: 
 8859:          %% Termination
 8860:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 8861:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 8862:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 8863:                                ok ->
 8864:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,    State),
 8865:                                    State3 = maps:remove(async_tag, State2),
 8866:                                    State4 = maps:remove(recv_tag,  State3),
 8867:                                    State5 = maps:remove(recv_ref,  State4),
 8868:                                    State6 = maps:remove(req_src,   State5),
 8869:                                    {ok, State6};
 8870:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8871:                                    ERROR
 8872:                            end
 8873:                    end},
 8874:          #{desc => "close socket",
 8875:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 8876:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 8877:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 8878:                    end},
 8879: 
 8880:          %% *** We are done ***
 8881:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 8882:         ],
 8883: 
 8884: 
 8885:     ClientSeq = 
 8886:         [
 8887:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
 8888:          #{desc => "await start",
 8889:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 8890:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 8891:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
 8892:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
 8893:                    end},
 8894:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 8895:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8896:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 8897:                            ok
 8898:                    end},
 8899: 
 8900:          %% *** Init part ***
 8901:          #{desc => "local address",
 8902:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8903:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 8904:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 8905:                    end},
 8906:          #{desc => "open socket",
 8907:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 8908:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, dgram, udp),
 8909:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
 8910:                    end},
 8911:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
 8912:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
 8913:                           case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 8914:                                ok ->
 8915:                                    ok;
 8916:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8917:                                    ERROR
 8918:                            end
 8919:                    end},
 8920:          #{desc => "sockname",
 8921:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 8922:                            SA = sock_sockname(Sock),
 8923:                            {ok, State#{sa => SA}}
 8924:                    end},
 8925:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 8926:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8927:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 8928:                            ok
 8929:                    end},
 8930: 
 8931:          %% The actual test
 8932:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 8933:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8934:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 8935:                    end},
 8936:          #{desc => "send request",
 8937:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := Server, send := Send}) ->
 8938:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ, Server)
 8939:                    end},
 8940:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 8941:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8942:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 8943:                            ok
 8944:                    end},
 8945:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
 8946:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 8947:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
 8948:                    end},
 8949:          #{desc => "try recv reply (with nowait)",
 8950:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
 8951:                          recv     := Recv,
 8952:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
 8953:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 8954:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 8955:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8956:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 8957:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 8958:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 8959:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8960:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8961:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => select,
 8962:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 8963:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, RecvRef}}
 8964:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
 8965:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 8966:                                                recv_tag  => Tag,
 8967:                                                recv_ref  => RecvRef}};
 8968:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 8969:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
 8970:                                    {ok, State#{async_tag => completion,
 8971:                                                recv_tag  => Tag}};
 8972:                                {ok, X} ->
 8973:                                    {error, {unexpected_select_info, X}};
 8974:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8975:                                    ERROR
 8976:                            end
 8977:                    end},
 8978:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 8979:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 8980:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 8981:                            ok
 8982:                    end},
 8983:          #{desc => "await select message",
 8984:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 8985:                          sock      := Sock,
 8986:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 8987:                            receive
 8988:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 8989:                                    ok
 8990:                            end;
 8991:                       (#{async_tag := completion,
 8992:                          sock      := Sock,
 8993:                          recv_ref  := RecvRef}) ->
 8994:                            receive
 8995:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 8996:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, _}}} ->
 8997:                                    ok
 8998:                            end
 8999:                    end},
 9000:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 9001:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9002:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 9003:                            ok
 9004:                    end},
 9005:          #{desc => "now read the data (reply)",
 9006:            cmd  => fun(#{async_tag := select,
 9007:                          sock      := Sock,
 9008:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
 9009:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9010:                                {ok, {_Src, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
 9011:                                    ok;
 9012:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9013:                                    ERROR
 9014:                            end;
 9015:                       (#{async_tag := completion}) ->
 9016:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Already read!"),
 9017:                            ok
 9018:                    end},
 9019:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 9020:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9021:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 9022:                            ok
 9023:                    end},
 9024: 
 9025:          %% Termination
 9026:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
 9027:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9028:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9029:                                ok ->
 9030:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,    State),
 9031:                                    State3 = maps:remove(async_tag, State2),
 9032:                                    State4 = maps:remove(recv_tag,  State3),
 9033:                                    State5 = maps:remove(recv_ref,  State4),
 9034:                                    {ok, State5};
 9035:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9036:                                    ERROR
 9037:                            end
 9038:                    end},
 9039:          #{desc => "close socket",
 9040:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
 9041:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
 9042:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
 9043:                    end},
 9044: 
 9045:          %% *** We are done ***
 9046:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9047:         ],
 9048: 
 9049: 
 9050:     TesterSeq = 
 9051:         [
 9052:          %% *** Init part ***
 9053:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 9054:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9055:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9056:                            ok
 9057:                    end},
 9058:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 9059:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9060:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9061:                            ok
 9062:                    end},
 9063: 
 9064:          %% Start the server
 9065:          #{desc => "order server start",
 9066:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9067:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 9068:                            ok
 9069:                    end},
 9070:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 9071:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9072:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 9073:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
 9074:                    end},
 9075: 
 9076:          %% Start the client
 9077:          #{desc => "order client start",
 9078:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
 9079:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
 9080:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
 9081:                            ok
 9082:                    end},
 9083:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
 9084:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9085:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 9086:                    end},
 9087:  
 9088:          %% The actual test
 9089:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
 9090:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9091:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9092:                            ok
 9093:                    end},
 9094:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv_select)",
 9095:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9096:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 9097:                    end},
 9098: 
 9099:          #{desc => "order client continue (send request)",
 9100:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9101:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_req),
 9102:                            ok
 9103:                    end},
 9104:          #{desc => "await client ready (send request)",
 9105:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9106:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, send_req)
 9107:                    end},
 9108:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 9109:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9110:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 9111:                    end},
 9112:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv request)",
 9113:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9114:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_req)
 9115:                    end},
 9116: 
 9117:          #{desc => "order client continue (recv)",
 9118:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9119:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
 9120:                            ok
 9121:                    end},
 9122:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv_select)",
 9123:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9124:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_select)
 9125:                    end},
 9126:          #{desc => "order server continue (send reply)",
 9127:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9128:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_reply),
 9129:                            ok
 9130:                    end},
 9131:          #{desc => "await server ready (send)",
 9132:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9133:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, send)
 9134:                    end},
 9135:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 9136:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9137:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, select)
 9138:                    end},
 9139:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv reply)",
 9140:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9141:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_rep)
 9142:                    end},
 9143: 
 9144:          %% Terminations
 9145:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 9146:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9147:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 9148:                            ok
 9149:                    end},
 9150:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 9151:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
 9152:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 9153:                                ok ->
 9154:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 9155:                                    {ok, State1};
 9156:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9157:                                    ERROR
 9158:                            end
 9159:                    end},
 9160:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 9161:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9162:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
 9163:                            ok
 9164:                    end},
 9165:          #{desc => "await server termination",
 9166:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9167:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
 9168:                                ok ->
 9169:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
 9170:                                    {ok, State1};
 9171:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9172:                                    ERROR
 9173:                            end
 9174:                    end},
 9175: 
 9176: 
 9177:          %% *** We are done ***
 9178:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9179:         ],
 9180: 
 9181:     i("start server evaluator"),
 9182:     ServerInitState = InitState,
 9183:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
 9184: 
 9185:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
 9186:     ClientInitState = InitState,
 9187:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
 9188: 
 9189:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
 9190:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
 9191:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
 9192:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
 9193: 
 9194:     i("await evaluator"),
 9195:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
 9196: 
 9197: 
 9198: 
 9199: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9200: 
 9201: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 9202: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9203: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9204: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 9205: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 9206: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9207: api_a_send_and_recv_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9208:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9209:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9210:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9211:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
 9212:            fun() ->
 9213:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9214:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 9215:                           end,
 9216:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9217:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 9218:                           end,
 9219:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 9220:                                  proto     => tcp,
 9221:                                  send      => Send,
 9222:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9223:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9224:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9225:            end).
 9226: 
 9227: 
 9228: 
 9229: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9230: 
 9231: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 9232: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9233: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9234: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 9235: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 9236: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9237: api_a_send_and_recv_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9238:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9239:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9240:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9241:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 9242:            fun() ->
 9243:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9244:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 9245:                           end,
 9246:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9247:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 9248:                           end,
 9249:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 9250:                                  proto     => tcp,
 9251:                                  send      => Send,
 9252:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9253:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9254:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9255:            end).
 9256: 
 9257: 
 9258: 
 9259: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9260: 
 9261: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 9262: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9263: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9264: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 9265: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 9266: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9267: api_a_send_and_recv_sctp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9268:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9269:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9270:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9271:            fun() ->
 9272:                    has_support_sctp(),
 9273:                    has_support_ipv4()
 9274:            end,
 9275:            fun() ->
 9276:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9277:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 9278:                           end,
 9279:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9280:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 9281:                           end,
 9282:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 9283:                                  proto     => sctp,
 9284:                                  send      => Send,
 9285:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9286:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9287:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9288:            end).
 9289: 
 9290: 
 9291: 
 9292: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9293: 
 9294: %% Basically send and receive using the "common" functions (send and recv)
 9295: %% on an IPv4 SCTP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9296: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9297: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recv,
 9298: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for send.
 9299: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9300: api_a_send_and_recv_sctp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9301:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9302:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9303:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9304:            fun() ->
 9305:                    has_support_sctp(),
 9306:                    has_support_ipv6()
 9307:            end,
 9308:            fun() ->
 9309:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9310:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
 9311:                           end,
 9312:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9313:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
 9314:                           end,
 9315:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 9316:                                  proto     => sctp,
 9317:                                  send      => Send,
 9318:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9319:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9320:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9321:            end).
 9322: 
 9323: 
 9324: 
 9325: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9326: 
 9327: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 9328: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9329: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9330: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 9331: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 9332: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9333: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9334:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9335:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9336:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9337:            fun() ->
 9338:                    is_not_windows(),
 9339:                    has_support_ipv4()
 9340:            end,
 9341:            fun() ->
 9342:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9343:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 9344:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 9345:                           end,
 9346:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9347:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 9348:                                       {ok, #{iov := [Data]}} ->
 9349:                                           {ok, Data};
 9350:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9351:                                           SELECT;
 9352: 				      {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9353:                                           ERROR
 9354:                                   end
 9355:                           end,
 9356:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
 9357:                                  proto     => tcp,
 9358:                                  send      => Send,
 9359:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9360:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9361:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9362:            end).
 9363: 
 9364: 
 9365: 
 9366: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9367: 
 9368: %% Basically send and receive using the msg functions (sendmsg and recvmsg)
 9369: %% on an IPv6 TCP (stream) socket. But we try to be async. That is, we use
 9370: %% the 'nowait' value for the Timeout argument (and await the eventual
 9371: %% select message). Note that we only do this for the recvmsg,
 9372: %% since its much more difficult to "arrange" for sendmsg.
 9373: %% We *also* test async for accept.
 9374: api_a_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 9375:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
 9376:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9377:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 9378:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
 9379:            fun() ->
 9380:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
 9381:                                   Msg = #{iov => [Data]},
 9382:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
 9383:                           end,
 9384:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
 9385:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
 9386:                                       {ok, #{iov := [Data]}} ->
 9387:                                           {ok, Data};
 9388:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
 9389:                                           SELECT;
 9390: 				      {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9391:                                           ERROR
 9392:                                   end
 9393:                           end,
 9394:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
 9395:                                  proto     => tcp,
 9396:                                  send      => Send,
 9397:                                  recv      => Recv,
 9398:                                  recv_sref => Nowait},
 9399:                    ok = api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState)
 9400:            end).
 9401: 
 9402: 
 9403: 
 9404: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 9405: 
 9406: api_a_send_and_recv_stream(Config, InitState) ->
 9407:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 9408:     ServerSeq = 
 9409:         [
 9410:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 9411:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 9412:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9413:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9414:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
 9415:                    end},
 9416:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9417:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9418:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9419:                            ok
 9420:                    end},
 9421: 
 9422:          %% *** Init part ***
 9423:          #{desc => "which local address",
 9424:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
 9425:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 9426:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
 9427:                    end},
 9428:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
 9429:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 9430:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create (open) ~w (~w) socket",
 9431:                                        [Proto, Domain]),
 9432:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 9433:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9434:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
 9435:                                {error, eprotonosupport = Reason} ->
 9436:                                    {skip, Reason};
 9437:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9438:                                    ERROR
 9439:                            end
 9440:                    end},
 9441:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 9442:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
 9443:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
 9444:                                ok ->
 9445:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
 9446:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
 9447:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9448:                                    ERROR
 9449:                            end
 9450:                    end},
 9451:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
 9452:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
 9453:                            socket:listen(LSock)
 9454:                    end},
 9455:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9456:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
 9457:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
 9458:                            ok
 9459:                    end},
 9460: 
 9461:          %% The actual test
 9462:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
 9463:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9464:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
 9465:                    end},
 9466:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
 9467:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
 9468:                            Nowait = nowait(Config),
 9469:                            case socket:accept(LSock, Nowait) of
 9470:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9471:                                  when Nowait =:= nowait ->
 9472:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select accept message: "
 9473:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9474:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9475:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => select,
 9476:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 9477:                                                accept_sref => Ref}};
 9478:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Nowait}}
 9479:                                  when is_reference(Nowait) ->
 9480:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select accept result: "
 9481:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9482:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Nowait]),
 9483:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => select,
 9484:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 9485:                                                accept_sref => Nowait}};
 9486: 
 9487:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9488:                                  when Nowait =:= nowait ->
 9489:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion accept result: "
 9490:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9491:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9492:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => completion,
 9493:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 9494:                                                accept_sref => Ref}};
 9495:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Nowait}}
 9496:                                  when is_reference(Nowait) ->
 9497:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion accept result: "
 9498:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9499:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Nowait]),
 9500:                                    {ok, State#{sorc        => completion,
 9501:                                                accept_stag => Tag,
 9502:                                                accept_sref => Nowait}};
 9503: 
 9504:                                {ok, X} ->
 9505:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9506:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9507:                                    ERROR
 9508:                            end
 9509:                    end},
 9510:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
 9511:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9512:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
 9513:                            ok
 9514:                    end},
 9515:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 9516:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock, accept_sref := Ref} = State) ->
 9517:                            receive
 9518:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
 9519:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("select message: "
 9520:                                                "ready for accept"),
 9521:                                    ok;
 9522:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 9523:                                 {Ref, {ok, CSock}}} ->
 9524:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("completion message: accepted: "
 9525:                                                "~n   CSock: ~p", [Sock]),
 9526:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}}
 9527:                            after 5000 ->
 9528:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("select|completion message timeout:"
 9529:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
 9530:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
 9531:                                                "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 9532:                                                [Sock, Ref, mq()]),
 9533:                                    {error, timeout}
 9534:                            end
 9535:                    end},
 9536:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 9537:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9538:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 9539:                            ok
 9540:                    end},
 9541:          #{desc => "try accept (again)",
 9542:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, sorc := select} = State) ->
 9543:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try accept again"),
 9544:                            case socket:accept(LSock, nowait) of
 9545:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9546:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: "
 9547:                                                "~n   Sock: ~p", [Sock]),
 9548:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
 9549:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9550:                                    ERROR
 9551:                            end;
 9552:                        (#{sorc := completion})->
 9553:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("already accepted"),
 9554:                            ok
 9555:                    end},
 9556:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
 9557:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9558:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
 9559:                            ok
 9560:                    end},
 9561: 
 9562:          #{desc => "await continue (recv request)",
 9563:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9564:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv_req)
 9565:                    end},
 9566:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
 9567:            cmd  => fun(#{csock     := Sock,
 9568:                          recv      := Recv,
 9569:                          recv_sref := SR} = State) ->
 9570:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9571:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9572:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 9573:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
 9574:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9575:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9576:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag,
 9577:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 9578:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, SR}}
 9579:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 9580:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
 9581:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9582:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 9583:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag}};
 9584: 
 9585:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9586:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 9587:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
 9588:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9589:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9590:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag,
 9591:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 9592:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, SR}}
 9593:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 9594:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
 9595:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9596:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 9597:                                    {ok, State#{recv_stag => Tag}};
 9598: 
 9599:                                {ok, X} ->
 9600:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9601:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9602:                                    ERROR
 9603:                            end
 9604:                    end},
 9605:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 9606:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9607:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 9608:                            ok
 9609:                    end},
 9610:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
 9611:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv_sref := RecvRef}) ->
 9612:                            receive
 9613:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 9614:                                    ok;
 9615:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 9616:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, ?BASIC_REQ}}} ->
 9617:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected data"),
 9618:                                    ok;
 9619:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 9620:                                 {RecvRef, {error, Reason} = ERROR}} ->
 9621:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("received unexpected error: "
 9622:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 9623:                                    ERROR
 9624:                            end
 9625:                    end},
 9626:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 9627:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9628:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 9629:                            ok
 9630:                    end},
 9631:          #{desc => "now read the data (request)",
 9632:            cmd  => fun(#{sorc  := select,
 9633:                          csock := Sock,
 9634:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
 9635:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9636:                                {ok, ?BASIC_REQ} ->
 9637:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
 9638:                                    ok;
 9639:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9640:                                    ERROR
 9641:                            end;
 9642:                       (#{sorc := completion}) ->
 9643:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("already received"),
 9644:                            ok
 9645:                    end},
 9646:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
 9647:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9648:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
 9649:                            ok
 9650:                    end},
 9651: 
 9652:          #{desc => "await continue (send reply)",
 9653:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9654:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_rep)
 9655:                    end},
 9656:          #{desc => "send reply",
 9657:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 9658:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
 9659:                    end},
 9660:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
 9661:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9662:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_rep),
 9663:                            ok
 9664:                    end},
 9665: 
 9666:          %% *** Termination ***
 9667:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 9668:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9669:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9670:                                ok ->
 9671:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 9672:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9673:                                    ERROR
 9674:                            end
 9675:                    end},
 9676:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
 9677:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
 9678:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9679:                    end},
 9680:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
 9681:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
 9682:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9683:                    end},
 9684: 
 9685:          %% *** We are done ***
 9686:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9687:         ],
 9688: 
 9689: 
 9690:     ClientSeq = 
 9691:         [
 9692:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
 9693:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
 9694:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
 9695:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
 9696:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
 9697:                    end},
 9698:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
 9699:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9700:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
 9701:                            ok
 9702:                    end},
 9703: 
 9704:          %% *** The init part ***
 9705:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
 9706:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
 9707:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
 9708:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
 9709:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
 9710:                    end},
 9711:          #{desc => "create socket",
 9712:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
 9713:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try create (open) ~w (~w) socket",
 9714:                                        [Proto, Domain]),
 9715:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
 9716:                                {ok, Sock} ->
 9717:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
 9718:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9719:                                    ERROR
 9720:                            end
 9721:                    end},
 9722:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
 9723:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
 9724:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
 9725:                                ok ->
 9726:                                    ok;
 9727:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9728:                                    ERROR
 9729:                            end
 9730:                    end},
 9731:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
 9732:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
 9734:                            ok
 9735:                    end},
 9736: 
 9737:          %% *** The actual test ***
 9738:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
 9739:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9740:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
 9741:                    end},
 9742:          #{desc => "connect to server",
 9743:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
 9744:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
 9745:                    end},
 9746:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
 9747:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9748:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
 9749:                            ok
 9750:                    end},
 9751: 
 9752:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
 9753:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
 9754:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
 9755:                    end},
 9756:          #{desc => "send request (to server)",
 9757:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
 9758:                            ok = Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
 9759:                    end},
 9760:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
 9761:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9762:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
 9763:                            ok
 9764:                    end},
 9765: 
 9766:          #{desc => "try recv reply (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
 9767:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
 9768:                          recv := Recv,
 9769:                          recv_sref := SR} = State) ->
 9770:                            case Recv(Sock) of
 9771:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9772:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 9773:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
 9774:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9775:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9776:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => select,
 9777:                                                recv_stag => Tag,
 9778:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 9779:                                {select, {select_info, Tag, SR}}
 9780:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 9781:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
 9782:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9783:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 9784:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => select,
 9785:                                                recv_stag => Tag}};
 9786: 
 9787:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, Ref}}
 9788:                                  when SR =:= nowait ->
 9789:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
 9790:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9791:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, Ref]),
 9792:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => completion,
 9793:                                                recv_stag => Tag,
 9794:                                                recv_sref => Ref}};
 9795:                                {completion, {completion_info, Tag, SR}}
 9796:                                  when is_reference(SR) ->
 9797:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
 9798:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
 9799:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [Tag, SR]),
 9800:                                    {ok, State#{sorc      => completion,
 9801:                                                recv_stag => Tag}};
 9802: 
 9803:                                {ok, X} ->
 9804:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
 9805:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9806:                                    ERROR
 9807:                            end
 9808:                    end},
 9809:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
 9810:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9811:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
 9812:                            ok
 9813:                    end},
 9814:          #{desc => "await select message",
 9815:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv_sref := RecvRef}) ->
 9816:                            receive
 9817:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, RecvRef} ->
 9818:                                    ok;
 9819:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion,
 9820:                                 {RecvRef, {ok, ?BASIC_REP}}} ->
 9821:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected reply"),
 9822:                                    ok
 9823:                            end
 9824:                    end},
 9825:          #{desc => "announce ready (select)",
 9826:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9827:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, select),
 9828:                            ok
 9829:                    end},
 9830:          #{desc => "now read the data (reply)",
 9831:            cmd  => fun(#{sorc := select, sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
 9832:                            {ok, ?BASIC_REP} = Recv(Sock),
 9833:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[select] received expected reply"),
 9834:                            ok;
 9835:                       (#{sorc := completion}) ->
 9836:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("[completion] "
 9837:                                        "expected reply already received"),
 9838:                            ok
 9839:                    end},
 9840:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv reply)",
 9841:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
 9842:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_rep),
 9843:                            ok
 9844:                    end},
 9845: 
 9846:          %% *** Termination ***
 9847:          #{desc => "await terminate",
 9848:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
 9849:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
 9850:                                ok ->
 9851:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
 9852:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
 9853:                                    ERROR
 9854:                            end
 9855:                    end},
 9856:          #{desc => "close socket",
 9857:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
 9858:                            socket:close(Sock)
 9859:                    end},
 9860: 
 9861:          %% *** We are done ***
 9862:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
 9863:         ],
 9864: 
 9865:     TesterSeq =
 9866:         [
 9867:          %% *** Init part ***
 9868:          #{desc => "monitor server",
 9869:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9870:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9871:                            ok
 9872:                    end},
 9873:          #{desc => "monitor client",
 9874:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9875:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 9876:                            ok
 9877:                    end},
 9878: 
 9879:          %% Start the server
 9880:          #{desc => "order server start",
 9881:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9882:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
 9883:                            ok
 9884:                    end},
 9885:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
 9886:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
 9887:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
 9888:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
 9889:                    end},
 9890: 
 9891:          %% Start the client
 9892:          #{desc => "order client start",
 9893:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
 9894:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
 9895:                            ok
 9896:                    end},
 9897:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
