 9898:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9899:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
 9900:                    end},
 9901: 
 9902:          %% *** The actual test ***
 9903:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
 9904:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 9905:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
 9906:                            ok
 9907:                    end},
 9908:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
 9909:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9910:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
 9911:                    end},
 9912:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
 9913:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9914:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
 9915:                            ok
 9916:                    end},
 9917:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 9918:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9919:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 9920:                    end},
 9921:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
 9922:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9923:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept)
 9924:                    end},
 9925:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
 9926:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9927:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
 9928:                    end},
 9929: 
 9930:          #{desc => "order server to continue (recv request)",
 9931:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9932:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv_req),
 9933:                            ok
 9934:                    end},
 9935:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
 9936:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9937:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
 9938:                    end},
 9939:          #{desc => "order client to continue (send request)",
 9940:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9941:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_req),
 9942:                            ok
 9943:                    end},
 9944:          #{desc => "await client ready (send request)",
 9945:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 9946:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
 9947:                    end},
 9948:          #{desc => "await server ready (select)",
 9949:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9950:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, select)
 9951:                    end},
 9952:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv request)",
 9953:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9954:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_req)
 9955:                    end},
 9956: 
 9957:          #{desc => "order client to continue (recv reply)",
 9958:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9959:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv_rep),
 9960:                            ok
 9961:                    end},
 9962:          #{desc => "await client ready (recv select)",
 9963:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9964:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, recv_select)
 9965:                    end},
 9966:          #{desc => "order server to continue (send reply)",
 9967:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9968:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send_rep),
 9969:                            ok
 9970:                    end},
 9971:          #{desc => "await server ready (send reply)",
 9972:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
 9973:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, send_rep)
 9974:                    end},
 9975:          #{desc => "await client ready (select)",
 9976:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
 9977:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, select)
 9978:                    end},
 9979:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
 9980:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 9981:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_rep)
 9982:                    end},
 9983: 
 9984: 
 9985:          %% *** Termination ***
 9986:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
 9987:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
 9988:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
 9989:                            ok
 9990:                    end},
 9991:          #{desc => "await client termination",
 9992:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
 9993:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
 9994:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
 9995:                            {ok, State1}
 9996:                    end},
 9997:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
 9998:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
 9999:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
10000:                            ok
10001:                    end},
10002:          #{desc => "await server termination",
10003:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
10004:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
10005:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
10006:                            {ok, State1}
10007:                    end},
10008: 
10009:          %% *** We are done ***
10010:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10011:         ],
10012: 
10013:     i("start server evaluator"),
10014:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
10015: 
10016:     i("start client evaluator"),
10017:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
10018: 
10019:     i("start tester evaluator"),
10020:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
10021:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
10022:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
10023: 
10024:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
10025:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
10026: 
10027: 
10028: 
10029: 
10030: 
10031: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10032: 
10033: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvfrom,
10034: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
10035: %%
10036: api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10037:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10038:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10039:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10040:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
10041:            fun() ->
10042:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10043:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
10044:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
10045:                                           OK;
10046:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
10047:                                           SELECT;
10048:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10049:                                           COMPLETION;
10050:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
10051:                                           ERROR
10052:                                   end
10053:                           end,
10054:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10055:                                  recv     => Recv,
10056:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10057:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
10058:            end).
10059: 
10060: 
10061: 
10062: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10063: 
10064: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvfrom,
10065: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
10066: %%
10067: api_a_recvfrom_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10068:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10069:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10070:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10071:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10072:            fun() ->
10073:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10074:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
10075:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
10076:                                           OK;
10077:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
10078:                                           SELECT;
10079:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10080:                                           COMPLETION;
10081:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
10082:                                           ERROR
10083:                                   end
10084:                           end,
10085:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10086:                                  recv     => Recv,
10087:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10088:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
10089:            end).
10090: 
10091: 
10092: 
10093: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10094: 
10095: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
10096: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
10097: %%
10098: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10099:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10100:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10101:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10102:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
10103:            fun() ->
10104:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10105:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
10106:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
10107:                                           OK;
10108:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
10109:                                           SELECT;
10110:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10111:                                           COMPLETION;
10112:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
10113:                                           ERROR
10114:                                   end
10115:                           end,
10116:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10117:                                  recv     => Recv,
10118:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10119:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
10120:            end).
10121: 
10122: 
10123: 
10124: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10125: 
10126: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
10127: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
10128: %%
10129: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10130:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10131:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10132:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10133:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10134:            fun() ->
10135:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10136:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
10137:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
10138:                                           OK;
10139:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
10140:                                           SELECT;
10141:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10142:                                           COMPLETION;
10143:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
10144:                                           ERROR
10145:                                   end
10146:                           end,
10147:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10148:                                  recv     => Recv,
10149:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10150:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState)
10151:            end).
10152: 
10153: 
10154: 
10155: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10156: 
10157: api_a_recv_cancel_udp(InitState) ->
10158:     ServerSeq = 
10159:         [
10160:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
10161:          #{desc => "await start",
10162:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10163:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10164:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
10165:                    end},
10166:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10167:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10168:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10169:                            ok
10170:                    end},
10171: 
10172:          %% *** Init part ***
10173:          #{desc => "which local address",
10174:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10175:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10176:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
10177:                    end},
10178:          #{desc => "create socket",
10179:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10180:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
10181:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10182:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
10183:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10184:                                    ERROR
10185:                            end
10186:                    end},
10187:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
10188:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
10189:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
10190:                                ok ->
10191:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
10192:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
10193:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10194:                                    ERROR
10195:                            end
10196:                    end},
10197:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10198:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
10199:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
10200:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
10201:                            ok
10202:                    end},
10203: 
10204:          %% The actual test
10205:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
10206:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10207:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
10208:                    end},
10209:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
10210:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
10211:                          recv     := Recv,
10212:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10213:                            case Recv(Sock) of
10214:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10215:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10216:                                {select,
10217:                                 {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
10218:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10219:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10220: 
10221:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
10222:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10223:                                {completion,
10224:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
10225:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10226:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10227: 
10228:                                {ok, X} ->
10229:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10230: 
10231:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10232:                                    ERROR
10233:                            end
10234:                    end},
10235:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
10236:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10237:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
10238:                            ok
10239:                    end},
10240:          #{desc => "wait for select message - without success",
10241:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
10242:                            receive
10243:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10244:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10245: 
10246:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
10247:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
10248: 
10249:                            after 5000 ->
10250:                                    ok
10251:                            end
10252:                    end},
10253:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
10254:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10255:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
10256:                            ok
10257:                    end},
10258:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
10259:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10260:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
10261:                    end},
10262:          #{desc => "cancel",
10263:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv_select_info := SI}) ->
10264:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SI);
10265:                       (#{sock := Sock, recv_completion_info := CI}) ->
10266:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CI)
10267:                    end},
10268: 
10269:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
10270:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10271:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
10272:                            ok
10273:                    end},
10274: 
10275:          %% Termination
10276:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
10277:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10278:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10279:                                ok ->
10280:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,   State),
10281:                                    State3 = maps:remove(recv_ref, State2),
10282:                                    State4 = maps:remove(req_src,  State3),
10283:                                    {ok, State4};
10284:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10285:                                    ERROR
10286:                            end
10287:                    end},
10288:          #{desc => "close socket",
10289:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
10290:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
10291:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
10292:                    end},
10293: 
10294:          %% *** We are done ***
10295:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10296:         ],
10297: 
10298: 
10299:     TesterSeq = 
10300:         [
10301:          %% *** Init part ***
10302:          #{desc => "monitor server",
10303:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10304:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10305:                            ok
10306:                    end},
10307: 
10308:          %% Start the server
10309:          #{desc => "order server start",
10310:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10311:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
10312:                            ok
10313:                    end},
10314:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
10315:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10316:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
10317:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
10318:                    end},
10319: 
10320:          %% The actual test
10321:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
10322:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10323:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
10324:                            ok
10325:                    end},
10326:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
10327:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10328:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
10329:                    end},
10330:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
10331:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10332:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
10333:                    end},
10334:          #{desc => "order server continue (cancel)",
10335:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10336:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
10337:                            ok
10338:                    end},
10339:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
10340:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10341:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
10342:                    end},
10343: 
10344:          %% Terminations
10345:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
10346:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10347:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
10348:                            ok
10349:                    end},
10350:          #{desc => "await server termination",
10351:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10352:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
10353:                                ok ->
10354:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
10355:                                    {ok, State1};
10356:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10357:                                    ERROR
10358:                            end
10359:                    end},
10360: 
10361: 
10362:          %% *** We are done ***
10363:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10364:         ],
10365: 
10366:     i("start server evaluator"),
10367:     ServerInitState = InitState,
10368:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
10369: 
10370:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
10371:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid},
10372:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
10373: 
10374:     i("await evaluator"),
10375:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Tester]).
10376: 
10377: 
10378: 
10379: 
10380: 
10381: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10382: 
10383: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to accept,
10384: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
10385: %%
10386: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10387:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10388:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10389:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10390:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
10391:            fun() ->
10392:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
10393:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
10394:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
10395:                                             OK;
10396:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
10397:                                             SELECT;
10398:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10399:                                             COMPLETION;
10400:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
10401:                                             ERROR
10402:                                     end
10403:                             end,
10404:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet,
10405:                                  accept     => Accept,
10406:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
10407:                    ok = api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10408:            end).
10409: 
10410: 
10411: 
10412: 
10413: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10414: 
10415: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to accept,
10416: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
10417: %%
10418: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10419:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10420:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10421:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10422:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10423:            fun() ->
10424:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
10425:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
10426:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
10427:                                             OK;
10428:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
10429:                                             SELECT;
10430:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
10431:                                             COMPLETION;
10432:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
10433:                                             ERROR
10434:                                     end
10435:                             end,
10436:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet6,
10437:                                  accept     => Accept,
10438:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
10439:                    ok = api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10440:            end).
10441: 
10442: 
10443: 
10444: 
10445: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10446: 
10447: api_a_accept_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
10448:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
10449:     ServerSeq = 
10450:         [
10451:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10452:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10453:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10454:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10455:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
10456:                    end},
10457:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10458:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10459:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10460:                            ok
10461:                    end},
10462: 
10463:          %% *** Init part ***
10464:          #{desc => "which local address",
10465:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10466:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10467:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
10468:                    end},
10469:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
10470:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10471:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10472:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10473:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
10474:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10475:                                    ERROR
10476:                            end
10477:                    end},
10478:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10479:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
10480:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
10481:                                ok ->
10482:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
10483:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
10484:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10485:                                    ERROR
10486:                            end
10487:                    end},
10488:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
10489:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
10490:                            socket:listen(LSock)
10491:                    end},
10492:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10493:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
10494:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
10495:                            ok
10496:                    end},
10497: 
10498:          %% The actual test
10499:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
10500:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10501:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
10502:                    end},
10503:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
10504:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := LSock,
10505:                          accept     := Accept,
10506:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10507:                            case Accept(LSock) of
10508:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
10509:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10510:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select nowait: "
10511:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10512:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
10513:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10514:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
10515:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10516:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select ref: "
10517:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10518:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10519:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
10520: 
10521:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
10522:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10523:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion nowait: "
10524:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10525:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
10526:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10527:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
10528:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10529:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion ref: "
10530:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
10531:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10532:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
10533: 
10534:                                {ok, X} ->
10535:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10536: 
10537:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10538:                                    ERROR
10539:                            end
10540:                    end},
10541:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
10542:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10543:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
10544:                            ok
10545:                    end},
10546:          #{desc => "await select message (without success)",
10547:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
10548:                            receive
10549:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10550:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10551: 
10552:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
10553:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
10554: 
10555:                            after 5000 ->
10556:                                    ok
10557:                            end
10558:                    end},
10559:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
10560:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10561:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
10562:                            ok
10563:                    end},
10564:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
10565:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10566:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
10567:                    end},
10568:          #{desc => "cancel",
10569:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
10570:                          accept_select_info := SelectInfo}) ->
10571:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SelectInfo);
10572:                       (#{lsock                  := Sock,
10573:                          accept_completion_info := CompletionInfo}) ->
10574:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CompletionInfo)
10575:                    end},
10576:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
10577:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10578:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
10579:                            ok
10580:                    end},
10581: 
10582:          %% *** Termination ***
10583:          #{desc => "await terminate",
10584:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10585:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10586:                                ok ->
10587:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
10588:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10589:                                    ERROR
10590:                            end
10591:                    end},
10592:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
10593:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
10594:                            socket:close(Sock)
10595:                    end},
10596: 
10597:          %% *** We are done ***
10598:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10599:         ],
10600: 
10601: 
10602:     TesterSeq =
10603:         [
10604:          %% *** Init part ***
10605:          #{desc => "monitor server",
10606:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10607:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
10608:                            ok
10609:                    end},
10610: 
10611:          %% Start the server
10612:          #{desc => "order server start",
10613:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10614:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
10615:                            ok
10616:                    end},
10617:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
10618:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
10619:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
10620:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
10621:                    end},
10622: 
10623:          %% *** The actual test ***
10624:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
10625:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
10626:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
10627:                            ok
10628:                    end},
10629:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
10630:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10631:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
10632:                    end},
10633:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
10634:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10635:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
10636:                    end},
10637:          #{desc => "order server to continue (cancel)",
10638:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10639:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
10640:                            ok
10641:                    end},
10642:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
10643:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
10644:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
10645:                    end},
10646: 
10647:          %% *** Termination ***
10648:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
10649:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
10650:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
10651:                            ok
10652:                    end},
10653:          #{desc => "await server termination",
10654:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
10655:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
10656:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
10657:                            {ok, State1}
10658:                    end},
10659: 
10660:          %% *** We are done ***
10661:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10662:         ],
10663: 
10664:     i("start server evaluator"),
10665:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
10666: 
10667:     i("start tester evaluator"),
10668:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid},
10669:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
10670: 
10671:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
10672:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Tester]).
10673: 
10674: 
10675: 
10676: 
10677: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10678: 
10679: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recv,
10680: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
10681: %%
10682: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10683:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10684:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10685:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10686:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
10687:            fun() ->
10688:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10689:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
10690:                           end,
10691:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10692:                                  recv     => Recv,
10693:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10694:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10695:            end).
10696: 
10697: 
10698: 
10699: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10700: 
10701: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recv,
10702: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
10703: %%
10704: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10705:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10706:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10707:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10708:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
10709:            fun() ->
10710:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10711:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
10712:                           end,
10713:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10714:                                  recv     => Recv,
10715:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10716:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10717:            end).
10718: 
10719: 
10720: 
10721: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10722: 
10723: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
10724: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv4
10725: %%
10726: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10727:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10728:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10729:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10730:            fun() ->
10731:                    is_not_windows(),
10732:                    has_support_ipv4()
10733:            end,
10734:            fun() ->
10735:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10736:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
10737:                           end,
10738:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
10739:                                  recv     => Recv,
10740:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10741:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10742:            end).
10743: 
10744: 
10745: 
10746: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10747: 
10748: %% Basically we make an async (Timeout = nowait) call to recvmsg,
10749: %% wait some time and then cancel. IPv6
10750: %%
10751: api_a_recvmsg_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
10752:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
10753:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
10754:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
10755:            fun() ->
10756:                    is_not_windows(),
10757:                    has_support_ipv6()
10758:            end,
10759:            fun() ->
10760:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
10761:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
10762:                           end,
10763:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
10764:                                  recv     => Recv,
10765:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
10766:                    ok = api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
10767:            end).
10768: 
10769: 
10770: 
10771: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
10772: 
10773: api_a_recv_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
10774:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
10775:     ServerSeq = 
10776:         [
10777:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10778:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10779:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10780:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10781:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
10782:                    end},
10783:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10784:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10785:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10786:                            ok
10787:                    end},
10788: 
10789:          %% *** Init part ***
10790:          #{desc => "which local address",
10791:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10792:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10793:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
10794:                    end},
10795:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
10796:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10797:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10798:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10799:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
10800:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10801:                                    ERROR
10802:                            end
10803:                    end},
10804:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10805:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
10806:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
10807:                                ok ->
10808:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
10809:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
10810:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10811:                                    ERROR
10812:                            end
10813:                    end},
10814:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
10815:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
10816:                            socket:listen(LSock)
10817:                    end},
10818:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10819:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
10820:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
10821:                            ok
10822:                    end},
10823: 
10824:          %% The actual test
10825:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
10826:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10827:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
10828:                    end},
10829:          #{desc => "await connection",
10830:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
10831:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
10832:                                {ok, CSock} ->
10833:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}};
10834:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10835:                                    ERROR
10836:                            end
10837:                    end},
10838:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
10839:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10840:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
10841:                            ok
10842:                    end},
10843: 
10844:          #{desc => "await continue (nowait recv)",
10845:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10846:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
10847:                    end},
10848: 
10849:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
10850:            cmd  => fun(#{csock    := Sock,
10851:                          recv     := Recv,
10852:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
10853:                            case Recv(Sock) of
10854:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
10855:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10856:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
10857:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10858:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
10859:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10860:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
10861:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10862:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select ref: "
10863:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10864:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10865:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
10866: 
10867:                                {completion,
10868:                                 {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
10869:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
10870:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
10871:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10872:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
10873:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10874:                                {completion,
10875:                                 {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
10876:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
10877:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion ref: "
10878:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
10879:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
10880:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
10881: 
10882:                                {ok, X} ->
10883:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
10884: 
10885:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10886:                                    ERROR
10887:                            end
10888:                    end},
10889:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
10890:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10891:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
10892:                            ok
10893:                    end},
10894:          #{desc => "await select message",
10895:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
10896:                            receive
10897:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
10898:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
10899: 
10900:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, C} ->
10901:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}}
10902: 
10903:                            after 5000 ->
10904:                                    ok
10905:                            end
10906:                    end},
10907:          #{desc => "announce ready (no select)",
10908:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10909:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_select),
10910:                            ok
10911:                    end},
10912:          #{desc => "await continue (cancel)",
10913:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
10914:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, cancel)
10915:                    end},
10916:          #{desc => "cancel",
10917:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv_select_info := SI}) ->
10918:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, SI);
10919: 
10920:                       (#{csock := Sock, recv_completion_info := CI}) ->
10921:                            ok = socket:cancel(Sock, CI)
10922:                    end},
10923:          #{desc => "announce ready (cancel)",
10924:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10925:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, cancel),
10926:                            ok
10927:                    end},
10928: 
10929:          %% *** Termination ***
10930:          #{desc => "await terminate",
10931:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
10932:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
10933:                                ok ->
10934:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
10935:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10936:                                    ERROR
10937:                            end
10938:                    end},
10939:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
10940:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock}) ->
10941:                            socket:close(Sock)
10942:                    end},
10943:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
10944:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
10945:                            socket:close(Sock)
10946:                    end},
10947: 
10948:          %% *** We are done ***
10949:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
10950:         ],
10951: 
10952: 
10953:     ClientSeq = 
10954:         [
10955:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
10956:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
10957:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
10958:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
10959:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
10960:                    end},
10961:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
10962:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10963:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
10964:                            ok
10965:                    end},
10966: 
10967:          %% *** The init part ***
10968:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
10969:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
10970:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
10971:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
10972:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
10973:                    end},
10974:          #{desc => "create socket",
10975:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
10976:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
10977:                                {ok, Sock} ->
10978:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
10979:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10980:                                    ERROR
10981:                            end
10982:                    end},
10983:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
10984:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
10985:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
10986:                                ok ->
10987:                                    ok;
10988:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
10989:                                    ERROR
10990:                            end
10991:                    end},
10992:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
10993:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
10994:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
10995:                            ok
10996:                    end},
10997: 
10998:          %% *** The actual test ***
10999:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
11000:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11001:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
11002:                    end},
11003:          #{desc => "connect to server",
11004:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
11005:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
11006:                    end},
11007:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
11008:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11009:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
11010:                            ok
11011:                    end},
11012: 
11013:          %% *** Termination ***
11014:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11015:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11016:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11017:                                ok ->
11018:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
11019:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11020:                                    ERROR
11021:                            end
11022:                    end},
11023:          #{desc => "close socket",
11024:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
11025:                            socket:close(Sock)
11026:                    end},
11027: 
11028:          %% *** We are done ***
11029:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11030:         ],
11031: 
11032:     TesterSeq =
11033:         [
11034:          %% *** Init part ***
11035:          #{desc => "monitor server",
11036:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11037:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11038:                            ok
11039:                    end},
11040:          #{desc => "monitor client",
11041:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
11042:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11043:                            ok
11044:                    end},
11045: 
11046:          %% Start the server
11047:          #{desc => "order server start",
11048:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11049:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
11050:                            ok
11051:                    end},
11052:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
11053:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
11054:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
11055:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
11056:                    end},
11057: 
11058:          %% Start the client
11059:          #{desc => "order client start",
11060:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
11061:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
11062:                            ok
11063:                    end},
11064:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
11065:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
11066:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
11067:                    end},
11068: 
11069:          %% *** The actual test ***
11070:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
11071:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
11072:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
11073:                            ok
11074:                    end},
11075:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
11076:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
11077:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
11078:                            ok
11079:                    end},
11080:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
11081:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
11082:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
11083:                    end},
11084:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
11085:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11086:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept)
11087:                    end},
11088: 
11089:          #{desc => "order server to continue (recv)",
11090:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11091:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11092:                            ok
11093:                    end},
11094:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
11095:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11096:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
11097:                    end},
11098:          #{desc => "await server ready (no select)",
11099:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11100:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, no_select)
11101:                    end},
11102:          #{desc => "order server to continue (send request)",
11103:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11104:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, cancel),
11105:                            ok
11106:                    end},
11107:          #{desc => "await server ready (cancel)",
11108:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11109:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, cancel)
11110:                    end},
11111: 
11112:          %% *** Termination ***
11113:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
11114:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
11115:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
11116:                            ok
11117:                    end},
11118:          #{desc => "await client termination",
11119:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
11120:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
11121:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
11122:                            {ok, State1}
11123:                    end},
11124:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
11125:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
11126:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
11127:                            ok
11128:                    end},
11129:          #{desc => "await server termination",
11130:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
11131:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
11132:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
11133:                            {ok, State1}
11134:                    end},
11135: 
11136:          %% *** We are done ***
11137:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11138:         ],
11139: 
11140:     i("start server evaluator"),
11141:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
11142: 
11143:     i("start client evaluator"),
11144:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
11145: 
11146:     i("start tester evaluator"),
11147:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
11148:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
11149:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
11150: 
11151:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
11152:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
11153: 
11154: 
11155: 
11156: 
11157: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11158: 
11159: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvfrom
11160: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
11161: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
11162: %%
11163: api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11164:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11165:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11166:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp4,
11167:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
11168:            fun() ->
11169:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
11170:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
11171:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
11172:                                           OK;
11173:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
11174:                                           SELECT;
11175:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11176:                                           COMPLETION;
11177:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
11178:                                           ERROR
11179:                                   end
11180:                           end,
11181:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
11182:                                  recv     => Recv,
11183:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
11184:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
11185:            end).
11186: 
11187: 
11188: 
11189: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11190: 
11191: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvfrom
11192: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
11193: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
11194: %%
11195: api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11196:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11197:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11198:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvfrom_cancel_udp6,
11199:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
11200:            fun() ->
11201:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
11202:                                   case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, Nowait) of
11203:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
11204:                                           OK;
11205:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
11206:                                           SELECT;
11207:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11208:                                           COMPLETION;
11209:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
11210:                                           ERROR
11211:                                   end
11212:                           end,
11213:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
11214:                                  recv     => Recv,
11215:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
11216:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
11217:            end).
11218: 
11219: 
11220: 
11221: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11222: 
11223: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
11224: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
11225: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
11226: %%
11227: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11228:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11229:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11230:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp4,
11231:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
11232:            fun() ->
11233:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
11234:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
11235:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
11236:                                           OK;
11237:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
11238:                                           SELECT;
11239:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11240:                                           COMPLETION;
11241:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
11242:                                           ERROR
11243:                                   end
11244:                           end,
11245:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
11246:                                  recv     => Recv,
11247:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
11248:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
11249:            end).
11250: 
11251: 
11252: 
11253: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11254: 
11255: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
11256: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel.
11257: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
11258: %%
11259: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11260:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11261:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11262:     tc_try(api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_udp6,
11263:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
11264:            fun() ->
11265:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
11266:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait) of
11267:                                       {ok, _} = OK ->
11268:                                           OK;
11269:                                       {select, _} = SELECT ->
11270:                                           SELECT;
11271:                                       {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11272:                                           COMPLETION;
11273:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
11274:                                           ERROR
11275:                                   end
11276:                           end,
11277:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
11278:                                  recv     => Recv,
11279:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
11280:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState)
11281:            end).
11282: 
11283: 
11284: 
11285: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11286: 
11287: api_a_mrecv_cancel_udp(InitState) ->
11288:     ServerSeq = 
11289:         [
11290:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
11291:          #{desc => "await start",
11292:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11293:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11294:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
11295:                    end},
11296:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11297:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11298:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11299:                            ok
11300:                    end},
11301: 
11302:          %% *** Init part ***
11303:          #{desc => "which local address",
11304:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11305:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11306:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
11307:                    end},
11308:          #{desc => "create socket",
11309:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11310:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
11311:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11312:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11313:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11314:                                    ERROR
11315:                            end
11316:                    end},
11317:          #{desc => "bind socket (to local address)",
11318:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
11319:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
11320:                                ok ->
11321:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
11322:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
11323:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11324:                                    ERROR
11325:                            end
11326:                    end},
11327:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11328:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock}) ->
11329:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
11330:                            ok
11331:                    end},
11332: 
11333:          %% The actual test
11334:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
11335:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11336:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
11337:                    end},
11338:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
11339:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
11340:                          recv     := Recv,
11341:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
11342:                            case Recv(Sock) of
11343:                                {select, SI}
11344:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
11345:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
11346:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
11347:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11348:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
11349: 
11350:                                {completion, CI}
11351:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
11352:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
11353:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
11354:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11355:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
11356: 
11357:                                {ok, X} ->
11358:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
11359: 
11360:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11361:                                    ERROR
11362:                            end
11363:                    end},
11364:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
11365:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11366:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
11367:                            ok
11368:                    end},
11369:          #{desc => "await abort message",
11370:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
11371:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} =
11372:                            State) ->
11373:                            receive
11374:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
11375:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
11376:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11377:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11378:                            after 5000 ->
11379:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
11380:                                    {error, timeout}
11381:                            end;
11382:                       (#{sock                 := Sock,
11383:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = 
11384:                            State) ->
11385:                            receive
11386:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, CS}} ->
11387:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, CS}};
11388:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11389:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11390:                            after 5000 ->
11391:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
11392:                                    {error, timeout}
11393:                            end
11394:                    end},
11395:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
11396:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11397:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
11398:                            ok
11399:                    end},
11400: 
11401:          %% Termination
11402:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
11403:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11404:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11405:                                ok ->
11406:                                    State2 = maps:remove(tester,   State),
11407:                                    State3 = maps:remove(recv_ref, State2),
11408:                                    {ok, State3};
11409:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11410:                                    ERROR
11411:                            end
11412:                    end},
11413: 
11414:          %% *** We are done ***
11415:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11416:         ],
11417: 
11418: 
11419:     AltServerSeq = 
11420:         [
11421:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
11422:          #{desc => "await start",
11423:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11424:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11425:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
11426:                    end},
11427:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11428:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11429:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11430:                            ok
11431:                    end},
11432:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11433:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11434:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
11435:                            ok
11436:                    end},
11437: 
11438:          %% The actual test
11439:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
11440:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11441:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
11442:                    end},
11443:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
11444:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
11445:                          recv     := Recv,
11446:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
11447:                            case Recv(Sock) of
11448:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
11449:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
11450:                                {select,
11451:                                 {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
11452:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11453:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
11454: 
11455:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
11456:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
11457:                                {completion,
11458:                                 {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
11459:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11460:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
11461: 
11462:                                {ok, X} ->
11463:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
11464: 
11465:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11466:                                    ERROR
11467:                            end
11468:                    end},
11469:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
11470:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11471:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
11472:                            ok
11473:                    end},
11474:          #{desc => "await abort message",
11475:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
11476:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
11477:                            receive
11478:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
11479:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
11480:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11481:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11482:                            after 5000 ->
11483:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
11484:                                    {error, timeout}
11485:                            end;
11486: 
11487:                       (#{sock                 := Sock,
11488:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} =
11489:                            State) ->
11490:                            receive
11491:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, CS}} ->
11492:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, CS}};
11493:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11494:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11495:                            after 5000 ->
11496:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
11497:                                    {error, timeout}
11498:                            end
11499:                    end},
11500:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
11501:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11502:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
11503:                            ok
11504:                    end},
11505: 
11506:          %% Termination
11507:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
11508:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11509:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11510:                                ok ->
11511:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
11512:                                    State1 = maps:remove(recv_select_info, State),
11513:                                    State2 = maps:remove(recv_completion_info, State1),
11514:                                    State3 = maps:remove(tester,           State2),
11515:                                    State4 = maps:remove(sock,             State3),
11516:                                    {ok, State4};
11517:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11518:                                    ERROR
11519:                            end
11520:                    end},
11521: 
11522:          %% *** We are done ***
11523:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11524:         ],
11525: 
11526: 
11527: 
11528:     TesterSeq = 
11529:         [
11530:          %% *** Init part ***
11531:          #{desc => "monitor server",
11532:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11533:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11534:                            ok
11535:                    end},
11536:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
11537:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11538:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11539:                            ok
