11540:                    end},
11541:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
11542:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11543:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11544:                            ok
11545:                    end},
11546: 
11547:          %% Start the server
11548:          #{desc => "order server start",
11549:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11550:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
11551:                            ok
11552:                    end},
11553:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
11554:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
11555:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
11556:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
11557:                    end},
11558: 
11559:          %% Start the alt-server 1
11560:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
11561:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
11562:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
11563:                            ok
11564:                    end},
11565:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
11566:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11567:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
11568:                    end},
11569: 
11570:          %% Start the alt-server 2
11571:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
11572:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
11573:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
11574:                            ok
11575:                    end},
11576:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
11577:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11578:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
11579:                    end},
11580: 
11581: 
11582:          %% The actual test
11583:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
11584:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11585:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11586:                            ok
11587:                    end},
11588:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
11589:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11590:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
11591:                    end},
11592: 
11593:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (recv)",
11594:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11595:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11596:                            ok
11597:                    end},
11598:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (recv select)",
11599:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11600:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, recv_select)
11601:                    end},
11602: 
11603:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (recv)",
11604:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11605:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
11606:                            ok
11607:                    end},
11608:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (recv select)",
11609:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11610:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, recv_select)
11611:                    end},
11612: 
11613:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
11614: 
11615:          #{desc => "close the socket",
11616:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
11617:                            socket:close(Sock)
11618:                    end},
11619: 
11620:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
11621:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11622:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
11623:                    end},
11624:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
11625:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11626:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
11627:                    end},
11628:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
11629:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11630:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
11631:                    end},
11632: 
11633:          %% Terminations
11634:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
11635:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11636:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11637:                            ok
11638:                    end},
11639:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
11640:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
11641:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11642:                                ok ->
11643:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
11644:                                    {ok, State1};
11645:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11646:                                    ERROR
11647:                            end
11648:                    end},
11649: 
11650:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
11651:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11652:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11653:                            ok
11654:                    end},
11655:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
11656:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
11657:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11658:                                ok ->
11659:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
11660:                                    {ok, State1};
11661:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11662:                                    ERROR
11663:                            end
11664:                    end},
11665: 
11666:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
11667:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
11668:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11669:                            ok
11670:                    end},
11671:          #{desc => "await server termination",
11672:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
11673:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11674:                                ok ->
11675:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
11676:                                    {ok, State1};
11677:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11678:                                    ERROR
11679:                            end
11680:                    end},
11681: 
11682: 
11683:          %% *** We are done ***
11684:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11685:         ],
11686: 
11687:     i("start server evaluator"),
11688:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
11689: 
11690:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
11691:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
11692: 
11693:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
11694:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
11695: 
11696:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
11697:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
11698:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
11699:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid},
11700:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
11701: 
11702:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
11703:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Tester]).
11704: 
11705: 
11706: 
11707: 
11708: 
11709: 
11710: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11711: 
11712: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to accept
11713: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
11714: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
11715: %%
11716: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11717:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11718:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11719:     tc_try(api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp4,
11720:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
11721:            fun() ->
11722:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
11723:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
11724:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
11725:                                             OK;
11726:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
11727:                                             SELECT;
11728:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11729:                                             COMPLETION;
11730:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
11731:                                             ERROR
11732:                                     end
11733:                             end,
11734:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet,
11735:                                  accept     => Accept,
11736:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
11737:                    ok = api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
11738:            end).
11739: 
11740: 
11741: 
11742: 
11743: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11744: 
11745: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to accept
11746: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
11747: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
11748: %%
11749: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11750:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
11751:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
11752:     tc_try(api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp6,
11753:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
11754:            fun() ->
11755:                    Accept = fun(Sock) ->
11756:                                     case socket:accept(Sock, Nowait) of
11757:                                         {ok, _} = OK ->
11758:                                             OK;
11759:                                         {select, _} = SELECT ->
11760:                                             SELECT;
11761:                                         {completion, _} = COMPLETION ->
11762:                                             COMPLETION;
11763:                                         {error, _} = ERROR ->
11764:                                             ERROR
11765:                                     end
11766:                             end,
11767:                    InitState = #{domain     => inet6,
11768:                                  accept     => Accept,
11769:                                  accept_ref => Nowait},
11770:                    ok = api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState)
11771:            end).
11772: 
11773: 
11774: 
11775: 
11776: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11777: 
11778: api_a_maccept_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
11779:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
11780:     ServerSeq = 
11781:         [
11782:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
11783:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
11784:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11785:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11786:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
11787:                    end},
11788:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11789:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11790:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11791:                            ok
11792:                    end},
11793: 
11794:          %% *** Init part ***
11795:          #{desc => "which local address",
11796:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11797:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11798:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
11799:                    end},
11800:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
11801:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11802:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
11803:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11804:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
11805:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11806:                                    ERROR
11807:                            end
11808:                    end},
11809:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
11810:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
11811:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
11812:                                ok ->
11813:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
11814:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
11815:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11816:                                    ERROR
11817:                            end
11818:                    end},
11819:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
11820:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
11821:                            socket:listen(LSock)
11822:                    end},
11823:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11824:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lsock := Sock}) ->
11825:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
11826:                            ok
11827:                    end},
11828: 
11829:          %% The actual test
11830:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
11831:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11832:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
11833:                    end},
11834:          #{desc => "await connection (nowait)",
11835:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := LSock,
11836:                          accept     := Accept,
11837:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
11838:                            case Accept(LSock) of
11839:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
11840:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
11841:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select nowait: "
11842:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
11843:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
11844:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
11845:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
11846:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11847:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept select ref: "
11848:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
11849:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
11850:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
11851: 
11852:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
11853:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
11854:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion nowait: "
11855:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
11856:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, R]),
11857:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
11858:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
11859:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11860:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accept completion ref: "
11861:                                                "~n   T: ~p"
11862:                                                "~n   R: ~p", [T, Ref]),
11863:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
11864: 
11865:                                {ok, X} ->
11866:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
11867: 
11868:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11869:                                    ERROR
11870:                            end
11871:                    end},
11872:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
11873:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11874:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
11875:                            ok
11876:                    end},
11877:          #{desc => "await select message (without success)",
11878:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
11879:                          accept_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
11880:                            receive
11881:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
11882:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
11883:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11884:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
11885:                            after 5000 ->
11886:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
11887:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
11888:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
11889:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
11890:                                                [Sock, Ref, mq()]),
11891:                                    {error, timeout}
11892:                            end;
11893:                       (#{lsock                  := Sock,
11894:                          accept_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
11895:                            receive
11896:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
11897:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
11898:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11899:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
11900:                            after 5000 ->
11901:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
11902:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
11903:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
11904:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
11905:                                                [Sock, Ref, mq()]),
11906:                                    {error, timeout}
11907:                            end
11908:                    end},
11909:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
11910:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11911:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
11912:                            ok
11913:                    end},
11914: 
11915:          %% *** Termination ***
11916:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11917:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11918:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11919:                                ok ->
11920:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
11921:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11922:                                    ERROR
11923:                            end
11924:                    end},
11925: 
11926:          %% *** We are done ***
11927:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11928:         ],
11929: 
11930: 
11931:     AltServerSeq =
11932:         [
11933:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
11934:          #{desc => "await start",
11935:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11936:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11937:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, lsock => Sock}}
11938:                    end},
11939:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11940:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11941:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11942:                            ok
11943:                    end},
11944:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11945:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11946:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
11947:                            ok
11948:                    end},
11949: 
11950:          %% The actual test
11951:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
11952:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11953:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
11954:                    end},
11955:          #{desc => "try accept request (with nowait, expect select)",
11956:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock      := Sock,
11957:                          accept     := Accept,
11958:                          accept_ref := Ref} = State) ->
11959:                            case Accept(Sock) of
11960:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
11961:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
11962:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
11963:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11964:                                    {ok, State#{accept_select_info => SI}};
11965: 
11966:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
11967:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
11968:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
11969:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
11970:                                    {ok, State#{accept_completion_info => CI}};
11971: 
11972:                                {ok, X} ->
11973:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
11974: 
11975:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11976:                                    ERROR
11977:                            end
11978:                    end},
11979:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept_select)",
11980:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11981:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept_select),
11982:                            ok
11983:                    end},
11984:          #{desc => "await abort message",
11985:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock              := Sock,
11986:                          accept_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
11987:                            receive
11988:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
11989:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
11990:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
11991:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11992:                            after 5000 ->
11993:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
11994:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
11995:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
11996:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
11997:                                                [Sock, Ref, mq()]),
11998:                                    {error, timeout}
11999:                            end;
12000:                       (#{lsock              := Sock,
12001:                          accept_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
12002:                            receive
12003:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
12004:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
12005:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
12006:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12007:                            after 5000 ->
12008:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout when: "
12009:                                                "~n   Sock:          ~p"
12010:                                                "~n   Ref:           ~p"
12011:                                                "~n   message queue: ~p",
12012:                                                [Sock, Ref, mq()]),
12013:                                    {error, timeout}
12014:                            end
12015:                    end},
12016:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
12017:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12018:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
12019:                            ok
12020:                    end},
12021: 
12022:          %% Termination
12023:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
12024:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12025:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
12026:                                ok ->
12027:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
12028:                                    State1 = maps:remove(tester,             State),
12029:                                    State2 = maps:remove(accept_select_info, State1),
12030:                                    State3 = maps:remove(accept_completion_info, State2),
12031:                                    State4 = maps:remove(lsock,              State3),
12032:                                    {ok, State4};
12033:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12034:                                    ERROR
12035:                            end
12036:                    end},
12037: 
12038:          %% *** We are done ***
12039:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12040:         ],
12041: 
12042: 
12043:     TesterSeq =
12044:         [
12045:          %% *** Init part ***
12046:          #{desc => "monitor server",
12047:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12048:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12049:                            ok
12050:                    end},
12051:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
12052:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12053:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12054:                            ok
12055:                    end},
12056:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
12057:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12058:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12059:                            ok
12060:                    end},
12061: 
12062:          %% Start the server
12063:          #{desc => "order server start",
12064:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12065:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
12066:                            ok
12067:                    end},
12068:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
12069:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
12070:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
12071:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
12072:                    end},
12073: 
12074:          %% Start the alt-server 1
12075:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
12076:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12077:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
12078:                            ok
12079:                    end},
12080:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
12081:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12082:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
12083:                    end},
12084: 
12085:          %% Start the alt-server 2
12086:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
12087:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12088:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
12089:                            ok
12090:                    end},
12091:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
12092:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12093:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
12094:                    end},
12095: 
12096: 
12097:          %% *** The actual test ***
12098:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
12099:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12100:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
12101:                            ok
12102:                    end},
12103:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept select)",
12104:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12105:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept_select)
12106:                    end},
12107: 
12108:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (accept)",
12109:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12110:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
12111:                            ok
12112:                    end},
12113:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (accept select)",
12114:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12115:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, accept_select)
12116:                    end},
12117: 
12118:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (accept)",
12119:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12120:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
12121:                            ok
12122:                    end},
12123:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (accept select)",
12124:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12125:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, accept_select)
12126:                    end},
12127: 
12128:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12129: 
12130:          #{desc => "close the socket",
12131:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12132:                            socket:close(Sock)
12133:                    end},
12134: 
12135:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
12136:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12137:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
12138:                    end},
12139:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
12140:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12141:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
12142:                    end},
12143:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
12144:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12145:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
12146:                    end},
12147: 
12148: 
12149:          %% *** Termination ***
12150:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
12151:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12152:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
12153:                            ok
12154:                    end},
12155:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
12156:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
12157:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
12158:                                ok ->
12159:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
12160:                                    {ok, State1};
12161:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12162:                                    ERROR
12163:                            end
12164:                    end},
12165: 
12166:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
12167:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12168:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
12169:                            ok
12170:                    end},
12171:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
12172:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
12173:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
12174:                                ok ->
12175:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
12176:                                    {ok, State1};
12177:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12178:                                    ERROR
12179:                            end
12180:                    end},
12181: 
12182:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
12183:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12184:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
12185:                            ok
12186:                    end},
12187:          #{desc => "await server termination",
12188:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
12189:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
12190:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
12191:                            {ok, State1}
12192:                    end},
12193: 
12194:          %% *** We are done ***
12195:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12196:         ],
12197: 
12198:     i("start server evaluator"),
12199:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
12200: 
12201:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
12202:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
12203: 
12204:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
12205:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
12206: 
12207:     i("start tester evaluator"),
12208:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
12209:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
12210:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid},
12211:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
12212: 
12213:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
12214:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Tester]).
12215: 
12216: 
12217: 
12218: 
12219: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12220: 
12221: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recv
12222: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
12223: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
12224: %%
12225: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12226:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
12227:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
12228:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12229:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
12230:            fun() ->
12231:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
12232:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
12233:                           end,
12234:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
12235:                                  recv     => Recv,
12236:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
12237:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
12238:            end).
12239: 
12240: 
12241: 
12242: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12243: 
12244: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recv
12245: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
12246: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
12247: %%
12248: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12249:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
12250:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
12251:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12252:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
12253:            fun() ->
12254:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
12255:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, Nowait)
12256:                           end,
12257:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
12258:                                  recv     => Recv,
12259:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
12260:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
12261:            end).
12262: 
12263: 
12264: 
12265: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12266: 
12267: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
12268: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
12269: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv4
12270: %%
12271: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12272:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
12273:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
12274:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12275:            fun() ->
12276:                    is_not_windows(),
12277:                    has_support_ipv4()
12278:            end,
12279:            fun() ->
12280:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
12281:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
12282:                           end,
12283:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
12284:                                  recv     => Recv,
12285:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
12286:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
12287:            end).
12288: 
12289: 
12290: 
12291: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12292: 
12293: %% Basically we make multiple async (Timeout = nowait) call(s) to recvmsg
12294: %% (from *several* processes), wait some time and then cancel,
12295: %% This should result in abort messages to the 'other' processes. IPv6
12296: %%
12297: api_a_mrecvmsg_cancel_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12298:     ?TT(?SECS(20)),
12299:     Nowait = nowait(Config),
12300:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12301:            fun() ->
12302:                    is_not_windows(),
12303:                    has_support_ipv6()
12304:            end,
12305:            fun() ->
12306:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
12307:                                   socket:recvmsg(Sock, Nowait)
12308:                           end,
12309:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
12310:                                  recv     => Recv,
12311:                                  recv_ref => Nowait},
12312:                    ok = api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState)
12313:            end).
12314: 
12315: 
12316: 
12317: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12318: 
12319: api_a_mrecv_cancel_tcp(InitState) ->
12320:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
12321:     ServerSeq = 
12322:         [
12323:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
12324:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
12325:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
12326:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
12327:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
12328:                    end},
12329:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
12330:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12331:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
12332:                            ok
12333:                    end},
12334: 
12335:          %% *** Init part ***
12336:          #{desc => "which local address",
12337:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12338:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
12339:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
12340:                    end},
12341:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
12342:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12343:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
12344:                                {ok, Sock} ->
12345:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
12346:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12347:                                    ERROR
12348:                            end
12349:                    end},
12350:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
12351:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
12352:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
12353:                                ok ->
12354:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
12355:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
12356:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12357:                                    ERROR
12358:                            end
12359:                    end},
12360:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
12361:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
12362:                            socket:listen(LSock)
12363:                    end},
12364:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
12365:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
12366:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
12367:                            ok
12368:                    end},
12369: 
12370:          %% The actual test
12371:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
12372:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12373:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
12374:                    end},
12375:          #{desc => "await connection",
12376:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
12377:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
12378:                                {ok, CSock} ->
12379:                                    {ok, State#{csock => CSock}};
12380:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12381:                                    ERROR
12382:                            end
12383:                    end},
12384:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
12385:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, csock := Sock}) ->
12386:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept, Sock),
12387:                            ok
12388:                    end},
12389: 
12390:          #{desc => "await continue (nowait recv)",
12391:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12392:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
12393:                    end},
12394:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select|completion)",
12395:            cmd  => fun(#{csock    := Sock,
12396:                          recv     := Recv,
12397:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
12398:                            case Recv(Sock) of
12399:                                {select, {select_info, T, R} = SI}
12400:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
12401:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
12402:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
12403:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
12404:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
12405:                                {select, {select_info, T, Ref} = SI}
12406:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
12407:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv select nowait: "
12408:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
12409:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
12410:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
12411: 
12412:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, R} = CI}
12413:                                  when Ref =:= nowait ->
12414:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
12415:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
12416:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, R]),
12417:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
12418:                                {completion, {completion_info, T, Ref} = CI}
12419:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
12420:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("recv completion nowait: "
12421:                                                "~n   Tag: ~p"
12422:                                                "~n   Ref: ~p", [T, Ref]),
12423:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
12424: 
12425:                                {ok, X} ->
12426:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
12427: 
12428:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12429:                                    ERROR
12430:                            end
12431:                    end},
12432:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
12433:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12434:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
12435:                            ok
12436:                    end},
12437:          #{desc => "await select|completion message",
12438:            cmd  => fun(#{csock            := Sock,
12439:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
12440:                            receive
12441:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
12442:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
12443:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
12444:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12445:                            after 5000 ->
12446:                                    ok
12447:                            end;
12448:                       (#{csock                := Sock,
12449:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
12450:                            receive
12451:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
12452:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
12453:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
12454:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12455:                            after 5000 ->
12456:                                    ok
12457:                            end
12458:                    end},
12459:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
12460:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12461:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
12462:                            ok
12463:                    end},
12464: 
12465:          %% *** Termination ***
12466:          #{desc => "await terminate",
12467:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12468:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
12469:                                ok ->
12470:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
12471:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12472:                                    ERROR
12473:                            end
12474:                    end},
12475:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
12476:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock}) ->
12477:                            socket:close(Sock)
12478:                    end},
12479: 
12480:          %% *** We are done ***
12481:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12482:         ],
12483: 
12484:     AltServerSeq =
12485:         [
12486:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
12487:          #{desc => "await start",
12488:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
12489:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
12490:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, sock => Sock}}
12491:                    end},
12492:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
12493:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12494:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
12495:                            ok
12496:                    end},
12497:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
12498:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12499:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
12500:                            ok
12501:                    end},
12502: 
12503:          %% The actual test
12504:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
12505:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12506:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
12507:                    end},
12508:          #{desc => "try recv request (with nowait, expect select)",
12509:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
12510:                          recv     := Recv,
12511:                          recv_ref := Ref} = State) ->
12512:                            case Recv(Sock) of
12513:                                {select, SI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
12514:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
12515:                                {select, {select_info, _Tag, Ref} = SI}
12516:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
12517:                                    {ok, State#{recv_select_info => SI}};
12518: 
12519:                                {completion, CI} when Ref =:= nowait ->
12520:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
12521:                                {completion, {completion_info, _Tag, Ref} = CI}
12522:                                  when is_reference(Ref) ->
12523:                                    {ok, State#{recv_completion_info => CI}};
12524: 
12525:                                {ok, X} ->
12526:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, X}};
12527: 
12528:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12529:                                    ERROR
12530:                            end
12531:                    end},
12532:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv_select)",
12533:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12534:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_select),
12535:                            ok
12536:                    end},
12537:          #{desc => "await abort message",
12538:            cmd  => fun(#{sock             := Sock,
12539:                          recv_select_info := {select_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
12540:                            receive
12541:                                {'$socket', Sock, select, Ref} ->
12542:                                    {error, {unexpected_select, Ref}};
12543:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
12544:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12545:                            after 5000 ->
12546:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
12547:                                    {error, timeout}
12548:                            end;
12549:                       (#{sock             := Sock,
12550:                          recv_completion_info := {completion_info, _, Ref}} = State) ->
12551:                            receive
12552:                                {'$socket', Sock, completion, {Ref, _} = C} ->
12553:                                    {error, {unexpected_completion, C}};
12554:                                {'$socket', Sock, abort, {Ref, closed}} ->
12555:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
12556:                            after 5000 ->
12557:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("message queue: ~p", [mq()]),
12558:                                    {error, timeout}
12559:                            end
12560:                    end},
12561:          #{desc => "announce ready (abort)",
12562:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12563:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, abort),
12564:                            ok
12565:                    end},
12566: 
12567:          %% Termination
12568:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
12569:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12570:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
12571:                                ok ->
12572:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
12573:                                    State1 = maps:remove(recv_select_info, State),
12574:                                    State2 = maps:remove(recv_completion_info, State1),
12575:                                    State3 = maps:remove(tester,           State2),
12576:                                    State4 = maps:remove(sock,             State3),
12577:                                    {ok, State4};
12578:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12579:                                    ERROR
12580:                            end
12581:                    end},
12582: 
12583:          %% *** We are done ***
12584:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12585:         ],
12586: 
12587:     ClientSeq = 
12588:         [
12589:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
12590:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
12591:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
12592:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
12593:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
12594:                    end},
12595:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
12596:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12597:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
12598:                            ok
12599:                    end},
12600: 
12601:          %% *** The init part ***
12602:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
12603:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
12604:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
12605:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
12606:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
12607:                    end},
12608:          #{desc => "create socket",
12609:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
12610:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
12611:                                {ok, Sock} ->
12612:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
12613:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12614:                                    ERROR
12615:                            end
12616:                    end},
12617:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
12618:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
12619:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
12620:                                ok ->
12621:                                    ok;
12622:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12623:                                    ERROR
12624:                            end
12625:                    end},
12626:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
12627:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12628:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
12629:                            ok
12630:                    end},
12631: 
12632:          %% *** The actual test ***
12633:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
12634:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
12635:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
12636:                    end},
12637:          #{desc => "connect to server",
12638:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
12639:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
12640:                    end},
12641:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
12642:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
12643:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
12644:                            ok
12645:                    end},
12646: 
12647:          %% *** Termination ***
12648:          #{desc => "await terminate",
12649:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
12650:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
12651:                                ok ->
12652:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
12653:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12654:                                    ERROR
12655:                            end
12656:                    end},
12657:          #{desc => "close socket",
12658:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
12659:                            socket:close(Sock)
12660:                    end},
12661: 
12662:          %% *** We are done ***
12663:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12664:         ],
12665: 
12666:     TesterSeq =
12667:         [
12668:          %% *** Init part ***
12669:          #{desc => "monitor server",
12670:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12671:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12672:                            ok
12673:                    end},
12674:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 1",
12675:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12676:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12677:                            ok
12678:                    end},
12679:          #{desc => "monitor alt-server 2",
12680:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12681:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12682:                            ok
12683:                    end},
12684:          #{desc => "monitor client",
12685:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
12686:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
12687:                            ok
12688:                    end},
12689: 
12690:          %% Start the server
12691:          #{desc => "order server start",
12692:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12693:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
12694:                            ok
12695:                    end},
12696:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
12697:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
12698:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
12699:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
12700:                    end},
12701: 
12702:          %% Start the client
12703:          #{desc => "order client start",
12704:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
12705:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
12706:                            ok
12707:                    end},
12708:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
12709:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
12710:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
12711:                    end},
12712: 
12713:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
12714:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
12715:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
12716:                            ok
12717:                    end},
12718:          #{desc => "order client to continue (connect)",
12719:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
12720:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
12721:                            ok
12722:                    end},
12723:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
12724:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
12725:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, connect)
12726:                    end},
12727:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
12728:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
12729:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, accept),
12730:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
12731:                    end},
12732: 
12733:          %% Start the alt server 1
12734:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 start",
12735:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12736:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
12737:                            ok
12738:                    end},
12739:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (init)",
12740:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12741:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, init)
12742:                    end},
12743: 
12744:          %% Start the alt server 2
12745:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 start",
12746:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12747:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Sock),
12748:                            ok
12749:                    end},
12750:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (init)",
12751:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12752:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, init)
12753:                    end},
12754: 
12755: 
12756:          %% *** The actual test ***
12757:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
12758:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12759:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
12760:                            ok
12761:                    end},
12762:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv select)",
12763:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12764:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, recv_select)
12765:                    end},
12766: 
12767:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 continue (recv)",
12768:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12769:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
12770:                            ok
12771:                    end},
12772:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (recv select)",
12773:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12774:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, recv_select)
12775:                    end},
12776: 
12777:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 continue (recv)",
12778:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12779:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
12780:                            ok
12781:                    end},
12782:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (recv select)",
12783:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12784:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, recv_select)
12785:                    end},
12786: 
12787:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12788: 
12789:          #{desc => "close the socket",
12790:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
12791:                            socket:close(Sock)
12792:                    end},
12793: 
12794:          #{desc => "await server ready (abort)",
12795:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12796:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, abort)
12797:                    end},
12798:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 ready (abort)",
12799:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12800:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server1, abort)
12801:                    end},
12802:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 ready (abort)",
12803:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12804:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, alt_server2, abort)
12805:                    end},
12806: 
12807:          %% Terminations
12808:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
12809:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
12810:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
12811:                            ok
12812:                    end},
12813:          #{desc => "await client termination",
12814:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
12815:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
12816:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
12817:                            {ok, State1}
12818:                    end},
12819: 
12820:          #{desc => "order alt-server 2 to terminate",
12821:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = _State) ->
12822:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
12823:                            ok
12824:                    end},
12825:          #{desc => "await alt-server 2 termination",
12826:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server2 := Pid} = State) ->
12827:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
12828:                                ok ->
12829:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server2, State),
12830:                                    {ok, State1};
12831:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12832:                                    ERROR
12833:                            end
12834:                    end},
12835: 
12836:          #{desc => "order alt-server 1 to terminate",
12837:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = _State) ->
12838:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
12839:                            ok
12840:                    end},
12841:          #{desc => "await alt-server 1 termination",
12842:            cmd  => fun(#{alt_server1 := Pid} = State) ->
12843:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
12844:                                ok ->
12845:                                    State1 = maps:remove(alt_server1, State),
12846:                                    {ok, State1};
12847:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12848:                                    ERROR
12849:                            end
12850:                    end},
12851: 
12852:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
12853:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
12854:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
12855:                            ok
12856:                    end},
12857:          #{desc => "await server termination",
12858:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
12859:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
12860:                                ok ->
12861:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
12862:                                    {ok, State1};
12863:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12864:                                    ERROR
12865:                            end
12866:                    end},
12867: 
12868: 
12869:          %% *** We are done ***
12870:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
12871:         ],
12872: 
12873:     i("start server evaluator"),
12874:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
12875: 
12876:     i("start alt-server 1 evaluator"),
12877:     AltServer1 = ?SEV_START("alt_server1", AltServerSeq, InitState),
12878: 
12879:     i("start alt-server 2 evaluator"),
12880:     AltServer2 = ?SEV_START("alt_server2", AltServerSeq, InitState),
12881: 
12882:     i("start client evaluator"),
12883:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
12884: 
12885:     i("start tester evaluator"),
12886:     TesterInitState = #{server      => Server#ev.pid,
12887:                         alt_server1 => AltServer1#ev.pid,
12888:                         alt_server2 => AltServer2#ev.pid,
12889:                         client      => Client#ev.pid},
12890:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
12891: 
12892:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
12893:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, AltServer1, AltServer2, Client, Tester]).
12894: 
12895: 
12896: 
12897: 
12898: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12899: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12900: %%                                                                     %%
12901: %%                           API OPTIONS                               %%
12902: %%                                                                     %%
12903: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12904: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12905: 
12906: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12907: 
12908: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt with the level = otp options
12909: api_opt_simple_otp_options(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
12910:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
12911:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_options,
12912:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_options() end).
12913: 
12914: api_opt_simple_otp_options() ->
12915:     Get = fun(S, Key) ->
12916:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, Key)
12917:           end,
12918:     Set = fun(S, Key, Val) ->
12919:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, Key, Val)
12920:           end,
12921: 
12922:     Seq = 
12923:         [
12924:          %% *** Init part ***
12925:          #{desc => "create socket",
12926:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
12927:                          type     := Type,
12928:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
12929:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
12930:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
12931:                    end},
12932:          #{desc => "create dummy process",
12933:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
12934:                            Pid =  spawn_link(fun() -> 
12935:                                                      put(sname, "dummy"),
12936:                                                      receive
12937:                                                          die -> 
12938:                                                              exit(normal) 
12939:                                                      end 
12940:                                              end),
12941:                            {ok, State#{dummy => Pid}}
12942:                    end},
12943: 
12944:          %% *** Check iow part ***
12945:          #{desc => "get iow",
12946:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
12947:                            case Get(Sock, iow) of
12948:                                {ok, IOW} when is_boolean(IOW) ->
12949:                                    {ok, State#{iow => IOW}};
12950:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12951:                                    {error, OK};
12952:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12953:                                    ERROR
12954:                            end
12955:                    end},
12956: 
12957:          %% #{desc => "enable debug",
12958:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
12959:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true)
12960:          %%           end},
12961: 
12962:          #{desc => "set (new) iow",
12963:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, iow := OldIOW} = State) ->
12964:                            NewIOW = not OldIOW,
12965:                            case Set(Sock, iow, NewIOW) of
12966:                                ok ->
12967:                                    {ok, State#{iow => NewIOW}};
12968:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12969:                                    ERROR
12970:                            end
12971:                    end},
12972:          #{desc => "get (new) iow",
12973:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, iow := IOW}) ->
12974:                            case Get(Sock, iow) of
12975:                                {ok, IOW} ->
12976:                                    ok;
12977:                                {ok, _} = OK->
12978:                                    {error, OK};
12979:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12980:                                    ERROR
12981:                            end
12982:                    end},
12983: 
12984:          %% *** Check rcvbuf part ***
12985:          #{desc => "get rcvbuf",
12986:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
12987:                            case Get(Sock, rcvbuf) of
12988:                                {ok, RcvBuf} when is_integer(RcvBuf) ->
12989:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => RcvBuf}};
12990:                                {ok, {N, RcvBuf} = V} when is_integer(N) andalso 
12991:                                                           is_integer(RcvBuf) ->
12992:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => V}};
12993:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
12994:                                    {error, OK};
12995:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
12996:                                    ERROR
12997:                            end
12998:                    end},
12999:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvbuf",
13000:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := {OldN, OldRcvBuf}} = State) ->
13001:                            NewRcvBuf = {OldN+2, OldRcvBuf + 1024},
13002:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
13003:                                ok ->
13004:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13005:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13006:                                    ERROR
13007:                            end;
13008:                       (#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := OldRcvBuf} = State) when is_integer(OldRcvBuf) ->
13009:                            NewRcvBuf = 2 * OldRcvBuf,
13010:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
13011:                                ok ->
13012:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13013:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13014:                                    ERROR
13015:                            end;
13016:                       (#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := OldRcvBuf,
13017:                          type := stream,
13018:                          protocol := tcp} = State) when is_integer(OldRcvBuf) ->
13019:                            NewRcvBuf = {2, OldRcvBuf},
13020:                            case Set(Sock, rcvbuf, NewRcvBuf) of
13021:                                ok ->
13022:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13023:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13024:                                    ERROR
13025:                            end
13026:                    end},
13027:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvbuf",
13028:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := RcvBuf}) ->
13029:                            case Get(Sock, rcvbuf) of
13030:                                {ok, RcvBuf} ->
13031:                                    ok;
13032:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13033:                                    {error, OK};
13034:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13035:                                    ERROR
13036:                            end
13037:                    end},
13038: 
13039:          %% *** Check rcvctrlbuf part ***
13040:          #{desc => "get rcvctrlbuf",
13041:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13042:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
13043:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} when is_integer(RcvCtrlBuf) ->
13044:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => RcvCtrlBuf}};
13045:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13046:                                    {error, OK};
13047:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13048:                                    ERROR
13049:                            end
13050:                    end},
13051:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvctrlbuf",
13052:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := OldRcvCtrlBuf} = State) ->
13053:                            NewRcvCtrlBuf = 2 * OldRcvCtrlBuf,
13054:                            case Set(Sock, rcvctrlbuf, NewRcvCtrlBuf) of
13055:                                ok ->
13056:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => NewRcvCtrlBuf}};
13057:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13058:                                    ERROR
13059:                            end
13060:                    end},
13061:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvctrlbuf",
13062:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := RcvCtrlBuf}) ->
13063:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
13064:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} ->
13065:                                    ok;
13066:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13067:                                    {error, OK};
13068:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13069:                                    ERROR
13070:                            end
13071:                    end},
13072:          %% *** Check rcvctrlbuf part ***
13073:          #{desc => "get rcvctrlbuf",
13074:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13075:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
13076:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} when is_integer(RcvCtrlBuf) ->
13077:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => RcvCtrlBuf}};
13078:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13079:                                    {error, OK};
13080:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13081:                                    ERROR
13082:                            end
13083:                    end},
13084:          #{desc => "set (new) rcvctrlbuf",
13085:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := OldRcvCtrlBuf} = State) ->
13086:                            NewRcvCtrlBuf = 2 * OldRcvCtrlBuf,
13087:                            case Set(Sock, rcvctrlbuf, NewRcvCtrlBuf) of
13088:                                ok ->
13089:                                    {ok, State#{rcvctrlbuf => NewRcvCtrlBuf}};
13090:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13091:                                    ERROR
13092:                            end
13093:                    end},
13094:          #{desc => "get (new) rcvctrlbuf",
13095:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvctrlbuf := RcvCtrlBuf}) ->
13096:                            case Get(Sock, rcvctrlbuf) of
13097:                                {ok, RcvCtrlBuf} ->
13098:                                    ok;
13099:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13100:                                    {error, OK};
13101:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13102:                                    ERROR
13103:                            end
13104:                    end},
13105: 
13106: 
13107:          %% *** Check sndctrlbuf part ***
13108:          #{desc => "get sndctrlbuf",
13109:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13110:                            case Get(Sock, sndctrlbuf) of
13111:                                {ok, SndCtrlBuf} when is_integer(SndCtrlBuf) ->
13112:                                    {ok, State#{sndctrlbuf => SndCtrlBuf}};
13113:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13114:                                    {error, OK};
13115:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13116:                                    ERROR
13117:                            end
13118:                    end},
13119:          #{desc => "set (new) sndctrlbuf",
13120:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, sndctrlbuf := OldSndCtrlBuf} = State) ->
13121:                            NewSndCtrlBuf = 2 * OldSndCtrlBuf,
