13122:                            case Set(Sock, sndctrlbuf, NewSndCtrlBuf) of
13123:                                ok ->
13124:                                    {ok, State#{sndctrlbuf => NewSndCtrlBuf}};
13125:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13126:                                    ERROR
13127:                            end
13128:                    end},
13129:          #{desc => "get (new) sndctrlbuf",
13130:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, sndctrlbuf := SndCtrlBuf}) ->
13131:                            case Get(Sock, sndctrlbuf) of
13132:                                {ok, SndCtrlBuf} ->
13133:                                    ok;
13134:                                {ok, _} = OK->
13135:                                    {error, OK};
13136:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13137:                                    ERROR
13138:                            end
13139:                    end},
13140: 
13141:          %% *** Check controlling-process part ***
13142:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
13143:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
13144:                            Self = self(),
13145:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
13146:                                {ok, Self} ->
13147:                                    ok;
13148:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13149:                                    {error, OK};
13150:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13151:                                    ERROR
13152:                            end
13153:                    end},
13154:          #{desc => "set dummy as controlling-process",
13155:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dummy := Dummy}) ->
13156:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Dummy)
13157:                    end},
13158:          #{desc => "verify dummy as controlling-process",
13159:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dummy := Dummy}) ->
13160:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
13161:                                {ok, Dummy} ->
13162:                                    ok;
13163:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
13164:                                    {error, OK};
13165:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13166:                                    ERROR
13167:                            end
13168:                    end},
13169: 
13170:          %% *** We are done ***
13171:          #{desc => "finish",
13172:            cmd  => fun(#{ dummy := Dummy }) ->
13173:                            Dummy ! die,
13174:                            {ok, normal}
13175:                    end}
13176:         ],
13177: 
13178:     i("start tcp (stream) evaluator"),
13179:     InitState1 = #{domain => inet, type => stream, protocol => tcp},
13180:     Tester1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-tester", Seq, InitState1),
13181:     i("await tcp evaluator"),
13182:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester1]),
13183: 
13184:     i("start udp (dgram) socket"),
13185:     InitState2 = #{domain => inet, type => dgram, protocol => udp},
13186:     Tester2 = ?SEV_START("udp-tester", Seq, InitState2),
13187:     i("await udp evaluator"),
13188:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester2]).
13189: 
13190: 
13191: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13192: 
13193: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt otp meta option
13194: api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13195:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
13196:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option,
13197:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option() end).
13198: 
13199: api_opt_simple_otp_meta_option() ->
13200:     Get = fun(S) ->
13201:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, meta)
13202:           end,
13203:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
13204:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, meta, Val)
13205:           end,
13206: 
13207:     MainSeq =
13208:         [
13209:          #{desc => "monitor helper",
13210:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid}) ->
13211:                           _ = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
13212:                           ok
13213:                   end},
13214: 
13215:          #{desc => "create socket",
13216:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
13217:                          type     := Type,
13218:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
13219:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
13220:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
13221:                    end},
13222: 
13223:          #{desc => "get default",
13224:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
13225:                           case Get(Sock) of
13226:                               {ok, undefined} ->
13227:                                   ok;
13228:                               {ok, _} = OK ->
13229:                                   {error, OK};
13230:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13231:                                   ERROR
13232:                           end
13233:                   end},
13234: 
13235:          #{desc => "set value",
13236:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13237:                           Value = make_ref(),
13238:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
13239:                               ok ->
13240:                                   {ok, State#{value => Value}};
13241:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13242:                                   ERROR
13243:                           end
13244:                   end},
13245: 
13246:          #{desc => "get value",
13247:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
13248:                           case Get(Sock) of
13249:                               {ok, Value} ->
13250:                                   ok;
13251:                               {ok, _} = OK ->
13252:                                   {error, OK};
13253:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13254:                                   ERROR
13255:                           end
13256:                   end},
13257: 
13258:          #{desc => "set complex value",
13259:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
13260:                           Value =
13261:                               #{a => 1,
13262:                                 b => {2, 3},
13263:                                 c => make_ref(),
13264:                                 d => self(),
13265:                                 e => State},
13266:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
13267:                               ok ->
13268:                                   {ok, State#{value := Value}};
13269:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13270:                                   ERROR
13271:                           end
13272:                   end},
13273: 
13274:          #{desc => "get complex value",
13275:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
13276:                           case Get(Sock) of
13277:                               {ok, Value} ->
13278:                                   ok;
13279:                               {ok, _} = OK->
13280:                                   {error, OK};
13281:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13282:                                   ERROR
13283:                           end
13284:                   end},
13285: 
13286:          #{desc => "start helper",
13287:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid,  sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
13288:                           ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, {Sock, Value}),
13289:                           ok
13290:                   end},
13291: 
13292:          #{desc => "wait for helper ready",
13293:            cmd => fun(#{helper := Pid}) ->
13294:                           ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, helper, test)
13295:                   end},
13296: 
13297:          #{desc => "socket close",
13298:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
13299:                           socket:close(Sock)
13300:                   end},
13301: 
13302:         ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL],
13303: 
13304:     HelperSeq =
13305:         [#{desc => "await start",
13306:            cmd => fun (State) ->
13307:                           {Main, {Sock, Value}} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
13308:                           {ok, State#{main => Main,
13309:                                       sock => Sock,
13310:                                       value => Value}}
13311:                   end},
13312:          #{desc => "monitor main",
13313:            cmd => fun(#{main := Main}) ->
13314:                           _ = erlang:monitor(process, Main),
13315:                           ok
13316:                   end},
13317: 
13318:          #{desc => "get value",
13319:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock, value := Value}) ->
13320:                           case Get(Sock) of
13321:                               {ok, Value} ->
13322:                                   ok;
13323:                               {ok, _} = OK->
13324:                                   {error, OK};
13325:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13326:                                   ERROR
13327:                           end
13328:                   end},
13329: 
13330:          #{desc => "set and fail",
13331:            cmd => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
13332:                           Value = self(),
13333:                           case Set(Sock, Value) of
13334:                               ok ->
13335:                                   {error, only_owner_may_set};
13336:                               {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
13337:                                   ok;
13338:                               {error, _} = ERROR ->
13339:                                   ERROR
13340:                           end
13341:                   end},
13342: 
13343:          #{desc => "announce ready (test)",
13344:            cmd  => fun(#{main := Main}) ->
13345:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Main, test),
13346:                            ok
13347:                    end},
13348: 
13349:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL],
13350: 
13351: 
13352:     i("start tcp helper evaluator"),
13353:     Helper = ?SEV_START("tcp-helper", HelperSeq, #{}),
13354: 
13355:     i("start tcp main evaluator"),
13356:     MainState = #{domain => inet, type => stream, protocol => tcp,
13357:                   helper => Helper#ev.pid},
13358:     Main = ?SEV_START("tcp-main", MainSeq, MainState),
13359: 
13360:     i("await tcp evaluators"),
13361:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Helper, Main]).
13362: 
13363: 
13364: 
13365: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
13366: 
13367: %% Perform some simple operations with the rcvbuf otp option
13368: %% The operations we test here are only for type = stream and
13369: %% protocol = tcp.
13370: api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
13371:     ?TT(?SECS(15)),
13372:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
13373:            fun() ->
13374:                    api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option()
13375:            end).
13376: 
13377: api_opt_simple_otp_rcvbuf_option() ->
13378:     Get = fun(S) ->
13379:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, rcvbuf)
13380:           end,
13381:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
13382:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, rcvbuf, Val)
13383:           end,
13384: 
13385:     ServerSeq = 
13386:         [
13387:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
13388:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
13389:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
13390:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
13391:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
13392:                    end},
13393:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
13394:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13395:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
13396:                            ok
13397:                    end},
13398: 
13399:          %% *** Init part ***
13400:          #{desc => "which local address",
13401:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13402:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
13403:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
13404:                    end},
13405:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
13406:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13407:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
13408:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13409:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
13410:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13411:                                    ERROR
13412:                            end
13413:                    end},
13414:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
13415:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
13416:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
13417:                                ok ->
13418:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
13419:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
13420:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13421:                                    ERROR
13422:                            end
13423:                    end},
13424:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
13425:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
13426:                            socket:listen(LSock)
13427:                    end},
13428:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
13429:            cmd  => fun(#{tester   := Tester,
13430:                          local_sa := LocalSA,
13431:                          lport    := Port}) ->
13432:                            ServerSA = LocalSA#{port => Port},
13433:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
13434:                            ok
13435:                    end},
13436: 
13437: 
13438:          %% *** The actual test part ***
13439:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
13440:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13441:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
13442:                    end},
13443:          #{desc => "attempt to accept",
13444:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
13445:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
13446:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13447:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
13448:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13449:                                    ERROR
13450:                            end
13451:                    end},
13452:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
13453:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13454:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
13455:                            ok
13456:                    end},
13457: 
13458:          %% Recv with default size for (otp) rcvbuf
13459:          #{desc => "await continue (recv initial)",
13460:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13461:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
13462:                                {ok, MsgSz} ->
13463:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("MsgSz: ~p", [MsgSz]),
13464:                                    {ok, State#{msg_sz => MsgSz}};
13465:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13466:                                    ERROR
13467:                            end
13468:                    end},
13469:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
13470:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
13471:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes when rcvbuf is ~s", 
13472:                                        [MsgSz,
13473:                                         case Get(Sock) of
13474:                                             {ok, RcvBuf} -> f("~w", [RcvBuf]);
13475:                                             {error, _}   -> "-"
13476:                                         end]),
13477:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
13478:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
13479:                                    ok;
13480:                                {ok, Data} ->
13481:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
13482:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13483:                                    ERROR
13484:                            end
13485:                    end},
13486:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv initial)",
13487:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13488:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
13489:                            ok
13490:                    end},
13491: 
13492:          %% Recv with new size (1) for (otp) rcvbuf
13493:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 1)",
13494:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13495:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
13496:                                {ok, NewRcvBuf} ->
13497:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p", [NewRcvBuf]),
13498:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13499:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13500:                                    ERROR
13501:                            end
13502:                    end},
13503:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
13504:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
13505:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
13506:                                ok ->
13507:                                    ok;
13508:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13509:                                    ERROR
13510:                            end
13511:                    end},
13512:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
13513:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
13514:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes when rcvbuf is ~s", 
13515:                                        [MsgSz,
13516:                                         case Get(Sock) of
13517:                                             {ok, RcvBuf} -> f("~w", [RcvBuf]);
13518:                                             {error, _}   -> "-"
13519:                                         end]),
13520:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
13521:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
13522:                                    ok;
13523:                                {ok, Data} ->
13524:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
13525:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13526:                                    ERROR
13527:                            end
13528:                    end},
13529:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv 1)",
13530:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13531:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
13532:                            ok
13533:                    end},
13534: 
13535:          %% Recv with new size (2) for (otp) rcvbuf
13536:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 2)",
13537:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13538:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
13539:                                {ok, NewRcvBuf} ->
13540:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p", [NewRcvBuf]),
13541:                                    {ok, State#{rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13542:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13543:                                    ERROR
13544:                            end
13545:                    end},
13546:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
13547:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
13548:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
13549:                                ok ->
13550:                                    ok;
13551:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13552:                                    ERROR
13553:                            end
13554:                    end},
13555:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
13556:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
13557:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
13558:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
13559:                                    ok;
13560:                                {ok, Data} ->
13561:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
13562:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13563:                                    ERROR
13564:                            end
13565:                    end},
13566:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv 2)",
13567:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13568:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
13569:                            ok
13570:                    end},
13571: 
13572:          %% Recv with new size (3) for (otp) rcvbuf
13573:          #{desc => "await continue (recv 3, truncated)",
13574:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13575:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv) of
13576:                                {ok, {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf}} ->
13577:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf:"
13578:                                                "~n   New RcvBuf:  ~p"
13579:                                                "~n   Expect Size: ~p",
13580:                                                [ExpSz, NewRcvBuf]),
13581:                                    {ok, State#{msg_sz => ExpSz,
13582:                                                rcvbuf => NewRcvBuf}};
13583:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13584:                                    ERROR
13585:                            end
13586:                    end},
13587:          #{desc => "attempt to setopt rcvbuf",
13588:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, rcvbuf := NewRcvBuf} = _State) ->
13589:                            case Set(Sock, NewRcvBuf) of
13590:                                ok ->
13591:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("set new rcvbuf: ~p",
13592:                                                [NewRcvBuf]),
13593:                                    ok;
13594:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13595:                                    ERROR
13596:                            end
13597:                    end},
13598:          #{desc => "attempt to recv",
13599:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, msg_sz := MsgSz} = _State) ->
13600:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try recv ~w bytes of data", [MsgSz]),
13601:                            case socket:recv(Sock) of
13602:                                {ok, Data} when (size(Data) =:= MsgSz) ->
13603:                                    ok;
13604:                                {ok, Data} ->
13605:                                    {error, {invalid_msg_sz, MsgSz, size(Data)}};
13606:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13607:                                    ERROR
13608:                            end
13609:                    end},
13610:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
13611:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13612:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
13613:                            ok
13614:                    end},
13615: 
13616: 
13617:          %% Termination
13618:          #{desc => "await terminate",
13619:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13620:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
13621:                                ok ->
13622:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
13623:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13624:                                    ERROR
13625:                            end
13626:                    end},
13627:          #{desc => "close socket(s)",
13628:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock, sock := Sock} = State) ->
13629:                            sock_close(Sock),
13630:                            sock_close(LSock),
13631:                            State1 = maps:remove(sock,  State),
13632:                            State2 = maps:remove(lport, State1),
13633:                            State3 = maps:remove(lsock, State2),
13634:                            {ok, State3}
13635:                    end},
13636: 
13637:          %% *** We are done ***
13638:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13639:         ],
13640: 
13641:     ClientSeq =
13642:         [
13643:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
13644:          #{desc => "await start",
13645:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
13646:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
13647:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
13648:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
13649:                    end},
13650:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
13651:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13652:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
13653:                            ok
13654:                    end},
13655: 
13656:          %% *** Init part ***
13657:          #{desc => "which local address",
13658:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13659:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
13660:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
13661:                    end},
13662:          #{desc => "create socket",
13663:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
13664:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
13665:                                {ok, Sock} ->
13666:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
13667:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13668:                                    ERROR
13669:                            end
13670:                    end},
13671:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
13672:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
13673:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
13674:                                ok ->
13675:                                    ok;
13676:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13677:                                    ERROR
13678:                            end
13679:                    end},
13680:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
13681:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13682:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
13683:                            ok
13684:                    end},
13685: 
13686:          %% The actual test
13687:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
13688:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13689:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
13690:                    end},
13691:          #{desc => "connect to server",
13692:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
13693:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
13694:                    end},
13695:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
13696:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13697:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
13698:                            ok
13699:                    end},
13700: 
13701:          #{desc => "await continue (send initial)",
13702:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13703:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send) of
13704:                                {ok, Data} ->
13705:                                    {ok, State#{data => Data}};
13706:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13707:                                    ERROR
13708:                            end
13709:                    end},
13710:          #{desc => "send (initial) data to server",
13711:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data} = _State) ->
13712:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
13713:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
13714:                    end},
13715:          #{desc => "announce ready (send initial)",
13716:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13717:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
13718:                            ok
13719:                    end},
13720: 
13721:          #{desc => "await continue (send 1)",
13722:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13723:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
13724:                    end},
13725:          #{desc => "send (1) data to server",
13726:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
13727:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
13728:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
13729:                    end},
13730:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 1)",
13731:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13732:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
13733:                            ok
13734:                    end},
13735: 
13736:          #{desc => "await continue (send 2)",
13737:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13738:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
13739:                    end},
13740:          #{desc => "send (2) data to server",
13741:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
13742:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
13743:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
13744:                    end},
13745:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 2)",
13746:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13747:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
13748:                            ok
13749:                    end},
13750: 
13751:          #{desc => "await continue (send 3)",
13752:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
13753:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
13754:                    end},
13755:          #{desc => "send (3) data to server",
13756:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, data := Data}) ->
13757:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send ~w bytes", [size(Data)]),
13758:                            socket:send(Sock, Data)
13759:                    end},
13760:          #{desc => "announce ready (send 3)",
13761:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
13762:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
13763:                            ok
13764:                    end},
13765: 
13766: 
13767:          %% Termination
13768:          #{desc => "await terminate",
13769:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
13770:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
13771:                                ok ->
13772:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
13773:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13774:                                    ERROR
13775:                            end
13776:                    end},
13777:          #{desc => "close socket",
13778:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
13779:                            socket:close(Sock)
13780:                    end},
13781: 
13782:          %% *** We are done ***
13783:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
13784:         ],
13785: 
13786:     TesterSeq =
13787:         [
13788:          %% *** Init part ***
13789:          #{desc => "monitor server",
13790:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
13791:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
13792:                            ok
13793:                    end},
13794:          #{desc => "monitor client",
13795:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13796:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
13797:                            ok
13798:                    end},
13799:          #{desc => "order server start",
13800:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server}) ->
13801:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server)
13802:                    end},
13803:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
13804:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
13805:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
13806:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
13807:                    end},
13808:          #{desc => "order client start",
13809:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Client,
13810:                          server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
13811:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
13812:                            ok
13813:                    end},
13814:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
13815:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13816:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init)
13817:                    end},
13818: 
13819: 
13820:          %% The actual test (connecting)
13821:          #{desc => "order server accept (accept)",
13822:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
13823:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
13824:                            ok
13825:                    end},
13826:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13827:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
13828:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13829:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
13830:                            ok
13831:                    end},
13832:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
13833:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13834:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
13835:                    end},
13836:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
13837:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
13838:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
13839:                    end},
13840: 
13841:          %% The actual test (initial part)
13842:          #{desc => "order client continue (send initial)",
13843:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, data := Data} = _State) ->
13844:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send, Data),
13845:                            ok
13846:                    end},
13847:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13848:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv initial)",
13849:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
13850:                            ExpMsgSz = size(Data),
13851:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, ExpMsgSz),
13852:                            ok
13853:                    end},
13854:          #{desc => "await client ready (send initial)",
13855:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13856:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13857:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
13858:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
13859:                                ok ->
13860:                                    ok;
13861:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13862:                                    ERROR
13863:                            end
13864:                    end},
13865:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv initial)",
13866:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13867:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13868:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
13869:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
13870:                                ok ->
13871:                                    ok;
13872:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13873:                                    ERROR
13874:                            end
13875:                    end},
13876: 
13877:          %% The actual test (part 1)
13878:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 1)",
13879:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13880:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
13881:                            ok
13882:                    end},
13883:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13884:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 1)",
13885:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
13886:                            MsgSz     = size(Data),
13887:                            NewRcvBuf =
13888:                                case os:type() of
13889:                                    {win32, nt} ->
13890:                                        (((2 * MsgSz) div 1024) + 1) * 1024;
13891:                                    _ ->
13892:                                        {2 + (MsgSz div 1024), 1024}
13893:                                end,
13894:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, NewRcvBuf),
13895:                            ok
13896:                    end},
13897:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 1)",
13898:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13899:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13900:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
13901:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
13902:                                ok ->
13903:                                    ok;
13904:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13905:                                    ERROR
13906:                            end
13907:                    end},
13908:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 1)",
13909:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13910:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13911:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
13912:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
13913:                                ok ->
13914:                                    ok;
13915:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13916:                                    ERROR
13917:                            end
13918:                    end},
13919: 
13920:          %% The actual test (part 2)
13921:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 2)",
13922:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13923:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
13924:                            ok
13925:                    end},
13926:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13927:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 2)",
13928:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
13929:                            MsgSz     = size(Data),
13930:                            NewRcvBuf = 
13931:                                case os:type() of
13932:                                    {win32, nt} ->
13933:                                        (((3 * MsgSz) div 1024) + 1) * 1024;
13934:                                    _ ->
13935:                                        {2 + (MsgSz div 2048), 2048}
13936:                                end,
13937:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv, NewRcvBuf),
13938:                            ok
13939:                    end},
13940:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 2)",
13941:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13942:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13943:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
13944:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
13945:                                ok ->
13946:                                    ok;
13947:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13948:                                    ERROR
13949:                            end
13950:                    end},
13951:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 2)",
13952:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13953:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13954:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
13955:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
13956:                                ok ->
13957:                                    ok;
13958:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13959:                                    ERROR
13960:                            end
13961:                    end},
13962: 
13963: 
13964:          %% The actual test (part 3)
13965:          #{desc => "order client continue (send 3)",
13966:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
13967:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
13968:                            ok
13969:                    end},
13970:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
13971:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv 3)",
13972:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, data := Data} = _State) ->
13973:                            MsgSz = size(Data),
13974:                            BufSz = 2048,
13975:                            N     = MsgSz div BufSz - 1,
13976:                            {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf} =
13977:                                case os:type() of
13978:                                    {win32, nt} ->
13979:                                        {N*BufSz, N*BufSz};
13980:                                    _ ->
13981:                                        {N*BufSz, {N, BufSz}}
13982:                                end,
13983:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv,
13984:                                                   {ExpSz, NewRcvBuf})
13985:                    end},
13986:          #{desc => "await client ready (send 3)",
13987:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13988:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
13989:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send,
13990:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
13991:                                ok ->
13992:                                    ok;
13993:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
13994:                                    ERROR
13995:                            end
13996:                    end},
13997:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv 3)",
13998:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
13999:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
14000:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, client, recv,
14001:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
14002:                                ok ->
14003:                                    ok;
14004:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14005:                                    ERROR
14006:                            end
14007:                    end},
14008: 
14009: 
14010:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14011: 
14012:          %% *** Terminate server ***
14013:          #{desc => "order client terminate",
14014:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14015:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
14016:                            ok
14017:                    end},
14018:          #{desc => "await client down",
14019:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
14020:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
14021:                            State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
14022:                            {ok, State1}
14023:                    end},
14024:          #{desc => "order server terminate",
14025:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
14026:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
14027:                            ok
14028:                    end},
14029:          #{desc => "await server down",
14030:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
14031:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
14032:                            State1 = maps:remove(server,    State),
14033:                            State2 = maps:remove(server_sa, State1),
14034:                            {ok, State2}
14035:                    end},
14036: 
14037:          %% *** We are done ***
14038:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14039:         ],
14040: 
14041:     %% Create a data binary of 6*1024 bytes
14042:     Data      = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(6*4, lists:seq(0, 255))),
14043:     InitState = #{domain => inet_or_inet6(),
14044:                   data   => Data},
14045: 
14046:     i("create server evaluator"),
14047:     ServerInitState = #{domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
14048:     Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
14049: 
14050:     i("create client evaluator"),
14051:     ClientInitState = #{host   => local_host(),
14052:                         domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
14053:     Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
14054: 
14055:     i("create tester evaluator"),
14056:     TesterInitState = InitState#{server => Server#ev.pid,
14057:                                  client => Client#ev.pid},
14058:     Tester          = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
14059: 
14060:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14061:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
14062: 
14063: 
14064: 
14065: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14066: 
14067: %% Perform some simple getopt and setopt with the level = otp options
14068: api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14069:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
14070:     tc_try(api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process,
14071:            fun() -> api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process() end).
14072: 
14073: api_opt_simple_otp_controlling_process() ->
14074:     Get = fun(S, Key) ->
14075:                   socket:getopt(S, otp, Key)
14076:           end,
14077:     Set = fun(S, Key, Val) ->
14078:                   socket:setopt(S, otp, Key, Val)
14079:           end,
14080: 
14081:     ClientSeq =
14082:         [
14083:          %% *** Init part ***
14084:          #{desc => "await start",
14085:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
14086:                            {Tester, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
14087:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester,
14088:                                        sock   => Sock}}
14089:                    end},
14090:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
14091:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
14092:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
14093:                            ok
14094:                    end},
14095: 
14096:          %% *** The actual test ***
14097:          #{desc => "verify tester as controlling-process",
14098:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14099:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
14100:                                {ok, Tester} ->
14101:                                    ok;
14102:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
14103:                                    {error, OK};
14104:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14105:                                    ERROR
14106:                            end
14107:                    end},
14108:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
14109:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14110:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
14111:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
14112:                                    ok;
14113:                                ok ->
14114:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
14115:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14116:                                    ERROR
14117:                            end
14118:                    end},
14119:          #{desc => "announce ready (not owner)",
14120:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14121:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, not_owner),
14122:                            ok
14123:                    end},
14124:          #{desc => "await continue (owner)",
14125:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14126:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, owner)
14127:                    end},
14128:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
14129:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14130:                            Self = self(),
14131:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
14132:                                {ok, Self} ->
14133:                                    ok;
14134:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
14135:                                    {error, OK};
14136:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14137:                                    ERROR
14138:                            end
14139:                    end},
14140:          #{desc => "attempt controlling-process transfer to tester",
14141:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14142:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Tester)
14143:                    end},
14144:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
14145:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14146:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
14147:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
14148:                                    ok;
14149:                                ok ->
14150:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
14151:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14152:                                    ERROR
14153:                            end
14154:                    end},
14155:          #{desc => "announce ready (owner)",
14156:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
14157:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, owner),
14158:                            ok
14159: 
14160:                    end},
14161:          
14162:          %% *** Termination ***
14163:          #{desc => "await termination",
14164:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
14165:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester),
14166:                            State1 = maps:remove(tester, State),
14167:                            State2 = maps:remove(sock, State1),
14168:                            {ok, State2}
14169:                    end},
14170: 
14171:          %% *** We are done ***
14172:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14173:         ],
14174: 
14175:     TesterSeq =
14176:         [
14177:          %% *** Init part ***
14178:          #{desc => "create socket",
14179:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
14180:                          type     := Type,
14181:                          protocol := Protocol} = State) ->
14182:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Protocol),
14183:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
14184:                    end},
14185:          #{desc => "monitor client",
14186:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14187:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
14188:                            ok
14189:                    end},
14190: 
14191:          %% *** The actual test ***
14192:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
14193:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14194:                            Self = self(),
14195:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
14196:                                {ok, Self} ->
14197:                                    ok;
14198:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
14199:                                    {error, OK};
14200:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14201:                                    ERROR
14202:                            end
14203:                    end},
14204:          #{desc => "order (client) start",
14205:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14206:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, Sock),
14207:                            ok
14208:                    end},
14209:          #{desc => "await (client) ready (not owner)",
14210:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14211:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, not_owner)
14212:                    end},
14213:          #{desc => "attempt controlling-process transfer to client",
14214:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14215:                            Set(Sock, controlling_process, Client)
14216:                    end},
14217:          #{desc => "verify client as controlling-process",
14218:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14219:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
14220:                                {ok, Client} ->
14221:                                    ok;
14222:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
14223:                                    {error, OK};
14224:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14225:                                    ERROR
14226:                            end
14227:                    end},
14228:          #{desc => "attempt invalid controlling-process transfer (to self)",
14229:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14230:                            case Set(Sock, controlling_process, self()) of
14231:                                {error, {invalid, not_owner}} ->
14232:                                    ok;
14233:                                ok ->
14234:                                    {error, unexpected_success};
14235:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14236:                                    ERROR
14237:                            end
14238:                    end},
14239:          #{desc => "order (client) continue (owner)",
14240:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14241:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, owner),
14242:                            ok
14243:                    end},
14244:          #{desc => "await (client) ready (2)",
14245:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14246:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, owner),
14247:                            ok
14248:                    end},
14249:          #{desc => "verify self as controlling-process",
14250:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14251:                            Self = self(),
14252:                            case Get(Sock, controlling_process) of
14253:                                {ok, Self} ->
14254:                                    ok;
14255:                                {ok, _} = OK ->
14256:                                    {error, OK};
14257:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14258:                                    ERROR
14259:                            end
14260:                    end},
14261: 
14262:          %% *** Termination ***
14263:          #{desc => "order (client) terminate",
14264:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
14265:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
14266:                            ok
14267:                    end},
14268:          #{desc => "await client termination",
14269:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
14270:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
14271:                            {ok, maps:remove(client, State)}
14272:                    end},
14273:          #{desc => "close socket",
14274:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14275:                            sock_close(Sock),
14276:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
14277:                    end},
14278: 
14279:          %% *** We are done ***
14280:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14281:         ],
14282: 
14283:     i("start tcp (stream) client evaluator"),
14284:     ClientInitState1 = #{},
14285:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState1),
14286: 
14287:     i("start tcp (stream) tester evaluator"),
14288:     TesterInitState1 = #{domain   => inet,
14289:                          type     => stream, 
14290:                          protocol => tcp,
14291:                          client   => Client1#ev.pid},
14292:     Tester1 = ?SEV_START("tcp-tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState1),
14293: 
14294:     i("await tcp evaluator(s)"),
14295:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester1, Client1]),
14296: 
14297:     i("start udp (dgram) client evaluator"),
14298:     ClientInitState2 = #{},
14299:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("udp-client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState2),
14300: 
14301:     i("start udp (dgram) tester evaluator"),
14302:     TesterInitState2 = #{domain   => inet,
14303:                          type     => dgram, 
14304:                          protocol => udp,
14305:                          client   => Client2#ev.pid},
14306:     Tester2 = ?SEV_START("udp-tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState2),
14307: 
14308:     i("await udp evaluator(s)"),
14309:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester2, Client2]).
14310: 
14311: 
14312: 
14313: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14314: 
14315: %% Tests the socket option acceptconn for UDP.
14316: %% This should be possible to get but not set.
14317: 
14318: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14319:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
14320:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp,
14321:            fun() ->
14322:                    has_support_sock_acceptconn()
14323:            end,
14324:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp() end).
14325: 
14326: 
14327: 
14328: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_udp() ->
14329:     Opt = acceptconn,
14330:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
14331:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
14332:           end,
14333:     Get = fun(S) ->
14334:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
14335:           end,
14336: 
14337:     TesterSeq =
14338:         [
14339:          #{desc => "which local address",
14340:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14341:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
14342:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
14343:                    end},
14344:          #{desc => "create socket",
14345:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14346:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
14347:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14348:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
14349:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14350:                                    ERROR
14351:                            end
14352:                    end},
14353: 
14354:          #{desc => "[get] verify socket (before bind)",
14355:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14356:                            case Get(Sock) of
14357:                                {ok, false} ->
14358:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14359:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14360:                                    ok;
14361:                                {ok, true} ->
14362:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14363:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14364:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14365:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
14366:                                    %% On some platforms this is not accepted
14367:                                    %% for UDP, so skip this part (UDP).
14368:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: "
14369:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
14370:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
14371:                                    {skip, Reason};
14372:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14373:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14374:                                                [Reason]),
14375:                                    ERROR
14376:                            end
14377:                    end},
14378:          #{desc => "[set] verify socket (before bind)",
14379:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14380:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14381:                                {error, Reason} ->
14382:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
14383:                                                [Reason]),
14384:                                    ok;
14385:                                ok ->
14386:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14387:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14388:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14389:                            end
14390:                    end},
14391: 
14392:          #{desc => "bind socket to local address",
14393:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
14394:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
14395:                                ok ->
14396:                                    ok;
14397:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14398:                                    ERROR
14399:                            end
14400:                    end},
14401: 
14402:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14403: 
14404:          #{desc => "[get] verify socket (after bind)",
14405:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14406:                            case Get(Sock) of
14407:                                {ok, false} ->
14408:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14409:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14410:                                    ok;
14411:                                {ok, true} ->
14412:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14413:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14414:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14415:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14416:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14417:                                                [Reason]),
14418:                                    ERROR
14419:                            end
14420:                    end},
14421:          #{desc => "[set] verify socket (after bind)",
14422:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = _State) ->
14423:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14424:                                {error, Reason} ->
14425:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
14426:                                                [Reason]),
14427:                                    ok;
14428:                                ok ->
14429:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14430:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14431:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14432:                            end
14433:                    end},
14434: 
14435:          %% *** Termination ***
14436:          #{desc => "close socket",
14437:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
14438:                            socket:close(Sock),
14439:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
14440:                    end},
14441: 
14442:          %% *** We are done ***
14443:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14444:         ],
14445: 
14446:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
14447: 
14448:     i("start tester evaluator"),
14449:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
14450:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
14451: 
14452:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14453:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
14454: 
14455: 
14456: 
14457: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14458: 
14459: %% Tests the socket option acceptconn for TCP.
14460: %% This should be possible to get but not set.
14461: 
14462: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14463:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
14464:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp,
14465:            fun() ->
14466:                    has_support_sock_acceptconn()
14467:            end,
14468:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp() end).
14469: 
14470: 
14471: 
14472: api_opt_sock_acceptconn_tcp() ->
14473:     Opt = acceptconn,
14474:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
14475:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
14476:           end,
14477:     Get = fun(S) ->
14478:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
14479:           end,
14480: 
14481:     TesterSeq =
14482:         [
14483:          #{desc => "which local address",
14484:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14485:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
14486:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
14487:                    end},
14488: 
14489:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
14490:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14491:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
14492:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14493:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
14494:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14495:                                    ERROR
14496:                            end
14497:                    end},
14498: 
14499:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (before bind)",
14500:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14501:                            case Get(Sock) of
14502:                                {ok, false} ->
14503:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14504:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14505:                                    ok;
14506:                                {ok, true} ->
14507:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14508:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14509:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14510:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
14511:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: "
14512:                                                "~p => SKIP", [Reason]),
14513:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
14514:                                    {skip, Reason};
14515:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14516:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14517:                                                [Reason]),
14518:                                    ERROR
14519:                            end
14520:                    end},
14521:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (before bind)",
14522:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14523:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14524:                                {error, Reason} ->
14525:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14526:                                    ok;
14527:                                ok ->
14528:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14529:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14530:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14531:                            end
14532:                    end},
14533: 
14534:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14535: 
14536:          #{desc => "bind listen socket to local address",
14537:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
14538:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
14539:                                ok ->
14540:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
14541:                                    {ok, State#{server_sa => LSA#{port => Port}}};
14542:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14543:                                    ERROR
14544:                            end
14545:                    end},
14546: 
14547:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after bind)",
14548:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14549:                            case Get(Sock) of
14550:                                {ok, false} ->
14551:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14552:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14553:                                    ok;
14554:                                {ok, true} ->
14555:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14556:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14557:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14558:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14559:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14560:                                    ERROR
14561:                            end
14562:                    end},
14563:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after bind)",
14564:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14565:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14566:                                {error, Reason} ->
14567:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14568:                                    ok;
14569:                                ok ->
14570:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14571:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14572:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14573:                            end
14574:                    end},
14575: 
14576:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14577: 
14578:          #{desc => "make listen socket accept connections",
14579:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14580:                            case socket:listen(Sock) of
14581:                                ok ->
14582:                                    ok;
14583:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14584:                                    ERROR
14585:                            end
14586:                    end},
14587: 
14588:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after listen)",
14589:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14590:                            case Get(Sock) of
14591:                                {ok, true} ->
14592:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14593:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14594:                                    ok;
14595:                                {ok, false} ->
14596:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14597:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14598:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, false}}};
14599:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14600:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14601:                                    ERROR
14602:                            end
14603:                    end},
14604:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after listen)",
14605:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14606:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
14607:                                {error, Reason} ->
14608:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14609:                                    ok;
14610:                                ok ->
14611:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14612:                                                "Set acceptconn (=false)"),
14613:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14614:                            end
14615:                    end},
14616: 
14617:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14618: 
14619:          #{desc => "create (connecting) socket",
14620:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14621:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
14622:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14623:                                    {ok, State#{csockc => Sock}};
14624:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14625:                                    ERROR
14626:                            end
14627:                    end},
14628: 
14629:          #{desc => "bind connecting socket to local address",
14630:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
14631:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
14632:                                ok ->
14633:                                    ok;
14634:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14635:                                    ERROR
14636:                            end
14637:                    end},
14638: 
14639:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14640: 
14641:          #{desc => "[get] verify connecting socket (before connect)",
14642:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
14643:                            case Get(Sock) of
14644:                                {ok, false} ->
14645:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14646:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14647:                                    ok;
14648:                                {ok, true} ->
14649:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14650:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14651:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14652:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14653:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14654:                                    ERROR
14655:                            end
14656:                    end},
14657:          #{desc => "[set] verify connecting socket (before connect)",
14658:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
14659:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14660:                                {error, Reason} ->
14661:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14662:                                    ok;
14663:                                ok ->
14664:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14665:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14666:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14667:                            end
14668:                    end},
14669: 
14670:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14671: 
14672:          #{desc => "connect to server",
14673:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock, server_sa := SSA} = _State) ->
14674:                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
14675:                                ok ->
14676:                                    ok;
14677:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14678:                                    ERROR
14679:                            end
14680:                    end},
14681: 
14682:          #{desc => "accept connection",
14683:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
14684:                            case socket:accept(Sock) of
14685:                                {ok, CSock} ->
14686:                                    {ok, State#{csocks => CSock}};
14687:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14688:                                    ERROR
14689:                            end
14690:                    end},
14691: 
14692:          #{desc => "[get] verify connecting socket (after connect)",
14693:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
14694:                            case Get(Sock) of
14695:                                {ok, false} ->
14696:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14697:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14698:                                    ok;
14699:                                {ok, true} ->
14700:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14701:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14702:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14703:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14704:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14705:                                    ERROR
14706:                            end
14707:                    end},
14708:          #{desc => "[set] verify connecting socket (after connect)",
14709:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = _State) ->
14710:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14711:                                {error, Reason} ->
14712:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14713:                                    ok;
14714:                                ok ->
14715:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14716:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14717:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14718:                            end
14719:                    end},
14720: 
14721:          #{desc => "[get] verify connected socket",
14722:            cmd  => fun(#{csocks := Sock} = _State) ->
14723:                            case Get(Sock) of
14724:                                {ok, false} ->
14725:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
