14726:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14727:                                    ok;
14728:                                {ok, true} ->
14729:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14730:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14731:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, true}}};
14732:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14733:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14734:                                    ERROR
14735:                            end
14736:                    end},
14737:          #{desc => "[set] verify connected socket",
14738:            cmd  => fun(#{csocks := Sock} = _State) ->
14739:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
14740:                                {error, Reason} ->
14741:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14742:                                    ok;
14743:                                ok ->
14744:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14745:                                                "Set acceptconn (=true)"),
14746:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14747:                            end
14748:                    end},
14749: 
14750:          #{desc => "[get] verify listen socket (after connect)",
14751:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14752:                            case Get(Sock) of
14753:                                {ok, true} ->
14754:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
14755:                                                "Accepting connections"),
14756:                                    ok;
14757:                                {ok, false} ->
14758:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14759:                                                "Not accepting connections"),
14760:                                    {error, {unexpected_success, {Opt, false}}};
14761:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14762:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14763:                                    ERROR
14764:                            end
14765:                    end},
14766:          #{desc => "[set] verify listen socket (after connect)",
14767:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = _State) ->
14768:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
14769:                                {error, Reason} ->
14770:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14771:                                    ok;
14772:                                ok ->
14773:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Success: "
14774:                                                "Set acceptconn (=false)"),
14775:                                    {error, unexpected_success}
14776:                            end
14777:                    end},
14778: 
14779:          %% *** Termination ***
14780:          #{desc => "close connecting socket(s)",
14781:            cmd  => fun(#{csockc := Sock} = State0) ->
14782:                            socket:close(Sock),
14783:                            State1 = maps:remove(csockc, State0),
14784:                            State2 = maps:remove(csocks, State1), %% Auto-close
14785:                            {ok, maps:remove(csockc, State2)}
14786:                    end},
14787:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
14788:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
14789:                            socket:close(Sock),
14790:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
14791:                    end},
14792: 
14793:          %% *** We are done ***
14794:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
14795:         ],
14796: 
14797: 
14798:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
14799: 
14800:     i("start tester evaluator"),
14801:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
14802:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
14803: 
14804:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
14805:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
14806: 
14807: 
14808: 
14809: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14810: 
14811: %% Tests the socket option acceptfilter. PLACEHOLDER!
14812: 
14813: api_opt_sock_acceptfilter(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14814:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
14815:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_acceptfilter,
14816:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
14817:            fun() -> ok end).
14818: 
14819: 
14820: 
14821: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
14822: 
14823: %% Tests the socket option bindtodevice.
14824: %% It has not always been possible to 'get' this option
14825: %% (at least on linux).
14826: 
14827: api_opt_sock_bindtodevice(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
14828:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
14829:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_bindtodevice,
14830:            fun() -> has_support_sock_bindtodevice() end,
14831:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_bindtodevice() end).
14832: 
14833: 
14834: api_opt_sock_bindtodevice() ->
14835:     Opt = bindtodevice,
14836:     Set = fun(S, Val) ->
14837:                   socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
14838:           end,
14839:     Get = fun(S) ->
14840:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
14841:           end,
14842: 
14843:     TesterSeq =
14844:         [
14845:          #{desc => "which local address",
14846:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14847:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
14848:                                {ok, #{name := Name, addr := Addr}} ->
14849:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info (~p): "
14850:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
14851:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
14852:                                                [Domain, Name, Addr]),
14853:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
14854:                                            addr   => Addr},
14855:                                    {ok, State#{dev      => Name,
14856:                                                local_sa => LSA}};
14857:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14858:                                    ERROR
14859:                            end
14860:                    end},
14861:          #{desc => "create UDP socket 1",
14862:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14863:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
14864:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14865:                                    {ok, State#{usock1 => Sock}};
14866:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14867:                                    ERROR
14868:                            end
14869:                    end},
14870:          #{desc => "create UDP socket 2",
14871:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14872:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
14873:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14874:                                    {ok, State#{usock2 => Sock}};
14875:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14876:                                    ERROR
14877:                            end
14878:                    end},
14879:          #{desc => "create TCP socket 1",
14880:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14881:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
14882:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14883:                                    {ok, State#{tsock1 => Sock}};
14884:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14885:                                    ERROR
14886:                            end
14887:                    end},
14888:          #{desc => "create TCP socket 2",
14889:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
14890:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
14891:                                {ok, Sock} ->
14892:                                    {ok, State#{tsock2 => Sock}};
14893:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
14894:                                    ERROR
14895:                            end
14896:                    end},
14897: 
14898:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 1 (before bindtodevice)",
14899:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
14900:                            case Get(Sock) of
14901:                                {ok, Dev} ->
14902:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
14903:                                    ok;
14904:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
14905:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
14906: 					       [Reason]),
14907:                                    {skip, Reason};
14908:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14909:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
14910: 					       [Reason]),
14911:                                    ERROR
14912:                            end
14913:                    end},
14914:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 2 (before bind)",
14915:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
14916:                            case Get(Sock) of
14917:                                {ok, Dev} ->
14918:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
14919:                                    ok;
14920:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14921:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14922:                                    ERROR
14923:                            end
14924:                    end},
14925:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 1 (before bindtodevice)",
14926:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
14927:                            case Get(Sock) of
14928:                                {ok, Dev} ->
14929:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
14930:                                    ok;
14931:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14932:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14933:                                    ERROR
14934:                            end
14935:                    end},
14936:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 2 (before bind)",
14937:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
14938:                            case Get(Sock) of
14939:                                {ok, Dev} ->
14940:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
14941:                                    ok;
14942:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14943:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14944:                                    ERROR
14945:                            end
14946:                    end},
14947: 
14948:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
14949: 
14950:          #{desc => "Bind UDP socket 1 to device",
14951:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := Sock, dev := Dev} = State) ->
14952:                            case Set(Sock, Dev) of
14953:                                ok ->
14954:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14955:                                    ok;
14956:                                {error, eperm = Reason} ->
14957:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14958:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
14959:                                    {ok, State#{usock1 => skip}};
14960:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14961:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14962:                                    ERROR
14963:                            end
14964:                    end},
14965:          #{desc => "Bind UDP socket 2 to local address",
14966:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
14967:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
14968:                                ok ->
14969:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14970:                                    ok;
14971:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14972:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14973:                                    ERROR
14974:                            end
14975:                    end},
14976:          #{desc => "Bind TCP socket 1 to device",
14977:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := USock1,
14978:                          tsock1 := Sock, dev := Dev} = State) ->
14979:                            case Set(Sock, Dev) of
14980:                                ok ->
14981:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
14982:                                    ok;
14983:                                {error, eperm = Reason} when (USock1 =:= skip) ->
14984:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14985:                                    {skip, Reason};
14986:                                {error, eperm = Reason} ->
14987:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14988:                                    (catch socket:close(Sock)),
14989:                                    {ok, State#{tsock1 => skip}};
14990:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
14991:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
14992:                                    ERROR
14993:                            end
14994:                    end},
14995:          #{desc => "Bind TCP socket 2 to local address",
14996:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
14997:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
14998:                                ok ->
14999:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
15000:                                    ok;
15001:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15002:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
15003:                                    ERROR
15004:                            end
15005:                    end},
15006: 
15007:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15008: 
15009:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 1 (after bindtodevice)",
15010:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := skip} = _State) ->
15011:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (previous eperm)"),
15012:                            ok;
15013:                       (#{usock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
15014:                            case Get(Sock) of
15015:                                {ok, Dev} ->
15016:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
15017:                                    ok;
15018:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15019:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
15020:                                    ERROR
15021:                            end
15022:                    end},
15023:          #{desc => "[get] verify UDP socket 2 (after bind)",
15024:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
15025:                            case Get(Sock) of
15026:                                {ok, Dev} ->
15027:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
15028:                                    ok;
15029:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15030:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
15031:                                    ERROR
15032:                            end
15033:                    end},
15034:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 1 (after bindtodevice)",
15035:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := skip} = _State) ->
15036:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (previous eperm)"),
15037:                            ok;
15038:                       (#{tsock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
15039:                            case Get(Sock) of
15040:                                {ok, Dev} ->
15041:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
15042:                                    ok;
15043:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15044:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
15045:                                    ERROR
15046:                            end
15047:                    end},
15048:          #{desc => "[get] verify TCP socket 2 (after bind)",
15049:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
15050:                            case Get(Sock) of
15051:                                {ok, Dev} ->
15052:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: ~p", [Dev]),
15053:                                    ok;
15054:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15055:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p", [Reason]),
15056:                                    ERROR
15057:                            end
15058:                    end},
15059: 
15060:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15061: 
15062:          %% *** Termination ***
15063:          #{desc => "close UDP socket 1",
15064:            cmd  => fun(#{usock1 := skip} = State) ->
15065:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (already closed)"),
15066:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock1, State)};
15067:                       (#{usock1 := Sock} = State) ->
15068:                            socket:close(Sock),
15069:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock1, State)}
15070:                    end},
15071:          #{desc => "close UDP socket 2",
15072:            cmd  => fun(#{usock2 := Sock} = State) ->
15073:                            socket:close(Sock),
15074:                            {ok, maps:remove(usock2, State)}
15075:                    end},
15076:          #{desc => "close TCP socket 1",
15077:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock1 := skip} = State) ->
15078:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP'ed (already closed)"),
15079:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock1, State)};
15080:                       (#{tsock1 := Sock} = State) ->
15081:                            socket:close(Sock),
15082:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock1, State)}
15083:                    end},
15084:          #{desc => "close TCP socket 2",
15085:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock2 := Sock} = State) ->
15086:                            socket:close(Sock),
15087:                            {ok, maps:remove(tsock2, State)}
15088:                    end},
15089: 
15090:          %% *** We are done ***
15091:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15092:         ],
15093: 
15094:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15095: 
15096:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15097:     InitState = #{domain  => Domain},
15098:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15099: 
15100:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15101:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15102: 
15103: 
15104: 
15105: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15106: 
15107: %% Tests the socket option broadcast.
15108: %% Make it possible for datagram sockets to send packets to a broadcast
15109: %% address (IPv4 only).
15110: 
15111: api_opt_sock_broadcast(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15112:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
15113:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_broadcast,
15114:            fun() -> has_support_sock_broadcast() end,
15115:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_broadcast() end).
15116: 
15117: 
15118: api_opt_sock_broadcast() ->
15119:     Opt    = broadcast,
15120:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
15121:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
15122:              end,
15123:     Get    = fun(S) ->
15124:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
15125:              end,
15126: 
15127:     TesterSeq =
15128:         [
15129:          #{desc => "which local address",
15130:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15131:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
15132:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
15133:                                       addr      := Addr,
15134:                                       broadaddr := BAddr}}
15135: 				 when (BAddr =/= undefined) ->
15136:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
15137:                                                "~n   Name:           ~p"
15138:                                                "~n   Addr:           ~p"
15139:                                                "~n   Broadcast Addr: ~p",
15140:                                                [Name, Addr, BAddr]),
15141:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
15142:                                            addr   => Addr},
15143:                                    BSA = #{family => Domain,
15144:                                            addr   => BAddr},
15145:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA,
15146:                                                bsa => BSA}};
15147: 			       {ok, _} ->
15148: 				   {skip, no_broadcast_address};
15149:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15150:                                    ERROR
15151:                            end
15152:                    end},
15153: 
15154:          #{desc => "[socket 1] create UDP socket (listening 1)",
15155:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15156:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15157:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15158:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
15159:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15160:                                    ERROR
15161:                            end
15162:                    end},
15163:          #{desc => "[socket 1] Bind UDP socket (to limited broadcast address)",
15164:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
15165: 			   BSA = #{family => inet,
15166: 				   addr   => broadcast},
15167:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 1) to: "
15168:                                        "~n   ~p", [BSA]),
15169:                            case socket:bind(Sock, BSA) of
15170:                                ok ->
15171:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
15172:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
15173:                                                [Port]),
15174:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => BSA#{port => Port}}};
15175:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
15176:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("~p => "
15177: 					       "SKIP limited broadcast test",
15178: 					       [Reason]),
15179:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => skip}};
15180:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15181:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15182: 					       [Reason]),
15183:                                    ERROR
15184:                            end
15185:                    end},
15186:          #{desc => "[socket 1] UDP socket sockname",
15187:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
15188:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test"),
15189:                            ok;
15190: 		      (#{sock1 := Sock} = _State) ->
15191: 			   case socket:sockname(Sock) of
15192: 			       {ok, SA} ->
15193: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("SA: ~p", [SA]),
15194: 				   ok;
15195: 			       {error, _} = ERROR ->
15196: 				   ERROR
15197: 			   end
15198:                    end},
15199: 
15200:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15201: 
15202:          #{desc => "[socket 2] create UDP socket (listening 2)",
15203:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15204:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15205:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15206:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
15207:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15208:                                    ERROR
15209:                            end
15210:                    end},
15211:          #{desc => "[socket 2] Bind UDP socket (to subnet-directed broadcast address)",
15212:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
15213: 			 bsa   := BSA} = State) ->
15214:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 1) to: "
15215:                                        "~n   ~p", [BSA]),
15216:                            case socket:bind(Sock, BSA) of
15217:                                ok ->
15218:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
15219:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
15220:                                                [Port]),
15221:                                    {ok, State#{sa2 => BSA#{port => Port}}};
15222:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
15223:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("~p => "
15224: 					       "SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test",
15225: 					       [Reason]),
15226:                                    {ok, State#{sa2 => skip}};
15227:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15228:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15229: 					       [Reason]),
15230:                                    ERROR
15231:                            end
15232:                    end},
15233:          #{desc => "[socket 2] UDP socket sockname",
15234:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
15235:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test"),
15236:                            ok;
15237: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock} = _State) ->
15238:                            case socket:sockname(Sock) of
15239:                                {ok, SA} ->
15240: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("SA: ~p", [SA]),
15241:                                    ok;
15242:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15243:                                    ERROR
15244:                            end
15245:                    end},
15246: 
15247:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15248: 
15249:          #{desc => "[socket 3] create UDP socket (sender)",
15250:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15251:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15252:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15253:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
15254:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15255:                                    ERROR
15256:                            end
15257:                    end},
15258:          #{desc => "[socket 3][get] verify UDP socket (before bind and set)",
15259:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
15260:                            case Get(Sock) of
15261:                                {ok, false} ->
15262:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15263:                                                "broadcast not allowed"),
15264:                                    ok;
15265:                                {ok, true} ->
15266:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
15267:                                                "broadcast already allowed"),
15268:                                    ok;
15269:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15270:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15271: 					       [Reason]),
15272:                                    ERROR
15273:                            end
15274:                    end},
15275:          #{desc => "[socket 3] Try make broadcast allowed",
15276:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
15277:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
15278:                                ok ->
15279:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15280:                                                "broadcast now allowed"),
15281:                                    ok;
15282:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15283:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15284: 					       [Reason]),
15285:                                    ERROR
15286:                            end
15287:                    end},
15288:          #{desc => "[socket 3] verify UDP socket broadcast allowed",
15289:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
15290:                            case Get(Sock) of
15291:                                {ok, true} ->
15292:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15293:                                                "broadcast allowed"),
15294:                                    ok;
15295:                                {ok, false} ->
15296:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
15297:                                                "broadcast *not* allowed"),
15298:                                    ok;
15299:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15300:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15301: 					       [Reason]),
15302:                                    ERROR
15303:                            end
15304:                    end},
15305:          #{desc => "[socket 3] Bind UDP socket (to local address)",
15306:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
15307:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try bind (socket 2) to: "
15308:                                        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
15309:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
15310:                                ok ->
15311:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
15312:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (bound): ~p",
15313:                                                [Port]),
15314:                                    {ok, State#{sa3 => LSA#{port => Port}}};
15315:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15316:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15317: 					       [Reason]),
15318:                                    ERROR
15319:                            end
15320:                    end},
15321:          #{desc => "[socket 3] verify UDP socket (after set)",
15322:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = _State) ->
15323:                            case Get(Sock) of
15324:                                {ok, true} ->
15325:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15326:                                                "broadcast allowed"),
15327:                                    ok;
15328:                                {ok, false} ->
15329:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success result: "
15330:                                                "broadcast not allowed"),
15331:                                    {error, not_allowed};
15332:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15333:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15334: 					       [Reason]),
15335:                                    ERROR
15336:                            end
15337:                    end},
15338: 
15339: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15340: 
15341:          #{desc => "[socket 3] try send to limited broadcast address",
15342:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
15343:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test (send)"),
15344: 			   ok;
15345: 		      (#{sock3 := Sock,
15346: 			 sa1   := Dest} = _State) ->
15347: 			   Data = list_to_binary("hejsan"),
15348: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("try send to broadcast address: "
15349: 				       "~n   ~p", [Dest]),
15350: 			   case socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest) of
15351: 			       ok ->
15352: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15353: 					       "broadcast message sent"),
15354: 				   ok;
15355: 			       {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15356: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15357: 					       [Reason]),
15358: 				   ERROR
15359: 			   end
15360: 		   end},
15361:          #{desc => "[socket 1] try recv",
15362:            cmd  => fun(#{sa1 := skip} = _State) ->
15363: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP limited broadcast test (recv)"),
15364: 			   ok;
15365: 		      (#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
15366:                            case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, 5000) of
15367:                                {ok, _} ->
15368:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15369:                                                "received message"),
15370:                                    ok;
15371:                                {error, timeout = Reason} ->
15372:                                    %% Some platforms seem to balk at this.
15373:                                    %% It spossible to bind to this, and
15374:                                    %% send to it, but no data is received.
15375:                                    %% At some point we should investigate...
15376:                                    %% For now, we just skip this part of
15377:                                    %% the test...
15378:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15379: 					       [Reason]),
15380:                                    {ok, State#{sa1 => skip}};
15381:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15382:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15383: 					       [Reason]),
15384:                                    ERROR
15385:                            end
15386:                    end},
15387: 
15388: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
15389: 
15390:          #{desc => "[socket 2] try send to subnet-directed broadcast address",
15391:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
15392: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test "
15393:                                        "(send)"),
15394: 			   ok;
15395: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock,
15396:                          sa2   := Dest} = _State) ->
15397:                            Data = list_to_binary("hejsan"),
15398:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try send to broadcast address: "
15399:                                        "~n   ~p", [Dest]),
15400:                            case socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest) of
15401:                                ok ->
15402:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15403:                                                "broadcast message sent"),
15404:                                    ok;
15405:                                {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
15406:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
15407:                                                [Reason]),
15408:                                    {skip, Reason};
15409:                                {error, eacces = Reason} ->
15410:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p => SKIP",
15411: 					       [Reason]),
15412:                                    {skip, Reason};
15413:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15414:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15415: 					       [Reason]),
15416:                                    ERROR
15417:                            end
15418:                    end},
15419:          #{desc => "[socket 2] try recv",
15420:            cmd  => fun(#{sa2 := skip} = _State) ->
15421: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("SKIP subnet-directed broadcast test "
15422:                                          "(recv)"),
15423: 			   ok;
15424: 		      (#{sock2 := Sock, sa2 := SA2} = _State) ->
15425:                            case socket:recvfrom(Sock, 0, 5000) of
15426:                                {ok, _} ->
15427:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success: "
15428:                                                "received message"),
15429:                                    ok;
15430:                                {error, timeout = Reason} when (SA2 =:= skip) ->
15431:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15432: 					       [Reason]),
15433:                                    {skip, "receive timeout"};
15434:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15435:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15436: 					       [Reason]),
15437:                                    ERROR
15438:                            end
15439:                    end},
15440: 
15441:          %% *** Termination ***
15442:          #{desc => "[socket 3] close UDP socket (sender)",
15443:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State0) ->
15444:                            socket:close(Sock),
15445: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock3, State0),
15446: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa3,   State1),
15447: 			   {ok, State2}
15448:                    end},
15449:          #{desc => "[socket 2] close UDP socket (listener 2)",
15450:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State0) ->
15451:                            socket:close(Sock),
15452: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock2, State0),
15453: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa2,   State1),
15454:                            {ok, State2}
15455:                    end},
15456:          #{desc => "[socket 1] close UDP socket (listener 1)",
15457:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State0) ->
15458:                            socket:close(Sock),
15459: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock1, State0),
15460: 			   State2 = maps:remove(sa1,   State1),
15461:                            {ok, State2}
15462:                    end},
15463: 
15464:          %% *** We are done ***
15465:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15466:         ],
15467: 
15468:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15469: 
15470:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15471:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
15472:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15473: 
15474:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15475:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15476: 
15477: 
15478: 
15479: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15480: 
15481: %% Tests the socket option debug.
15482: %% On linux, this test requires that the user running the test to have
15483: %% CAP_NET_ADMIN capabilities or be root (effective user ID of 0), 
15484: %% therefore we explicitly test for the result eacces when attempting to
15485: %% set, and skip if we get it.
15486: 
15487: api_opt_sock_debug(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15488:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15489:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_debug,
15490:            fun() -> has_support_sock_debug() end,
15491:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_debug() end).
15492: 
15493: 
15494: api_opt_sock_debug() ->
15495:     Opt    = debug,
15496:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_integer(Val) ->
15497:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
15498:              end,
15499:     Get    = fun(S) ->
15500:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
15501:              end,
15502: 
15503:     TesterSeq =
15504:         [
15505:          #{desc => "which local address",
15506:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15507:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
15508:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
15509:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
15510:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
15511:                                                "~n   Name:           ~p"
15512:                                                "~n   Addr:           ~p",
15513:                                                [Name, Addr]),
15514:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
15515:                                            addr   => Addr},
15516:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
15517:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15518:                                    ERROR
15519:                            end
15520:                    end},
15521: 
15522:          #{desc => "create UDP socket",
15523:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15524:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15525:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15526:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
15527:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15528:                                    ERROR
15529:                            end
15530:                    end},
15531:          #{desc => "Get current debug value",
15532:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
15533:                            case Get(Sock) of
15534:                                {ok, Debug} when is_integer(Debug) ->
15535:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Debug]),
15536:                                    {ok, State#{debug => Debug}};
15537:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15538:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15539:                                                [Reason]),
15540:                                    ERROR
15541:                            end
15542:                    end},
15543:          #{desc => "Try enable socket debug",
15544:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, debug := Debug} = State) ->
15545: 			   NewDebug = Debug + 1,
15546:                            case Set(Sock, NewDebug) of
15547:                                ok ->
15548:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
15549:                                    {ok, State#{debug => NewDebug}};
15550:                                {error, eacces = Reason} ->
15551:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("NO ACCESS => SKIP"),
15552:                                    {skip, Reason};
15553:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15554:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15555: 					       [Reason]),
15556:                                    ERROR
15557:                            end
15558:                    end},
15559:          #{desc => "Get current (new) debug value",
15560:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, debug := Debug} = _State) ->
15561:                            case Get(Sock) of
15562:                                {ok, Debug} when is_integer(Debug) ->
15563:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Debug]),
15564:                                    ok;
15565:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15566:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15567:                                                [Reason]),
15568:                                    ERROR
15569:                            end
15570:                    end},
15571: 
15572:          %% *** Termination ***
15573:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
15574:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
15575:                            socket:close(Sock),
15576: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
15577:                            {ok, State1}
15578:                    end},
15579: 
15580:          %% *** We are done ***
15581:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15582:         ],
15583: 
15584:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15585: 
15586:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15587:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
15588:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15589: 
15590:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15591:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15592: 
15593: 
15594: 
15595: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15596: 
15597: %% Tests the socket option domain.
15598: %% This is a read only option. Also not available on all platforms.
15599: 
15600: api_opt_sock_domain(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15601:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15602:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_domain,
15603:            fun() -> has_support_sock_domain() end,
15604:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_domain() end).
15605: 
15606: 
15607: api_opt_sock_domain() ->
15608:     Opt = domain,
15609:     Get = fun(S) ->
15610:                   socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
15611:           end,
15612: 
15613:     TesterSeq =
15614:         [
15615:          #{desc => "which local address",
15616:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15617:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
15618:                                {ok, #{name := Name,
15619:                                       addr := Addr}} ->
15620:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
15621:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
15622:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
15623:                                                [Name, Addr]),
15624:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
15625:                                            addr   => Addr},
15626:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
15627:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15628:                                    ERROR
15629:                            end
15630:                    end},
15631: 
15632:          #{desc => "create IPv4 UDP socket",
15633:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15634:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15635:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15636:                                    {ok, State#{usock => Sock}};
15637:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15638:                                    ERROR
15639:                            end
15640:                    end},
15641:          #{desc => "Get domain for the UDP socket",
15642:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, usock := Sock} = _State) ->
15643:                            case Get(Sock) of
15644:                                {ok, Domain} ->
15645:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Domain]),
15646:                                    ok;
15647:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15648:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15649:                                                [Reason]),
15650:                                    ERROR
15651:                            end
15652:                    end},
15653:          #{desc => "create TCP socket",
15654:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15655:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
15656:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15657:                                    {ok, State#{tsock => Sock}};
15658:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15659:                                    ERROR
15660:                            end
15661:                    end},
15662:          #{desc => "Get domain for the TCP socket",
15663:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, tsock := Sock} = _State) ->
15664:                            case Get(Sock) of
15665:                                {ok, Domain} ->
15666:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Domain]),
15667:                                    ok;
15668:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15669:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15670:                                                [Reason]),
15671:                                    ERROR
15672:                            end
15673:                    end},
15674: 
15675:          %% *** Termination ***
15676:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
15677:            cmd  => fun(#{usock := Sock} = State0) ->
15678:                            socket:close(Sock),
15679: 			   State1 = maps:remove(usock, State0),
15680:                            {ok, State1}
15681:                    end},
15682:          #{desc => "close TCP socket",
15683:            cmd  => fun(#{tsock := Sock} = State0) ->
15684:                            socket:close(Sock),
15685: 			   State1 = maps:remove(tsock, State0),
15686:                            {ok, State1}
15687:                    end},
15688: 
15689:          %% *** We are done ***
15690:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15691:         ],
15692: 
15693:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15694: 
15695:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15696:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
15697:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15698: 
15699:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15700:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15701: 
15702: 
15703: 
15704: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15705: 
15706: %% Tests the socket option dontroute.
15707: %% The man page has the following to say:
15708: %% "Don't send via a gateway, send only to directly connected hosts.
15709: %%  The same effect can be achieved by setting the MSG_DONTROUTE
15710: %%  flag on a socket send(2) operation."
15711: %% Since its "kind of" difficult to check if it actually takes an 
15712: %% effect (you would need a gateway for that and a machine "on the
15713: %% other side"), we only test if we can set and get the value.
15714: %% Better then nothing.
15715: 
15716: api_opt_sock_dontroute(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15717:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15718:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_dontroute,
15719:            fun() -> has_support_sock_dontroute() end,
15720:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_dontroute() end).
15721: 
15722: 
15723: api_opt_sock_dontroute() ->
15724:     Opt    = dontroute,
15725:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
15726:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
15727:              end,
15728:     Get    = fun(S) ->
15729:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
15730:              end,
15731: 
15732:     TesterSeq =
15733:         [
15734:          #{desc => "which local address",
15735:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15736:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
15737:                                {ok, #{name := Name,
15738:                                       addr := Addr}} ->
15739:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
15740:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
15741:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
15742:                                                [Name, Addr]),
15743:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
15744:                                            addr   => Addr},
15745:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
15746:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15747:                                    ERROR
15748:                            end
15749:                    end},
15750: 
15751:          #{desc => "create UDP socket",
15752:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15753:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, udp) of
15754:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15755:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
15756:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15757:                                    ERROR
15758:                            end
15759:                    end},
15760:          #{desc => "Get current value",
15761:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
15762:                            case Get(Sock) of
15763:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
15764:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
15765:                                    {ok, State#{dontroute => Val}};
15766:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15767:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15768:                                                [Reason]),
15769:                                    ERROR
15770:                            end
15771:                    end},
15772:          #{desc => "Try change value",
15773:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dontroute := Current} = State) ->
15774: 			   New = not Current,
15775:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Change from ~p to ~p", [Current, New]),
15776:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
15777:                                ok ->
15778:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
15779:                                    {ok, State#{dontroute => New}};
15780:                                {error, eopnotsupp = Reason} ->
15781:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Expected Failure: ~p",
15782: 					       [Reason]),
15783:                                    {skip, Reason};
15784:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15785:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15786: 					       [Reason]),
15787:                                    ERROR
15788:                            end
15789:                    end},
15790:          #{desc => "Verify changed value",
15791:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, dontroute := Val} = _State) ->
15792:                            case Get(Sock) of
15793:                                {ok, Val} ->
15794:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
15795:                                    ok;
15796:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15797:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15798:                                                [Reason]),
15799:                                    ERROR
15800:                            end
15801:                    end},
15802: 
15803:          %% *** Termination ***
15804:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
15805:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
15806:                            socket:close(Sock),
15807: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
15808:                            {ok, State1}
15809:                    end},
15810: 
15811:          %% *** We are done ***
15812:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15813:         ],
15814: 
15815:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15816: 
15817:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15818:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
15819:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15820: 
15821:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15822:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15823: 
15824: 
15825: 
15826: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15827: 
15828: %% Tests the socket option error. PLACEHOLDER!
15829: 
15830: api_opt_sock_error(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15831:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15832:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_error,
15833:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
15834:            fun() -> ok end).
15835: 
15836: 
15837: 
15838: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15839: 
15840: %% Tests the socket option keepalive.
15841: %% This is bit tricky to test, partly because we have no control over
15842: %% the underlying TCP timeouts. So, for now, we just test that we can
15843: %% change the value.
15844: 
15845: api_opt_sock_keepalive(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15846:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15847:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_keepalive,
15848:            fun() -> has_support_sock_keepalive() end,
15849:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_keepalive() end).
15850: 
15851: 
15852: api_opt_sock_keepalive() ->
15853:     Opt    = keepalive,
15854:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
15855:                      socket:setopt(S, socket, Opt, Val)
15856:              end,
15857:     Get    = fun(S) ->
15858:                      socket:getopt(S, socket, Opt)
15859:              end,
15860: 
15861:     TesterSeq =
15862:         [
15863:          #{desc => "which local address",
15864:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15865:                            case which_local_host_info(Domain) of
15866:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
15867:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
15868:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
15869:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
15870:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
15871:                                                [Name, Addr]),
15872:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
15873:                                            addr   => Addr},
15874:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
15875:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15876:                                    ERROR
15877:                            end
15878:                    end},
15879: 
15880:          #{desc => "create TCP socket",
15881:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
15882:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, tcp) of
15883:                                {ok, Sock} ->
15884:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
15885:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
15886:                                    ERROR
15887:                            end
15888:                    end},
15889:          #{desc => "Get current value",
15890:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
15891:                            case Get(Sock) of
15892:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
15893:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
15894:                                    {ok, State#{keepalive => Val}};
15895:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15896:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15897:                                                [Reason]),
15898:                                    ERROR
15899:                            end
15900:                    end},
15901:          #{desc => "Try change the value",
15902:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, keepalive := Current} = State) ->
15903: 			   New = not Current,
15904:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try change value from ~p to ~p", 
15905:                                        [Current, New]),
15906:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
15907:                                ok ->
15908:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
15909:                                    {ok, State#{keepalive => New}};
15910:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15911:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
15912: 					       [Reason]),
15913:                                    ERROR
15914:                            end
15915:                    end},
15916:          #{desc => "Verify (new) current value",
15917:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, keepalive := Val} = _State) ->
15918:                            case Get(Sock) of
15919:                                {ok, Val} ->
15920:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (~p)", [Val]),
15921:                                    ok;
15922:                                {ok, OtherVal} ->
15923:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success: ~p",
15924:                                                [OtherVal]),
15925:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_value,
15926:                                             Val, OtherVal}};
15927:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
15928:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
15929:                                                [Reason]),
15930:                                    ERROR
15931:                            end
15932:                    end},
15933: 
15934:          %% *** Termination ***
15935:          #{desc => "close UDP socket",
15936:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
15937:                            socket:close(Sock),
15938: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
15939:                            {ok, State1}
15940:                    end},
15941: 
15942:          %% *** We are done ***
15943:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
15944:         ],
15945: 
15946:     Domain = inet_or_inet6(),
15947: 
15948:     i("start tester evaluator"),
15949:     InitState = #{domain => Domain},
15950:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
15951: 
15952:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
15953:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
15954: 
15955: 
15956: 
15957: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15958: 
15959: %% Tests the socket option reuseaddr.
15960: %% This is the most basic of tests. We only test that we can set the
15961: %% option and then read back.
15962: 
15963: api_opt_sock_reuseaddr(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15964:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15965:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
15966:            fun() ->
15967:                    %% [IPv4] Nothing to do with the option,
15968:                    %% [IPv4] but we use it the test so make
15969:                    %% [IPv4] use we have it.
15970:                    has_support_ipv4(),
15971:                    has_support_sock_reuseaddr()
15972:            end,
15973:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_reuseaddr() end).
15974: 
15975: 
15976: api_opt_sock_reuseaddr() ->
15977:     api_opt_simple_bool(inet, socket, stream, reuseaddr,
15978:                        #{bind => false}).
15979: 
15980: 
15981: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
15982: 
15983: %% Tests the socket option exclusiveaddruse.
15984: %% This is the most basic of tests. We only test that we can set the
15985: %% option and then read back.
15986: 
15987: api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
15988:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
15989:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
15990:            fun() ->
15991:                    %% [IPv4] Nothing to do with the option,
15992:                    %% [IPv4] but we use it the test so make
15993:                    %% [IPv4] use we have it.
15994:                    has_support_ipv4(),
15995:                    has_support_sock_exclusiveaddruse()
15996:            end,
15997:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse() end).
15998: 
15999: 
16000: api_opt_sock_exclusiveaddruse() ->
16001:     api_opt_simple_bool(inet, socket, stream, exclusiveaddruse,
16002: 			#{bind => false}).
16003: 
16004: 
16005: 
16006: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16007: 
16008: %% *Simple* test for a bool option.
16009: %% This basically just tests that we can set and get the option.
16010: %% This assumes that the option is supported.
16011: %% What if its required that the socket is bound before set/get?
16012: %% What if its required that set/get is done before bind?
16013: 
16014: api_opt_simple_bool(Domain, Level, Type, Option, InitState) ->
16015: 
16016:     Set    = fun(S, Val) when is_boolean(Val) ->
16017:                      socket:setopt(S, Level, Option, Val)
16018:              end,
16019:     Get    = fun(S) ->
16020:                      socket:getopt(S, Level, Option)
16021:              end,
16022: 
16023:     TesterSeq =
16024:         [
16025:          #{desc => "(maybe) which local address",
16026:            cmd  => fun(#{bind := true} = State) ->
16027:                            case ?LIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
16028:                                {ok, #{name      := Name,
16029:                                       addr      := Addr}} ->
16030:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("local host info: "
16031:                                                "~n   Name: ~p"
16032:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p",
16033:                                                [Name, Addr]),
16034:                                    LSA = #{family => Domain,
16035:                                            addr   => Addr},
16036:                                    {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}};
16037:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16038:                                    ERROR
16039:                            end;
16040:                       (_State) ->
16041:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("ignore get local address"),
16042:                            ok
16043:                    end},
16044: 
16045:          #{desc => "create socket",
16046:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
16047:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type) of
16048:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16049:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
16050:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16051:                                    ERROR
16052:                            end
16053:                    end},
16054: 
16055:          #{desc => "(maybe) bind",
16056:            cmd  => fun(#{bind := true, lsa := LSA, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
16057:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try binding"),
16058:                            socket:bind(Sock, LSA);
16059:                       (_State) ->
16060:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("ignore binding"),
16061:                            ok
16062:                    end},
16063: 
16064:          #{desc => "Get current value",
16065:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
16066:                            case Get(Sock) of
16067:                                {ok, Val} when is_boolean(Val) ->
16068:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Success: ~p", [Val]),
16069:                                    {ok, State#{Option => Val}};
16070:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
16071:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
16072:                                                [Reason]),
16073:                                    ERROR
16074:                            end
16075:                    end},
16076:          #{desc => "Try change the value",
16077:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
16078:                            Current = maps:get(Option, State),
16079: 			   New     = not Current,
16080:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Try change value from ~p to ~p", 
16081:                                        [Current, New]),
16082:                            case Set(Sock, New) of
16083:                                ok ->
16084:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success"),
16085:                                    {ok, State#{Option => New}};
16086:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
16087:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected Failure: ~p",
16088: 					       [Reason]),
16089:                                    ERROR
16090:                            end
16091:                    end},
16092:          #{desc => "Verify (new) current value",
16093:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
16094:                            Val = maps:get(Option, State),
16095:                            case Get(Sock) of
16096:                                {ok, Val} ->
16097:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected Success (~p)", [Val]),
16098:                                    ok;
16099:                                {ok, OtherVal} ->
16100:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Unexpected Success: ~p",
16101:                                                [OtherVal]),
16102:                                    {error, {unexpected_success_value,
16103:                                             Val, OtherVal}};
16104:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
16105:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected failure: ~p",
16106:                                                [Reason]),
16107:                                    ERROR
16108:                            end
16109:                    end},
16110: 
16111:          %% *** Termination ***
16112:          #{desc => "close socket",
16113:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State0) ->
16114:                            socket:close(Sock),
16115: 			   State1 = maps:remove(sock, State0),
16116:                            {ok, State1}
16117:                    end},
16118: 
16119:          %% *** We are done ***
16120:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16121:         ],
16122: 
16123:     i("start tester evaluator"),
16124:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, InitState),
16125: 
16126:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
16127:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Tester]).
16128: 
16129: 
16130: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16131: 
16132: %% Tests the socket option bsp_state.
16133: %% This is the most basic of tests. We test that we can,
16134: %% create sockets, bind and connect and extract bsp-state
16135: %% in the various state(s) of the socket.
16136: %% For both dgram and stream sockets.
16137: 
16138: api_opt_sock_bsp_state(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16139:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
16140:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
16141:            fun() ->
16142: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
16143: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
16144:                    has_support_ipv4(),
16145:                    has_support_sock_bsp_state()
16146:            end,
16147:            fun() -> api_opt_sock_bsp_state() end).
16148: 
16149: 
16150: api_opt_sock_bsp_state() ->
16151:     LSA        = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
16152:     BspState   = fun(S) ->
16153: 			 case socket:getopt(S, socket, bsp_state) of
16154: 			     {ok, BS} ->
16155: 				 BS;
16156: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16157: 				 ?FAIL({getopt_bsp_state, Reason})
16158: 			 end
16159: 		 end,
16160:     CreateSock = fun(T, P) ->
16161: 			 case socket:open(inet, T, P) of
16162: 			     {ok, Sock}      ->
16163: 				 Sock;
16164: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16165: 				 skip({socket_create_fail, Reason})
16166: 			 end
16167: 		 end,
16168:     CloseSock = fun(S) ->
16169: 			socket:close(S)
16170: 		end,
16171:     BindSock   = fun(S, SA) ->
16172: 			 case socket:bind(S, SA) of
16173: 			     ok ->
16174: 				 ok;
16175: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16176: 				 ?FAIL({bind, Reason})
16177: 			 end
16178: 		 end,
16179:     Sockname   = fun(S) ->
16180: 			 case socket:sockname(S) of
16181: 			     {ok, SA} ->
16182: 				 SA;
16183: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16184: 				 ?FAIL({sockname, Reason})
16185: 			 end
16186: 		 end,
16187:     %% Setopt      = fun(S, L, O, V) ->
16188:     %% 			  socket:setopt(S, L, O, V)
16189:     %% 		  end,
16190:     %% SetOtpOpt = fun(S, O, V) -> Setopt(S, otp, O, V) end,
16191:     %% SetDebug  = fun(S, D) when is_boolean(D) -> SetOptOpt(S, debug, D) end,
16192:     %% EnableDebug = fun(S) -> SetDebug(S, true) end,
16193:     ConnectSock = fun(S, SA) ->
16194: 			  case socket:connect(S, SA) of
16195: 			      ok ->
16196: 				  ok;
16197: 			      {error, Reason} ->
16198: 				  ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
16199: 			  end
16200: 		  end,
16201:     ListenSock = fun(S) ->
16202: 			 case socket:listen(S) of
16203: 			     ok ->
16204: 				 ok;
16205: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16206: 				 ?FAIL({listen, Reason})
16207: 			 end
16208: 		 end,
16209:     AcceptSock = fun(S) ->
16210: 			 case socket:accept(S) of
16211: 			     {ok, A} ->
16212: 				 A;
16213: 			     {error, Reason} ->
16214: 				 ?FAIL({accept, Reason})
16215: 			 end
16216: 		 end,
16217: 
16218:     VerifyBspState = fun(S, Type, Proto,
16219: 			 Bound, Connected) ->
16220: 			     verify_bsp_state(S, Type, Proto,
16221: 					      Bound, Connected)
16222: 		     end,
16223: 
16224:     ?P("Create UDP socket 1:"),
16225:     US1 = CreateSock(dgram, udp),
16226:     ?P("UDP[1] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
16227:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US1), dgram, udp, false, false),
16228: 
16229:     ?P("Create UDP socket 2:"),
16230:     US2 = CreateSock(dgram, udp),
16231:     ?P("UDP[2] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
16232:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US2), dgram, udp, false, false),
16233: 
16234:     ?P("Bind UDP socket 1"),
16235:     BindSock(US1, LSA),
16236:     ?P("UDP[1] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
16237:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US1), dgram, udp, true, false),
16238: 
16239:     ?P("Bind UDP socket 2"),
16240:     BindSock(US2, LSA),
16241:     ?P("UDP[2] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
16242:     VerifyBspState(BspState(US2), dgram, udp, true, false),
16243: 
16244:     %% We have not yet implemented 'connect' for UDP on Windows,
16245:     %% so we leave this commented for now:
16246: 
16247:     %% ?P("socknames"),
16248:     %% USN1 = Sockname(US1),
16249:     %% USN2 = Sockname(US2),
16250: 
16251:     %% ?P("enable debug for US1"),
16252:     %% EnableDebug(US1),
16253: 
16254:     %% ?P("Connect UDP socket 1 to"
16255:     %%    "~n   ~p", [USN2]),
16256:     %% ConnectSock(US1, USN2),
16257:     %% ?P("UDP[1] [Bound | Connected]     => ~p", [BspState(US1)]),
16258: 
16259:     %% ?P("Connect UDP socket 2 to"
16260:     %%    "~n   ~p", [USN1]),
16261:     %% ConnectSock(US2, USN1),
16262:     %% ?P("UDP[2] [Bound | Connected]     => ~p", [BspState(US2)]),
16263: 
16264: 
16265:     ?P("Create TCP socket 1:"),
16266:     TS1 = CreateSock(stream, tcp),
16267:     ?P("TCP[1] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
16268:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, false, false),
16269: 
16270:     ?P("Create TCP socket 2 (listen):"),
16271:     TS2 = CreateSock(stream, tcp),
16272:     ?P("TCP[2] [Unbound | Unconnected] => ~p", [BspState(TS2)]),
16273:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS2), stream, tcp, false, false),
16274: 
16275:     ?P("Bind TCP socket 1"),
16276:     BindSock(TS1, LSA),
16277:     ?P("TCP[1] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
16278:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, true, false),
16279: 
16280:     ?P("Bind TCP socket 2"),
16281:     BindSock(TS2, LSA),
16282:     ?P("TCP[2] [Bound | Unconnected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS2)]),
16283:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS2), stream, tcp, true, false),
16284: 
16285:     ?P("Make TCP socket 2 listen"),
16286:     ListenSock(TS2),
16287: 
16288:     ?P("socknames"),
16289:     TSN2 = Sockname(TS2),
16290: 
16291:     ?P("Connect TCP socket 1 to"
16292:        "~n   ~p", [TSN2]),
16293:     ConnectSock(TS1, TSN2),
16294:     ?P("TCP[1] [Bound | Connected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS1)]),
16295:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS1), stream, tcp, true, true),
16296: 
16297:     ?P("Accept TCP socket 3"),
16298:     TS3 = AcceptSock(TS2),
16299:     ?P("TCP[3] [Bound | Connected]   => ~p", [BspState(TS3)]),
16300:     VerifyBspState(BspState(TS3), stream, tcp, true, true),
16301: 
16302:     ?P("Close socket(s)"),
16303:     CloseSock(TS3),
16304:     CloseSock(TS2),
16305:     CloseSock(TS1),
16306: 
16307:     ?P("done"),
16308:     ok.
16309: 
16310: 
16311: verify_bsp_state(#{type        := T,
16312: 		   protocol    := P,
16313: 		   local_addr  := LA,
16314: 		   remote_addr := RA},
16315: 		 Type, Proto,
16316: 		 Bound, Connected) when (T =:= Type) andalso (P =:= Proto) ->
16317:     case {Bound, LA} of
16318: 	{false, undefined} ->
16319: 	    ok;
16320: 	{true, _} when (LA =/= undefined) ->
16321: 	    ok;
16322: 	_ ->
16323: 	    ?FAIL({invalid_bound_la, Bound, LA})
16324:     end,
16325:     case {Connected, RA} of
16326: 	{false, undefined} ->
16327: 	    ok;
16328: 	{true, _} when (RA =/= undefined) ->
16329: 	    ok;
16330: 	_ ->
16331: 	    ?FAIL({invalid_connected_ra, Connected, RA})
16332:     end,
16333:     ok;
16334: verify_bsp_state(#{type     := T,
16335: 		   protocol := P},
16336: 		 Type, Proto,
16337: 		 _Bound, _Connected) ->
16338:     ?FAIL({invalid_type_or_proto, {T, Type}, {P, Proto}}).
16339: 
16340: 
16341:     
16342: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16343: 
16344: %% Tests the socket option linger. PLACEHOLDER!
16345: 
16346: api_opt_sock_linger(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16347:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
16348:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_linger,
16349:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
16350:            fun() -> ok end).
16351: 
16352: 
16353: 
16354: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16355: 
16356: %% Tests the socket option mark. PLACEHOLDER!
16357: 
16358: api_opt_sock_mark(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16359:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
16360:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_mark,
16361:            fun() -> not_yet_implemented() end,
16362:            fun() -> ok end).
16363: 
16364: 
16365: 
16366: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16367: 
16368: %% Tests the socket option maxdg.
16369: 
16370: api_opt_sock_maxdg(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16371:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
16372:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
16373: 	   fun() ->
16374: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
16375: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
16376:                    has_support_ipv4(),
16377:                    has_support_sock_maxdg()
16378:            end,
16379:            fun() -> do_api_opt_sock_maxdg() end).
16380: 
16381: do_api_opt_sock_maxdg() ->
16382:     ?P("create DGRAM socket"),
16383:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
16384:     ?P("get maxdg"),
16385:     case socket:getopt(S, socket, maxdg) of
16386: 	{ok, Sz} ->
16387: 	    ?P("success: Sz = ~p", [Sz]),
16388: 	    ok;
16389: 	{error, Reason} ->
16390: 	    ?FAIL({failed_get_maxdg, Reason})
16391:     end.
16392: 
16393: 
16394: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16395: 
16396: %% Tests the socket option max_msg_size.
16397: 
16398: api_opt_sock_max_msg_size(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16399:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
16400:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
16401: 	   fun() ->
16402: 		   %% This is not a 'IPv4' option,
16403: 		   %% but since we used it in the test...
16404:                    has_support_ipv4(),
16405:                    has_support_sock_max_msg_size()
16406:            end,
16407:            fun() -> do_api_opt_sock_max_msg_size() end).
16408: 
16409: do_api_opt_sock_max_msg_size() ->
16410:     {ok, S} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
16411:     case socket:getopt(S, socket, max_msg_size) of
16412: 	{ok, Sz} ->
16413: 	    ?P("success: Sz = ~p", [Sz]),
16414: 	    ok;
16415: 	{error, Reason} ->
16416: 	    ?FAIL({failed_get_max_msg_size, Reason})
