16417:     end.
16418: 
16419: 
16420: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16421: 
16422: %% This test case tries to test that the oobinline socket 'socket' option
16423: %% works.
16424: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
16425: %%
16426: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, oobinline, boolean()).
16427: %%
16428: %% This works on linux of some version (at least linux kernel 4.15.0),
16429: %% but not on FreeBSD (12) for some reason. Until we have figured out
16430: %% exctly why, we skip a bunch of OSs...
16431: %%
16432: %% Do we need to make sure the two entities does not run in the same
16433: %% process? This test case does not currently do that (which works in'
16434: %% linux but maybe not in, say, FreeBSD).
16435: %%
16436: 
16437: api_opt_sock_oobinline(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
16438:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
16439:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_ooinline,
16440:            fun() ->
16441:                    has_support_sock_oobinline(),
16442:                    has_support_msg_flag(oob),
16443:                    is_valid_oobinline_platform()
16444:            end,
16445:            fun() ->
16446:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
16447:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, oobinline, Value)
16448:                           end,
16449:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
16450:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, oobinline)
16451:                           end,
16452:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data, true) ->
16453:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data, [oob]);
16454:                              (Sock, Data, false) ->
16455:                                      socket:send(Sock, Data)
16456:                           end,
16457:                    Recv = fun(Sock, true) ->
16458:                                   socket:recv(Sock, 0, [oob]);
16459:                              (Sock, false) ->
16460:                                   socket:recv(Sock)
16461:                           end,
16462:                    InitState = #{domain => inet_or_inet6(),
16463:                                  proto  => tcp,
16464:                                  send   => Send,
16465:                                  recv   => Recv,
16466:                                  set    => Set,
16467:                                  get    => Get},
16468:                    ok = do_api_opt_sock_oobinline(InitState)
16469:            end).
16470: 
16471: %% Hopefully this is a temporary solution...
16472: is_valid_oobinline_platform() ->
16473:     case os:type() of
16474:         {unix, linux} ->
16475:             ok;
16476: 
16477:         Type ->
16478:             %% Actually, all we know is that the
16479:             %% test case only work for linux, but
16480:             %% it *should* for FreeBSD and Solaris
16481:             %% also...
16482:             not_supported(Type)
16483:     end.
16484:     
16485: 
16486: 
16487: 
16488: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
16489: 
16490: do_api_opt_sock_oobinline(InitState) ->
16491:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
16492:     ServerSeq =
16493:         [
16494:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
16495:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
16496:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
16497:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16498:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
16499:                    end},
16500:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
16501:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16502:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16503:                            ok
16504:                    end},
16505: 
16506:          %% *** Init part ***
16507:          #{desc => "which local address",
16508:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
16509:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16510:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
16511:                    end},
16512:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
16513:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
16514:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
16515:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
16516:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16517:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
16518:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16519:                                    ERROR
16520:                            end
16521:                    end},
16522:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
16523:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
16524:                          lsock  := LSock,
16525:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
16526:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
16527:                                ok ->
16528:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
16529:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16530:                                    ERROR
16531:                            end;
16532:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
16533:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
16534:                                ok ->
16535:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
16536:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
16537:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
16538:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16539:                                    ERROR
16540:                            end
16541:                    end},
16542:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
16543:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
16544:                            socket:listen(LSock)
16545:                    end},
16546:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
16547:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
16548:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
16549:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
16550:                            ok;
16551:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
16552:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
16553:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
16554:                            ok
16555:                    end},
16556: 
16557: 
16558:          %% The actual test
16559:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
16560:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16561:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
16562:                    end},
16563:          #{desc => "await connection",
16564:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
16565:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
16566:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16567:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
16568:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
16569:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16570:                                    ERROR
16571:                            end
16572:                    end},
16573:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
16574:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16575:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
16576:                            ok
16577:                    end},
16578: 
16579:          %% *** no oobinline ***
16580: 
16581:          #{desc => "await continue (verify no oobinline)",
16582:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16583:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_oobinline)
16584:                    end},
16585:          #{desc => "verify no oobinline",
16586:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
16587:                            case Get(Sock) of
16588:                                {ok, false = _Value} ->
16589:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("oobinline: ~p", [_Value]),
16590:                                    ok;
16591:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
16592:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected oobinline: ~p",
16593:                                                [Unexpected]),
16594:                                    {error, {unexpected_oobinline, Unexpected}};
16595:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
16596:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting oobinline:"
16597:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
16598:                                    ERROR
16599:                            end                                   
16600:                    end},
16601:          #{desc => "announce ready (no oobinline)",
16602:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16603:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, no_oobinline),
16604:                            ok
16605:                    end},
16606: 
16607:          #{desc => "await continue (recv no oobinline)",
16608:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16609:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
16610:                    end},
16611:          #{desc => "await plain data",
16612:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
16613:                            case Recv(Sock, false) of
16614:                                {ok, <<"a">>} ->
16615:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received plain data"),
16616:                                    ok;
16617:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16618:                                    ERROR
16619:                            end
16620:                    end},
16621:          #{desc => "announce ready (plain data)",
16622:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16623:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_plain),
16624:                            ok
16625:                    end},
16626:          #{desc => "await oob data",
16627:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
16628:                            case Recv(Sock, true) of
16629:                                {ok, <<"b">>} ->
16630:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received oob data"),
16631:                                    ok;
16632:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16633:                                    ERROR
16634:                            end
16635:                    end},
16636:          #{desc => "announce ready (oob data)",
16637:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16638:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_oob),
16639:                            ok
16640:                    end},
16641: 
16642:          %% *** oobinline ***
16643: 
16644:           #{desc => "await continue (enable oobinline)",
16645:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16646:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, enable_oobinline)
16647:                    end},
16648:          #{desc => "enable oobinline",
16649:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
16650:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
16651:                                ok ->
16652:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("oobinline enabled"),
16653:                                    ok;
16654:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
16655:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed enable oobinline:"
16656:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
16657:                                    ERROR
16658:                            end                                   
16659:                    end},
16660:          #{desc => "announce ready (oobinline)",
16661:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16662:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, oobinline),
16663:                            ok
16664:                    end},
16665: 
16666:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
16667:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16668:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv)
16669:                    end},
16670:        #{desc => "await (recv) data",
16671:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
16672:                            case Recv(Sock, false) of
16673:                                {ok, <<"ba">>} ->
16674:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected message: "
16675:                                                "both plain and oob data"),
16676:                                    ok;
16677:                                {ok, BadMsg} ->
16678:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("received unexpected message: ~p",
16679:                                                [BadMsg]),
16680:                                    {error, {unexpected_msg, BadMsg}};
16681:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16682:                                    ERROR
16683:                            end
16684:                    end},
16685:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
16686:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16687:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv),
16688:                            ok
16689:                    end},
16690: 
16691:          %% *** Termination ***
16692:          #{desc => "await terminate",
16693:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
16694:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
16695:                                ok ->
16696:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
16697:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16698:                                    ERROR
16699:                            end
16700:                    end},
16701:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
16702:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
16703:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16704:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
16705:                    end},
16706:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
16707:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
16708:                          lsock    := Sock,
16709:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
16710:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16711:                            State1 =
16712:                                unlink_path(Path,
16713:                                            fun() ->
16714:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
16715:                                            end,
16716:                                            fun() -> State end),
16717:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
16718:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
16719:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
16720:                                ok ->
16721:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
16722:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16723:                                    ERROR
16724:                            end
16725:                    end},
16726: 
16727:          %% *** We are done ***
16728:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16729:         ],
16730: 
16731: 
16732:     ClientSeq =
16733:         [
16734:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
16735:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
16736:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
16737:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16738:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
16739:                       (State) ->
16740:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
16741:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
16742:                    end},
16743:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
16744:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16745:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
16746:                            ok
16747:                    end},
16748: 
16749:          %% *** The init part ***
16750:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
16751:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
16752:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
16753:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16754:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
16755:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
16756:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
16757:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
16758:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
16759:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
16760:                    end},
16761:          #{desc => "create socket",
16762:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
16763:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
16764:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
16765:                                {ok, Sock} ->
16766:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
16767:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16768:                                    ERROR
16769:                            end
16770:                    end},
16771:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
16772:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
16773:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
16774:                                ok ->
16775:                                    ok;
16776:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16777:                                    ERROR
16778:                            end
16779:                    end},
16780:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
16781:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16782:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
16783:                            ok
16784:                    end},
16785: 
16786:          %% *** The actual test ***
16787:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
16788:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16789:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
16790:                    end},
16791:          #{desc => "connect to server",
16792:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
16793:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
16794:                    end},
16795:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
16796:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16797:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
16798:                            ok
16799:                    end},
16800: 
16801:          %% *** First batch of data (no oobinline) ***
16802: 
16803:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
16804:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16805:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
16806:                    end},
16807:          #{desc => "send plain data",
16808:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
16809:                            Send(Sock, <<"a">>, false)
16810:                    end},
16811:          %% #{desc => "enable (socket & global) debug",
16812:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
16813:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
16814:          %%                   ok = socket:debug(true)
16815:          %%           end},
16816:          #{desc => "send oob data",
16817:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
16818:                            Send(Sock, <<"b">>, true)
16819:                    end},
16820:          %% #{desc => "disable (socket) debug",
16821:          %%   cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock}) ->
16822:          %%                   ok = socket:debug(true),
16823:          %%                   ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false)
16824:          %%           end},
16825:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
16826:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16827:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
16828:                            ok
16829:                    end},
16830: 
16831:          %% *** Second batch of data (oobinline) ***
16832: 
16833:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
16834:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
16835:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send)
16836:                    end},
16837:          #{desc => "send plain data",
16838:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
16839:                            Send(Sock, <<"a">>, false)
16840:                    end},
16841:          #{desc => "send oob data",
16842:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
16843:                            Send(Sock, <<"b">>, true)
16844:                    end},
16845:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
16846:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
16847:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send),
16848:                            ok
16849:                    end},
16850: 
16851:          %% *** Termination ***
16852:          #{desc => "await terminate",
16853:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
16854:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
16855:                                ok ->
16856:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
16857:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
16858:                                    ERROR
16859:                            end
16860:                    end},
16861:          #{desc => "close socket",
16862:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
16863:                          sock     := Sock,
16864:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
16865:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16866:                            State1 =
16867:                                unlink_path(Path,
16868:                                            fun() ->
16869:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
16870:                                            end,
16871:                                            fun() -> State end),
16872:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
16873:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
16874:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
16875:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
16876:                    end},
16877: 
16878:          %% *** We are done ***
16879:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
16880:         ],
16881: 
16882: 
16883:     TesterSeq =
16884:         [
16885:          %% *** Init part ***
16886:          #{desc => "monitor server",
16887:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
16888:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
16889:                            ok
16890:                    end},
16891:          #{desc => "monitor client",
16892:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
16893:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
16894:                            ok
16895:                    end},
16896: 
16897:          %% Start the server
16898:          #{desc => "order server start",
16899:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
16900:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
16901:                            ok
16902:                    end},
16903:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
16904:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
16905:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
16906:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
16907:                    end},
16908: 
16909:          %% Start the client
16910:          #{desc => "order client start",
16911:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
16912:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
16913:                            ok
16914:                    end},
16915:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
16916:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
16917:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
16918:                    end},
16919: 
16920:          %% *** The actual test ***
16921:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
16922:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16923:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
16924:                            ok
16925:                    end},
16926:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
16927:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
16928:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16929:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
16930:                            ok
16931:                    end},
16932:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
16933:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16934:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
16935:                    end},
16936:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
16937:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16938:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
16939:                    end},
16940: 
16941:          %% *** First batch of data (no oobinline) ***
16942: 
16943:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with verify no oobinline)",
16944:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16945:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_oobinline),
16946:                            ok
16947:                    end},
16948:          #{desc => "await server ready (no oobinline)",
16949:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16950:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, no_oobinline)
16951:                    end},
16952: 
16953:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send)",
16954:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16955:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
16956:                            ok
16957:                    end},
16958:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send)",
16959:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16960:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send)
16961:                    end},
16962:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with recv plain)",
16963:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16964:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv),
16965:                            ok
16966:                    end},
16967:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv plain)",
16968:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16969:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_plain)
16970:                    end},
16971:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv oob)",
16972:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16973:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_oob)
16974:                    end},
16975: 
16976:          %% Second message (w timestamp)
16977: 
16978:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with enable oobinline)",
16979:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16980:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, enable_oobinline),
16981:                            ok
16982:                    end},
16983:          #{desc => "await server ready (oobinline)",
16984:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16985:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, oobinline)
16986:                    end},
16987: 
16988:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send)",
16989:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16990:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send),
16991:                            ok
16992:                    end},
16993:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send)",
16994:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
16995:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send)
16996:                    end},
16997:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with recv)",
16998:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
16999:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, recv),
17000:                            ok
17001:                    end},
17002:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv plain)",
17003:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17004:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv)
17005:                    end},
17006: 
17007: 
17008:          %% *** Termination ***
17009:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
17010:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17011:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
17012:                            ok
17013:                    end},
17014:          #{desc => "await client termination",
17015:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
17016:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
17017:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
17018:                            {ok, State1}
17019:                    end},
17020:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
17021:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17022:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
17023:                            ok
17024:                    end},
17025:          #{desc => "await server termination",
17026:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
17027:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
17028:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
17029:                            {ok, State1}
17030:                    end},
17031: 
17032:          %% *** We are done ***
17033:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17034:         ],
17035: 
17036: 
17037:     i("start server evaluator"),
17038:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
17039: 
17040:     i("start client evaluator"),
17041:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
17042: 
17043:     i("start tester evaluator"),
17044:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
17045:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
17046:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
17047: 
17048:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
17049: 
17050: 
17051: 
17052: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17053: 
17054: %% Tests that the credentials control message header is received when
17055: %% setting the socket 'socket' option true when using sendmsg/recvmsg
17056: %% on an IPv4 TCP (stream) socket.
17057: %% So, this is done on the receiving side: 
17058: %%
17059: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, passcred, boolean()).
17060: %%
17061: %% We *may* need to run the different entities (server and client) in 
17062: %% separate VM (os processes) for this to actually work.
17063: %% As it is now, the client does *not* get any credentials!
17064: %% Until this has been done, this case is skipped!.
17065: 
17066: api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17067:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17068:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp4,
17069:            fun() -> has_support_sock_passcred(),
17070:                     not_yet_implemented()
17071:            end,
17072:            fun() ->
17073:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
17074:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, passcred, Value)
17075:                           end,
17076:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17077:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, passcred)
17078:                           end,
17079:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
17080:                                   Msg = #{iov  => [Data]},
17081:                                   socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
17082:                           end,
17083:                    Recv = fun(Sock) ->
17084:                                   case socket:recvmsg(Sock) of
17085:                                       {ok, #{ctrl := CMsgs,
17086:                                              iov  := [Data]}} ->
17087:                                           {ok, {CMsgs, Data}};
17088:                                       {error, _} = ERROR ->
17089:                                           ERROR
17090:                                   end
17091:                           end,
17092:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
17093:                                  proto  => tcp,
17094:                                  send   => Send,
17095:                                  recv   => Recv,
17096:                                  set    => Set,
17097:                                  get    => Get},
17098:                    ok = api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp(InitState)
17099:            end).
17100: 
17101: 
17102: 
17103: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17104: 
17105: api_opt_sock_passcred_tcp(InitState) ->
17106:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
17107:     ServerSeq =
17108:         [
17109:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
17110:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
17111:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
17112:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
17113:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
17114:                    end},
17115:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
17116:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17117:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
17118:                            ok
17119:                    end},
17120: 
17121:          %% *** Init part ***
17122:          #{desc => "which local address",
17123:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17124:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17125:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17126:                    end},
17127:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
17128:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17129:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17130:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
17131:                                {ok, Sock} ->
17132:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
17133:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17134:                                    ERROR
17135:                            end
17136:                    end},
17137:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
17138:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
17139:                          lsock  := LSock,
17140:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
17141:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
17142:                                ok ->
17143:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
17144:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17145:                                    ERROR
17146:                            end;
17147:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
17148:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
17149:                                ok ->
17150:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
17151:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound to port: ~w", [Port]),
17152:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
17153:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17154:                                    ERROR
17155:                            end
17156:                    end},
17157:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
17158:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
17159:                            socket:listen(LSock)
17160:                    end},
17161:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
17162:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
17163:                          tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
17164:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
17165:                            ok;
17166:                       (#{tester := Tester, lport := Port}) ->
17167:                            %% This is actually not used for unix domain socket
17168:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Port),
17169:                            ok
17170:                    end},
17171: 
17172: 
17173:          %% The actual test
17174:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
17175:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17176:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
17177:                    end},
17178:          #{desc => "await connection",
17179:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
17180:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
17181:                                {ok, Sock} ->
17182:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
17183:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
17184:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17185:                                    ERROR
17186:                            end
17187:                    end},
17188:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
17189:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17190:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
17191:                            ok
17192:                    end},
17193: 
17194:          %% *** First message ***
17195: 
17196:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 1",
17197:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17198:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17199:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
17200:                                    ok;
17201:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17202:                                    ERROR
17203:                            end
17204:                    end},
17205:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
17206:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17207:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
17208:                            ok
17209:                    end},
17210:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
17211:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17212:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
17213:                    end},
17214:          #{desc => "send reply",
17215:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17216:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
17217:                    end},
17218:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
17219:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17220:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
17221:                            ok
17222:                    end},
17223: 
17224:          %% *** Second message ***
17225: 
17226:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 2",
17227:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17228:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17229:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
17230:                                    ok;
17231:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17232:                                    ERROR
17233:                            end
17234:                    end},
17235:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
17236:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17237:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
17238:                            ok
17239:                    end},
17240:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
17241:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17242:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
17243:                    end},
17244:          #{desc => "send reply",
17245:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17246:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
17247:                    end},
17248:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
17249:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17250:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
17251:                            ok
17252:                    end},
17253: 
17254:          %% *** Third message ***
17255: 
17256:          #{desc => "await (recv) request 3",
17257:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17258:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17259:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REQ}} ->
17260:                                    ok;
17261:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17262:                                    ERROR
17263:                            end
17264:                    end},
17265:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv request)",
17266:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17267:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_req),
17268:                            ok
17269:                    end},
17270:          #{desc => "await continue (with send reply)",
17271:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17272:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_reply)
17273:                    end},
17274:          #{desc => "send reply",
17275:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17276:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REP)
17277:                    end},
17278:          #{desc => "announce ready (send reply)",
17279:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17280:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_reply),
17281:                            ok
17282:                    end},
17283: 
17284:          %% *** Termination ***
17285:          #{desc => "await terminate",
17286:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
17287:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
17288:                                ok ->
17289:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
17290:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17291:                                    ERROR
17292:                            end
17293:                    end},
17294:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
17295:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
17296:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17297:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
17298:                    end},
17299:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
17300:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
17301:                          lsock    := Sock,
17302:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
17303:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17304:                            State1 =
17305:                                unlink_path(Path,
17306:                                            fun() ->
17307:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
17308:                                            end,
17309:                                            fun() -> State end),
17310:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
17311:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
17312:                            case socket:close(LSock) of
17313:                                ok ->
17314:                                    {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)};
17315:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17316:                                    ERROR
17317:                            end
17318:                    end},
17319: 
17320:          %% *** We are done ***
17321:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17322:         ],
17323: 
17324: 
17325:     ClientSeq =
17326:         [
17327:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
17328:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
17329:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
17330:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
17331:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
17332:                       (State) ->
17333:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
17334:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
17335:                    end},
17336:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
17337:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17338:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
17339:                            ok
17340:                    end},
17341: 
17342:          %% *** The init part ***
17343:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
17344:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
17345:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
17346:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17347:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
17348:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
17349:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
17350:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17351:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
17352:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
17353:                    end},
17354:          #{desc => "create socket",
17355:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17356:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17357:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
17358:                                {ok, Sock} ->
17359:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
17360:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17361:                                    ERROR
17362:                            end
17363:                    end},
17364:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
17365:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
17366:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
17367:                                ok ->
17368:                                    ok;
17369:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17370:                                    ERROR
17371:                            end
17372:                    end},
17373:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
17374:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17375:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
17376:                            ok
17377:                    end},
17378: 
17379:          %% *** The actual test ***
17380:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
17381:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17382:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
17383:                    end},
17384:          #{desc => "connect to server",
17385:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
17386:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
17387:                    end},
17388:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
17389:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17390:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
17391:                            ok
17392:                    end},
17393: 
17394:          %% *** First message (default=wo passcred) ***
17395: 
17396:          #{desc => "await continue (verify timestamp off)",
17397:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17398:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_passcred)
17399:                    end},
17400:          #{desc => "verify passcred off",
17401:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
17402:                            case Get(Sock) of
17403:                                {ok, false = _Value} ->
17404:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred: ~p", [_Value]),
17405:                                    ok;
17406:                                {ok, Unexpected} ->
17407:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected passcred: ~p",
17408:                                                [Unexpected]),
17409:                                    {error, {unexpected_passcred, Unexpected}};
17410:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17411:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting passcred:"
17412:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17413:                                    ERROR
17414:                            end                                   
17415:                    end},
17416:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred off)",
17417:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17418:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_off),
17419:                            ok
17420:                    end},
17421: 
17422:          #{desc => "await continue (send request)",
17423:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17424:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
17425:                    end},
17426:          #{desc => "send request 1 (to server)",
17427:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17428:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
17429:                    end},
17430:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request)",
17431:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17432:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
17433:                            ok
17434:                    end},
17435:          #{desc => "await recv reply 1 (from server, wo passcred)",
17436:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17437:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17438:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17439:                                    ok;
17440:                                {ok, {[], UnexpData}} ->
17441:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data, UnexpData}};
17442:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17443:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
17444:                                             BadCMsgs}};
17445:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
17446:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
17447:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17448:                                    ERROR
17449:                            end
17450:                    end},
17451:          #{desc => "announce ready 1 (recv reply)",
17452:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17453:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
17454:                            ok
17455:                    end},
17456: 
17457:          %% *** Second message (w passcred) ***
17458: 
17459:          #{desc => "await continue (enable passcred)",
17460:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17461:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, enable_passcred)
17462:                    end},
17463:          #{desc => "enable passcred",
17464:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
17465:                            case Set(Sock, true) of
17466:                                ok ->
17467:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred enabled"),
17468:                                    ok;
17469:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17470:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed enable passcred:"
17471:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17472:                                    ERROR
17473:                            end                                   
17474:                    end},
17475:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred on)",
17476:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17477:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_on),
17478:                            ok
17479:                    end},
17480: 
17481:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 2)",
17482:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17483:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
17484:                    end},
17485:          #{desc => "send request 2 (to server)",
17486:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17487:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
17488:                    end},
17489:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 2)",
17490:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17491:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
17492:                            ok
17493:                    end},
17494:          #{desc => "await recv reply 2 (from server, w passcred)",
17495:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17496:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
17497:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17498:                                {ok, {[#{level := socket,
17499:                                         type  := passcred,
17500:                                         value := Cred}], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17501:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
17502:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received reply *with* "
17503:                                                "expected passcred: "
17504:                                                "~n   ~p", [Cred]),
17505:                                    ok;
17506:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17507:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
17508:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
17509:                                             BadCMsgs}};
17510:                                {ok, {[#{level := socket,
17511:                                         type  := passcred,
17512:                                         value := _Cred}], BadData}} ->
17513:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
17514:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data,
17515:                                             BadData}};
17516:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
17517:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
17518:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
17519:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17520:                                    %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
17521:                                    ERROR
17522:                            end
17523:                    end},
17524:          #{desc => "announce ready 2 (recv reply)",
17525:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17526:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
17527:                            ok
17528:                    end},
17529: 
17530:          %% *** Third message (wo passcred) ***
17531: 
17532:          #{desc => "await continue (disable passcred)",
17533:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17534:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, disable_passcred)
17535:                    end},
17536:          #{desc => "disable passcred",
17537:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, set := Set} = _State) ->
17538:                            case Set(Sock, false) of
17539:                                ok ->
17540:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("passcred disabled"),
17541:                                    ok;
17542:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
17543:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed disable timestamp:"
17544:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
17545:                                    ERROR
17546:                            end                                   
17547:                    end},
17548:          #{desc => "announce ready (passcred off)",
17549:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17550:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, passcred_off),
17551:                            ok
17552:                    end},
17553: 
17554:          #{desc => "await continue (send request 3)",
17555:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
17556:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_req)
17557:                    end},
17558:          #{desc => "send request 3 (to server)",
17559:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
17560:                            Send(Sock, ?BASIC_REQ)
17561:                    end},
17562:          #{desc => "announce ready (send request 3)",
17563:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17564:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_req),
17565:                            ok
17566:                    end},
17567:          #{desc => "await recv reply 3 (from server, wo passcred)",
17568:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, recv := Recv}) ->
17569:                            case Recv(Sock) of
17570:                                {ok, {[], ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17571:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received reply *without* "
17572:                                                "passcred"),
17573:                                    ok;
17574:                                {ok, {BadCMsgs, ?BASIC_REP}} ->
17575:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_cmsgs,
17576:                                             BadCMsgs}};
17577:                                {ok, {[], BadData}} ->
17578:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply_data,
17579:                                             BadData}};
17580:                                {ok, BadReply} ->
17581:                                    {error, {unexpected_reply, BadReply}};
17582:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17583:                                    ERROR
17584:                            end
17585:                    end},
17586:          #{desc => "announce ready 3 (recv reply)",
17587:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17588:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv_reply),
17589:                            ok
17590:                    end},
17591: 
17592:          %% *** Termination ***
17593:          #{desc => "await terminate",
17594:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
17595:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
17596:                                ok ->
17597:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
17598:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17599:                                    ERROR
17600:                            end
17601:                    end},
17602:          #{desc => "close socket",
17603:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
17604:                          sock     := Sock,
17605:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
17606:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17607:                            State1 =
17608:                                unlink_path(Path,
17609:                                            fun() ->
17610:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
17611:                                            end,
17612:                                            fun() -> State end),
17613:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
17614:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
17615:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
17616:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
17617:                    end},
17618: 
17619:          %% *** We are done ***
17620:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17621:         ],
17622: 
17623: 
17624:     TesterSeq =
17625:         [
17626:          %% *** Init part ***
17627:          #{desc => "monitor server",
17628:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
17629:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
17630:                            ok
17631:                    end},
17632:          #{desc => "monitor client",
17633:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
17634:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
17635:                            ok
17636:                    end},
17637: 
17638:          %% Start the server
17639:          #{desc => "order server start",
17640:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
17641:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
17642:                            ok
17643:                    end},
17644:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
17645:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
17646:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
17647:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
17648:                    end},
17649: 
17650:          %% Start the client
17651:          #{desc => "order client start",
17652:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
17653:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
17654:                            ok
17655:                    end},
17656:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
17657:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
17658:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
17659:                    end},
17660: 
17661:          %% *** The actual test ***
17662:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
17663:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17664:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
17665:                            ok
17666:                    end},
17667:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
17668:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
17669:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17670:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
17671:                            ok
17672:                    end},
17673:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
17674:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17675:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
17676:                    end},
17677:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
17678:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17679:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
17680:                    end},
17681: 
17682:          %% *** First message (default=wo passcred) ***
17683: 
17684:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with verify timestamp off)",
17685:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17686:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, verify_passcred),
17687:                            ok
17688:                    end},
17689:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred off)",
17690:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17691:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_off)
17692:                    end},
17693: 
17694:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 1)",
17695:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17696:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
17697:                            ok
17698:                    end},
17699:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 1)",
17700:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17701:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
17702:                    end},
17703:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 1)",
17704:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17705:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
17706:                    end},
17707:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply)",
17708:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17709:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
17710:                            ok
17711:                    end},
17712:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent)",
17713:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17714:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
17715:                    end},
17716:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv)",
17717:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17718:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
17719:                    end},
17720: 
17721:          %% Second message (w passcred)
17722: 
17723:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with enable passcred)",
17724:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17725:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, enable_passcred),
17726:                            ok
17727:                    end},
17728:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred on)",
17729:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17730:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_on)
17731:                    end},
17732: 
17733:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 2)",
17734:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17735:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
17736:                            ok
17737:                    end},
17738:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 2)",
17739:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17740:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
17741:                    end},
17742:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 2)",
17743:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17744:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
17745:                    end},
17746:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 2)",
17747:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17748:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
17749:                            ok
17750:                    end},
17751:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent 2)",
17752:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17753:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
17754:                    end},
17755:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv 2)",
17756:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17757:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
17758:                    end},
17759: 
17760:          %% Third message (wo passcred)
17761: 
17762:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with disable passcred)",
17763:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17764:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, disable_passcred),
17765:                            ok
17766:                    end},
17767:          #{desc => "await client ready (passcred off)",
17768:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17769:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, passcred_off)
17770:                    end},
17771: 
17772:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send request 3)",
17773:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17774:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_req),
17775:                            ok
17776:                    end},
17777:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send request 3)",
17778:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17779:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_req)
17780:                    end},
17781:          #{desc => "await server ready (request recv 3)",
17782:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17783:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv_req)
17784:                    end},
17785:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with send reply 3)",
17786:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17787:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, send_reply),
17788:                            ok
17789:                    end},
17790:          #{desc => "await server ready (with reply sent 3)",
17791:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17792:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, send_reply)
17793:                    end},
17794:          #{desc => "await client ready (reply recv 3)",
17795:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17796:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, recv_reply)
17797:                    end},
17798: 
17799: 
17800:          %% *** Termination ***
17801:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
17802:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
17803:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
17804:                            ok
17805:                    end},
17806:          #{desc => "await client termination",
17807:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
17808:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
17809:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
17810:                            {ok, State1}
17811:                    end},
17812:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
17813:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
17814:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
17815:                            ok
17816:                    end},
17817:          #{desc => "await server termination",
17818:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
17819:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
17820:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
17821:                            {ok, State1}
17822:                    end},
17823: 
17824:          %% *** We are done ***
17825:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
17826:         ],
17827: 
17828: 
17829:     i("start server evaluator"),
17830:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
17831: 
17832:     i("start client evaluator"),
17833:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
17834: 
17835:     i("start tester evaluator"),
17836:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
17837:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
17838:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
17839: 
17840:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
17841: 
17842: 
17843: 
17844: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
17845: 
17846: %% Tests the the peek-off socket option for a unix domain socket
17847: %% (stream TCP in this case).
17848: %%
17849: %% THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER!!
17850: %%
17851: %%
17852: 
17853: api_opt_sock_peek_off_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
17854:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
17855:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_peek_off_tcpL,
17856:            fun() ->
17857:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
17858:                    has_support_sock_peek_off(),
17859:                    has_support_msg_flag(peek)
17860:            end,
17861:            fun() ->
17862:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Val) when is_integer(Val) ->
17863:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, peek_off, Val)
17864:                           end,
17865:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
17866:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, peek_off)
17867:                           end,
17868:                    Send = fun(Sock, Data) ->
17869:                                   socket:send(Sock, Data)
17870:                           end,
17871:                    Recv = fun(Sock, L, false) ->
17872:                                   socket:recv(Sock, L);
17873:                              (Sock, L, true) ->
17874:                                   socket:recv(Sock, L, [peek])
17875:                           end,
17876:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
17877:                                  proto  => default, % Type = stream => tcp
17878:                                  set    => Set,
17879:                                  get    => Get,
17880:                                  send   => Send,
17881:                                  recv   => Recv},
17882:                    ok = api_opt_sock_peek_off(InitState)
17883:            end).
17884: 
17885: api_opt_sock_peek_off(InitState) ->
17886:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
17887:     ServerSeq = 
17888:         [
17889:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
17890:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
17891:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
17892:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
17893:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
17894:                    end},
17895:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
17896:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17897:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
17898:                            ok
17899:                    end},
17900: 
17901:          %% *** Init part ***
17902:          #{desc => "which local address",
17903:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
17904:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
17905:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
17906:                    end},
17907:          #{desc => "create listen socket",
17908:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
17909:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
17910:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
17911:                                {ok, Sock} ->
17912:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
17913:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17914:                                    ERROR
17915:                            end
17916:                    end},
17917:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
17918:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock,
17919:                          lsa   := LSA} = _State) ->
17920:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
17921:                                ok ->
17922:                                    %% We do not care about the port for local
17923:                                    ok;
17924:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17925:                                    ERROR
17926:                            end
17927:                    end},
17928:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
17929:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
17930:                            socket:listen(LSock)
17931:                    end},
17932:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
17933:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
17934:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
17935:                            ok
17936:                    end},
17937: 
17938:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
17939:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17940:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
17941:                    end},
17942:          #{desc => "await connection",
17943:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
17944:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
17945:                                {ok, Sock} ->
17946:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
17947:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
17948:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17949:                                    ERROR
17950:                            end
17951:                    end},
17952:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
17953:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17954:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
17955:                            ok
17956:                    end},
17957: 
17958: 
17959:          %% The actual test
17960: 
17961:          %% 1) peek (0 = everything: 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
17962:          #{desc => "1a: await continue (peek)",
17963:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17964:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peek)
17965:                    end},
17966:          #{desc => "1a: peek read",
17967:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
17968:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
17969:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, true) of
17970:                                {ok, <<1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8>>} ->
17971:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("peek'ed expected data"),
17972:                                    ok;
17973:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17974:                                    ERROR
17975:                            end
17976:                    end},
17977:          #{desc => "1a: announce ready (peek)",
17978:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17979:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peek),
17980:                            ok
17981:                    end},
17982: 
17983:          #{desc => "1b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
17984:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
17985:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
17986:                    end},
17987:          #{desc => "1b: verify peek-off",
17988:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
17989:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
17990:                            case Get(Sock) of
17991:                                {ok, DefaultPeekOff} ->
17992:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w",
17993:                                                [DefaultPeekOff]),
17994:                                    ok;
17995:                                {error, {not_supported, {socket, peek_off}}} ->
