17996:                                    {skip, "Not supported"};
17997:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
17998:                                    ERROR
17999:                            end
18000:                    end},
18001:          #{desc => "1b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
18002:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18003:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
18004:                            ok
18005:                    end},
18006: 
18007: 
18008:          %% 2) set peek-off to 4
18009:          #{desc => "2a: await continue (set peek-off: 4)",
18010:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18011:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, set_peek_off)
18012:                    end},
18013:          #{desc => "2a: set peek-off: 4",
18014:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18015:                          set   := Set} = _State) ->
18016:                            case Set(Sock, 4) of
18017:                                ok ->
18018:                                    ok;
18019:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18020:                                    ERROR
18021:                            end
18022:                    end},
18023:          #{desc => "2a: announce ready (set peek-off: 4)",
18024:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18025:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, set_peek_off),
18026:                            ok
18027:                    end},
18028: 
18029:          #{desc => "2b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
18030:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18031:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
18032:                    end},
18033:          #{desc => "2b: verify peek-off",
18034:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18035:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
18036:                            case Get(Sock) of
18037:                                {ok, 4 = PeekOff} ->
18038:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
18039:                                    ok;
18040:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18041:                                    ERROR
18042:                            end
18043:                    end},
18044:          #{desc => "2b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
18045:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18046:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
18047:                            ok
18048:                    end},
18049: 
18050: 
18051:          %% 3) peek (0 = everything: 5,6,7,8)
18052:          %%    NOTE THAT THIS WILL MOVE THE PEEK-OFF "POINTER" TO THE END OF 
18053:          %%    THE *CURRENT* DATA POSITION IN THE BUFFER (READY FOR NEXT BATCH
18054:          %%    OF DATA).
18055:          #{desc => "3a: await continue (peek)",
18056:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18057:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peek)
18058:                    end},
18059:          #{desc => "3a: peek read",
18060:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18061:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
18062:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, true) of
18063:                                {ok, <<5,6,7,8>>} ->
18064:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("peek'ed expected data"),
18065:                                    ok;
18066:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18067:                                    ERROR
18068:                            end
18069:                    end},
18070:          #{desc => "3a: announce ready (peek)",
18071:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18072:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peek),
18073:                            ok
18074:                    end},
18075: 
18076:          #{desc => "3b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
18077:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18078:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
18079:                    end},
18080:          #{desc => "3b: verify peek-off",
18081:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18082:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
18083:                            case Get(Sock) of
18084:                                {ok, 8 = PeekOff} ->
18085:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
18086:                                    ok;
18087:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18088:                                    ERROR
18089:                            end
18090:                    end},
18091:          #{desc => "3b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
18092:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18093:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
18094:                            ok
18095:                    end},
18096: 
18097: 
18098:          %% 4) read two byte(s): 1,2
18099:          #{desc => "4a: await continue (read 2 byte)",
18100:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18101:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, read)
18102:                    end},
18103:          #{desc => "4a: read (2 bytes)",
18104:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18105:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
18106:                            case Recv(Sock, 2, false) of
18107:                                {ok, <<1,2>>} ->
18108:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
18109:                                    ok;
18110:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18111:                                    ERROR
18112:                            end
18113:                    end},
18114:          #{desc => "4a: announce ready (read)",
18115:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18116:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, read),
18117:                            ok
18118:                    end},
18119: 
18120:          #{desc => "4b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
18121:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18122:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
18123:                    end},
18124:          #{desc => "4b: verify peek-off",
18125:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18126:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
18127:                            case Get(Sock) of
18128:                                {ok, 6 = PeekOff} ->
18129:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
18130:                                    ok;
18131:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18132:                                    ERROR
18133:                            end
18134:                    end},
18135:          #{desc => "4b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
18136:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18137:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
18138:                            ok
18139:                    end},
18140: 
18141: 
18142:          %% 5) read the rest: 3,4,5,6,7,8)
18143:          #{desc => "5a: await continue (read the rest)",
18144:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18145:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, read)
18146:                    end},
18147:          #{desc => "5a: read (the rest)",
18148:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18149:                          recv  := Recv} = _State) ->
18150:                            case Recv(Sock, 0, false) of
18151:                                {ok, <<3,4,5,6,7,8>>} ->
18152:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("read expected data"),
18153:                                    ok;
18154:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18155:                                    ERROR
18156:                            end
18157:                    end},
18158:          #{desc => "5a: announce ready (read)",
18159:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18160:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, read),
18161:                            ok
18162:                    end},
18163: 
18164:          #{desc => "5b: await continue (verify peek-off)",
18165:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18166:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, verify_peek_off)
18167:                    end},
18168:          #{desc => "5b: verify peek-off",
18169:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock,
18170:                          get   := Get} = _State) ->
18171:                            case Get(Sock) of
18172:                                {ok, PeekOff} ->
18173:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("verify peek-off: ~w", [PeekOff]),
18174:                                    ok;
18175:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18176:                                    ERROR
18177:                            end
18178:                    end},
18179:          #{desc => "5b: announce ready (verify peek-off)",
18180:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18181:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, verify_peek_off),
18182:                            ok
18183:                    end},
18184: 
18185: 
18186:          %% *** Termination ***
18187:          #{desc => "await terminate",
18188:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
18189:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
18190:                                ok ->
18191:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
18192:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18193:                                    ERROR
18194:                            end
18195:                    end},
18196:          #{desc => "close connection socket",
18197:            cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
18198:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
18199:                            {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
18200:                    end},
18201:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
18202:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := Sock,
18203:                          lsa   := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
18204:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
18205:                            State1 =
18206:                                unlink_path(Path,
18207:                                            fun() ->
18208:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
18209:                                            end,
18210:                                            fun() -> State end),
18211:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)}
18212:                    end},
18213: 
18214:          %% *** We are done ***
18215:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18216:         ],
18217: 
18218:     ClientSeq = 
18219:         [
18220:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
18221:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
18222:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
18223:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
18224:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}}
18225:                    end},
18226:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
18227:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18228:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
18229:                            ok
18230:                    end},
18231: 
18232:          %% *** The init part ***
18233:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
18234:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
18235:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
18236:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18237:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
18238:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
18239:                    end},
18240:          #{desc => "create socket",
18241:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
18242:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
18243:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
18244:                                {ok, Sock} ->
18245:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
18246:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18247:                                    ERROR
18248:                            end
18249:                    end},
18250:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
18251:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
18252:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
18253:                                ok ->
18254:                                    ok;
18255:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18256:                                    ERROR
18257:                            end
18258:                    end},
18259:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
18260:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18261:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
18262:                            ok
18263:                    end},
18264: 
18265:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
18266:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
18267:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
18268:                    end},
18269:          #{desc => "connect to server",
18270:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
18271:                            socket:connect(Sock, SSA)
18272:                    end},
18273:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
18274:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18275:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
18276:                            ok
18277:                    end},
18278: 
18279: 
18280:          %% *** The actual test ***
18281:          #{desc => "await continue (send data)",
18282:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
18283:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, send_data)
18284:                    end},
18285:          #{desc => "send data (to server)",
18286:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, send := Send}) ->
18287:                            Send(Sock, <<1:8/integer,
18288:                                         2:8/integer,
18289:                                         3:8/integer,
18290:                                         4:8/integer,
18291:                                         5:8/integer,
18292:                                         6:8/integer,
18293:                                         7:8/integer,
18294:                                         8:8/integer>>)
18295:                    end},
18296:          #{desc => "announce ready (send data)",
18297:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18298:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send_data),
18299:                            ok
18300:                    end},
18301: 
18302:          %% *** Termination ***
18303:          #{desc => "await terminate",
18304:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
18305:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
18306:                                ok ->
18307:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
18308:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
18309:                                    ERROR
18310:                            end
18311:                    end},
18312:          #{desc => "close socket",
18313:            cmd  => fun(#{sock     := Sock,
18314:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
18315:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
18316:                            State1 =
18317:                                unlink_path(Path,
18318:                                            fun() ->
18319:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
18320:                                            end,
18321:                                            fun() -> State end),
18322:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)}
18323:                    end},
18324: 
18325:          %% *** We are done ***
18326:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18327:         ],
18328: 
18329:     TesterSeq =
18330:         [
18331:          %% *** Init part ***
18332:          #{desc => "monitor server",
18333:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
18334:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
18335:                            ok
18336:                    end},
18337:          #{desc => "monitor client",
18338:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
18339:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
18340:                            ok
18341:                    end},
18342: 
18343:          %% Start the server
18344:          #{desc => "order server start",
18345:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
18346:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
18347:                            ok
18348:                    end},
18349:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
18350:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
18351:                            {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
18352:                            {ok, State#{server_port => Port}}
18353:                    end},
18354: 
18355:          %% Start the client
18356:          #{desc => "order client start",
18357:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid, server_port := Port} = _State) ->
18358:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Port),
18359:                            ok
18360:                    end},
18361:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
18362:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
18363:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
18364:                    end},
18365: 
18366:          %% Establish the connection
18367:          #{desc => "order server to continue (with accept)",
18368:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18369:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, accept),
18370:                            ok
18371:                    end},
18372:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with connect)",
18373:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18374:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect),
18375:                            ok
18376:                    end},
18377:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
18378:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18379:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect)
18380:                    end},
18381:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
18382:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18383:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept)
18384:                    end},
18385: 
18386: 
18387:          %% *** The actual test ***
18388:          #{desc => "order client to continue (with send data)",
18389:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18390:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, send_data),
18391:                            ok
18392:                    end},
18393:          #{desc => "await client ready (with send data)",
18394:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18395:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send_data)
18396:                    end},
18397: 
18398:          %% There is no way to be sure that the data has actually arrived,
18399:          %% and with no data on the server side, the peek will fail.
18400:          %% Hopefully a sleep will take care of this...
18401:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
18402: 
18403:          %% 1) peek
18404:          #{desc => "1a: order server to continue (peek)",
18405:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18406:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, peek),
18407:                            ok
18408:                    end},
18409:          #{desc => "1a: await server ready (peek)",
18410:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18411:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peek)
18412:                    end},
18413: 
18414:          #{desc => "1b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
18415:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18416:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
18417:                            ok
18418:                    end},
18419:          #{desc => "1b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
18420:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18421:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
18422:                    end},
18423: 
18424: 
18425:          %% 2) set peek-off
18426:          #{desc => "2a: order server to continue (set peek-off)",
18427:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18428:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, set_peek_off),
18429:                            ok
18430:                    end},
18431:          #{desc => "2a: await server ready (set peek-off)",
18432:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18433:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, set_peek_off)
18434:                    end},
18435: 
18436:          #{desc => "2b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
18437:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18438:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
18439:                            ok
18440:                    end},
18441:          #{desc => "2b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
18442:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18443:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
18444:                    end},
18445: 
18446: 
18447: 
18448:          %% 3) peek
18449:          #{desc => "3a: order server to continue (peek)",
18450:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18451:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, peek),
18452:                            ok
18453:                    end},
18454:          #{desc => "3a: await server ready (peek)",
18455:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18456:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peek)
18457:                    end},
18458: 
18459:          #{desc => "3b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
18460:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18461:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
18462:                            ok
18463:                    end},
18464:          #{desc => "3b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
18465:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18466:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
18467:                    end},
18468: 
18469: 
18470: 
18471:          %% 4) read part
18472:          #{desc => "4a: order server to continue (read part)",
18473:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18474:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, read),
18475:                            ok
18476:                    end},
18477:          #{desc => "4a: await server ready (peek)",
18478:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18479:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, read)
18480:                    end},
18481: 
18482:          #{desc => "4b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
18483:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18484:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
18485:                            ok
18486:                    end},
18487:          #{desc => "4b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
18488:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18489:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
18490:                    end},
18491: 
18492: 
18493:          %% 5) read (the rest)
18494:          #{desc => "5a: order server to continue (read the rest)",
18495:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18496:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, read),
18497:                            ok
18498:                    end},
18499:          #{desc => "5a: await server ready (peek)",
18500:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18501:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, read)
18502:                    end},
18503: 
18504:          #{desc => "5b: order server to continue (verify peek-off)",
18505:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18506:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Server, verify_peek_off),
18507:                            ok
18508:                    end},
18509:          #{desc => "5b: await server ready (verify peek-off)",
18510:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18511:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, verify_peek_off)
18512:                    end},
18513: 
18514: 
18515:          %% *** Termination ***
18516:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
18517:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18518:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
18519:                            ok
18520:                    end},
18521:          #{desc => "await client termination",
18522:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
18523:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
18524:                            State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
18525:                            {ok, State1}
18526:                    end},
18527:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
18528:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18529:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
18530:                            ok
18531:                    end},
18532:          #{desc => "await server termination",
18533:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
18534:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
18535:                            State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
18536:                            {ok, State1}
18537:                    end},
18538: 
18539:          %% *** We are done ***
18540:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18541:         ],
18542: 
18543:     i("start server evaluator"),
18544:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, InitState),
18545: 
18546:     i("start client evaluator"),
18547:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, InitState),
18548:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
18549: 
18550:     i("start tester evaluator"),
18551:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
18552:                         client => Client#ev.pid},
18553:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
18554: 
18555:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
18556: 
18557: 
18558: 
18559: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
18560: 
18561: %% Tests that we get the peer credentials for a connected unix domain
18562: %% TCP (stream) socket.
18563: %% That is, all we need to do is to create a node, and have 
18564: %% process connect from that to a local (unix domain socket) socket.
18565: %%
18566: %% THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER!!
18567: %%
18568: %% We need to figure out what the ucred structure looks like,
18569: %% and decode it...
18570: %%
18571: 
18572: api_opt_sock_peercred_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
18573:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
18574:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_peercred_tcpL,
18575:            fun() ->
18576:                    has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
18577:                    has_support_sock_peercred(),
18578:                    not_yet_implemented()
18579:            end,
18580:            fun() ->
18581:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
18582:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, peercred)
18583:                           end,
18584:                    InitState = #{domain => local,
18585:                                  proto  => default, % Type = stream => tcp
18586:                                  get    => Get},
18587:                    ok = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp(InitState)
18588:            end).
18589: 
18590: 
18591: api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp(_InitState) ->
18592:     %% ServerSeq =
18593:     %%     [
18594:     %%      %% *** Wait for start order part ***
18595:     %%      #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
18596:     %%        cmd  => fun(State) ->
18597:     %%                        {Tester, Backlog} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
18598:     %%                        {ok, State#{tester  => Tester,
18599:     %%                                    backlog => Backlog}}
18600:     %%                end},
18601:     %%      #{desc => "monitor tester",
18602:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
18603:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
18604:     %%                        ok
18605:     %%                end},
18606: 
18607:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
18608:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
18609:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
18610:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18611:     %%                        {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
18612:     %%                end},
18613:     %%      #{desc => "create listen socket",
18614:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
18615:     %%                        case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
18616:     %%                            {ok, Sock} ->
18617:     %%                                {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
18618:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18619:     %%                                ERROR
18620:     %%                        end
18621:     %%                end},
18622:     %%      #{desc => "bind to local address",
18623:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
18624:     %%                      lsock  := LSock,
18625:     %%                      lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
18626:     %%                        case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
18627:     %%                            ok ->
18628:     %%                                ok;
18629:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18630:     %%                                ERROR
18631:     %%                        end
18632:     %%                end},
18633:     %%      #{desc => "make listen socket",
18634:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
18635:     %%                        socket:listen(LSock)
18636:     %%                end},
18637:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
18638:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
18639:     %%                      tester := Tester, lsa := #{path := Path}}) ->
18640:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
18641:     %%                        ok
18642:     %%                end},
18643: 
18644: 
18645:     %%      %% The actual test
18646:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
18647:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18648:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
18649:     %%                end},
18650:     %%      #{desc => "await connection",
18651:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
18652:     %%                        case socket:accept(LSock) of
18653:     %%                            {ok, Sock} ->
18654:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("accepted: ~n   ~p", [Sock]),
18655:     %%                                {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
18656:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18657:     %%                                ERROR
18658:     %%                        end
18659:     %%                end},
18660:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
18661:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18662:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
18663:     %%                        ok
18664:     %%                end},
18665: 
18666:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (peercred)",
18667:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18668:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, peercred)
18669:     %%                end},
18670:     %%      #{desc => "get peercred",
18671:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock, get := Get} = _State) ->
18672:     %%                        case Get(Sock) of
18673:     %%                            {ok, PeerCred} ->
18674:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("PeerCred: ~n   ~p", [PeerCred]),
18675:     %%                                ok;
18676:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18677:     %%                                ERROR
18678:     %%                        end
18679:     %%                end},
18680:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (peercred)",
18681:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18682:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, peercred),
18683:     %%                        ok
18684:     %%                end},
18685: 
18686: 
18687:     %%      %% Termination
18688:     %%      #{desc => "await terminate",
18689:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
18690:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
18691:     %%                            ok ->
18692:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
18693:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18694:     %%                                ERROR
18695:     %%                        end
18696:     %%                end},
18697:     %%      #{desc => "close connection socket",
18698:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{csock := Sock} = State) ->
18699:     %%                        ok = socket:close(Sock),
18700:     %%                        {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)}
18701:     %%                end},
18702:     %%      #{desc => "close listen socket",
18703:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
18704:     %%                      lsock  := Sock,
18705:     %%                      lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
18706:     %%                        ok = socket:close(Sock),
18707:     %%                        State1 =
18708:     %%                            unlink_path(Path,
18709:     %%                                        fun() ->
18710:     %%                                                maps:remove(lsa, State)
18711:     %%                                        end,
18712:     %%                                        fun() -> State end),
18713:     %%                        {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)}
18714:     %%                end},
18715: 
18716:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
18717:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18718:     %%     ],
18719: 
18720: 
18721:     %% ClientSeq =
18722:     %%     [
18723:     %%      %% *** Wait for start order part ***
18724:     %%      #{desc => "await start",
18725:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
18726:     %%                        {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
18727:     %%                        {ok, State#{tester    => Tester,
18728:     %%                                    server_path => Path}}
18729:     %%                end},
18730:     %%      #{desc => "monitor tester",
18731:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
18732:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
18733:     %%                        ok
18734:     %%                end},
18735: 
18736: 
18737:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
18738:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
18739:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
18740:     %%                      server_path := Path} = State) ->
18741:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18742:     %%                        SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
18743:     %%                        {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
18744:     %%                end},
18745:     %%      #{desc => "create node",
18746:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{host := Host} = State) ->
18747:     %%     		   ?SEV_IPRINT("try create node on ~p", [Host]),
18748:     %%                        case ?CT_PEER() of
18749:     %%                            {ok, Peer, Node} ->
18750:     %%                                ?SEV_IPRINT("client node ~p started",
18751:     %%                                            [Node]),
18752:     %%                                {ok, State#{node => Node, peer => Peer}};
18753:     %%                            {error, Reason} ->
18754:     %%                                {skip, Reason}
18755:     %%                        end
18756:     %%                end},
18757:     %%       #{desc => "monitor client node",
18758:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
18759:     %%                        true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
18760:     %%                        ok
18761:     %%                end},
18762:     %%      #{desc => "start remote client on client node",
18763:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
18764:     %%                        Pid = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_start(Node),
18765:     %%                        ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client ~p started", [Pid]),
18766:     %%                        {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
18767:     %%                end},
18768:     %%      #{desc => "monitor remote client",
18769:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
18770:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
18771:     %%                        ok
18772:     %%                end},
18773:     %%      #{desc => "order remote client to start",
18774:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := Client,
18775:     %%                     proto      := Proto,
18776:     %%                      server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
18777:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, {Proto, ServerSA}),
18778:     %%                        ok
18779:     %%                end},
18780:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client ready",
18781:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
18782:     %%                      rclient := Client} = _State) ->
18783:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, rclient, init,
18784:     %%                                         [{tester, Tester}])
18785:     %%                end},
18786:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
18787:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18788:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
18789:     %%                        ok
18790:     %%                end},
18791: 
18792: 
18793:     %%      %% The actual test
18794:     %%      #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
18795:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
18796:     %%                      rclient := Client} = State) ->
18797:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect,
18798:     %%                                                 [{rclient, Client}]) of
18799:     %%                            {ok, {ConTimeout, ConLimit}} ->
18800:     %%                                {ok, State#{connect_timeout => ConTimeout,
18801:     %%                                            connect_limit   => ConLimit}};
18802:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18803:     %%                                ERROR
18804:     %%                        end
18805:     %%                end},
18806:     %%      #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
18807:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient         := RClient,
18808:     %%                      connect_timeout := ConTimeout,
18809:     %%                      connect_limit   := ConLimit}) ->
18810:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect,
18811:     %%                                               {ConTimeout, ConLimit}),
18812:     %%                        ok
18813:     %%                end},
18814:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
18815:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
18816:     %%                      rclient := RClient} = State) ->
18817:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect,
18818:     %%                                              [{tester, Tester}]) of
18819:     %%                            {ok, ok = _Result} ->
18820:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(connect_limit, State)};
18821:     %%                            {ok, {error, {connect_limit_reached,R,L}}} ->
18822:     %%                                {skip,
18823:     %%                                 ?LIB:f("Connect limit reached ~w: ~w",
18824:     %%                                        [L, R])};
18825:     %%                            {ok, Result} ->
18826:     %%                                Result;
18827:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18828:     %%                                ERROR
18829:     %%                        end
18830:     %%                end},
18831:     %%      #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
18832:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
18833:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
18834:     %%                        ok
18835:     %%                end},
18836: 
18837:     %%      %% Termination
18838:     %%      #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
18839:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
18840:     %%                      rclient := RClient} = State) ->
18841:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
18842:     %%                                                  [{rclient, RClient}]) of
18843:     %%                            ok ->
18844:     %%                                {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
18845:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18846:     %%                                ERROR
18847:     %%                        end
18848:     %%                end},
18849:     %%      #{desc => "kill remote client",
18850:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client}) ->
18851:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
18852:     %%                        ok
18853:     %%                end},
18854:     %%      #{desc => "await remote client termination",
18855:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Client} = State) ->
18856:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
18857:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
18858:     %%                        {ok, State1}
18859:     %%                end},
18860:     %%      #{desc => "stop client node",
18861:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = _State) ->
18862:     %%                        peer:stop(Peer)
18863:     %%                end},
18864:     %%      #{desc => "await client node termination",
18865:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
18866:     %%                        receive
18867:     %%                            {nodedown, Node} ->
18868:     %%                                State1 = maps:remove(node_id, State),
18869:     %%                                State2 = maps:remove(node,    State1),
18870:     %%                                {ok, State2}
18871:     %%                        end
18872:     %%                end},
18873: 
18874:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
18875:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18876:     %%    ],
18877: 
18878:     %% TesterSeq =
18879:     %%     [
18880:     %%      %% *** Init part ***
18881:     %%      #{desc => "monitor server",
18882:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18883:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Server),
18884:     %%                        ok
18885:     %%                end},
18886:     %%      #{desc => "monitor client",
18887:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18888:     %%                        _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Client),
18889:     %%                        ok
18890:     %%                end},
18891:     %%      #{desc => "which local address",
18892:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
18893:     %%                        LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
18894:     %%                        {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
18895:     %%                end},
18896:     %%      #{desc => "order server start",
18897:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server  := Server,
18898:     %%                      backlog := Backlog}) ->
18899:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Server, Backlog),
18900:     %%                        ok
18901:     %%                end},
18902:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
18903:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
18904:     %%                        {ok, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, init),
18905:     %%                        ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
18906:     %%                        {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
18907:     %%                end},
18908:     %%      #{desc => "order client start",
18909:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client    := Client,
18910:     %%                      server_sa := ServerSA}) ->
18911:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Client, ServerSA),
18912:     %%                        ok
18913:     %%                end},
18914:     %%      #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
18915:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18916:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init),
18917:     %%                        ok
18918:     %%                end},
18919: 
18920: 
18921:     %%      %% The actual test
18922:     %%      %% The server accepts the connect from the client, announces
18923:     %%      %% this to us (accept) and then attempts to get peercred.
18924:     %%      #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
18925:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client        := Client,
18926:     %%                      timeout       := Timeout,
18927:     %%                      connect_limit := ConLimit} = _State) ->
18928:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, connect,
18929:     %%                                               {Timeout, ConLimit}),
18930:     %%                        ok
18931:     %%                end},
18932:     %%      #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
18933:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
18934:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
18935:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect,
18936:     %%                                              [{server, Server}]) of
18937:     %%                            ok ->
18938:     %%                                ok;
18939:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18940:     %%                                ERROR
18941:     %%                        end
18942:     %%                end},
18943:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
18944:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
18945:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
18946:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
18947:     %%                                              [{client, Client}]) of
18948:     %%                            ok ->
18949:     %%                                ok;
18950:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18951:     %%                                ERROR
18952:     %%                        end
18953:     %%                end},
18954:     %%      #{desc => "await server ready (peercred)",
18955:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
18956:     %%                      client := Client} = _State) ->
18957:     %%                        case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, peercred,
18958:     %%                                              [{client, Client}]) of
18959:     %%                            ok ->
18960:     %%                                ok;
18961:     %%                            {error, _} = ERROR ->
18962:     %%                                ERROR
18963:     %%                        end
18964:     %%                end},
18965: 
18966: 
18967:     %%      %% *** Terminate server ***
18968:     %%      #{desc => "order client terminate",
18969:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
18970:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
18971:     %%                        ok
18972:     %%                end},
18973:     %%      #{desc => "await client down",
18974:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
18975:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
18976:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
18977:     %%                        {ok, State1}
18978:     %%                end},
18979:     %%      #{desc => "order server terminate",
18980:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
18981:     %%                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
18982:     %%                        ok
18983:     %%                end},
18984:     %%      #{desc => "await server down",
18985:     %%        cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = State) ->
18986:     %%                        ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
18987:     %%                        State1 = maps:remove(server,    State),
18988:     %%                        State2 = maps:remove(server_sa, State1),
18989:     %%                        {ok, State2}
18990:     %%                end},
18991: 
18992:     %%      %% *** We are done ***
18993:     %%      ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
18994:     %%     ],
18995: 
18996:     %% i("create server evaluator"),
18997:     %% ServerInitState = #{domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
18998:     %% Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
18999: 
19000:     %% i("create client evaluator"),
19001:     %% ClientInitState = #{host   => local_host(),
19002:     %%                     domain => maps:get(domain, InitState)},
19003:     %% Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
19004: 
19005:     %% i("create tester evaluator"),
19006:     %% TesterInitState = InitState#{server => Server#ev.pid,
19007:     %%                              client => Client#ev.pid},
19008:     %% Tester          = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
19009: 
19010:     %% i("await evaluator(s)"),
19011:     %% ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
19012: 
19013: 
19014:     %% This should actually never be called (the conditions should cause a skip),
19015:     %% but just to be on the safe side...
19016:     skip.
19017: 
19018: 
19019: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_start(Node) ->
19020: %%     Self = self(),
19021: %%     Fun  = fun() -> api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client(Self) end,
19022: %%     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
19023: 
19024: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client(Parent) ->
19025: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_init(Parent),
19026: %%     {Proto, ServerSA} = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
19027: %%     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
19028: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
19029: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
19030: %%     Result = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_connect(Domain, Proto, ServerSA),
19031: %%     ?SEV_IPRINT("result: ~p", [Result]),
19032: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect, Result),
19033: %%     Reason = api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
19034: %%     api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close(Result),
19035: %%     exit(Reason).
19036: 
19037: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
19038: %%     put(sname, "rclient"),
19039: %%     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
19040: %%     ok.
19041: 
19042: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
19043: %%     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
19044: 
19045: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
19046: %%     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
19047: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Result) ->
19048: %%     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Result).
19049: 
19050: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
19051: %%     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
19052: %%         ok ->
19053: %%             ok;
19054: %%         {ok, Extra} ->
19055: %%             Extra;
19056: %%         {error, Reason} ->
19057: %%             exit({await_continue, Slogan, Reason})
19058: %%     end.
19059: 
19060: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
19061: %%     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
19062: %%         ok ->
19063: %%             ok;
19064: %%         {error, Reason} ->
19065: %%             Reason
19066: %%     end.
19067: 
19068: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_connect(Domain, Proto, ServerSA) ->
19069: %%     LSA  = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
19070: %%     Sock = case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
19071: %%                {ok, S} ->
19072: %%                    S;
19073: %%                {error, OReason} ->
19074: %%                    ?FAIL({open, OReason})
19075: %%            end,
19076: %%     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
19077: %%         ok ->
19078: %%             ok;
19079: %%         {error, BReason} ->
19080: %%             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
19081: %%             ?FAIL({bind, BReason})
19082: %%     end,
19083: %%     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
19084: %%         ok ->
19085: %%             {ok, Sock};
19086: %%         {error, Reason} ->
19087: %%             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
19088: %%             ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
19089: %%     end.
19090: 
19091: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close({ok, Sock}) ->
19092: %%     (catch socket:close(Sock));
19093: %% api_opt_sock_peercred_tcp_client_close(_) ->
19094: %%     ok.
19095: 
19096: 
19097: 
19098: 
19099: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19100: 
19101: %% Tests the 'PRIORITY' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19102: %%
19103: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, integer()).
19104: %%
19105: %%
19106: 
19107: api_opt_sock_priority_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19108:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19109:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_priority_udp4,
19110:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_priority() end,
19111:            fun() ->
19112:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
19113:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, Value)
19114:                           end,
19115:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
19116:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, priority)
19117:                           end,
19118:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
19119:                                  type   => dgram,
19120:                                  proto  => udp,
19121:                                  set    => Set,
19122:                                  get    => Get},
19123:                    ok = api_opt_sock_priority(InitState)
19124:            end).
19125: 
19126: 
19127: 
19128: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19129: 
19130: %% Tests the 'PRIORITY' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 TCP:
19131: %%
19132: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, integer()).
19133: %%
19134: %%
19135: 
19136: api_opt_sock_priority_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19137:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19138:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_priority_tcp4,
19139:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_priority() end,
19140:            fun() ->
19141:                    Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
19142:                                   socket:setopt(Sock, socket, priority, Value)
19143:                           end,
19144:                    Get  = fun(Sock) ->
19145:                                   socket:getopt(Sock, socket, priority)
19146:                           end,
19147:                    InitState = #{domain => inet,
19148:                                  type   => stream,
19149:                                  proto  => tcp,
19150:                                  set    => Set,
19151:                                  get    => Get},
19152:                    ok = api_opt_sock_priority(InitState)
19153:            end).
19154: 
19155: 
19156: 
19157: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19158: 
19159: api_opt_sock_priority(InitState) ->
19160:     Seq = 
19161:         [
19162:          #{desc => "local address",
19163:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
19164:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
19165:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
19166:                    end},
19167: 
19168:          #{desc => "open socket",
19169:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
19170:                          type   := Type,
19171:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
19172:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
19173:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
19174:                    end},
19175:          #{desc => "bind",
19176:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
19177:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
19178:                                ok ->
19179:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
19180:                                    ok;
19181:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19182:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
19183:                                    ERROR
19184:                            end
19185:                    end},
19186:          #{desc => "get current (default) priority",
19187:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
19188:                            case Get(Sock) of
19189:                                {ok, Prio} ->
19190:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) priority: ~p",
19191:                                                [Prio]),
19192:                                    {ok, State#{default => Prio}};
19193:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19194:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) "
19195:                                                "priority:"
19196:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19197:                                    ERROR
19198:                            end
19199:                    end},
19200: 
19201:          #{desc => "change priority (to within non-root range)",
19202:            cmd  => fun(#{sock    := Sock,
19203:                          default := DefaultPrio,
19204:                          set     := Set} = _State) ->
19205:                            NewPrio =
19206:                                if
19207:                                    (DefaultPrio =< 0) andalso
19208:                                    (DefaultPrio < 6) ->
19209:                                        DefaultPrio+1;
19210:                                    (DefaultPrio =:= 6) ->
19211:                                        DefaultPrio-1;
19212:                                    true ->
19213:                                        3 % ...
19214:                                end,
19215:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new priority (to ~p)",
19216:                                        [NewPrio]),
19217:                            case Set(Sock, NewPrio) of
19218:                                ok ->
19219:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority changed (to ~p)",
19220:                                                [NewPrio]),
19221:                                    ok;
19222:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19223:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting timestamp:"
19224:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19225:                                    ERROR
19226:                            end
19227:                    end},
19228: 
19229:          #{desc => "change priority (to outside root-range)",
19230:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
19231:                          set  := Set} = _State) ->
19232:                            NewPrio = 42,
19233:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new priority (to ~p)",
19234:                                        [NewPrio]),
19235:                            case Set(Sock, NewPrio) of
19236:                                ok ->
19237:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority changed (to ~p)",
19238:                                                [NewPrio]),
19239:                                    ok;
19240:                                {error, eperm} ->
19241:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("priority change not allowed"),
19242:                                    ok;
19243:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19244:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed setting timestamp:"
19245:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19246:                                    ERROR
19247:                            end
19248:                    end},
19249: 
19250:          #{desc => "close socket",
19251:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
19252:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
19253:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
19254:                    end},
19255: 
19256:          %% *** We are done ***
19257:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
19258:         ],
19259:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
19260:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
19261: 
19262: 
19263: 
19264: 
19265: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19266: 
19267: %% Tests the 'SNDBUF' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19268: %%
19269: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, integer()).
19270: %%
19271: %%
19272: 
19273: api_opt_sock_rcvbuf_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19274:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19275:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvbuf_udp4,
19276:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_rcvbuf() end,
19277:            fun() ->
19278:                    ok = api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(rcvbuf)
19279:            end).
19280: 
19281: 
19282: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19283: 
19284: %% Tests the 'RCVBUF' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19285: %%
19286: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, integer()).
19287: %%
19288: %%
19289: 
19290: api_opt_sock_sndbuf_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19291:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19292:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndbuf_udp4,
19293:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_sndbuf() end,
19294:            fun() ->
19295:                    ok = api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(sndbuf)
19296:            end).
19297: 
19298: 
19299: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19300: 
19301: api_opt_sock_buf_udp4(Opt) ->
19302:     Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
19303:                    socket:setopt(Sock, socket, Opt, Value)
19304:            end,
19305:     Get  = fun(Sock) ->
19306:                    socket:getopt(Sock, socket, Opt)
19307:            end,
19308:     InitState = #{domain => inet,
19309:                   type   => dgram,
19310:                   proto  => udp,
19311:                   set    => Set,
19312:                   get    => Get},
19313:     ok = api_opt_sock_buf(InitState).
19314: 
19315: 
19316: api_opt_sock_buf(InitState) ->
19317:     Seq = 
19318:         [
19319:          #{desc => "local address",
19320:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
19321:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
19322:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
19323:                    end},
19324: 
19325:          #{desc => "open socket",
19326:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
19327:                          type   := Type,
19328:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
19329:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
19330:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
19331:                    end},
19332:          #{desc => "bind",
19333:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
19334:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
19335:                                ok ->
19336:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
19337:                                    ok;
19338:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19339:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
19340:                                    ERROR
19341:                            end
19342:                    end},
19343:          #{desc => "get current (default) buffer size",
19344:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
19345:                            case Get(Sock) of
19346:                                {ok, Sz} ->
19347:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) buffer: ~p",
19348:                                                [Sz]),
19349:                                    {ok, State#{default_sz => Sz}};
19350:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19351:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) "
19352:                                                "buffer size:"
19353:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19354:                                    ERROR
19355:                            end
19356:                    end},
19357: 
19358:          #{desc => "change buffer size (default + 1024)",
19359:            cmd  => fun(#{sock       := Sock,
19360:                          default_sz := DefaultSz,
19361:                          set        := Set} = State) ->
19362:                            NewSz = DefaultSz + 1024,
19363:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new buffer size to ~w", [NewSz]),
19364:                            case Set(Sock, NewSz) of
19365:                                ok ->
19366:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Buffer size change success", []),
19367:                                    {ok, State#{new_sz => NewSz}};
19368:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19369:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed changing buffer size:"
19370:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19371:                                    ERROR
19372:                            end
19373:                    end},
19374: 
19375:          #{desc => "validate buffer change",
19376:            cmd  => fun(#{sock   := Sock,
19377:                          get    := Get,
19378:                          new_sz := ExpSz} = _State) ->
19379:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try validate buffer size (~w)", [ExpSz]),
19380:                            case Get(Sock) of
19381:                                {ok, Sz} when (Sz >= ExpSz) ->
19382:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("buffer size validated:"
19383:                                                "~n   Sz: ~w (~w)", [Sz, ExpSz]),
19384:                                    ok;
19385:                                {ok, Sz} ->
19386:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("buffer size invalid:"
19387:                                                "~n   Sz:          ~w"
19388:                                                "~n   Expected Sz: ~w", [Sz, ExpSz]),
19389:                                    {error, {invalid_size, Sz, ExpSz}};
19390:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19391:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get buffer size:"
19392:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19393:                                    ERROR
19394:                            end
19395:                    end},
19396: 
19397:          #{desc => "close socket",
19398:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
19399:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
19400:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
19401:                    end},
19402: 
19403:          %% *** We are done ***
19404:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
19405:         ],
19406:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
19407:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
19408: 
19409: 
19410: 
19411: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19412: 
19413: %% Tests the 'RCVTIMEO' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19414: %%
19415: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvtimeo, #{sec  => integer(),
19416: %%                                                       usec => integer()}).
19417: %%
19418: %% We should really test that the receive behaves as expected,
19419: %% but we don't (we just set the value and read it back...)
19420: %%
19421: 
19422: api_opt_sock_rcvtimeo_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19423:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19424:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvtimeo_udp4,
19425:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_rcvtimeo() end,
19426:            fun() ->
19427:                    ok = api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(rcvtimeo)
19428:            end).
19429: 
19430: 
19431: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19432: 
19433: %% Tests the 'SNDTIMEO' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19434: %%
19435: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndtimeo, integer()).
19436: %%
19437: %%
19438: 
19439: api_opt_sock_sndtimeo_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19440:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19441:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndtimeo_udp4,
19442:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4(), has_support_sock_sndtimeo() end,
19443:            fun() ->
19444:                    ok = api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(sndtimeo)
19445:            end).
19446: 
19447: 
19448: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19449: 
19450: api_opt_sock_timeo_udp4(Opt) ->
19451:     Set  = fun(Sock, Value) ->
19452:                    socket:setopt(Sock, socket, Opt, Value)
19453:            end,
19454:     Get  = fun(Sock) ->
19455:                    socket:getopt(Sock, socket, Opt)
19456:            end,
19457:     InitState = #{domain => inet,
19458:                   type   => dgram,
19459:                   proto  => udp,
19460: 		  opt   => Opt,
19461:                   set    => Set,
19462:                   get    => Get},
19463:     ok = api_opt_sock_timeo(InitState).
19464: 
19465: 
19466: api_opt_sock_timeo(InitState) ->
19467:     Seq = 
19468:         [
19469:          #{desc => "local address",
19470:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
19471:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
19472:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
19473:                    end},
19474: 
19475:          #{desc => "open socket",
19476:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain,
19477:                          type   := Type,
19478:                          proto  := Proto} = State) ->
19479:                            Sock = sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto),
19480:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
19481:                    end},
19482:          #{desc => "bind",
19483:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA}) ->
19484:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
19485:                                ok ->
19486:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("bound"),
19487:                                    ok;
19488:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19489:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bind failed: ~p", [Reason]),
19490:                                    ERROR
19491:                            end
19492:                    end},
19493:          #{desc => "get current (default) timeout",
19494:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, get := Get} = State) ->
19495:                            case Get(Sock) of
19496:                                {ok, #{sec := _, usec := _} = TO} ->
19497:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("(default) timeout: ~p", [TO]),
19498:                                    {ok, State#{default_timeo => TO}};
19499:                                {error, enoprotoopt = Reason} ->
19500:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed getting (default) timeout:"
19501:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19502:                                    {skip, Reason};
19503:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19504:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed getting (default) timeout:"
19505:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19506:                                    ERROR
19507:                            end
19508:                    end},
19509: 
19510:          #{desc => "change timeout",
19511:            cmd  => fun(#{sock          := Sock,
19512:                          default_timeo := #{sec := DefaultSec} = DefaultTO,
19513:                          set           := Set} = State) ->
19514:                            NewTO = DefaultTO#{sec => DefaultSec + 100},
19515:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try set new timeout to ~w", [NewTO]),
19516:                            case Set(Sock, NewTO) of
19517:                                ok ->
19518:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Timeout change success", []),
19519:                                    {ok, State#{new_timeo => NewTO}};
19520:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19521:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed changing timeout:"
19522:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19523:                                    ERROR
19524:                            end
19525:                    end},
19526: 
19527:          #{desc => "validate timeout change",
19528:            cmd  => fun(#{sock      := Sock,
19529:                          get       := Get,
19530:                          new_timeo := #{sec := ExpSec} = ExpTO} = _State) ->
19531:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("try validate timeout (~w)", [ExpTO]),
19532:                            case Get(Sock) of
19533:                                {ok, ExpTO} ->
19534:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("timeout (exactly) validated"),
19535:                                    ok;
19536:                                {ok, #{sec := Sec}} when (ExpSec =:= Sec) ->
19537: 				   %% For some reason OpenBSD "adjusts" the timeout,
19538: 				   %% so that usec does not (always match)
19539:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("timeout (approx) validated"),
19540:                                    ok;
19541:                                {ok, TO} ->
19542:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("timeout invalid:"
19543:                                                "~n   Timeout:          ~w"
19544:                                                "~n   Expected Timeout: ~w",
19545:                                                [TO, ExpTO]),
19546:                                    {error, {invalid_timeo, TO, ExpTO}};
19547:                                {error, edom = Reason} ->
19548: 				   %% On OpenBSD (at least) its possible that if the value
19549: 				   %% is too far "out of bounds", this will be the result:
19550: 				   %%
19551: 				   %%     "Numerical argument out of domain"
19552: 				   %%
19553:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed get timeout:"
19554:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19555:                                    {skip, Reason};
19556:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
19557:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed get timeout:"
19558:                                                "   ~p", [Reason]),
19559:                                    ERROR
19560:                            end
19561:                    end},
19562: 
19563:          #{desc => "close socket",
19564:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
19565:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
19566:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
19567:                    end},
19568: 
19569:          %% *** We are done ***
19570:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
19571:         ],
19572:     Evaluator = ?SEV_START("tester", Seq, InitState),
19573:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Evaluator]).
19574: 
19575: 
19576: 
19577: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19578: 
19579: %% Tests the 'RCVLOWAT' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19580: %%
19581: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvlowat, integer()).
19582: %%
19583: %%
19584: 
19585: api_opt_sock_rcvlowat_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19586:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19587:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_rcvlowat_udp4,
19588:            fun() ->
19589:                    is_not_windows(), % einval on Windows
19590:                    has_support_ipv4(),
19591:                    has_support_sock_rcvlowat()
19592:            end,
19593:            fun() ->
19594:                    ok = api_opt_sock_lowat_udp4(rcvlowat)
19595:            end).
19596: 
19597: 
19598: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19599: 
19600: %% Tests the 'SNDLOWAT' socket 'socket' option with IPv4 UDP:
19601: %%
19602: %%               socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndlowat, integer()).
19603: %%
19604: %% This is (currently) not changeable on linux (among others),
19605: %% so we skip if we get ENOPROTOOPT when attempting a change.
19606: %%
19607: 
19608: api_opt_sock_sndlowat_udp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
19609:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
19610:     tc_try(api_opt_sock_sndlowat_udp4,
19611:            fun() ->
19612:                    is_not_windows(), % einval on Windows
19613:                    has_support_ipv4(),
19614:                    has_support_sock_sndlowat()
19615:            end,
19616:            fun() ->
19617:                    ok = api_opt_sock_lowat_udp4(sndlowat)
19618:            end).
19619: 
19620: 
19621: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
19622:
