30580:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30581:                                    ERROR
30582:                            end
30583:                    end},
30584:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
30585:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
30586: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
30587: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
30588: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
30589: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
30590: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
30591: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
30592:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
30593:                            ok
30594:                    end},
30595: 
30596: 
30597:          %% The actual test
30598:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
30599:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
30600:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
30601:                                ok ->
30602:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
30603:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30604:                                    ERROR
30605:                            end
30606:                    end},
30607: 
30608:          %% *** We are done ***
30609:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
30610:         ],
30611: 
30612:     TesterSeq =
30613:         [
30614:          %% *** Init part ***
30615:          #{desc => "monitor owner",
30616:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
30617:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
30618:                            ok
30619:                    end},
30620:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
30621:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
30622:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
30623:                            ok
30624:                    end},
30625:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
30626:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
30627:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
30628: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
30629:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
30630: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
30631: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
30632: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
30633: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
30634:                    end},
30635:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
30636:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30637: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
30638: 			   ok
30639:                    end},
30640:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
30641:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30642: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
30643: 			   ok
30644:                    end},
30645:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
30646:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
30647: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
30648: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
30649: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
30650: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
30651:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
30652:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
30653:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
30654:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
30655:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
30656: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors:"
30657: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
30658: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
30659: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
30660: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
30661: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
30662: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
30663: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
30664: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
30665: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
30666: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
30667: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
30668:                    end},
30669:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
30670:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30671: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
30672: 			   ok
30673:                    end},
30674:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
30675:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30676: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
30677: 			   ok
30678:                    end},
30679: 
30680:          %% The actual test
30681:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
30682:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
30683:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
30684:                            ok
30685:                    end},
30686: 
30687:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
30688:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
30689:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
30690:                                ok ->
30691:                                    ok;
30692:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30693:                                    ERROR
30694:                            end
30695:                    end},
30696: 
30697:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
30698:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
30699: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
30700: 			   receive
30701: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
30702: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
30703: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
30704: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
30705: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
30706: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
30707: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock1, State),
30708: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon1,  State2),
30709: 				   {ok, State3}
30710: 			   after 5000 ->
30711: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
30712: 				   {error, timeout}
30713: 			   end
30714:                    end},
30715:          #{desc => "await socket 2 down",
30716:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
30717: 			 mon2  := MRef} = State) ->
30718: 			   receive
30719: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
30720: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
30721: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
30722: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
30723: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
30724: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
30725: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock2, State),
30726: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon2,  State2),
30727: 				   {ok, State3}
30728: 			   after 5000 ->
30729: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
30730: 				   {error, timeout}
30731: 			   end
30732:                    end},
30733:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
30734:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
30735: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
30736: 			   receive
30737: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
30738: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
30739: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
30740: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
30741: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
30742: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
30743: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock3, State),
30744: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon3,  State2),
30745: 				   {ok, State3}
30746: 			   after 5000 ->
30747: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
30748: 				   {error, timeout}
30749: 			   end
30750:                    end},
30751:          #{desc => "await socket 4 down",
30752:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock,
30753: 			 mon4  := MRef} = State) ->
30754: 			   receive
30755: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
30756: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
30757: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
30758: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
30759: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
30760: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
30761: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock4, State),
30762: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon4,  State2),
30763: 				   {ok, State3}
30764: 			   after 5000 ->
30765: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
30766: 				   {error, timeout}
30767: 			   end
30768:                    end},
30769:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
30770:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
30771: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
30772: 			   receive
30773: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
30774: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
30775: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
30776: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
30777: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
30778: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
30779: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock5, State),
30780: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon5,  State2),
30781: 				   {ok, State3}
30782: 			   after 5000 ->
30783: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
30784: 				   {error, timeout}
30785: 			   end
30786:                    end},
30787:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
30788:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30789: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
30790: 			   ok
30791:                    end},
30792:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
30793:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30794: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
30795: 			   ok
30796:                    end},
30797: 
30798:          %% *** We are done ***
30799:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
30800:         ],
30801: 
30802:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
30803:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
30804: 
30805:     i("start tester evaluator"),
30806:     TesterInitState = #{owner => Owner#ev.pid},
30807:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
30808: 
30809:     i("await evaluator"),
30810:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
30811: 
30812: 
30813: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
30814: %% Create several sockets, monitor from a different process, demonitor
30815: %% two of them then close socket.
30816: %% The process that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN for
30817: %% the sockets that are still monitored.
30818: 
30819: monitor_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
30820:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
30821:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks,
30822:            fun() ->
30823: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
30824:                                  type     => stream,
30825:                                  protocol => tcp},
30826:                    ok = mon_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(InitState)
30827:            end).
30828: 
30829: 
30830: mon_open_and_demon_and_close_multi_socks(InitState) ->
30831:     OwnerSeq =
30832:         [
30833:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
30834:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
30835:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
30836:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
30837:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
30838:                    end},
30839:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
30840:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
30841:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
30842:                            ok
30843:                    end},
30844: 
30845:          %% *** Init part ***
30846:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
30847:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
30848:                          type     := Type, 
30849:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
30850:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
30851:                                {ok, Sock} ->
30852:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
30853:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30854:                                    ERROR
30855:                            end
30856:                    end},
30857:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
30858:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
30859:                          type     := Type, 
30860:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
30861:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
30862:                                {ok, Sock} ->
30863:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
30864:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30865:                                    ERROR
30866:                            end
30867:                    end},
30868:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
30869:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
30870:                          type     := Type, 
30871:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
30872:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
30873:                                {ok, Sock} ->
30874:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
30875:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30876:                                    ERROR
30877:                            end
30878:                    end},
30879:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
30880:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
30881:                          type     := Type, 
30882:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
30883:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
30884:                                {ok, Sock} ->
30885:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
30886:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30887:                                    ERROR
30888:                            end
30889:                    end},
30890:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
30891:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
30892:                          type     := Type, 
30893:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
30894:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
30895:                                {ok, Sock} ->
30896:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
30897:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30898:                                    ERROR
30899:                            end
30900:                    end},
30901:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
30902:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
30903: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
30904: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
30905: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
30906: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
30907: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
30908: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
30909:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
30910:                            ok
30911:                    end},
30912: 
30913:          %% The actual test
30914:          #{desc => "await continue (close1)",
30915:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
30916:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close1)
30917:                    end},
30918:          #{desc => "close socket 1",
30919:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
30920:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
30921: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock1, State)}
30922:                    end},
30923: 
30924:          #{desc => "await continue (close3)",
30925:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
30926:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close3)
30927:                    end},
30928:          #{desc => "close socket 3",
30929:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State) ->
30930:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
30931: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock3, State)}
30932:                    end},
30933: 
30934:          #{desc => "await continue (close5)",
30935:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
30936:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close5)
30937:                    end},
30938:          #{desc => "close socket 5",
30939:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock} = State) ->
30940:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
30941: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock5, State)}
30942:                    end},
30943: 
30944:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
30945:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
30946:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
30947:                                ok ->
30948:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
30949:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
30950:                                    ERROR
30951:                            end
30952:                    end},
30953: 
30954:          %% *** We are done ***
30955:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
30956:         ],
30957: 
30958:     TesterSeq =
30959:         [
30960:          %% *** Init part ***
30961:          #{desc => "monitor owner",
30962:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
30963:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
30964:                            ok
30965:                    end},
30966:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
30967:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
30968:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
30969:                            ok
30970:                    end},
30971:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
30972:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
30973:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
30974: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
30975:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
30976: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
30977: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
30978: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
30979: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
30980:                    end},
30981:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
30982:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30983: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
30984: 			   ok
30985:                    end},
30986:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
30987:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
30988: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
30989: 			   ok
30990:                    end},
30991:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
30992:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
30993: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
30994: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
30995: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
30996: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
30997:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
30998:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
30999:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
31000:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
31001:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
31002: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors:"
31003: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
31004: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
31005: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
31006: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
31007: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
31008: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
31009: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
31010: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
31011: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
31012: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
31013: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
31014:                    end},
31015:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
31016:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31017: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31018: 			   ok
31019:                    end},
31020:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
31021:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31022: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31023: 			   ok
31024:                    end},
31025: 
31026:          %% The actual test
31027:          #{desc => "demonitor socket(s)",
31028:            cmd  => fun(#{mon2 := MRef2,
31029: 			 mon4 := MRef4} = State) ->
31030:                            true = socket:cancel_monitor(MRef2),
31031:                            true = socket:cancel_monitor(MRef4),
31032: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("cancel socket monitor 2 and 4"),
31033: 			   State2 = maps:remove(mon2,  State),
31034: 			   State3 = maps:remove(sock2, State2),
31035: 			   State4 = maps:remove(mon4,  State3),
31036: 			   State5 = maps:remove(sock4, State4),
31037: 			   {ok, State5}
31038:                    end},
31039:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3)",
31040:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31041: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31042: 			   ok
31043:                    end},
31044:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=3)",
31045:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31046: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31047: 			   ok
31048:                    end},
31049:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 1",
31050:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31051:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close1),
31052:                            ok
31053:                    end},
31054:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
31055:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
31056: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
31057: 			   receive
31058: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
31059: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
31060: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
31061: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
31062: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
31063: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
31064: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock1, State),
31065: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon1,  State2),
31066: 				   {ok, State3}
31067: 			   after 5000 ->
31068: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
31069: 				   {error, timeout}
31070: 			   end
31071:                    end},
31072:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2)",
31073:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31074: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31075: 			   ok
31076:                    end},
31077:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=2)",
31078:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31079: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31080: 			   ok
31081:                    end},
31082: 
31083:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 3",
31084:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31085:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close3),
31086:                            ok
31087:                    end},
31088:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
31089:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
31090: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
31091: 			   receive
31092: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
31093: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
31094: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
31095: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
31096: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
31097: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
31098: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock3, State),
31099: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon3,  State2),
31100: 				   {ok, State3}
31101: 			   after 5000 ->
31102: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
31103: 				   {error, timeout}
31104: 			   end
31105:                    end},
31106:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1)",
31107:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31108: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31109: 			   ok
31110:                    end},
31111:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=1)",
31112:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31113: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31114: 			   ok
31115:                    end},
31116: 
31117:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 5",
31118:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31119:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close5),
31120:                            ok
31121:                    end},
31122:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
31123:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
31124: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
31125: 			   receive
31126: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
31127: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
31128: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
31129: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
31130: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
31131: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
31132: 				   State2 = maps:remove(sock5, State),
31133: 				   State3 = maps:remove(mon5,  State2),
31134: 				   {ok, State3}
31135: 			   after 5000 ->
31136: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
31137: 				   {error, timeout}
31138: 			   end
31139:                    end},
31140:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
31141:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31142: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31143: 			   ok
31144:                    end},
31145:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
31146:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31147: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31148: 			   ok
31149:                    end},
31150: 
31151:          %% Cleanup
31152:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
31153:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31154:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31155:                            ok
31156:                    end},
31157: 
31158:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
31159:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31160:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31161:                                ok ->
31162:                                    ok;
31163:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31164:                                    ERROR
31165:                            end
31166:                    end},
31167: 
31168:          %% *** We are done ***
31169:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31170:         ],
31171: 
31172:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
31173:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
31174: 
31175:     i("start tester evaluator"),
31176:     TesterInitState = #{owner => Owner#ev.pid},
31177:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
31178: 
31179:     i("await evaluator"),
31180:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
31181: 
31182: 
31183: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
31184: %% Create one socket (by 'owner' process), monitor from several different
31185: %% processes, then close socket (from 'owner').
31186: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN.
31187: 
31188: monitor_open_and_close_multi_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
31189:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
31190:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_close_multi_mon,
31191:            fun() ->
31192: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
31193:                                  type     => stream,
31194:                                  protocol => tcp},
31195:                    ok = mon_open_and_close_multi_mon(InitState)
31196:            end).
31197: 
31198: 
31199: mon_open_and_close_multi_mon(InitState) ->
31200:     OwnerSeq =
31201:         [
31202:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
31203:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
31204:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
31205:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
31206:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
31207:                    end},
31208:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
31209:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31210:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
31211:                            ok
31212:                    end},
31213: 
31214:          %% *** Init part ***
31215:          #{desc => "create socket",
31216:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
31217:                          type     := Type, 
31218:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
31219:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
31220:                                {ok, Sock} ->
31221:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
31222:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31223:                                    ERROR
31224:                            end
31225:                    end},
31226:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
31227:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31228:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
31229:                            ok
31230:                    end},
31231: 
31232:          %% The actual test
31233:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
31234:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31235:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close)
31236:                    end},
31237: 
31238:          #{desc => "close socket",
31239:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
31240:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
31241: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
31242:                    end},
31243: 
31244: 
31245:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
31246:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31247:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
31248:                                ok ->
31249:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
31250:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31251:                                    ERROR
31252:                            end
31253:                    end},
31254: 
31255:          %% *** We are done ***
31256:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31257:         ],
31258: 
31259: 
31260:     ClientSeq =
31261:         [
31262:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
31263:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
31264:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
31265:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
31266:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
31267:                    end},
31268:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
31269:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31270:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
31271:                            ok
31272:                    end},
31273: 
31274:          %% *** Init part ***
31275:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
31276:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31277:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
31278:                            ok
31279:                    end},
31280:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
31281:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31282:                            {ok, Sock} =
31283: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
31284: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Socket: ~p", [Sock]),
31285: 			   {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
31286:                    end},
31287: 
31288: 
31289:          %% The actual test
31290:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
31291:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31292:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
31293:                    end},
31294:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
31295:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31296: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31297: 			   ok
31298:                    end},
31299:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
31300:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
31301:                            MRef = socket:monitor(Sock),
31302: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitor: ~p", [MRef]),
31303: 			   {ok, State#{mon => MRef}}
31304:                    end},
31305:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=1)",
31306:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31307: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31308: 			   ok
31309:                    end},
31310: 
31311:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
31312:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31313:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
31314:                            ok
31315:                    end},
31316: 
31317:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
31318:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31319:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
31320:                    end},
31321: 
31322:          #{desc => "await socket down",
31323:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
31324: 			 mon  := MRef} = State) ->
31325: 			   receive
31326: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
31327: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
31328: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
31329: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
31330: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
31331: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
31332: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon, State),
31333: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock, State2),
31334: 				   {ok, State3}
31335: 			   after 5000 ->
31336: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
31337: 				   {error, timeout}
31338: 			   end
31339:                    end},
31340:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
31341:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31342: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31343: 			   ok
31344:                    end},
31345: 
31346:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
31347:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31348:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
31349:                            ok
31350:                    end},
31351: 
31352: 
31353:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
31354:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31355:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
31356:                                ok ->
31357:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
31358:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31359:                                    ERROR
31360:                            end
31361:                    end},
31362: 
31363:          %% *** We are done ***
31364:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31365:         ],
31366: 
31367:     TesterSeq =
31368:         [
31369:          %% *** Init part ***
31370:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
31371:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
31372:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
31373:                            ok
31374:                    end},
31375:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
31376:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31377:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31378:                            ok
31379:                    end},
31380:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
31381:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
31382:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
31383:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
31384:                    end},
31385: 
31386:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
31387:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31388:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31389:                            ok
31390:                    end},
31391:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
31392:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31393:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31394:                            ok
31395:                    end},
31396:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
31397:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31398:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
31399:                    end},
31400:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
31401:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31402:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31403:                            ok
31404:                    end},
31405: 
31406:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
31407:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31408:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31409:                            ok
31410:                    end},
31411:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
31412:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31413:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31414:                            ok
31415:                    end},
31416:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
31417:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31418:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
31419:                    end},
31420:          #{desc => "send socket to client 2",
31421:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31422:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31423:                            ok
31424:                    end},
31425: 
31426:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 3'",
31427:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31428:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31429:                            ok
31430:                    end},
31431:          #{desc => "order (client 3) start",
31432:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31433:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31434:                            ok
31435:                    end},
31436:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
31437:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31438:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
31439:                    end},
31440:          #{desc => "send socket to client 3",
31441:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31442:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31443:                            ok
31444:                    end},
31445: 
31446:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 4'",
31447:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31448:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31449:                            ok
31450:                    end},
31451:          #{desc => "order (client 4) start",
31452:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31453:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31454:                            ok
31455:                    end},
31456:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
31457:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31458:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, init)
31459:                    end},
31460:          #{desc => "send socket to client 4",
31461:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31462:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31463:                            ok
31464:                    end},
31465: 
31466:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 5'",
31467:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31468:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31469:                            ok
31470:                    end},
31471:          #{desc => "order (client 5) start",
31472:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31473:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31474:                            ok
31475:                    end},
31476:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
31477:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31478:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, init)
31479:                    end},
31480:          #{desc => "send socket to client 5",
31481:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31482:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31483:                            ok
31484:                    end},
31485: 
31486: 
31487:          %% The actual test
31488:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
31489:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31490: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31491: 			   ok
31492:                    end},
31493: 
31494:          #{desc => "order client 1 to monitor",
31495:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31496:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
31497:                            ok
31498:                    end},
31499:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
31500:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31501:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, monitor)
31502:                    end},
31503:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1)",
31504:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31505: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31506: 			   ok
31507:                    end},
31508: 
31509:          #{desc => "order client 2 to monitor",
31510:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31511:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
31512:                            ok
31513:                    end},
31514:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
31515:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31516:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, monitor)
31517:                    end},
31518:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2)",
31519:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31520: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31521: 			   ok
31522:                    end},
31523: 
31524:          #{desc => "order client 3 to monitor",
31525:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31526:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
31527:                            ok
31528:                    end},
31529:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
31530:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31531:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, monitor)
31532:                    end},
31533:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3)",
31534:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31535: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31536: 			   ok
31537:                    end},
31538: 
31539:          #{desc => "order client 4 to monitor",
31540:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31541:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
31542:                            ok
31543:                    end},
31544:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
31545:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31546:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, monitor)
31547:                    end},
31548:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=4)",
31549:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31550: 			   4 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31551: 			   ok
31552:                    end},
31553: 
31554:          #{desc => "order client 5 to monitor",
31555:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31556:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
31557:                            ok
31558:                    end},
31559:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
31560:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31561:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, monitor)
31562:                    end},
31563:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
31564:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31565: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31566: 			   ok
31567:                    end},
31568:          #{desc => "verify monitored by - none",
31569:            cmd  => fun(#{sock    := Sock,
31570: 			 client1 := Pid1,
31571: 			 client2 := Pid2,
31572: 			 client3 := Pid3,
31573: 			 client4 := Pid4,
31574: 			 client5 := Pid5} = _State) ->
31575: 			   Clients = lists:sort([Pid1, Pid2, Pid3, Pid4, Pid5]),
31576: 			   case lists:sort(socket:monitored_by(Sock)) of
31577: 			       Clients ->
31578: 				   ok;
31579: 			       SClients ->
31580: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected clients: "
31581: 					       "~n   Expected: ~p"
31582: 					       "~n   Actual:   ~p",
31583: 					       [Clients, SClients]),
31584: 				   {error, unexpected_clients}
31585: 			   end
31586:                    end},
31587: 
31588:          #{desc => "order client 1 to await down",
31589:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31590:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
31591:                            ok
31592:                    end},
31593:          #{desc => "order client 2 to await down",
31594:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31595:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
31596:                            ok
31597:                    end},
31598:          #{desc => "order client 3 to await down",
31599:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31600:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
31601:                            ok
31602:                    end},
31603:          #{desc => "order client 4 to await down",
31604:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31605:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
31606:                            ok
31607:                    end},
31608:          #{desc => "order client 5 to await down",
31609:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31610:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
31611:                            ok
31612:                    end},
31613: 
31614:          #{desc => "order owner to close",
31615:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31616:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
31617:                            ok
31618:                    end},
31619: 
31620:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
31621:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31622:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
31623:                    end},
31624:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
31625:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31626:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
31627:                    end},
31628:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
31629:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31630:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
31631:                    end},
31632:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
31633:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31634:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
31635:                    end},
31636:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
31637:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31638:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
31639:                    end},
31640:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
31641:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31642: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
31643: 			   ok
31644:                    end},
31645: 
31646:          %% Cleanup
31647:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
31648:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31649:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31650:                            ok
31651:                    end},
31652:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
31653:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
31654:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31655:                                ok ->
31656:                                    {ok, maps:remove(owner, State)};
31657:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31658:                                    ERROR
31659:                            end
31660:                    end},
31661: 
31662:          #{desc => "order (client 1) terminate",
31663:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31664:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31665:                            ok
31666:                    end},
31667:          #{desc => "await (client 1) termination",
31668:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
31669:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31670:                                ok ->
31671:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client1, State)};
31672:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31673:                                    ERROR
31674:                            end
31675:                    end},
31676: 
31677:          #{desc => "order (client 2) terminate",
31678:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31679:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31680:                            ok
31681:                    end},
31682:          #{desc => "await (client 2) termination",
31683:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
31684:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31685:                                ok ->
31686:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client2, State)};
31687:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31688:                                    ERROR
31689:                            end
31690:                    end},
31691: 
31692:          #{desc => "order (client 3) terminate",
31693:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
31694:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31695:                            ok
31696:                    end},
31697:          #{desc => "await (client 3) termination",
31698:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
31699:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31700:                                ok ->
31701:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client3, State)};
31702:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31703:                                    ERROR
31704:                            end
31705:                    end},
31706: 
31707:          #{desc => "order (client 4) terminate",
31708:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
31709:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31710:                            ok
31711:                    end},
31712:          #{desc => "await (client 4) termination",
31713:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = State) ->
31714:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31715:                                ok ->
31716:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client4, State)};
31717:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31718:                                    ERROR
31719:                            end
31720:                    end},
31721: 
31722:          #{desc => "order (client 5) terminate",
31723:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
31724:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
31725:                            ok
31726:                    end},
31727:          #{desc => "await (client 5) termination",
31728:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = State) ->
31729:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
31730:                                ok ->
31731:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client5, State)};
31732:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31733:                                    ERROR
31734:                            end
31735:                    end},
31736: 
31737:          %% *** We are done ***
31738:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31739:         ],
31740: 
31741:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
31742:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
31743: 
31744:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
31745:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
31746: 
31747:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
31748:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
31749: 
31750:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
31751:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
31752: 
31753:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
31754:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
31755: 
31756:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
31757:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
31758: 
31759:     i("start tester evaluator"),
31760:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
31761: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
31762: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
31763: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
31764: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
31765: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
31766:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
31767: 
31768:     i("await evaluator"),
31769:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
31770: 
31771: 
31772: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
31773: %% Create one socket (by 'owner' process), monitor from several different
31774: %% processes, then close socket (from 'owner').
31775: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive a socket DOWN.
31776: 
31777: monitor_open_and_exit_multi_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
31778:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
31779:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_exit_multi_mon,
31780:            fun() ->
31781: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
31782:                                  type     => stream,
31783:                                  protocol => tcp},
31784:                    ok = mon_open_and_exit_multi_mon(InitState)
31785:            end).
31786: 
31787: 
31788: mon_open_and_exit_multi_mon(InitState) ->
31789:     OwnerSeq =
31790:         [
31791:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
31792:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
31793:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
31794:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
31795:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
31796:                    end},
31797:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
31798:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31799:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
31800:                            ok
31801:                    end},
31802: 
31803:          %% *** Init part ***
31804:          #{desc => "create socket",
31805:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
31806:                          type     := Type, 
31807:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
31808:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
31809:                                {ok, Sock} ->
31810:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
31811:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31812:                                    ERROR
31813:                            end
31814:                    end},
31815:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
31816:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31817:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
31818:                            ok
31819:                    end},
31820: 
31821:          %% The actual test
31822:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
31823:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31824:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
31825:                                ok ->
31826:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
31827:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31828:                                    ERROR
31829:                            end
31830:                    end},
31831: 
31832:          %% *** We are done ***
31833:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31834:         ],
31835: 
31836: 
31837:     ClientSeq =
31838:         [
31839:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
31840:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
31841:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
31842:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
31843:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
31844:                    end},
31845:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
31846:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31847:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
31848:                            ok
31849:                    end},
31850: 
31851:          %% *** Init part ***
31852:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
31853:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
31854:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
31855:                            ok
31856:                    end},
31857:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
31858:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31859:                            {ok, Sock} =
31860: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
31861: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Socket: ~p", [Sock]),
31862: 			   {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
31863:                    end},
31864: 
31865: 
31866:          %% The actual test
31867:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
31868:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31869:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
31870:                    end},
31871:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
31872:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31873: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31874: 			   ok
31875:                    end},
31876:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
31877:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
31878:                            MRef = socket:monitor(Sock),
31879: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitor: ~p", [MRef]),
31880: 			   {ok, State#{mon => MRef}}
31881:                    end},
31882:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=1)",
31883:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31884: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31885: 			   ok
31886:                    end},
31887: 
31888:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
31889:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31890:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
31891:                            ok
31892:                    end},
31893: 
31894:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
31895:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31896:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
31897:                    end},
31898: 
31899:          #{desc => "await socket down",
31900:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
31901: 			 mon  := MRef} = State) ->
31902: 			   receive
31903: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
31904: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
31905: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
31906: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
31907: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
31908: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
31909: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon, State),
31910: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock, State2),
31911: 				   {ok, State3}
31912: 			   after 5000 ->
31913: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
31914: 				   {error, timeout}
31915: 			   end
31916:                    end},
31917:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
31918:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
31919: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
31920: 			   ok
31921:                    end},
31922: 
31923:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
31924:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
31925:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
31926:                            ok
31927:                    end},
31928: 
31929: 
31930:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
31931:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
31932:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
31933:                                ok ->
31934:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
31935:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
31936:                                    ERROR
31937:                            end
31938:                    end},
31939: 
31940:          %% *** We are done ***
31941:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
31942:         ],
31943: 
31944:     TesterSeq =
31945:         [
31946:          %% *** Init part ***
31947:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
31948:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
31949:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
31950:                            ok
31951:                    end},
31952:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
31953:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
31954:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31955:                            ok
31956:                    end},
31957:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
31958:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
31959:                            {ok, Sock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
31960:                            {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
31961:                    end},
31962: 
31963:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
31964:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31965:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31966:                            ok
31967:                    end},
31968:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
31969:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31970:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31971:                            ok
31972:                    end},
31973:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
31974:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
31975:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
31976:                    end},
31977:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
31978:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31979:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
31980:                            ok
31981:                    end},
31982: 
31983:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
31984:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31985:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
31986:                            ok
31987:                    end},
31988:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
31989:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31990:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
31991:                            ok
31992:                    end},
31993:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
31994:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
31995:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
31996:                    end},
31997:          #{desc => "send socket to client 2",
31998:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
31999:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
32000:                            ok
32001:                    end},
32002: 
32003:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 3'",
32004:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32005:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32006:                            ok
32007:                    end},
32008:          #{desc => "order (client 3) start",
32009:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32010:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32011:                            ok
32012:                    end},
32013:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
32014:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32015:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
32016:                    end},
32017:          #{desc => "send socket to client 3",
32018:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
32019:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
32020:                            ok
32021:                    end},
32022: 
32023:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 4'",
32024:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32025:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32026:                            ok
32027:                    end},
32028:          #{desc => "order (client 4) start",
32029:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32030:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32031:                            ok
32032:                    end},
32033:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
32034:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32035:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, init)
32036:                    end},
32037:          #{desc => "send socket to client 4",
32038:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
32039:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
32040:                            ok
32041:                    end},
32042: 
32043:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 5'",
32044:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32045:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32046:                            ok
32047:                    end},
32048:          #{desc => "order (client 5) start",
32049:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32050:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32051:                            ok
32052:                    end},
32053:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
32054:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32055:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, init)
32056:                    end},
32057:          #{desc => "send socket to client 5",
32058:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid, sock := Sock} = _State) ->
32059:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Sock),
32060:                            ok
32061:                    end},
32062: 
32063: 
32064:          %% The actual test
32065:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
32066:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32067: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32068: 			   ok
32069:                    end},
32070: 
32071:          #{desc => "order client 1 to monitor",
32072:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32073:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32074:                            ok
32075:                    end},
32076:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
32077:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32078:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, monitor)
32079:                    end},
32080:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1)",
32081:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32082: 			   1 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32083: 			   ok
32084:                    end},
32085: 
32086:          #{desc => "order client 2 to monitor",
32087:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32088:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32089:                            ok
32090:                    end},
32091:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
32092:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32093:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, monitor)
32094:                    end},
32095:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2)",
32096:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32097: 			   2 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32098: 			   ok
32099:                    end},
32100: 
32101:          #{desc => "order client 3 to monitor",
32102:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32103:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32104:                            ok
32105:                    end},
32106:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
32107:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32108:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, monitor)
32109:                    end},
32110:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3)",
32111:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32112: 			   3 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32113: 			   ok
32114:                    end},
32115: 
32116:          #{desc => "order client 4 to monitor",
32117:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32118:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32119:                            ok
32120:                    end},
32121:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
32122:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32123:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, monitor)
32124:                    end},
32125:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=4)",
32126:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32127: 			   4 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32128: 			   ok
32129:                    end},
32130: 
32131:          #{desc => "order client 5 to monitor",
32132:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32133:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32134:                            ok
32135:                    end},
32136:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
32137:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32138:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, monitor)
32139:                    end},
32140:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5)",
32141:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32142: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32143: 			   ok
32144:                    end},
32145: 
32146:          #{desc => "order client 1 to await down",
32147:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32148:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32149:                            ok
32150:                    end},
32151:          #{desc => "order client 2 to await down",
32152:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32153:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32154:                            ok
32155:                    end},
32156:          #{desc => "order client 3 to await down",
32157:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32158:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32159:                            ok
32160:                    end},
32161:          #{desc => "order client 4 to await down",
32162:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32163:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32164:                            ok
32165:                    end},
32166:          #{desc => "order client 5 to await down",
32167:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32168:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32169:                            ok
32170:                    end},
32171: 
32172: 
32173:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
32174:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
32175:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32176:                            ok
32177:                    end},
32178:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
32179:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
32180:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32181:                                ok ->
32182:                                    {ok, maps:remove(owner, State)};
32183:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32184:                                    ERROR
32185:                            end
32186:                    end},
32187: 
32188:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
32189:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32190:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
32191:                    end},
32192:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
32193:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32194:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
32195:                    end},
32196:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
32197:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32198:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
32199:                    end},
32200:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
32201:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32202:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
32203:                    end},
32204:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
32205:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32206:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
32207:                    end},
32208:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
32209:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32210: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
32211: 			   ok
32212:                    end},
32213: 
32214:          %% Cleanup
32215:          #{desc => "order (client 1) terminate",
32216:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32217:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32218:                            ok
32219:                    end},
32220:          #{desc => "await (client 1) termination",
32221:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
32222:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32223:                                ok ->
32224:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client1, State)};
32225:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32226:                                    ERROR
32227:                            end
32228:                    end},
32229: 
32230:          #{desc => "order (client 2) terminate",
32231:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32232:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32233:                            ok
32234:                    end},
32235:          #{desc => "await (client 2) termination",
32236:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
32237:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32238:                                ok ->
32239:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client2, State)};
32240:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32241:                                    ERROR
32242:                            end
32243:                    end},
32244: 
32245:          #{desc => "order (client 3) terminate",
32246:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32247:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32248:                            ok
32249:                    end},
32250:          #{desc => "await (client 3) termination",
32251:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
32252:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32253:                                ok ->
32254:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client3, State)};
32255:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32256:                                    ERROR
32257:                            end
32258:                    end},
32259: 
32260:          #{desc => "order (client 4) terminate",
32261:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32262:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32263:                            ok
32264:                    end},
32265:          #{desc => "await (client 4) termination",
32266:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = State) ->
32267:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32268:                                ok ->
32269:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client4, State)};
32270:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32271:                                    ERROR
32272:                            end
32273:                    end},
32274: 
32275:          #{desc => "order (client 5) terminate",
32276:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32277:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
32278:                            ok
32279:                    end},
32280:          #{desc => "await (client 5) termination",
32281:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = State) ->
32282:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
32283:                                ok ->
32284:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client5, State)};
32285:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32286:                                    ERROR
32287:                            end
32288:                    end},
32289: 
32290:          %% *** We are done ***
32291:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
32292:         ],
32293: 
32294:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
32295:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
32296: 
32297:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
32298:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
32299: 
32300:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
32301:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
32302: 
32303:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
32304:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
32305: 
32306:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
32307:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
32308: 
32309:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
32310:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
32311: 
32312:     i("start tester evaluator"),
32313:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
32314: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
32315: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
32316: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
32317: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
32318: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
32319:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
32320: 
32321:     i("await evaluator"),
32322:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
32323: 
32324: 
32325: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
32326: %% Create several sockets (by 'owner' process), monitor each from several
32327: %% different processes, then close each socket (from 'owner').
32328: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive one socket DOWN for
32329: %% each socket.
32330: 
32331: monitor_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
32332:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
32333:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon,
32334:            fun() ->
32335: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
32336:                                  type     => stream,
32337:                                  protocol => tcp},
32338:                    ok = mon_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState)
32339:            end).
32340: 
32341: 
32342: mon_open_and_close_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState) ->
32343:     OwnerSeq =
32344:         [
32345:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
32346:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
32347:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
32348:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
32349:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
32350:                    end},
32351:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
32352:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
32353:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
32354:                            ok
32355:                    end},
32356: 
32357:          %% *** Init part ***
32358:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
32359:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
32360:                          type     := Type, 
32361:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
32362:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
32363:                                {ok, Sock} ->
32364:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
32365:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32366:                                    ERROR
32367:                            end
32368:                    end},
32369:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
32370:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
32371:                          type     := Type,
