32372:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
32373:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
32374:                                {ok, Sock} ->
32375:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
32376:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32377:                                    ERROR
32378:                            end
32379:                    end},
32380:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
32381:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
32382:                          type     := Type, 
32383:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
32384:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
32385:                                {ok, Sock} ->
32386:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
32387:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32388:                                    ERROR
32389:                            end
32390:                    end},
32391:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
32392:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
32393:                          type     := Type, 
32394:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
32395:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
32396:                                {ok, Sock} ->
32397:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
32398:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32399:                                    ERROR
32400:                            end
32401:                    end},
32402:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
32403:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
32404:                          type     := Type, 
32405:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
32406:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
32407:                                {ok, Sock} ->
32408:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
32409:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32410:                                    ERROR
32411:                            end
32412:                    end},
32413:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
32414:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
32415: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
32416: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
32417: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
32418: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
32419: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
32420: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32421:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
32422:                            ok
32423:                    end},
32424: 
32425:          %% The actual test
32426:          #{desc => "await continue (close1)",
32427:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32428:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close1)
32429:                    end},
32430:          #{desc => "close socket 1",
32431:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock} = State) ->
32432:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
32433: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock1, State)}
32434:                    end},
32435: 
32436:          #{desc => "await continue (close2)",
32437:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32438:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close2)
32439:                    end},
32440:          #{desc => "close socket 2",
32441:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock} = State) ->
32442:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
32443: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock2, State)}
32444:                    end},
32445: 
32446:          #{desc => "await continue (close3)",
32447:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32448:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close3)
32449:                    end},
32450:          #{desc => "close socket 3",
32451:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock} = State) ->
32452:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
32453: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock3, State)}
32454:                    end},
32455: 
32456:          #{desc => "await continue (close4)",
32457:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32458:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close4)
32459:                    end},
32460:          #{desc => "close socket 4",
32461:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock} = State) ->
32462:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
32463: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock4, State)}
32464:                    end},
32465: 
32466:          #{desc => "await continue (close5)",
32467:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32468:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close5)
32469:                    end},
32470:          #{desc => "close socket 5",
32471:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock} = State) ->
32472:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
32473: 			   {ok, maps:remove(sock5, State)}
32474:                    end},
32475: 
32476: 
32477:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
32478:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
32479:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
32480:                                ok ->
32481:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
32482:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32483:                                    ERROR
32484:                            end
32485:                    end},
32486: 
32487:          %% *** We are done ***
32488:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
32489:         ],
32490: 
32491: 
32492:     ClientSeq =
32493:         [
32494:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
32495:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
32496:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
32497:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
32498:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
32499:                    end},
32500:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
32501:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
32502:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
32503:                            ok
32504:                    end},
32505: 
32506:          %% *** Init part ***
32507:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
32508:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
32509:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
32510:                            ok
32511:                    end},
32512:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
32513:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
32514:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
32515: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
32516: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Sockets: "
32517: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
32518: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
32519: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
32520: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
32521: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
32522: 				       [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]),
32523: 			   {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
32524: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
32525: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
32526: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
32527: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
32528:                    end},
32529: 
32530: 
32531:          %% The actual test
32532:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
32533:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32534:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
32535:                    end},
32536: 
32537:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
32538:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32539: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
32540: 			   ok
32541:                    end},
32542:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
32543:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
32544: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
32545: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
32546: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
32547: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
32548:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
32549:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
32550:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
32551:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
32552:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
32553: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors: "
32554: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
32555: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
32556: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
32557: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
32558: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
32559: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
32560: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
32561: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
32562: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
32563: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
32564: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
32565:                    end},
32566:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
32567:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32568: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
32569: 			   ok
32570:                    end},
32571: 
32572:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
32573:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32574:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
32575:                            ok
32576:                    end},
32577: 
32578:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
32579:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32580:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
32581:                    end},
32582: 
32583:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
32584:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
32585: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
32586: 			   receive
32587: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
32588: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
32589: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
32590: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
32591: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
32592: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
32593: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon1, State),
32594: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock1, State2),
32595: 				   {ok, State3}
32596: 			   after 5000 ->
32597: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
32598: 				   {error, timeout}
32599: 			   end
32600:                    end},
32601:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
32602:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32603:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
32604:                            ok
32605:                    end},
32606: 
32607:          #{desc => "await socket 2 down",
32608:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
32609: 			 mon2  := MRef} = State) ->
32610: 			   receive
32611: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
32612: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
32613: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
32614: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
32615: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
32616: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
32617: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon2, State),
32618: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock2, State2),
32619: 				   {ok, State3}
32620: 			   after 5000 ->
32621: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
32622: 				   {error, timeout}
32623: 			   end
32624:                    end},
32625:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
32626:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32627:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
32628:                            ok
32629:                    end},
32630: 
32631:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
32632:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
32633: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
32634: 			   receive
32635: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
32636: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
32637: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
32638: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
32639: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
32640: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
32641: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon3, State),
32642: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock3, State2),
32643: 				   {ok, State3}
32644: 			   after 5000 ->
32645: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
32646: 				   {error, timeout}
32647: 			   end
32648:                    end},
32649:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
32650:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32651:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
32652:                            ok
32653:                    end},
32654: 
32655:          #{desc => "await socket 4 down",
32656:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock,
32657: 			 mon4  := MRef} = State) ->
32658: 			   receive
32659: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
32660: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
32661: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
32662: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
32663: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
32664: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
32665: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon4, State),
32666: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock4, State2),
32667: 				   {ok, State3}
32668: 			   after 5000 ->
32669: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
32670: 				   {error, timeout}
32671: 			   end
32672:                    end},
32673:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
32674:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32675:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
32676:                            ok
32677:                    end},
32678: 
32679:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
32680:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
32681: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
32682: 			   receive
32683: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
32684: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
32685: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
32686: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
32687: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
32688: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
32689: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon5, State),
32690: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock5, State2),
32691: 				   {ok, State3}
32692: 			   after 5000 ->
32693: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
32694: 				   {error, timeout}
32695: 			   end
32696:                    end},
32697:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
32698:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
32699:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
32700:                            ok
32701:                    end},
32702:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
32703:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32704: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
32705: 			   ok
32706:                    end},
32707: 
32708: 
32709:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
32710:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
32711:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
32712:                                ok ->
32713:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
32714:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
32715:                                    ERROR
32716:                            end
32717:                    end},
32718: 
32719:          %% *** We are done ***
32720:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
32721:         ],
32722: 
32723:     TesterSeq =
32724:         [
32725:          %% *** Init part ***
32726:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
32727:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
32728:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
32729:                            ok
32730:                    end},
32731:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
32732:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
32733:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32734:                            ok
32735:                    end},
32736:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
32737:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
32738:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
32739: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
32740:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
32741: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
32742: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
32743: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
32744: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
32745:                    end},
32746: 
32747:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
32748:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32749:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32750:                            ok
32751:                    end},
32752:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
32753:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32754:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32755:                            ok
32756:                    end},
32757:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
32758:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32759:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
32760:                    end},
32761:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
32762:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid,
32763: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
32764: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
32765: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
32766: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
32767: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
32768: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32769:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
32770:                            ok
32771:                    end},
32772: 
32773:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
32774:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32775:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32776:                            ok
32777:                    end},
32778:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
32779:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32780:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32781:                            ok
32782:                    end},
32783:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
32784:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32785:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
32786:                    end},
32787:          #{desc => "send socket to client 2",
32788:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid,
32789: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
32790: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
32791: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
32792: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
32793: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
32794: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32795:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
32796:                            ok
32797:                    end},
32798: 
32799:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 3'",
32800:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32801:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32802:                            ok
32803:                    end},
32804:          #{desc => "order (client 3) start",
32805:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32806:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32807:                            ok
32808:                    end},
32809:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
32810:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32811:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
32812:                    end},
32813:          #{desc => "send socket to client 3",
32814:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid,
32815: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
32816: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
32817: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
32818: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
32819: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
32820: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32821:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
32822:                            ok
32823:                    end},
32824: 
32825:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 4'",
32826:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32827:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32828:                            ok
32829:                    end},
32830:          #{desc => "order (client 4) start",
32831:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32832:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32833:                            ok
32834:                    end},
32835:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
32836:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32837:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, init)
32838:                    end},
32839:          #{desc => "send socket to client 4",
32840:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid,
32841: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
32842: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
32843: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
32844: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
32845: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
32846: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32847:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
32848:                            ok
32849:                    end},
32850: 
32851:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 5'",
32852:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32853:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
32854:                            ok
32855:                    end},
32856:          #{desc => "order (client 5) start",
32857:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32858:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
32859:                            ok
32860:                    end},
32861:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
32862:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32863:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, init)
32864:                    end},
32865:          #{desc => "send socket to client 5",
32866:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid,
32867: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
32868: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
32869: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
32870: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
32871: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
32872: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
32873:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
32874:                            ok
32875:                    end},
32876: 
32877: 
32878:          %% The actual test
32879:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
32880:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32881: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32882: 			   ok
32883:                    end},
32884: 
32885:          #{desc => "order client 1 to monitor",
32886:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32887:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32888:                            ok
32889:                    end},
32890:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
32891:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32892:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, monitor)
32893:                    end},
32894:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1*5)",
32895:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32896: 			   1*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32897: 			   ok
32898:                    end},
32899: 
32900:          #{desc => "order client 2 to monitor",
32901:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32902:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32903:                            ok
32904:                    end},
32905:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
32906:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32907:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, monitor)
32908:                    end},
32909:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2*5)",
32910:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32911: 			   2*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32912: 			   ok
32913:                    end},
32914: 
32915:          #{desc => "order client 3 to monitor",
32916:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32917:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32918:                            ok
32919:                    end},
32920:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
32921:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32922:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, monitor)
32923:                    end},
32924:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3*5)",
32925:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32926: 			   3*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32927: 			   ok
32928:                    end},
32929: 
32930:          #{desc => "order client 4 to monitor",
32931:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32932:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32933:                            ok
32934:                    end},
32935:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
32936:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32937:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, monitor)
32938:                    end},
32939:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=4*5)",
32940:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32941: 			   4*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32942: 			   ok
32943:                    end},
32944: 
32945:          #{desc => "order client 5 to monitor",
32946:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32947:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
32948:                            ok
32949:                    end},
32950:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
32951:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32952:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, monitor)
32953:                    end},
32954:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*5)",
32955:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
32956: 			   5*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
32957: 			   ok
32958:                    end},
32959: 
32960:          #{desc => "order client 1 to await down",
32961:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32962:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32963:                            ok
32964:                    end},
32965:          #{desc => "order client 2 to await down",
32966:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32967:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32968:                            ok
32969:                    end},
32970:          #{desc => "order client 3 to await down",
32971:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
32972:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32973:                            ok
32974:                    end},
32975:          #{desc => "order client 4 to await down",
32976:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
32977:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32978:                            ok
32979:                    end},
32980:          #{desc => "order client 5 to await down",
32981:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
32982:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
32983:                            ok
32984:                    end},
32985: 
32986: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
32987: 
32988:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 1",
32989:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
32990:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close1),
32991:                            ok
32992:                    end},
32993:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
32994:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
32995:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
32996:                    end},
32997:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
32998:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
32999:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33000:                    end},
33001:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
33002:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33003:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33004:                    end},
33005:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
33006:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33007:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33008:                    end},
33009:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
33010:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33011:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33012:                    end},
33013:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*4)",
33014:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33015: 			   5*4 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33016: 			   ok
33017:                    end},
33018: 
33019: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33020: 
33021:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 2",
33022:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33023:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close2),
33024:                            ok
33025:                    end},
33026:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
33027:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33028:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
33029:                    end},
33030:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
33031:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33032:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33033:                    end},
33034:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
33035:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33036:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33037:                    end},
33038:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
33039:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33040:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33041:                    end},
33042:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
33043:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33044:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33045:                    end},
33046:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*3)",
33047:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33048: 			   5*3 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33049: 			   ok
33050:                    end},
33051: 
33052: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33053: 
33054:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 3",
33055:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33056:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close3),
33057:                            ok
33058:                    end},
33059:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
33060:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33061:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
33062:                    end},
33063:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
33064:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33065:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33066:                    end},
33067:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
33068:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33069:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33070:                    end},
33071:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
33072:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33073:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33074:                    end},
33075:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
33076:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33077:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33078:                    end},
33079:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*2)",
33080:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33081: 			   5*2 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33082: 			   ok
33083:                    end},
33084: 
33085: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33086: 
33087:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 4",
33088:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33089:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close4),
33090:                            ok
33091:                    end},
33092:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
33093:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33094:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
33095:                    end},
33096:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
33097:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33098:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33099:                    end},
33100:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
33101:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33102:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33103:                    end},
33104:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
33105:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33106:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33107:                    end},
33108:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
33109:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33110:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33111:                    end},
33112:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*1)",
33113:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33114: 			   5*1 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33115: 			   ok
33116:                    end},
33117: 
33118: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33119: 
33120:          #{desc => "order owner to close socket 5",
33121:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33122:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close5),
33123:                            ok
33124:                    end},
33125:          #{desc => "await (client 1) down received",
33126:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33127:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
33128:                    end},
33129:          #{desc => "await (client 2) down received",
33130:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33131:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33132:                    end},
33133:          #{desc => "await (client 3) down received",
33134:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33135:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33136:                    end},
33137:          #{desc => "await (client 4) down received",
33138:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33139:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33140:                    end},
33141:          #{desc => "await (client 5) down received",
33142:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33143:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33144:                    end},
33145:          #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
33146:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33147: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33148: 			   ok
33149:                    end},
33150: 
33151: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33152: 
33153:          %% Cleanup
33154:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
33155:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33156:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33157:                            ok
33158:                    end},
33159:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
33160:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
33161:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33162:                                ok ->
33163:                                    {ok, maps:remove(owner, State)};
33164:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33165:                                    ERROR
33166:                            end
33167:                    end},
33168: 
33169:          #{desc => "order (client 1) terminate",
33170:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33171:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33172:                            ok
33173:                    end},
33174:          #{desc => "await (client 1) termination",
33175:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
33176:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33177:                                ok ->
33178:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client1, State)};
33179:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33180:                                    ERROR
33181:                            end
33182:                    end},
33183: 
33184:          #{desc => "order (client 2) terminate",
33185:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33186:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33187:                            ok
33188:                    end},
33189:          #{desc => "await (client 2) termination",
33190:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
33191:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33192:                                ok ->
33193:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client2, State)};
33194:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33195:                                    ERROR
33196:                            end
33197:                    end},
33198: 
33199:          #{desc => "order (client 3) terminate",
33200:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33201:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33202:                            ok
33203:                    end},
33204:          #{desc => "await (client 3) termination",
33205:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
33206:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33207:                                ok ->
33208:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client3, State)};
33209:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33210:                                    ERROR
33211:                            end
33212:                    end},
33213: 
33214:          #{desc => "order (client 4) terminate",
33215:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33216:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33217:                            ok
33218:                    end},
33219:          #{desc => "await (client 4) termination",
33220:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = State) ->
33221:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33222:                                ok ->
33223:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client4, State)};
33224:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33225:                                    ERROR
33226:                            end
33227:                    end},
33228: 
33229:          #{desc => "order (client 5) terminate",
33230:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33231:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33232:                            ok
33233:                    end},
33234:          #{desc => "await (client 5) termination",
33235:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = State) ->
33236:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33237:                                ok ->
33238:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client5, State)};
33239:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33240:                                    ERROR
33241:                            end
33242:                    end},
33243: 
33244:          %% *** We are done ***
33245:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
33246:         ],
33247: 
33248:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
33249:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
33250: 
33251:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
33252:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
33253: 
33254:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
33255:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
33256: 
33257:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
33258:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
33259: 
33260:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
33261:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
33262: 
33263:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
33264:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
33265: 
33266:     i("start tester evaluator"),
33267:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
33268: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
33269: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
33270: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
33271: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
33272: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
33273:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
33274: 
33275:     i("await evaluator"),
33276:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
33277: 
33278: 
33279: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
33280: %% Create several sockets (by 'owner' process), monitor each from several
33281: %% different processes, then exit the owner.
33282: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive one socket DOWN for
33283: %% each socket.
33284: 
33285: monitor_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
33286:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
33287:     tc_try(monitor_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon,
33288:            fun() ->
33289: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
33290:                                  type     => stream,
33291:                                  protocol => tcp},
33292:                    ok = mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState)
33293:            end).
33294: 
33295: 
33296: mon_open_and_exit_multi_socks_and_mon(InitState) ->
33297:     OwnerSeq =
33298:         [
33299:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
33300:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
33301:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
33302:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
33303:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
33304:                    end},
33305:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
33306:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
33307:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
33308:                            ok
33309:                    end},
33310: 
33311:          %% *** Init part ***
33312:          #{desc => "create socket 1",
33313:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
33314:                          type     := Type, 
33315:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
33316:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
33317:                                {ok, Sock} ->
33318:                                    {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock}};
33319:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33320:                                    ERROR
33321:                            end
33322:                    end},
33323:          #{desc => "create socket 2",
33324:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
33325:                          type     := Type, 
33326:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
33327:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
33328:                                {ok, Sock} ->
33329:                                    {ok, State#{sock2 => Sock}};
33330:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33331:                                    ERROR
33332:                            end
33333:                    end},
33334:          #{desc => "create socket 3",
33335:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
33336:                          type     := Type, 
33337:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
33338:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
33339:                                {ok, Sock} ->
33340:                                    {ok, State#{sock3 => Sock}};
33341:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33342:                                    ERROR
33343:                            end
33344:                    end},
33345:          #{desc => "create socket 4",
33346:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
33347:                          type     := Type, 
33348:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
33349:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
33350:                                {ok, Sock} ->
33351:                                    {ok, State#{sock4 => Sock}};
33352:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33353:                                    ERROR
33354:                            end
33355:                    end},
33356:          #{desc => "create socket 5",
33357:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
33358:                          type     := Type, 
33359:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
33360:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
33361:                                {ok, Sock} ->
33362:                                    {ok, State#{sock5 => Sock}};
33363:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33364:                                    ERROR
33365:                            end
33366:                    end},
33367:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
33368:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
33369: 			 sock1  := Sock1,
33370: 			 sock2  := Sock2,
33371: 			 sock3  := Sock3,
33372: 			 sock4  := Sock4,
33373: 			 sock5  := Sock5} = _State) ->
33374: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33375:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Socks),
33376:                            ok
33377:                    end},
33378: 
33379:          %% The actual test
33380:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
33381:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
33382:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
33383:                                ok ->
33384:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
33385:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33386:                                    ERROR
33387:                            end
33388:                    end},
33389: 
33390:          %% *** We are done ***
33391:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
33392:         ],
33393: 
33394: 
33395:     ClientSeq =
33396:         [
33397:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
33398:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
33399:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
33400:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
33401:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
33402:                    end},
33403:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
33404:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
33405:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
33406:                            ok
33407:                    end},
33408: 
33409:          %% *** Init part ***
33410:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
33411:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
33412:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
33413:                            ok
33414:                    end},
33415:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
33416:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
33417:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
33418: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
33419: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Sockets: "
33420: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
33421: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
33422: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
33423: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
33424: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
33425: 				       [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]),
33426: 			   {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
33427: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
33428: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
33429: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
33430: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
33431:                    end},
33432: 
33433: 
33434:          %% The actual test
33435:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
33436:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
33437:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
33438:                    end},
33439: 
33440:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
33441:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33442: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
33443: 			   ok
33444:                    end},
33445:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
33446:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock1,
33447: 			 sock2 := Sock2,
33448: 			 sock3 := Sock3,
33449: 			 sock4 := Sock4,
33450: 			 sock5 := Sock5} = State) ->
33451:                            MRef1 = socket:monitor(Sock1),
33452:                            MRef2 = socket:monitor(Sock2),
33453:                            MRef3 = socket:monitor(Sock3),
33454:                            MRef4 = socket:monitor(Sock4),
33455:                            MRef5 = socket:monitor(Sock5),
33456: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors: "
33457: 				       "~n   1: ~p"
33458: 				       "~n   2: ~p"
33459: 				       "~n   3: ~p"
33460: 				       "~n   4: ~p"
33461: 				       "~n   5: ~p",
33462: 				       [MRef1, MRef2, MRef3, MRef4, MRef5]),
33463: 			   {ok, State#{mon1 => MRef1,
33464: 				       mon2 => MRef2,
33465: 				       mon3 => MRef3,
33466: 				       mon4 => MRef4,
33467: 				       mon5 => MRef5}}
33468:                    end},
33469:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=5)",
33470:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33471: 			   5 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
33472: 			   ok
33473:                    end},
33474:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
33475:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
33476:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
33477:                            ok
33478:                    end},
33479: 
33480:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
33481:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
33482:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
33483:                    end},
33484: 
33485:          #{desc => "await socket 1 down",
33486:            cmd  => fun(#{sock1 := Sock,
33487: 			 mon1  := MRef} = State) ->
33488: 			   receive
33489: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
33490: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
33491: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
33492: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
33493: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
33494: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
33495: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon1, State),
33496: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock1, State2),
33497: 				   {ok, State3}
33498: 			   after 5000 ->
33499: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
33500: 				   {error, timeout}
33501: 			   end
33502:                    end},
33503: 
33504:          #{desc => "await socket 2 down",
33505:            cmd  => fun(#{sock2 := Sock,
33506: 			 mon2  := MRef} = State) ->
33507: 			   receive
33508: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
33509: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
33510: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
33511: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
33512: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
33513: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
33514: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon2, State),
33515: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock2, State2),
33516: 				   {ok, State3}
33517: 			   after 5000 ->
33518: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
33519: 				   {error, timeout}
33520: 			   end
33521:                    end},
33522: 
33523:          #{desc => "await socket 3 down",
33524:            cmd  => fun(#{sock3 := Sock,
33525: 			 mon3  := MRef} = State) ->
33526: 			   receive
33527: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
33528: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
33529: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
33530: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
33531: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
33532: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
33533: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon3, State),
33534: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock3, State2),
33535: 				   {ok, State3}
33536: 			   after 5000 ->
33537: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
33538: 				   {error, timeout}
33539: 			   end
33540:                    end},
33541: 
33542:          #{desc => "await socket 4 down",
33543:            cmd  => fun(#{sock4 := Sock,
33544: 			 mon4  := MRef} = State) ->
33545: 			   receive
33546: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
33547: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
33548: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
33549: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
33550: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
33551: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
33552: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon4, State),
33553: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock4, State2),
33554: 				   {ok, State3}
33555: 			   after 5000 ->
33556: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
33557: 				   {error, timeout}
33558: 			   end
33559:                    end},
33560: 
33561:          #{desc => "await socket 5 down",
33562:            cmd  => fun(#{sock5 := Sock,
33563: 			 mon5  := MRef} = State) ->
33564: 			   receive
33565: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
33566: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
33567: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
33568: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
33569: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
33570: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
33571: 				   State2 = maps:remove(mon5, State),
33572: 				   State3 = maps:remove(sock5, State2),
33573: 				   {ok, State3}
33574: 			   after 5000 ->
33575: 				   ?SEV_EPRINT("socket down timeout"),
33576: 				   {error, timeout}
33577: 			   end
33578:                    end},
33579:          #{desc => "verify own number of monitors (=0)",
33580:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33581: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(self()),
33582: 			   ok
33583:                    end},
33584:          #{desc => "announce ready (down)",
33585:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
33586:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, down),
33587:                            ok
33588:                    end},
33589: 
33590: 
33591:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
33592:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
33593:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
33594:                                ok ->
33595:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
33596:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33597:                                    ERROR
33598:                            end
33599:                    end},
33600: 
33601:          %% *** We are done ***
33602:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
33603:         ],
33604: 
33605:     TesterSeq =
33606:         [
33607:          %% *** Init part ***
33608:          #{desc => "monitor 'owner'",
33609:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Owner} = _State) ->
33610:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Owner),
33611:                            ok
33612:                    end},
33613:          #{desc => "order (owner) start",
33614:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33615:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33616:                            ok
33617:                    end},
33618:          #{desc => "await (owner) ready",
33619:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
33620:                            {ok, [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5]} =
33621: 			       ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, owner, init),
33622:                            {ok, State#{sock1 => Sock1,
33623: 				       sock2 => Sock2,
33624: 				       sock3 => Sock3,
33625: 				       sock4 => Sock4,
33626: 				       sock5 => Sock5}}
33627:                    end},
33628: 
33629:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 1'",
33630:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33631:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
33632:                            ok
33633:                    end},
33634:          #{desc => "order (client 1) start",
33635:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33636:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33637:                            ok
33638:                    end},
33639:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
33640:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33641:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
33642:                    end},
33643:          #{desc => "send socket to client 1",
33644:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid,
33645: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
33646: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
33647: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
33648: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
33649: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
33650: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33651:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
33652:                            ok
33653:                    end},
33654: 
33655:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 2'",
33656:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33657:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
33658:                            ok
33659:                    end},
33660:          #{desc => "order (client 2) start",
33661:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33662:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33663:                            ok
33664:                    end},
33665:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
33666:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33667:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
33668:                    end},
33669:          #{desc => "send socket to client 2",
33670:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid,
33671: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
33672: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
33673: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
33674: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
33675: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
33676: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33677:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
33678:                            ok
33679:                    end},
33680: 
33681:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 3'",
33682:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33683:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
33684:                            ok
33685:                    end},
33686:          #{desc => "order (client 3) start",
33687:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33688:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33689:                            ok
33690:                    end},
33691:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
33692:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33693:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
33694:                    end},
33695:          #{desc => "send socket to client 3",
33696:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid,
33697: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
33698: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
33699: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
33700: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
33701: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
33702: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33703:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
33704:                            ok
33705:                    end},
33706: 
33707:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 4'",
33708:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33709:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
33710:                            ok
33711:                    end},
33712:          #{desc => "order (client 4) start",
33713:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33714:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33715:                            ok
33716:                    end},
33717:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
33718:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33719:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, init)
33720:                    end},
33721:          #{desc => "send socket to client 4",
33722:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid,
33723: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
33724: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
33725: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
33726: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
33727: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
33728: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33729:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
33730:                            ok
33731:                    end},
33732: 
33733:          #{desc => "monitor 'client 5'",
33734:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33735:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
33736:                            ok
33737:                    end},
33738:          #{desc => "order (client 5) start",
33739:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33740:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
33741:                            ok
33742:                    end},
33743:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
33744:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33745:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, init)
33746:                    end},
33747:          #{desc => "send socket to client 5",
33748:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid,
33749: 			 sock1   := Sock1,
33750: 			 sock2   := Sock2,
33751: 			 sock3   := Sock3,
33752: 			 sock4   := Sock4,
33753: 			 sock5   := Sock5} = _State) ->
33754: 			   Socks = [Sock1, Sock2, Sock3, Sock4, Sock5],
33755:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, socket, Socks),
33756:                            ok
33757:                    end},
33758: 
33759: 
33760:          %% The actual test
33761: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
33762:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33763: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33764: 			   ok
33765:                    end},
33766: 
33767:          #{desc => "order client 1 to monitor",
33768:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33769:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
33770:                            ok
33771:                    end},
33772:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
33773:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33774:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, monitor)
33775:                    end},
33776: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=1*5)",
33777:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33778: 			   1*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33779: 			   ok
33780:                    end},
33781: 
33782:          #{desc => "order client 2 to monitor",
33783:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33784:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
33785:                            ok
33786:                    end},
33787:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
33788:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33789:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, monitor)
33790:                    end},
33791: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=2*5)",
33792:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33793: 			   2*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33794: 			   ok
33795:                    end},
33796: 
33797:          #{desc => "order client 3 to monitor",
33798:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33799:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
33800:                            ok
33801:                    end},
33802:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
33803:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33804:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, monitor)
33805:                    end},
33806: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=3*5)",
33807:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33808: 			   3*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33809: 			   ok
33810:                    end},
33811: 
33812:          #{desc => "order client 4 to monitor",
33813:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33814:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
33815:                            ok
33816:                    end},
33817:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
33818:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33819:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, monitor)
33820:                    end},
33821: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=4*5)",
33822:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33823: 			   4*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33824: 			   ok
33825:                    end},
33826: 
33827:          #{desc => "order client 5 to monitor",
33828:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33829:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, monitor),
33830:                            ok
33831:                    end},
33832:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
33833:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33834:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, monitor)
33835:                    end},
33836: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=5*5)",
33837:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33838: 			   5*5 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33839: 			   ok
33840:                    end},
33841: 
33842:          #{desc => "order client 1 to await down",
33843:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33844:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
33845:                            ok
33846:                    end},
33847:          #{desc => "order client 2 to await down",
33848:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33849:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
33850:                            ok
33851:                    end},
33852:          #{desc => "order client 3 to await down",
33853:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33854:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
33855:                            ok
33856:                    end},
33857:          #{desc => "order client 4 to await down",
33858:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33859:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
33860:                            ok
33861:                    end},
33862:          #{desc => "order client 5 to await down",
33863:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33864:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, down),
33865:                            ok
33866:                    end},
33867: 
33868: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33869: 
33870:          #{desc => "order (owner) terminate",
33871:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = _State) ->
33872:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33873:                            ok
33874:                    end},
33875:          #{desc => "await (owner) termination",
33876:            cmd  => fun(#{owner := Pid} = State) ->
33877:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33878:                                ok ->
33879:                                    {ok, maps:remove(owner, State)};
33880:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33881:                                    ERROR
33882:                            end
33883:                    end},
33884: 
33885:          #{desc => "await (client 1) ready",
33886:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33887:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, down)
33888:                    end},
33889:          #{desc => "await (client 2) ready",
33890:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33891:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, down)
33892:                    end},
33893:          #{desc => "await (client 3) ready",
33894:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33895:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, down)
33896:                    end},
33897:          #{desc => "await (client 4) ready",
33898:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33899:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client4, down)
33900:                    end},
33901:          #{desc => "await (client 5) ready",
33902:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33903:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client5, down)
33904:                    end},
33905: 
33906: 	 #{desc => "verify total number of monitors (=0)",
33907:            cmd  => fun(_State) ->
33908: 			   0 = socket:number_of_monitors(),
33909: 			   ok
33910:                    end},
33911: 
33912: 	 ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
33913: 
33914:          %% Cleanup
33915:          #{desc => "order (client 1) terminate",
33916:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
33917:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33918:                            ok
33919:                    end},
33920:          #{desc => "await (client 1) termination",
33921:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
33922:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33923:                                ok ->
33924:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client1, State)};
33925:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33926:                                    ERROR
33927:                            end
33928:                    end},
33929: 
33930:          #{desc => "order (client 2) terminate",
33931:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
33932:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33933:                            ok
33934:                    end},
33935:          #{desc => "await (client 2) termination",
33936:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
33937:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33938:                                ok ->
33939:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client2, State)};
33940:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33941:                                    ERROR
33942:                            end
33943:                    end},
33944: 
33945:          #{desc => "order (client 3) terminate",
33946:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
33947:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33948:                            ok
33949:                    end},
33950:          #{desc => "await (client 3) termination",
33951:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
33952:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33953:                                ok ->
33954:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client3, State)};
33955:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33956:                                    ERROR
33957:                            end
33958:                    end},
33959: 
33960:          #{desc => "order (client 4) terminate",
33961:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = _State) ->
33962:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33963:                            ok
33964:                    end},
33965:          #{desc => "await (client 4) termination",
33966:            cmd  => fun(#{client4 := Pid} = State) ->
33967:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33968:                                ok ->
33969:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client4, State)};
33970:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33971:                                    ERROR
33972:                            end
33973:                    end},
33974: 
33975:          #{desc => "order (client 5) terminate",
33976:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = _State) ->
33977:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
33978:                            ok
33979:                    end},
33980:          #{desc => "await (client 5) termination",
33981:            cmd  => fun(#{client5 := Pid} = State) ->
33982:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
33983:                                ok ->
33984:                                    {ok, maps:remove(client5, State)};
33985:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
33986:                                    ERROR
33987:                            end
33988:                    end},
33989: 
33990:          %% *** We are done ***
33991:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
33992:         ],
33993: 
33994:     i("start (socket) owner evaluator"),
33995:     Owner = ?SEV_START("owner", OwnerSeq, InitState),
33996: 
33997:     i("start client 1 evaluator"),
33998:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, InitState),
33999: 
34000:     i("start client 2 evaluator"),
34001:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, InitState),
34002: 
34003:     i("start client 3 evaluator"),
34004:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, InitState),
34005: 
34006:     i("start client 4 evaluator"),
34007:     Client4 = ?SEV_START("client-4", ClientSeq, InitState),
34008: 
34009:     i("start client 5 evaluator"),
34010:     Client5 = ?SEV_START("client-5", ClientSeq, InitState),
34011: 
34012:     i("start tester evaluator"),
34013:     TesterInitState = #{owner   => Owner#ev.pid,
34014: 			client1 => Client1#ev.pid,
34015: 			client2 => Client2#ev.pid,
34016: 			client3 => Client3#ev.pid,
34017: 			client4 => Client4#ev.pid,
34018: 			client5 => Client5#ev.pid},
34019:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
34020: 
34021:     i("await evaluator"),
34022:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Owner, Tester]).
34023: 
34024: 
34025: 
34026: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
34027: %% Create several sockets (by 'owner' process), monitor each from several
34028: %% different processes, then exit the owner.
34029: %% The processes that did the monitor shall receive one socket DOWN for
34030: %% each socket.
34031: 
34032: monitor_closed_socket(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
34033:     ?TT(?SECS(5)),
34034:     tc_try(monitor_closed_socket,
34035:            fun() ->
34036: 		   InitState = #{domain   => inet,
34037:                                  type     => stream,
34038:                                  protocol => tcp},
34039:                    ok = mon_closed_socket(InitState)
34040:            end).
34041: 
34042: 
34043: mon_closed_socket(InitState) ->
34044:     OwnerSeq =
34045:         [
34046:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
34047:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
34048:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
34049:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
34050:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
34051:                    end},
34052:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
34053:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
34054:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
34055:                            ok
34056:                    end},
34057: 
34058:          %% *** Init part ***
34059:          #{desc => "create socket",
34060:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain, 
34061:                          type     := Type, 
34062:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
34063:                            case socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
34064:                                {ok, Sock} ->
34065:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
34066:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
34067:                                    ERROR
34068:                            end
34069:                    end},
34070:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
34071:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
34072: 			 sock   := Sock} = State) ->
34073:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Sock),
34074:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
34075:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
34076:                    end},
34077: 
34078:          %% The actual test
34079:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
34080:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
34081:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
34082:                                ok ->
34083:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
34084:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
34085:                                    ERROR
34086:                            end
34087:                    end},
34088: 
34089:          %% *** We are done ***
34090:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
34091:         ],
34092: 
34093: 
34094:     ClientSeq =
34095:         [
34096:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
34097:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
34098:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
34099:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
34100:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
34101:                    end},
34102:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
34103:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
34104:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
34105:                            ok
34106:                    end},
34107: 
34108:          %% *** Init part ***
34109:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
34110:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
34111:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
34112:                            ok
34113:                    end},
34114:          #{desc => "await continue (socket)",
34115:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
34116:                            {ok, Sock} =
34117:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, socket),
34118: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Socket: "
34119: 				       "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
34120: 			   {ok, State#{sock => Sock}}
34121:                    end},
34122: 
34123: 
34124:          %% The actual test
34125:          #{desc => "await continue (monitor)",
34126:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
34127:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, monitor)
34128:                    end},
34129: 
34130:          #{desc => "monitor socket",
34131:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
34132:                            MRef = socket:monitor(Sock),
34133: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("Monitors: "
34134: 				       "~n      ~p", [MRef]),
34135: 			   {ok, State#{mon => MRef}}
34136:                    end},
34137:          
34138:          #{desc => "announce ready (monitor)",
34139:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
34140:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, monitor),
34141:                            ok
34142:                    end},
34143: 
34144:          #{desc => "await continue (down)",
34145:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
34146:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, down)
34147:                    end},
34148: 
34149:          #{desc => "await socket down",
34150:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock,
34151: 			 mon  := MRef} = State) ->
34152: 			   receive
34153: 			       {'DOWN', MRef, socket, Sock, Info} ->
34154: 				   ?SEV_IPRINT("received expected down: "
34155: 					       "~n      MRef:   ~p"
34156: 					       "~n      Socket: ~p"
34157: 					       "~n      Info:   ~p",
34158: 					       [MRef, Sock, Info]),
