44273:                            socket:listen(LSock)
44274:                    end},
44275:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
44276:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
44277:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
44278:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
44279:                            ok;
44280:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, lport := Port}) ->
44281:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
44282:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
44283:                            ok
44284:                    end},
44285: 
44286:          %% The actual test
44287:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
44288:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
44289:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
44290:                    end},
44291:          #{desc => "accept",
44292:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
44293:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
44294:                                {ok, Sock} ->
44295:                                    {ok, State#{csock => Sock}};
44296:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44297:                                    ERROR
44298:                            end
44299:                    end},
44300:          #{desc => "create handler",
44301:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
44302:                            Handler = tpp_tcp_handler_create(),
44303:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
44304:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
44305:                    end},
44306:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
44307:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
44308:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
44309:                            ok
44310:                    end},
44311:          #{desc => "transfer connection socket ownership to handler",
44312:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler, csock := Sock} = _State) ->
44313:                            socket:setopt(Sock, otp, controlling_process, Handler)
44314:                    end},
44315:          #{desc => "start handler",
44316:            cmd  => fun(#{handler  := Handler,
44317:                          csock    := Sock,
44318:                          send     := Send,
44319:                          recv     := Recv} = _State) ->
44320:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
44321:                            ok
44322:                    end},
44323:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
44324:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44325:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
44326:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
44327:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
44328:                                ok ->
44329:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
44330:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44331:                                    ERROR
44332:                            end
44333:                    end},
44334:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
44335:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
44336:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
44337:                            ok
44338:                    end},
44339:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
44340:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44341:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
44342:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
44343:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
44344:                    end},
44345:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
44346:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
44347:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
44348:                            ok
44349:                    end},
44350:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
44351:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44352:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
44353:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
44354:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
44355:                                {ok, Result} ->
44356:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
44357:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
44358:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44359:                                    ERROR
44360:                            end
44361:                    end},
44362:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
44363:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
44364:                          result := Result} = State) ->
44365:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
44366:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
44367:                    end},
44368: 
44369:          %% Termination
44370:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
44371:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
44372:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
44373:                                ok ->
44374:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
44375:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44376:                                    ERROR
44377:                            end
44378:                    end},
44379:          #{desc => "stop handler",
44380:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
44381:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
44382:                            ok
44383:                    end},
44384:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
44385:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
44386:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
44387:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
44388:                            {ok, State1}
44389:                    end},
44390:          #{desc => "close listen socket",
44391:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
44392:                          lsock    := Sock,
44393:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
44394:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
44395:                            State1 =
44396:                                unlink_path(Path,
44397:                                            fun() -> 
44398:                                                    maps:remove(local_sa, State)
44399:                                            end,
44400:                                            fun() -> State end),
44401:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
44402:                       (#{lsock := Sock} = State) ->
44403:                            (catch socket:close(Sock)),
44404:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
44405:                    end},
44406: 
44407:          %% *** We are done ***
44408:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
44409:         ],
44410: 
44411:     ClientSeq =
44412:         [
44413:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
44414:          #{desc => "await start",
44415:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
44416:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
44417:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
44418:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
44419:                    end},
44420:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
44421:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
44422:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
44423:                            ok
44424:                    end},
44425: 
44426:          %% *** Init part ***
44427:          #{desc => "create node",
44428:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
44429:                            {Peer, Node} = ?START_NODE("client"),
44430:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
44431:                    end},
44432:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
44433:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
44434:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
44435:                            ok
44436:                    end},
44437:          #{desc => "create remote client",
44438:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
44439:                            Pid = tpp_tcp_client_create(Node),
44440:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client created: ~p", [Pid]),
44441:                            {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}}
44442:                    end},
44443:          #{desc => "monitor remote client",
44444:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := Pid}) ->
44445:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
44446:                            ok
44447:                    end},
44448:          #{desc => "order remote client to start",
44449:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient   := RClient,
44450:                          proto     := Proto,
44451:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
44452:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
44453:                          send      := Send,
44454:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
44455:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(RClient, 
44456:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
44457:                                                 Send, Recv}),
44458:                            ok
44459:                    end},
44460:          #{desc => "await remote client ready",
44461:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44462:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
44463:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, init, 
44464:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
44465:                                ok ->
44466:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client started"),
44467:                                    ok;
44468:                                {error, {unexpected_exit, _, {bind, eaddrnotavail = Reason}}} ->
44469:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client bind failure:"
44470:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
44471:                                    {skip, Reason};
44472:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
44473:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("remote client failure:"
44474:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
44475:                                    ERROR
44476:                            end
44477:                    end},
44478:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
44479:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
44480:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
44481:                            ok
44482:                    end},
44483: 
44484:          %% The actual test
44485:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
44486:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44487:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
44488:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect, 
44489:                                                [{rclient, RClient}]),
44490:                            ok
44491:                    end},
44492:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (connect)",
44493:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
44494:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, connect),
44495:                            ok
44496:                    end},
44497:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (connect)",
44498:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44499:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
44500:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, connect, 
44501:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
44502:                    end},
44503:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
44504:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
44505:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
44506:                            ok
44507:                    end},
44508:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
44509:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44510:                          rclient := RClient} = _State) ->
44511:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
44512:                                                send, 
44513:                                                [{rclient, RClient}])
44514:                    end},
44515:          #{desc => "order remote client to continue (send)",
44516:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient,
44517:                          msg     := Msg,
44518:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
44519:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
44520:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(RClient, send, Data),
44521:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
44522:                    end},
44523:          #{desc => "await remote client ready (send)",
44524:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
44525:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
44526:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, send, 
44527:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
44528:                                {ok, Result} ->
44529:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
44530:                                {error,
44531:                                 {unexpected_exit, rclient, noconnection}} ->
44532:                                    %% One guess is that the message is so
44533:                                    %% "large" that the client node died on us.
44534:                                    %% Or so "large" that the connection (to
44535:                                    %% the node) fails/dies.
44536:                                    %% Either way, we assume this is not actually
44537:                                    %% related to what we are testing => skip
44538:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("lost connection "
44539:                                                "to remote client node => SKIP"),
44540:                                    {skip, {rclient, noconnection}};
44541:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44542:                                    ERROR
44543:                            end
44544:                    end},
44545:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
44546:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
44547:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
44548:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
44549:                    end},
44550: 
44551:          %% Termination
44552:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
44553:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
44554:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
44555:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
44556:                                                      [{rclient, RClient}]) of
44557:                                ok ->
44558:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
44559:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44560:                                    ERROR
44561:                            end
44562:                    end},
44563:          #{desc => "stop remote client",
44564:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient}) ->
44565:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(RClient),
44566:                            ok
44567:                    end},
44568:          #{desc => "await remote client termination",
44569:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient} = State) ->
44570:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RClient),
44571:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
44572:                            {ok, State1}
44573:                    end},
44574:          #{desc => "stop client node",
44575:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
44576:                            {ok,
44577:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
44578:                                 ok ->
44579:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
44580:                                 {error, Reason} ->
44581:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
44582:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
44583:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
44584:                             catch
44585:                                 C:E:S ->
44586:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
44587:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
44588:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
44589:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
44590:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
44591:                             end}
44592:                    end},
44593:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
44594:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State) ->
44595:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
44596:                            receive
44597:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
44598:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
44599:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
44600:                                    {ok, State1}
44601:                            end;
44602:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
44603:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
44604:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
44605:                            {ok, State1}
44606:                    end},
44607: 
44608:          %% *** We are done ***
44609:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
44610:         ],
44611: 
44612:     TesterSeq =
44613:         [
44614:          %% *** Init part ***
44615:          #{desc => "monitor server",
44616:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
44617:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
44618:                            ok
44619:                    end},
44620:          #{desc => "monitor client",
44621:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
44622:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
44623:                            ok
44624:                    end},
44625: 
44626:          %% Start the server
44627:          #{desc => "order server start",
44628:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
44629:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
44630:                            ok
44631:                    end},
44632:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
44633:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
44634:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
44635:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
44636:                    end},
44637: 
44638:          %% Start the client
44639:          #{desc => "order client start",
44640:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
44641:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
44642:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
44643:                            ok
44644:                    end},
44645:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
44646:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
44647:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
44648:                    end},
44649:  
44650:          %% The actual test
44651:          #{desc => "order server continue (accept)",
44652:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
44653:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
44654:                            ok
44655:                    end},
44656:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
44657:          #{desc => "order client continue (connect)",
44658:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
44659:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
44660:                            ok
44661:                    end},
44662:          #{desc => "await server ready (accept)",
44663:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
44664:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
44665:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, accept,
44666:                                             [{client, Client}]),
44667:                            ok
44668:                    end},
44669:          #{desc => "await client ready (connect)",
44670:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
44671:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
44672:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, connect, 
44673:                                             [{server, Server}])
44674:                    end},
44675:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
44676:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
44677:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
44678:                            ok
44679:                    end},
44680:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
44681:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
44682:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
44683:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
44684:                            ok
44685:                    end},
44686:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
44687:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
44688:                          client := Client} = State) ->
44689:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
44690:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
44691:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
44692:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
44693:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
44694:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
44695:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
44696:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
44697:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
44698:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
44699:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44700:                                    ERROR
44701:                            end
44702:                    end},
44703:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
44704:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
44705:                          client := Client,
44706:                          num    := Num} = State) ->
44707:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
44708:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
44709:                                {ok, {Num, _, _, _, _} = Result} ->
44710:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server result: "
44711:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
44712:                                    Result2 = erlang:delete_element(1, Result),
44713:                                    {ok, State#{server_result => Result2}};
44714:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
44715:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("bad server result: "
44716:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
44717:                                    {error, {invalid_server_result, BadResult}};
44718:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44719:                                    ERROR
44720:                            end
44721:                    end},
44722:          #{desc => "present result",
44723:            cmd  => fun(#{server_result := SRes,
44724:                          client_result := CRes,
44725:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
44726:                            {SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop} = SRes,
44727:                            {CSent, CReceived, _, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
44728:                            STime = tdiff(SStart, SStop),
44729:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
44730:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("process result data:"
44731:                                        "~n   Num:          ~p"
44732:                                        "~n   Server Sent:  ~p"
44733:                                        "~n   Server Recv:  ~p"
44734:                                        "~n   Server Start: ~p"
44735:                                        "~n   Server Stop:  ~p"
44736:                                        "~n   Server Time:  ~p"
44737:                                        "~n   Client Sent:  ~p"
44738:                                        "~n   Client Recv:  ~p"
44739:                                        "~n   Client Start: ~p"
44740:                                        "~n   Client Stop:  ~p"
44741:                                        "~n   Client Time:  ~p",
44742:                                        [Num,
44743:                                         SSent, SReceived, SStart, SStop,
44744:                                         STime,
44745:                                         CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop,
44746:                                         CTime]),
44747:                            if
44748:                                (STime =:= 0) orelse
44749:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
44750:                                    {skip,
44751:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time(s): ~w , ~w",
44752:                                        [STime, CTime])};
44753:                                true ->
44754:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is 
44755:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
44756:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
44757:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
44758:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
44759:                                    %% big for the small messages!
44760:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
44761:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
44762:                                       "~n   Server: ~w msec"
44763:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
44764:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
44765:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
44766:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received"
44767:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
44768:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
44769:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
44770:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
44771:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
44772:                                       [Num,
44773:                                        STime,
44774:                                        STime / Num,
44775:                                        Num / STime,
44776:                                        SSent div STime,
44777:                                        SReceived div STime,
44778:                                        CTime,
44779:                                        CTime / Num,
44780:                                        Num / CTime,
44781:                                        CSent div CTime,
44782:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
44783:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server_result, State),
44784:                                    State2 = maps:remove(client_result, State1),
44785:                                    {ok, State2}
44786:                            end
44787:                    end},
44788: 
44789:          %% Terminations
44790:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
44791:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
44792:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
44793:                            ok
44794:                    end},
44795:          #{desc => "await client termination",
44796:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
44797:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
44798:                                ok ->
44799:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
44800:                                    {ok, State1};
44801:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44802:                                    ERROR
44803:                            end
44804:                    end},
44805:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
44806:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
44807:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
44808:                            ok
44809:                    end},
44810:          #{desc => "await server termination",
44811:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
44812:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
44813:                                ok ->
44814:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
44815:                                    {ok, State1};
44816:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
44817:                                    ERROR
44818:                            end
44819:                    end},
44820: 
44821: 
44822:          %% *** We are done ***
44823:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
44824:         ],
44825: 
44826:     i("start server evaluator"),
44827:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
44828:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
44829:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
44830:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
44831:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
44832:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
44833: 
44834:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
44835:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
44836:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
44837: 
44838:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
44839:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
44840:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
44841:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
44842:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
44843: 
44844:     i("await evaluator"),
44845:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
44846:     
44847: 
44848: tpp_tcp_handler_create() ->
44849:     Self = self(),
44850:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_tcp_handler(Self) end).
44851: 
44852: tpp_tcp_handler(Parent) ->
44853:     tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent),
44854:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent),
44855:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
44856:     tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
44857:     Result = tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
44858:     tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
44859:     Reason = tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
44860:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
44861:     exit(Reason).
44862: 
44863: tpp_tcp_handler_init(Parent) ->
44864:     put(sname, "handler"),
44865:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
44866:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
44867:     ok.
44868: 
44869: tpp_tcp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
44870:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
44871:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
44872: 
44873: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
44874:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
44875:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
44876: tpp_tcp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
44877:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
44878:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
44879: 
44880: tpp_tcp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
44881:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
44882:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
44883:         ok ->
44884:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
44885:             ok;
44886:         {error, Reason} ->
44887:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
44888:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
44889:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
44890:     end.
44891: 
44892: tpp_tcp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
44893:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
44894:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
44895:         ok ->
44896:             ok;
44897:         {error, Reason} ->
44898:             Reason
44899:     end.
44900: 
44901: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
44902:     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 0, 0, 0, undefined).
44903: 
44904: tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
44905:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
44906:     case tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
44907:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz} ->
44908:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?LIB:timestamp(); 
44909:                           true -> Start end,
44910:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
44911:             case tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg) of
44912:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
44913:                     tpp_tcp_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
44914:                                                       N+1,
44915:                                                       Sent+SendSz,
44916:                                                       Received+RecvSz,
44917:                                                       NewStart);
44918:                 {error, SReason} ->
44919:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
44920:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
44921:             end;
44922:         {error, closed} ->
44923:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w", [N, Sent, Received]),
44924:             Stop = ?LIB:timestamp(),
44925:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
44926:         {error, RReason} ->
44927:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
44928:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
44929:     end.
44930:             
44931: %% The (remote) client process
44932: 
44933: tpp_tcp_client_create(Node) ->
44934:     Self = self(),
44935:     Fun  = fun() -> tpp_tcp_client(Self) end,
44936:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
44937: 
44938: tpp_tcp_client(Parent) ->
44939:     tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent),
44940:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent),
44941:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
44942:     Sock     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
44943:     Path     = tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
44944:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, init),
44945:     tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, connect),
44946:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA),
44947:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, connect),
44948:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, send),
44949:     Result = tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
44950:     tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
44951:     Reason = tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent),
44952:     tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path),
44953:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
44954:     exit(Reason).
44955: 
44956: tpp_tcp_client_init(Parent) ->
44957:     put(sname, "rclient"),
44958:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
44959:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
44960:     ok.
44961: 
44962: tpp_tcp_client_await_start(Parent) ->
44963:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
44964:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
44965: 
44966: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
44967:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
44968:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
44969: tpp_tcp_client_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
44970:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p): ~p", [Slogan, Extra]),
44971:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
44972: 
44973: tpp_tcp_client_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
44974:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
44975:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
44976:         ok ->
44977:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
44978:             ok;
44979:         {ok, Data} ->
44980:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
44981:             Data;
44982:         {error, Reason} ->
44983:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
44984:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
44985:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
44986:     end.
44987: 
44988: tpp_tcp_client_await_terminate(Parent) ->
44989:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
44990:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
44991:         ok ->
44992:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: normal"),
44993:             normal;
44994:         {error, Reason} ->
44995:             ?SEV_IPRINT("termination received: ~w", [Reason]),
44996:             Reason
44997:     end.
44998: 
44999: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
45000:     Start = ?LIB:timestamp(),
45001:     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, InitMsg, 
45002:                                      Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
45003: 
45004: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
45005:                                  Num, Num, Sent, Received,
45006:                                  Start) ->
45007:     Stop = ?LIB:timestamp(),
45008:     Info = socket:info(Sock),
45009:     case socket:close(Sock) of
45010:         ok ->
45011:             {Sent, Received, Info, Start, Stop};
45012:         {error, Reason} ->
45013:             exit({failed_closing, Reason})
45014:     end;
45015: tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, Data, 
45016:                                  Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
45017:     %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) try send ~w", [Num,N,size(Data)]),
45018:     case tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) of
45019:         {ok, SendSz} ->
45020:             %% d("tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(~w,~w) sent - "
45021:             %%   "now try recv", [Num,N]),
45022:             case tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
45023:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz} ->
45024:                     tpp_tcp_client_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
45025:                                                      NewData, Num, N+1,
45026:                                                      Sent+SendSz, 
45027:                                                      Received+RecvSz, 
45028:                                                      Start);
45029:                 {error, RReason} ->
45030:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p: "
45031:                                 "~n   ~p", [N, Num, RReason, mq()]),
45032:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
45033:             end;
45034:         {error, SReason} ->
45035:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p"
45036:                         "~n   ~p", [N, Num, SReason, mq()]),
45037:             case SReason of
45038:                 emsgsize ->
45039:                     exit({send, SReason, N, byte_size(Data)});
45040:                 _ ->
45041:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
45042:             end
45043:     end.
45044: 
45045: tpp_tcp_client_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
45046:     case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
45047:         {ok, Sock} ->
45048:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
45049:             Sock;
45050:         {error, Reason} ->
45051:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
45052:     end.
45053: 
45054: tpp_tcp_client_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
45055:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
45056:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
45057:         ok ->
45058:             case socket:sockname(Sock) of
45059:                 {ok, #{family := local, path := Path}} ->
45060:                     Path;
45061:                 {ok, _} ->
45062:                     undefined;
45063:                 {error, Reason1} ->
45064:                     exit({sockname, Reason1})
45065:             end;
45066:         {error, Reason2} ->
45067:             exit({bind, Reason2})
45068:     end.
45069: 
45070: tpp_tcp_client_sock_connect(Sock, ServerSA) ->
45071:     case socket:connect(Sock, ServerSA) of
45072:         ok ->
45073:             ok;
45074:         {error, Reason} ->
45075:             exit({connect, Reason})
45076:     end.
45077: 
45078: tpp_tcp_client_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
45079:     case socket:close(Sock) of
45080:         ok ->
45081:             unlink_path(Path),
45082:             ok;
45083:         {error, closed} ->
45084:             ok;
45085:         {error, Reason} ->
45086:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed closing: "
45087:                         "~n   Reason: ~p", [Reason]),
45088:             unlink_path(Path),
45089:             {error, {close, Reason}}
45090:     end.
45091: 
45092:     
45093:     
45094: -define(TPP_REQUEST, 1).
45095: -define(TPP_REPLY,   2).
45096: 
45097: tpp_tcp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
45098:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
45099: 
45100: tpp_tcp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
45101:     tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
45102: 
45103: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
45104:     case Recv(Sock, 0) of
45105:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} 
45106:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
45107:             %% We got it all
45108:             {ok, Data, size(Msg)};
45109:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg} ->
45110:             Remains = Sz - size(Data),
45111:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remains, size(Msg), [Data]);
45112:         {ok, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>} ->
45113:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
45114:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
45115:             ERROR
45116:     end.
45117: 
45118: tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, Remaining, AccSz, Acc) ->
45119:     case Recv(Sock, Remaining) of
45120:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining =:= size(Data)) ->
45121:             %% We got the rest
45122:             TotSz = AccSz + size(Data),
45123:             {ok, erlang:iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse([Data | Acc])), TotSz};
45124:         {ok, Data} when (Remaining > size(Data)) ->
45125:             tpp_tcp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag, 
45126:                          Remaining - size(Data), AccSz + size(Data),     
45127:                          [Data | Acc]);
45128:         {error, _R} = ERROR ->
45129:             ERROR
45130:     end.
45131:                                                          
45132:             
45133: tpp_tcp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data) ->
45134:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data).
45135: 
45136: tpp_tcp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data) ->
45137:     tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data).
45138: 
45139: tpp_tcp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data) ->
45140:     DataSz = size(Data),
45141:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
45142:     tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, 0).
45143: 
45144: tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
45145:     case Send(Sock, Msg) of
45146:         ok ->
45147:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
45148:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
45149:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
45150:             tpp_tcp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
45151:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
45152:             ERROR
45153:     end.
45154:     
45155: 
45156: %% size_of_data(Data) when is_binary(Data) ->
45157: %%     size(Data);
45158: %% size_of_data(Data) when is_list(Data) ->
45159: %%     size_of_iovec(Data, 0).
45160: 
45161: %% size_of_iovec([], Sz) ->
45162: %%     Sz;
45163: %% size_of_iovec([B|IOVec], Sz) ->
45164: %%     size_of_iovec(IOVec, Sz+size(B)).
45165: 
45166: 
45167: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
45168: 
45169: %% Ping-Pong for UDP
45170: 
45171: traffic_ping_pong_sendto_and_recvfrom_udp(InitState) ->
45172:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) ->
45173:                    socket:sendto(Sock, Data, Dest)
45174:            end,
45175:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)         ->
45176:                    socket:recvfrom(Sock, Sz)
45177:            end,
45178:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
45179:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
45180:                            },
45181:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
45182: 
45183: traffic_ping_pong_sendmsg_and_recvmsg_udp(InitState) ->
45184:     Send = fun(Sock, Data, Dest) when is_binary(Data) ->
45185:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => [Data]},
45186:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg);
45187:               (Sock, Data, Dest) when is_list(Data) -> %% We assume iovec...
45188:                    Msg = #{addr => Dest, iov => Data},
45189:                    socket:sendmsg(Sock, Msg)
45190:            end,
45191:     Recv = fun(Sock, Sz)   ->
45192:                    case socket:recvmsg(Sock, Sz, 0) of
45193:                        {ok, #{addr  := Source,
45194:                               iov   := [Data]}} ->
45195:                            {ok, {Source, Data}};
45196:                        {error, _} = ERROR ->
45197:                            ERROR
45198:                    end
45199:            end,
45200:     InitState2 = InitState#{send => Send, % Send function
45201:                             recv => Recv  % Receive function
45202:                            },
45203:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(InitState2).
45204: 
45205: 
45206: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp(#{msg := Msg} = InitState) ->
45207:     Fun = fun(Sock) -> 
45208:                   {ok, RcvSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf),
45209:                   if (RcvSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
45210:                           i("adjust socket rcvbuf buffer size"),
45211:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
45212:                      true ->
45213:                           ok
45214:                   end,
45215:                   {ok, SndSz} = socket:getopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf),
45216:                   if (SndSz =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
45217:                           i("adjust socket sndbuf buffer size"),
45218:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, socket, sndbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
45219:                      true ->
45220:                           ok
45221:                   end,
45222:                   {ok, OtpRcvBuf} = socket:getopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf),
45223:                   if
45224:                       (OtpRcvBuf =< (8+size(Msg))) ->
45225:                           i("adjust otp rcvbuf buffer size"),
45226:                           ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, rcvbuf, 1024+size(Msg));
45227:                       true ->
45228:                           ok
45229:                   end
45230:           end,
45231:     traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState#{buf_init => Fun}).
45232: 
45233: traffic_ping_pong_send_and_receive_udp2(InitState) ->
45234:     ServerSeq =
45235:         [
45236:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
45237:          #{desc => "await start",
45238:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
45239:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
45240:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
45241:                    end},
45242:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
45243:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
45244:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
45245:                            ok
45246:                    end},
45247: 
45248:          %% *** Init part ***
45249:          #{desc => "which local address",
45250:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
45251:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
45252:                            {ok, State#{local_sa => LSA}}
45253:                    end},
45254:          #{desc => "create socket",
45255:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain, proto := Proto} = State) ->
45256:                            case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
45257:                                {ok, Sock} ->
45258:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
45259:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45260:                                    ERROR
45261:                            end
45262:                    end},
45263:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
45264:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
45265:                          sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = _State) ->
45266:                            case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
45267:                                ok ->
45268:                                    ok;
45269:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45270:                                    ERROR
45271:                            end;
45272:                       (#{sock := Sock, local_sa := LSA} = State) ->
45273:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
45274:                                ok ->
45275:                                    Port = sock_port(Sock),
45276:                                    {ok, State#{port => Port}};
45277:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45278:                                    ERROR
45279:                            end
45280:                    end},
45281:          #{desc => "maybe init buffers",
45282:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, buf_init := BufInit} = _State) ->
45283:                            BufInit(Sock)
45284:                    end},
45285:          #{desc => "create handler",
45286:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
45287:                            Handler = tpp_udp_server_handler_create(),
45288:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Handler]),
45289:                            {ok, State#{handler => Handler}}
45290:                    end},
45291:          #{desc => "monitor handler",
45292:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = _State) ->
45293:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Handler),
45294:                            ok
45295:                    end},
45296:          #{desc => "start handler",
45297:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
45298:                          sock    := Sock,
45299:                          send    := Send,
45300:                          recv    := Recv} = _State) ->
45301:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, {Sock, Send, Recv}),
45302:                            ok
45303:                    end},
45304:          #{desc => "await handler ready (init)",
45305:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45306:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
45307:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
45308:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
45309:                                ok ->
45310:                                    {ok, maps:remove(csock, State)};
45311:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45312:                                    ERROR
45313:                            end
45314:                    end},
45315:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
45316:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
45317:                          tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA}) ->
45318:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, LSA),
45319:                            ok;
45320:                       (#{tester := Tester, local_sa := LSA, port := Port}) ->
45321:                            ServerSA = LSA#{port => Port},
45322:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, ServerSA),
45323:                            ok
45324:                    end},
45325: 
45326:          %% The actual test
45327:          #{desc => "await continue (recv)",
45328:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45329:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
45330:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, recv, 
45331:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
45332:                    end},
45333:          #{desc => "order handler to recv",
45334:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
45335:                          sock    := _Sock} = _State) ->
45336:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
45337:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, recv),
45338:                            ok
45339:                    end},
45340:          #{desc => "await continue (close)",
45341:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45342:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
45343:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, close, 
45344:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
45345:                    end},
45346: 
45347:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
45348: 
45349:          #{desc => "close socket",
45350:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
45351:                            %% socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
45352:                            case socket:close(Sock) of
45353:                                ok ->
45354:                                    {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)};
45355:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45356:                                    ERROR
45357:                            end
45358:                    end},
45359:          #{desc => "(maybe) unlink socket",
45360:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := local,
45361:                          local_sa := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
45362:                            unlink_path(Path,
45363:                                        fun() ->
45364:                                                {ok, maps:remove(local_sa, State)}
45365:                                        end,
45366:                                        fun() ->
45367:                                                ok
45368:                                        end);
45369:                       (_) ->
45370:                            ok
45371:                    end},
45372:          #{desc => "announce ready (close)",
45373:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
45374:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, close),
45375:                            ok
45376:                    end},
45377:          #{desc => "await handler ready (recv)",
45378:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45379:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
45380:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, recv, 
45381:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
45382:                                {ok, Result} ->
45383:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("Result: ~p", [Result]),
45384:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
45385:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45386:                                    ERROR
45387:                            end
45388:                    end},
45389:          #{desc => "announce ready (recv)",
45390:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, 
45391:                          result := Result} = State) ->
45392:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, recv, Result),
45393:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
45394:                    end},
45395: 
45396:          %% Termination
45397:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
45398:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
45399:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
45400:                                ok ->
45401:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
45402:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45403:                                    ERROR
45404:                            end
45405:                    end},
45406:          #{desc => "stop handler",
45407:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
45408:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
45409:                            ok
45410:                    end},
45411:          #{desc => "await handler termination",
45412:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
45413:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
45414:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
45415:                            {ok, State1}
45416:                    end},
45417: 
45418:          %% *** We are done ***
45419:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
45420:         ],
45421: 
45422:     ClientSeq =
45423:         [
45424:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
45425:          #{desc => "await start",
45426:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
45427:                            {Tester, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
45428:                            {ok, State#{tester    => Tester, 
45429:                                        server_sa => ServerSA}}
45430:                    end},
45431:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
45432:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
45433:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
45434:                            ok
45435:                    end},
45436: 
45437:          %% *** Init part ***
45438:          #{desc => "create node",
45439:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
45440:                            {Peer, Node} = ?START_NODE("client"),
45441:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}}
45442:                    end},
45443:          #{desc => "monitor client node",
45444:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) ->
45445:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
45446:                            ok
45447:                    end},
45448:          #{desc => "create (remote) handler",
45449:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
45450:                            Pid = tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node),
45451:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("handler created: ~p", [Pid]),
45452:                            {ok, State#{handler => Pid}}
45453:                    end},
45454:          #{desc => "monitor remote handler",
45455:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Pid}) ->
45456:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
45457:                            ok
45458:                    end},
45459:          #{desc => "order remote handler to start",
45460:            cmd  => fun(#{handler   := Handler,
45461:                          server_sa := ServerSA,
45462:                          proto     := Proto,
45463:                          buf_init  := BufInit,
45464:                          send      := Send,
45465:                          recv      := Recv}) ->
45466:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Handler, 
45467:                                                {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit,
45468:                                                 Send, Recv}),
45469:                            ok
45470:                    end},
45471:          #{desc => "await (remote) handler ready",
45472:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45473:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
45474:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, init, 
45475:                                             [{tester, Tester}])
45476:                    end},
45477:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
45478:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
45479:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
45480:                            ok
45481:                    end},
45482: 
45483:          %% The actual test
45484:          #{desc => "await continue (send)",
45485:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45486:                          handler := Handler} = _State) ->
45487:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, 
45488:                                                send, 
45489:                                                [{handler, Handler}])
45490:                    end},
45491:          #{desc => "order handler to continue (send)",
45492:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler,
45493:                          msg     := Msg,
45494:                          num     := Num} = State) ->
45495:                            Data = {Msg, Num},
45496:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Handler, send, Data),
45497:                            {ok, maps:remove(data, State)}
45498:                    end},
45499:          #{desc => "await remote handler ready (send)",
45500:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
45501:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
45502:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Handler, handler, send, 
45503:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
45504:                                {ok, Result} ->
45505:                                    %% ?SEV_IPRINT("remote client result: "
45506:                                    %%             "~n   ~p", [Result]),
45507:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
45508:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45509:                                    ERROR
45510:                            end
45511:                    end},
45512:          #{desc => "announce ready (send)",
45513:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester, result := Result} = State) ->
45514:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, send, Result),
45515:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
45516:                    end},
45517: 
45518:          %% Termination
45519:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
45520:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
45521:                          handler := Handler} = State) ->
45522:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
45523:                                                      [{handler, Handler}]) of
45524:                                ok ->
45525:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
45526:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45527:                                    ERROR
45528:                            end
45529:                    end},
45530:          #{desc => "stop (remote) handler",
45531:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler}) ->
45532:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Handler),
45533:                            ok
45534:                    end},
45535:          #{desc => "await (remote) handler termination",
45536:            cmd  => fun(#{handler := Handler} = State) ->
45537:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Handler),
45538:                            State1 = maps:remove(handler, State),
45539:                            {ok, State1}
45540:                    end},
45541:          #{desc => "stop client node",
45542:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) ->
45543:                            {ok,
45544:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
45545:                                 ok ->
45546:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
45547:                                 {error, Reason} ->
45548:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
45549:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
45550:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
45551:                             catch
45552:                                 C:E:S ->
45553:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
45554:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
45555:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
45556:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
45557:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
45558:                             end}
45559:                    end},
45560:          #{desc => "await client node termination",
45561:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = State) ->
45562:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
45563:                            receive
45564:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
45565:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
45566:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
45567:                                    {ok, State1}
45568:                            end;
45569:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
45570:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
45571:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
45572:                            {ok, State1}
45573:                    end},
45574: 
45575:          %% *** We are done ***
45576:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
45577:         ],
45578: 
45579:     TesterSeq =
45580:         [
45581:          %% *** Init part ***
45582:          #{desc => "monitor server",
45583:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45584:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
45585:                            ok
45586:                    end},
45587:          #{desc => "monitor client",
45588:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
45589:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
45590:                            ok
45591:                    end},
45592: 
45593:          %% Start the server
45594:          #{desc => "order server start",
45595:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45596:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
45597:                            ok
45598:                    end},
45599:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
45600:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
45601:                            {ok, ServerSA} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
45602:                            {ok, State#{server_sa => ServerSA}}
45603:                    end},
45604: 
45605:          %% Start the client
45606:          #{desc => "order client start",
45607:            cmd  => fun(#{client    := Pid, 
45608:                          server_sa := ServerSA} = _State) ->
45609:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, ServerSA),
45610:                            ok
45611:                    end},
45612:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
45613:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
45614:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client, init)
45615:                    end},
45616:  
45617:          %% The actual test
45618:          #{desc => "order server continue (recv)",
45619:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45620:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, recv),
45621:                            ok
45622:                    end},
45623:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
45624:          #{desc => "order client continue (send)",
45625:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
45626:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, send),
45627:                            ok
45628:                    end},
45629:          #{desc => "await client ready (send)",
45630:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
45631:                          client := Client} = State) ->
45632:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, send, 
45633:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
45634:                                {ok, {_, _, _, _} = Result} ->
45635:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("client result: "
45636:                                                "~n   ~p", [Result]),
45637:                                    {ok, State#{client_result => Result}};
45638:                                {ok, BadResult} ->
45639:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("client result: "
45640:                                                "~n   ~p", [BadResult]),
45641:                                    {error, {invalid_client_result, BadResult}};
45642:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45643:                                    ERROR
45644:                            end
45645:                    end},
45646:          #{desc => "order server continue (close)",
45647:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45648:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, close),
45649:                            ok
45650:                    end},
45651:          #{desc => "await server ready (close)",
45652:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45653:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, close)
45654:                    end},
45655:          %% Because of the way we control the server, there is no real 
45656:          %% point in collecting statistics from it (the time will include
45657:          %% our communication with it).
45658:          #{desc => "await server ready (recv)",
45659:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
45660:                          client := Client} = _State) ->
45661:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Server, server, recv,
45662:                                                  [{client, Client}]) of
45663:                                {ok, _Result} ->
45664:                                    ok;
45665:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45666:                                    ERROR
45667:                            end
45668:                    end},
45669:          #{desc => "present result",
45670:            cmd  => fun(#{client_result := CRes,
45671:                          num           := Num} = State) ->
45672:                            {CSent, CReceived, CStart, CStop} = CRes,
45673:                            CTime = tdiff(CStart, CStop),
45674:                            if
45675:                                (CTime =:= 0) ->
45676:                                    {skip,
45677:                                     ?F("Invalid exec time: ~w ", [CTime])};
45678:                                true ->
45679:                                    %% Note that the sizes we are counting is
45680:                                    %% only the "data" part of the messages.
45681:                                    %% There is also fixed header for each
45682:                                    %% message, which of course is small for
45683:                                    %% the large messages, but comparatively
45684:                                    %% big for the small messages!
45685:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
45686:                                       "Results: ~w messages exchanged"
45687:                                       "~n   Client: ~w msec"
45688:                                       "~n      ~.2f msec/message (roundtrip)"
45689:                                       "~n      ~.2f messages/msec (roundtrip)"
45690:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec sent"
45691:                                       "~n      ~w bytes/msec received",
45692:                                       [Num,
45693:                                        CTime,
45694:                                        CTime / Num,
45695:                                        Num / CTime,
45696:                                        CSent div CTime,
45697:                                        CReceived div CTime]),
45698:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client_result, State),
45699:                                    {ok, State1}
45700:                            end
45701:                    end},
45702: 
45703:          %% Terminations
45704:          #{desc => "order client to terminate",
45705:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
45706:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
45707:                            ok
45708:                    end},
45709:          #{desc => "await client termination",
45710:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = State) ->
45711:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
45712:                                ok ->
45713:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client, State),
45714:                                    {ok, State1};
45715:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45716:                                    ERROR
45717:                            end
45718:                    end},
45719:          #{desc => "order server to terminate",
45720:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
45721:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
45722:                            ok
45723:                    end},
45724:          #{desc => "await server termination",
45725:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = State) ->
45726:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
45727:                                ok ->
45728:                                    State1 = maps:remove(server, State),
45729:                                    {ok, State1};
45730:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
45731:                                    ERROR
45732:                            end
45733:                    end},
45734: 
45735: 
45736:          %% *** We are done ***
45737:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
45738:         ],
45739: 
45740: 
45741:     i("start server evaluator"),
45742:     ServerInitState = #{domain   => maps:get(domain,   InitState),
45743:                         proto    => maps:get(proto,    InitState),
45744:                         recv     => maps:get(recv,     InitState),
45745:                         send     => maps:get(send,     InitState),
45746:                         buf_init => maps:get(buf_init, InitState)},
45747:     Server = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
45748: 
45749:     i("start client evaluator(s)"),
45750:     ClientInitState = InitState#{host => local_host()},
45751:     Client = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
45752: 
45753:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
45754:     TesterInitState = #{server => Server#ev.pid,
45755:                         client => Client#ev.pid,
45756:                         num    => maps:get(num, InitState)},
45757:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
45758: 
45759:     i("await evaluator"),
45760:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
45761: 
45762: 
45763: 
45764: %% Server side handler process
45765: %% We don't actually need a separate process for this socket, 
45766: %% but we do it anyway to simplify the sequence.
45767: tpp_udp_server_handler_create() ->
45768:     Self = self(),
45769:     erlang:spawn(fun() -> tpp_udp_server_handler(Self) end).
45770: 
45771: tpp_udp_server_handler(Parent) ->
45772:     tpp_udp_server_handler_init(Parent),
45773:     {Sock, Send, Recv} = tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent),
45774:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
45775:     tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, recv),
45776:     Result = tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv),
45777:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, recv, Result),
45778:     Reason = tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
45779:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
45780:     exit(Reason).
45781: 
45782: tpp_udp_server_handler_init(Parent) ->
45783:     put(sname, "shandler"),
45784:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
45785:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
45786:     ok.
45787: 
45788: tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, Send, Recv) ->
45789:     tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
45790:                                              0, 0, 0, undefined).
45791: 
45792: tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv, 
45793:                                          N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
45794:     %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
45795:     %% if 
45796:     %%     (N =:= (?TPP_SMALL_NUM-2)) -> 
45797:     %%         ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] try receive", [N]),
45798:     %%         socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true); 
45799:     %%     true -> ok
45800:     %% end,
45801:     try tpp_udp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) of
45802:         {ok, Msg, RecvSz, From} ->
45803:             NewStart = if (Start =:= undefined) -> ?LIB:timestamp(); 
45804:                           true -> Start end,
45805:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("[~w] received - now try send", [N]),
45806:             try tpp_udp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Msg, From) of
45807:                 {ok, SendSz} ->
45808:                     tpp_udp_server_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Send, Recv,
45809:                                                              N+1,
45810:                                                              Sent+SendSz,
45811:                                                              Received+RecvSz,
45812:                                                              NewStart);
45813:                 {error, SReason} ->
45814:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w): ~p", [N, SReason]),
45815:                     exit({send, SReason, N})
45816: 	    catch
45817: 		SC:SE:SS ->
45818: 		    exit({send, {SC, SE, SS}, N})
45819:             end;
45820:         {error, closed} ->
45821:             ?SEV_IPRINT("closed - we are done: ~w, ~w, ~w",
45822:                         [N, Sent, Received]),
45823:             Stop = ?LIB:timestamp(),
45824:             {N, Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
45825:         {error, RReason} ->
45826:             ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w): ~p", [N, RReason]),
45827:             exit({recv, RReason, N})
45828:     catch
45829: 	RC:RE:RS ->
45830: 	    exit({recv, {RC, RE, RS}, N})	
45831:     end.
45832:   
45833: 
45834: %% The (remote) client side handler process
45835: 
45836: tpp_udp_client_handler_create(Node) ->
45837:     Self = self(),
