45838:     Fun  = fun() -> put(sname, "chandler"), tpp_udp_client_handler(Self) end,
45839:     erlang:spawn(Node, Fun).
45840: 
45841: tpp_udp_client_handler(Parent) ->
45842:     tpp_udp_client_handler_init(Parent),
45843:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start command"),
45844:     {ServerSA, Proto, BufInit, Send, Recv} = tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent),
45845:     ?SEV_IPRINT("start command with"
45846:                 "~n   ServerSA: ~p", [ServerSA]),
45847:     Domain   = maps:get(family, ServerSA),
45848:     Sock     = tpp_udp_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit),
45849:     Path     = tpp_udp_sock_bind(Sock, Domain),
45850:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready", []),
45851:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, init),
45852:     {InitMsg, Num} = tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, send),
45853:     ?SEV_IPRINT("received continue with"
45854:                 "~n   Num: ~p", [Num]),
45855:     Result = tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, ServerSA, 
45856:                                                  Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num),
45857:     ?SEV_IPRINT("ready"),
45858:     tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, send, Result),
45859:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
45860:     Reason = tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent),
45861:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminate with ~p", [Reason]),
45862:     tpp_udp_sock_close(Sock, Path),
45863:     ?SEV_IPRINT("terminating"),
45864:     exit(Reason).
45865: 
45866: tpp_udp_client_handler_init(Parent) ->
45867:     put(sname, "chandler"),
45868:     ?SEV_IPRINT("init"),
45869:     _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Parent),
45870:     ok.
45871: 
45872: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange(Sock, ServerSA,
45873:                                     Send, Recv, InitMsg, Num) ->
45874:     Start = ?LIB:timestamp(),
45875:     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, ServerSA,
45876:                                              Send, Recv, InitMsg,
45877:                                              Num, 0, 0, 0, Start).
45878: 
45879: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(_Sock, _Dest, _Send, _Recv, _Msg,
45880:                                          Num, Num, Sent, Received,
45881:                                          Start) ->
45882:     Stop = ?LIB:timestamp(),
45883:     {Sent, Received, Start, Stop};
45884: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock,
45885: 					 #{family := local} = Dest,
45886: 					 Send, Recv, Data,
45887:                                          Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
45888:     case tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) of
45889:         {ok, SendSz} ->
45890:             case tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
45891:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz, Dest} ->
45892:                     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Dest,
45893:                                                              Send, Recv,
45894:                                                              NewData, Num, N+1,
45895:                                                              Sent+SendSz, 
45896:                                                              Received+RecvSz, 
45897:                                                              Start);
45898:                 {error, RReason} ->
45899:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, RReason]),
45900:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
45901:             end;
45902:         {error, SReason} ->
45903:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, SReason]),
45904:             exit({send, SReason, N})
45905:     end;
45906: tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock,
45907: 					 #{addr := Addr, port := Port} = Dest0,
45908: 					 Send, Recv, Data,
45909:                                          Num, N, Sent, Received, Start) ->
45910:     case tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest0) of
45911:         {ok, SendSz} ->
45912:             case tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) of
45913:                 {ok, NewData, RecvSz, #{addr := Addr, port := Port} = Dest1} ->
45914:                     tpp_udp_client_handler_msg_exchange_loop(Sock, Dest1,
45915:                                                              Send, Recv,
45916:                                                              NewData, Num, N+1,
45917:                                                              Sent+SendSz, 
45918:                                                              Received+RecvSz, 
45919:                                                              Start);
45920:                 {error, RReason} ->
45921:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("recv (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, RReason]),
45922:                     exit({recv, RReason, N})
45923:             end;
45924:         {error, SReason} ->
45925:             ?SEV_EPRINT("send (~w of ~w): ~p", [N, Num, SReason]),
45926:             exit({send, SReason, N})
45927:     end.
45928: 
45929: 
45930: tpp_udp_recv_req(Sock, Recv) ->
45931:     tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REQUEST).
45932: 
45933: tpp_udp_recv_rep(Sock, Recv) ->
45934:     tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, ?TPP_REPLY).
45935: 
45936: tpp_udp_recv(Sock, Recv, Tag) ->
45937:     %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
45938:     try Recv(Sock, 0) of
45939:         {ok, {Source, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>> = Msg}} 
45940:           when (Sz =:= size(Data)) ->
45941: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
45942:             %% We got it all
45943:             %% ?SEV_IPRINT("tpp_udp_recv -> got all: "
45944:             %%             "~n   Source:     ~p"
45945:             %%             "~n   Tag:        ~p"
45946:             %%             "~n   Sz:         ~p"
45947:             %%             "~n   size(Data): ~p",
45948:             %%             [Source, Tag, Sz, size(Data)]),
45949:             {ok, Data, size(Msg), Source};
45950:         {ok, {_Source, <<Tag:32/integer, Sz:32/integer, Data/binary>>}} ->
45951: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
45952:             {error, {invalid_msg, Sz, size(Data)}};
45953:         {ok, {_, <<Tag:32/integer, _/binary>>}} ->
45954: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
45955:             {error, {invalid_msg_tag, Tag}};
45956:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
45957: 	    %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, false),
45958:             ERROR
45959:     catch
45960: 	C:E:S ->
45961: 	    {error, {caught, C, E, S}}
45962:     end.
45963: 
45964: tpp_udp_send_req(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) ->
45965:     tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REQUEST, Data, Dest).
45966: 
45967: tpp_udp_send_rep(Sock, Send, Data, Dest) ->
45968:     tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, ?TPP_REPLY, Data, Dest).
45969: 
45970: tpp_udp_send(Sock, Send, Tag, Data, Dest) ->
45971:     DataSz = size(Data),
45972:     Msg    = <<Tag:32/integer, DataSz:32/integer, Data/binary>>,
45973:     tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, Dest, 0).
45974: 
45975: tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, Msg, Dest, AccSz) when is_binary(Msg) ->
45976:     case Send(Sock, Msg, Dest) of
45977:         ok ->
45978:             {ok, AccSz+size(Msg)};
45979:         {ok, Rest} -> % This is an IOVec
45980:             RestBin = list_to_binary(Rest),
45981:             tpp_udp_send_msg(Sock, Send, RestBin, Dest,
45982:                              AccSz+(size(Msg)-size(RestBin)));
45983:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
45984:             ERROR
45985:     end.
45986:     
45987: 
45988: tpp_udp_handler_await_start(Parent) ->
45989:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await start"),
45990:     ?SEV_AWAIT_START(Parent).
45991: 
45992: tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan) ->
45993:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
45994:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan).
45995: tpp_udp_handler_announce_ready(Parent, Slogan, Extra) ->
45996:     ?SEV_IPRINT("announce ready (~p)", [Slogan]),
45997:     ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Parent, Slogan, Extra).
45998: 
45999: tpp_udp_handler_await_continue(Parent, Slogan) ->
46000:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await continue (~p)", [Slogan]),
46001:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Parent, parent, Slogan) of
46002:         ok ->
46003:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok", [Slogan]),
46004:             ok;
46005:         {ok, Data} ->
46006:             ?SEV_IPRINT("continue (~p): ok with data", [Slogan]),
46007:             Data;
46008:         {error, Reason} ->
46009:             ?SEV_EPRINT("continue (~p): error"
46010:                         "~n   ~p", [Slogan, Reason]),
46011:             exit({continue, Slogan, Reason})
46012:     end.
46013: 
46014: tpp_udp_handler_await_terminate(Parent) ->
46015:     ?SEV_IPRINT("await terminate"),
46016:     case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Parent, parent) of
46017:         ok ->
46018:             ok;
46019:         {error, Reason} ->
46020:             Reason
46021:     end.
46022: 
46023: 
46024: tpp_udp_sock_open(Domain, Proto, BufInit) ->
46025:     case socket:open(Domain, dgram, Proto) of
46026:         {ok, Sock} ->
46027:             ok = BufInit(Sock),
46028:             Sock;
46029:         {error, Reason} ->
46030:             exit({open_failed, Reason})
46031:     end.
46032: 
46033: tpp_udp_sock_bind(Sock, Domain) ->
46034:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
46035:     case socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
46036:         ok ->
46037:             ok;
46038:         {error, Reason} ->
46039:             exit({bind, Reason})
46040:     end.
46041: 
46042: tpp_udp_sock_close(Sock, Path) ->
46043:     case socket:close(Sock) of
46044:         ok ->
46045:             unlink_path(Path),
46046:             ok;
46047:         {error, Reason} ->
46048:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed closing socket: "
46049:                         "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
46050:             unlink_path(Path),
46051:             {error, {close, Reason}}
46052:     end.
46053: 
46054: 
46055: 
46056: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46057: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46058: %%                                                                     %%
46059: %%                           TIME TEST                                 %%
46060: %%                                                                     %%
46061: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46062: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46063: 
46064: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46065: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46066: %% ping-pong like test case.
46067: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46068: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46069: %% Message Size: small (=1)
46070: %% Domain:       inet
46071: %%
46072: 
46073: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46074:     Runtime        = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46075:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp4,
46076:               Runtime,
46077:               inet,
46078:               gen, false,
46079:               gen, false,
46080:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
46081: 
46082: 
46083: 
46084: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46085: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46086: %% ping-pong like test case.
46087: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46088: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46089: %% Message Size: small (=1)
46090: %% Domain:       inet6
46091: %% 
46092: 
46093: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46094:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46095:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_small_tcp6,
46096:               Runtime,
46097:               inet6,
46098:               gen, false,
46099:               gen, false,
46100:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
46101: 
46102: 
46103: 
46104: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46105: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46106: %% ping-pong like test case.
46107: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46108: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46109: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
46110: %% Domain:       inet
46111: %%
46112: 
46113: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46114:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46115:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp4,
46116:               Runtime,
46117:               inet,
46118:               gen, false,
46119:               gen, false,
46120:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
46121: 
46122: 
46123: 
46124: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46125: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46126: %% ping-pong like test case.
46127: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46128: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46129: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
46130: %% Domain:       inet6
46131: %% 
46132: 
46133: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46134:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46135:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_medium_tcp6,
46136:               Runtime,
46137:               inet6,
46138:               gen, false,
46139:               gen, false,
46140:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
46141: 
46142: 
46143: 
46144: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46145: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46146: %% ping-pong like test case.
46147: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46148: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46149: %% Message Size: large (=3)
46150: %% Domain:       inet
46151: %%
46152: 
46153: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46154:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46155:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp4,
46156:               Runtime,
46157:               inet,
46158:               gen, false,
46159:               gen, false,
46160:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).
46161: 
46162: 
46163: 
46164: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46165: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46166: %% ping-pong like test case.
46167: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46168: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46169: %% Message Size: large (=3)
46170: %% Domain:       inet6
46171: %% 
46172: 
46173: ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46174:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46175:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgenf_large_tcp6,
46176:               Runtime,
46177:               inet6,
46178:               gen, false,
46179:               gen, false,
46180:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).
46181: 
46182: 
46183: 
46184: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46185: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46186: %% ping-pong like test case.
46187: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46188: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46189: %% Message Size: small (=1)
46190: %% Domain:       inet
46191: %%
46192: 
46193: ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46194:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46195:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp4,
46196:               Runtime,
46197:               inet,
46198:               gen, false,
46199:               gen, once,
46200:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
46201: 
46202: 
46203: 
46204: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46205: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46206: %% ping-pong like test case.
46207: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46208: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46209: %% Message Size: small (=1)
46210: %% Domain:       inet6
46211: %% 
46212: 
46213: ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46214:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46215:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgeno_small_tcp6,
46216:               Runtime,
46217:               inet6,
46218:               gen, false,
46219:               gen, once,
46220:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
46221: 
46222: 
46223: 
46224: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46225: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46226: %% ping-pong like test case.
46227: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46228: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46229: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
46230: %% Domain:       inet
46231: %%

46236:               Runtime,
46237:               inet,
46238:               gen, false,
46239:               gen, once,
46240:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
46241: 
46242: 
46243: 
46244: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46245: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46246: %% ping-pong like test case.
46247: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46248: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46249: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
46250: %% Domain:       inet6
46251: %%

46254:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46255:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgeno_medium_tcp6,
46256:               Runtime,
46257:               inet6,
46258:               gen, false,
46259:               gen, once,
46260:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
46261: 
46262: 
46263: 
46264: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46265: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46266: %% ping-pong like test case.
46267: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46268: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46269: %% Message Size: large (=3)
46270: %% Domain:       inet
46271: %%
46272: 
46273: ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46274:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46275:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp4,
46276:               Runtime,
46277:               inet,
46278:               gen, false,
46279:               gen, once,
46280:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).
46281: 
46282: 
46283: 
46284: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46285: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46286: %% ping-pong like test case.
46287: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46288: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46289: %% Message Size: large (=3)
46290: %% Domain:       inet6
46291: %% 
46292: 
46293: ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46294:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46295:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgeno_large_tcp6,
46296:               Runtime,
46297:               inet6,
46298:               gen, false,
46299:               gen, once,
46300:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).
46301: 
46302: 
46303: 
46304: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46305: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46306: %% ping-pong like test case.
46307: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46308: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = true
46309: %% Message Size: small (=1)
46310: %% Domain:       inet
46311: %%
46312: 
46313: ttest_sgenf_cgent_small_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46314:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46315:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgenf_cgent_small_tcp4,
46316:               Runtime,
46317:               inet,
46318:               gen, false,
46319:               gen, true,
46320:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).

46329: %% Message Size: small (=1)

46937:               inet6,
46938:               gen, once,
46939:               gen, false,
46940:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
46941: 
46942: 
46943: 
46944: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
46945: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
46946: %% ping-pong like test case.
46947: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
46948: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
46949: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
46950: %% Domain:       inet
46951: %%
46952: 
46953: ttest_sgeno_cgenf_medium_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
46954:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
46955:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgeno_cgenf_medium_tcp4,
46956:               Runtime,
46957:               inet,
46958:               gen, once,
46959:               gen, false,
46960:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).

47561:

47564: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
47565: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
47566: %% ping-pong like test case.
47567: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = once
47568: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
47569: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
47570: %% Domain:       inet6
47571: %% 
47572: 
47573: ttest_sgeno_csockt_medium_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
47574:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
47575:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgeno_csockt_medium_tcp6,
47576:               Runtime,
47577:               inet6,
47578:               gen, once,
47579:               sock, true,
47580:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).

48179: %% Server:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = true
48180: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = once
48181: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
48182: %% Domain:       inet6
48183: %% 
48184: 
48185: ttest_sgent_csocko_medium_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
48186:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
48187:     ttest_tcp(ttest_sgent_csocko_medium_tcp6,
48188:               Runtime,
48189:               inet6,
48190:               gen, true,
48191:               sock, once,
48192:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
48193:

48201: %% Message Size: large (=3)

48804: 
48805: ttest_ssockf_cgsf_large_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
48806:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
48807:     ttest_tcp(?FUNCTION_NAME,
48808:               Runtime,
48809:               inet,
48810:               sock, false,
48811:               gs, false,
48812:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).
48813:

49425: ttest_ssocko_cgenf_medium_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
49426:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
49427:     ttest_tcp(ttest_ssocko_cgenf_medium_tcp4,
49428:               Runtime,
49429:               inet,
49430:               sock, once,
49431:               gen, false,
49432:               2, ttest_medium_max_outstanding(Config)).
49433:

49438: %% ping-pong like test case.
49439: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = once
49440: %% Client:       Transport = gen_tcp, Active = false
49441: %% Message Size: medium (=2)
49442: %% Domain:       inet6

50047:     ttest_tcp(ttest_ssocko_csocko_large_tcp4,
50048:               Runtime,
50049:               inet,
50050:               sock, once,
50051:               sock, once,
50052:               3, ttest_large_max_outstanding(Config)).

50665: ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
50666:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
50667:     ttest_tcp(ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcp6,
50668:               Runtime,
50669:               inet6,
50670:               sock, true,
50671:               sock, false,
50672:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).
50673: 
50674: 
50675: 
50676: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
50677: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
50678: %% ping-pong like test case.
50679: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
50680: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = false
50681: %% Message Size: small (=1)
50682: %% Domain:       local
50683: %% 
50684: 
50685: ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcpL(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
50686:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
50687:     ttest_tcp(ttest_ssockt_csockf_small_tcpL,
50688:               Runtime,
50689:               local,
50690:               sock, true,

50692:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config)).

51138: %% ping-pong like test case.
51139: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51140: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true

51156: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51157: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
51158: %% ping-pong like test case.
51159: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51160: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51161: %% Message Size: large (=3)
51162: %% Domain:       local
51163: %% 
51164:

51176: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51177: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
51178: %% ping-pong like test case.
51179: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51180: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = once
51181: %% Message Size: small (=1)
51182: %% Domain:       inet
51183: %% Remote:       false (run everything on the local node)
51184: %%
51185: 
51186: ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
51187:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
51188:     ttest_tcp(?FUNCTION_NAME,
51189:               Runtime,
51190:               inet,
51191:               sock, true,
51192:               sock, once,
51193:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config),
51194: 	      false).
51195: 
51196: 
51197: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51198: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
51199: %% ping-pong like test case.
51200: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51201: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = once
51202: %% Message Size: small (=1)
51203: %% Domain:       inet6
51204: %% 
51205: 
51206: ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
51207:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
51208:     ttest_tcp(?FUNCTION_NAME,
51209:               Runtime,
51210:               inet6,
51211:               sock, true,
51212:               sock, once,
51213:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config),
51214: 	      false).
51215: 
51216: 
51217: 
51218: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51219: %% This test case uses the time test (ttest) utility to implement a 
51220: %% ping-pong like test case.
51221: %% Server:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = true
51222: %% Client:       Transport = socket(tcp), Active = once
51223: %% Message Size: small (=1)
51224: %% Domain:       local
51225: %% 
51226: 
51227: ttest_simple_ssockt_csocko_small_tcpL(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
51228:     Runtime = which_ttest_runtime(Config),
51229:     ttest_tcp(?FUNCTION_NAME,
51230:               Runtime,
51231:               local,
51232:               sock, true,
51233:               sock, once,
51234:               1, ttest_small_max_outstanding(Config),
51235: 	      false).
51236: 
51237: 
51238: 
51239: 
51240: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51241: 
51242: which_ttest_runtime(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
51243:     case lists:keysearch(esock_test_ttest_runtime, 1, Config) of
51244:         {value, {esock_test_ttest_runtime, Runtime}} ->
51245:             Runtime;
51246:         false ->
51247:             which_ttest_runtime_env()
51248:     end.
51249: 
51250: which_ttest_runtime_env() ->
51251:     which_ttest_runtime_env(os:getenv("ESOCK_TEST_TTEST_RUNTIME")).
51252: 
51253: which_ttest_runtime_env(TStr) when is_list(TStr) ->
51254:     which_ttest_runtime_env2(lists:reverse(TStr));
51255: which_ttest_runtime_env(false) ->
51256:     ?TTEST_RUNTIME.
51257: 
51258: 
51259: %% The format is: <int>[unit]
51260: %% where the optional unit can be:
51261: %% ms: milliseconds
51262: %% s:  seconds (default)
51263: %% m:  minutes
51264: which_ttest_runtime_env2([$s, $m | MS]) when (length(MS) > 0) ->
51265:     convert_time(MS, fun(X) -> X end);
51266: which_ttest_runtime_env2([$m | M]) when (length(M) > 0) ->
51267:     convert_time(M, fun(X) -> ?MINS(X) end);
51268: which_ttest_runtime_env2([$s | S]) when (length(S) > 0) ->
51269:     convert_time(S, fun(X) -> ?SECS(X) end);
51270: which_ttest_runtime_env2(S) ->
51271:     convert_time(S, fun(X) -> ?SECS(X) end).
51272: 
51273: convert_time(TStrRev, Convert) ->
51274:     try list_to_integer(lists:reverse(TStrRev)) of
51275:         I -> Convert(I)
51276:     catch
51277:         _:_ ->
51278:             ?TTEST_RUNTIME
51279:     end.
51280: 
51281: %% ttest_tcp(TC,
51282: %%           Domain,
51283: %%           ServerMod, ServerActive,
51284: %%           ClientMod, ClientActive,
51285: %%           MsgID, MaxOutstanding) ->
51286: %%     ttest_tcp(TC,
51287: %%               ?TTEST_RUNTIME,
51288: %%               Domain,
51289: %%               ServerMod, ServerActive,
51290: %%               ClientMod, ClientActive,
51291: %%               MsgID, MaxOutstanding).
51292: ttest_tcp(TC,
51293:           Runtime,
51294:           Domain,
51295:           ServerMod, ServerActive,
51296:           ClientMod, ClientActive,
51297:           MsgID, MaxOutstanding) ->
51298:     ttest_tcp(TC,
51299: 	      Runtime,
51300: 	      Domain,
51301: 	      ServerMod, ServerActive,
51302: 	      ClientMod, ClientActive,
51303: 	      MsgID, MaxOutstanding, true).
51304: 
51305: ttest_tcp(TC,
51306:           Runtime,
51307:           Domain,
51308:           ServerMod, ServerActive,
51309:           ClientMod, ClientActive,
51310:           MsgID, MaxOutstanding,
51311: 	  Remote) ->
51312:     tc_try(TC,
51313:            fun() ->
51314:                    if
51315:  
51316:                        (Domain =:= local) ->
51317:                            %% On darwin we seem to hit the system limit(s)
51318:                            %% much earlier.
51319:                            %% The tests "mostly" work, but random cases fail
51320:                            %% (even on reasonably powerful machines),
51321:                            %% so its much simpler to just skip on darwin...
51322:                            has_support_unix_domain_socket(),
51323:                            is_not_darwin();
51324:                        (Domain =:= inet) ->
51325:                            has_support_ipv4();
51326:                        (Domain =:= inet6) ->
51327:                            has_support_ipv6();
51328:                        true -> ok 
51329:                    end
51330:            end,
51331:            fun() ->
51332:                    %% This may be overkill, depending on the runtime,
51333:                    %% but better safe then sorry...
51334:                    ?TT(Runtime + ?SECS(60)),
51335:                    ?P("Parameters: "
51336:                       "~n   Domain:          ~p"
51337:                       "~n   Message ID:      ~p"
51338:                       "~n   Max Outstanding: ~p"
51339:                       "~n   Running Time:    ~p"
51340:                       "~n   Server Module:   ~p"
51341:                       "~n   Server Active:   ~p"
51342:                       "~n   Client Module:   ~p"
51343:                       "~n   Client Active:   ~p"
51344:                       "~n   Remote:          ~p",
51345:                       [Domain, MsgID, MaxOutstanding, Runtime,
51346:                        ServerMod, ServerActive, ClientMod, ClientActive,
51347: 		       Remote]),
51348:                    InitState = #{domain          => Domain,
51349:                                  msg_id          => MsgID,
51350:                                  max_outstanding => MaxOutstanding,
51351:                                  runtime         => Runtime,
51352:                                  server_mod      => ServerMod,
51353:                                  server_active   => ServerActive,
51354:                                  client_mod      => ClientMod,
51355:                                  client_active   => ClientActive,
51356: 				 remote          => Remote},
51357:                    ok = ttest_tcp(InitState)
51358:            end).
51359: 
51360: 
51361: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
51362: 
51363: ttest_tcp(InitState) ->
51364:     ServerSeq =
51365:         [
51366:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
51367:          #{desc => "await start",
51368:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
51369:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
51370:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
51371:                    end},
51372:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
51373:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
51374:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
51375:                            ok
51376:                    end},
51377: 
51378: 
51379:          %% *** Init part ***
51380:          #{desc => "(maybe) create node",
51381:            cmd  => fun(#{remote := true} = State) ->
51382:                            {Peer, Node} = ?START_NODE("server"),
51383: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("server node created:"
51384: 				       "~n   Peer: ~p"
51385: 				       "~n   Node: ~p", [Peer, Node]),
51386:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}};
51387: 		      (State) ->
51388: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("use local node for server"),
51389: 			   {ok, State#{peer => undefined, node => node()}}
51390:                    end},
51391:          #{desc => "(maybe) monitor server node",
51392:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) when (Node =/= node) ->
51393:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
51394: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("~p monitored", [Node]),
51395:                            ok;
51396: 		      (_State) ->
51397: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51398: 			   ok
51399:                    end},
51400:          #{desc => "start ttest (remote) server",
51401:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local = Domain,
51402:                          mod    := Mod,
51403:                          active := Active,
51404:                          node   := Node} = State) ->
51405:                            case ttest_tcp_server_start(Node,
51406:                                                        Domain, Mod, Active) of
51407:                                {ok, {{Pid, _}, Path}} ->
51408:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server started: "
51409:                                                "~n   Pid:  ~p"
51410:                                                "~n   Path: ~p", [Pid, Path]),
51411:                                    {ok, State#{rserver => Pid,
51412:                                                path    => Path}};
51413:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51414:                                    ERROR
51415:                            end;
51416:                       (#{domain := Domain,
51417:                          mod    := Mod,
51418:                          active := Active,
51419:                          node   := Node} = State) ->
51420:                            case ttest_tcp_server_start(Node,
51421:                                                        Domain, Mod, Active) of
51422:                                {ok, {{Pid, _}, {Addr, Port}}} ->
51423:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("server started: "
51424:                                                "~n   Pid:  ~p"
51425:                                                "~n   Addr: ~p"
51426:                                                "~n   Port: ~p",
51427:                                                [Pid, Addr, Port]),
51428:                                    {ok, State#{rserver => Pid,
51429:                                                addr    => Addr,
51430:                                                port    => Port}};
51431:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51432:                                    ERROR
51433:                            end
51434:                    end},
51435:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
51436:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
51437:                          tester := Tester,
51438:                          path   := Path}) ->
51439:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, Path),
51440:                            ok;
51441:                       (#{tester := Tester,
51442:                          addr   := Addr,
51443:                          port   := Port}) ->
51444:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, {Addr, Port}),
51445:                            ok
51446:                    end},
51447: 
51448: 
51449:          %% *** Termination ***
51450:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
51451:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester, 
51452:                          rserver := RServer} = State) ->
51453:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester,
51454:                                                      [{rserver, RServer}]) of
51455:                                ok ->
51456:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("received termination request"),
51457:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
51458:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
51459:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("received unexpected error: "
51460:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
51461:                                    ERROR
51462:                            end
51463:                    end},
51464:          %% The remote server is in a accept, with a timeout of 5 seconds,
51465:          %% so may have to wait a bit...
51466:          #{desc => "order (remote) ttest server terminate",
51467:            cmd  => fun(#{node    := _Node,
51468:                          rserver := RServer}) ->
51469:                            ttest_tcp_server_stop(RServer),
51470:                            ok
51471:                    end},
51472:          #{desc => "await ttest (remote) server termination",
51473:            cmd  => fun(#{rserver := RServer} = State) ->
51474:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RServer),
51475:                            State1 = maps:remove(rserver, State),
51476:                            {ok, State1}
51477:                    end},
51478:          #{desc => "(maybe) stop (server) node",
51479:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State)  when (Peer =/= undefined) ->
51480:                            {ok,
51481:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
51482:                                 ok ->
51483:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
51484:                                 {error, Reason} ->
51485:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
51486:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
51487:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
51488:                             catch
51489:                                 C:E:S ->
51490:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
51491:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
51492:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
51493:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
51494:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
51495:                             end};
51496: 		      (_) ->
51497:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51498: 			   ok
51499:                    end},
51500:          #{desc => "(maybe) await (server) node termination",
51501:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State)
51502: 			 when (Node =/= node()) ->
51503:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
51504:                            receive
51505:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
51506:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
51507:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
51508:                                    {ok, State1}
51509:                            end;
51510:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
51511:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
51512:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
51513:                            {ok, State1};
51514: 		      (State) ->
51515:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51516:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
51517:                            {ok, State1}
51518:                    end},
51519: 
51520: 
51521:          %% *** We are done ***
51522:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
51523:         ],
51524: 
51525:     ClientSeq =
51526:         [
51527:          %% *** Wait for start order part ***
51528:          #{desc => "await start",
51529:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
51530:                            {Tester, ServerPath} = 
51531:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
51532:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("started with server info: "
51533:                                        "~n   Path: ~p", [ServerPath]),
51534:                            {ok, State#{tester      => Tester,
51535:                                        server_path => ServerPath}};
51536:                       (State) ->
51537:                            {Tester, {ServerAddr, ServerPort}} = 
51538:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
51539:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("started with server info: "
51540:                                        "~n   Addr: ~p"
51541:                                        "~n   Port: ~p",
51542:                                        [ServerAddr, ServerPort]),
51543:                            {ok, State#{tester      => Tester,
51544:                                        server_addr => ServerAddr,
51545:                                        server_port => ServerPort}}
51546:                    end},
51547:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
51548:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
51549:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
51550:                            ok
51551:                    end},
51552: 
51553: 
51554:          %% *** Init part ***
51555:          #{desc => "create node",
51556:            cmd  => fun(#{remote := true, host := _Host} = State) ->
51557:                            %% Because peer does not accept a host argument,
51558:                            %% we can no longer start "remote" nodes...
51559:                            %% Not that we actually did that. We always
51560:                            %% used local-host.
51561:                            {Peer, Node} = ?START_NODE("client"),
51562:                            {ok, State#{peer => Peer, node => Node}};
51563: 		      (State) ->
51564: 			   {ok, State#{peer => undefined, node => node()}}
51565:                    end},
51566:          #{desc => "(maybe) monitor client node",
51567:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node} = _State) when (Node =/= node()) ->
51568:                            true = erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
51569: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("~p monitored", [Node]),
51570:                            ok;
51571: 		      (_) ->
51572: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51573: 			   ok
51574:                    end},
51575:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
51576:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
51577:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
51578:                            ok
51579:                    end},
51580: 
51581: 
51582:          %% The actual test
51583:          #{desc => "await continue (ttest)",
51584:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
51585:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, ttest),
51586:                            ok
51587:                    end},
51588:          #{desc => "start ttest (remote) client",
51589:            cmd  => fun(#{domain          := local = Domain,
51590:                          node            := Node,
51591:                          mod             := Mod,
51592:                          active          := Active,
51593:                          msg_id          := MsgID,
51594:                          max_outstanding := MaxOutstanding,
51595:                          runtime         := RunTime,
51596:                          server_path     := Path} = State) ->
51597:                            Self   = self(),
51598:                            Notify =
51599:                                fun(Result) ->
51600:                                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Self, ttest, Result)
51601:                                end,                           
51602:                            case ttest_tcp_client_start(Node, Notify,
51603:                                                        Domain, Mod,
51604:                                                        Path,
51605:                                                        Active,
51606:                                                        MsgID, MaxOutstanding,
51607:                                                        RunTime) of
51608:                                {ok, {Pid, _MRef}} ->
51609:                                    {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}};
51610:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51611:                                    ERROR
51612:                            end;
51613:                       (#{domain          := Domain,
51614:                          node            := Node,
51615:                          mod             := Mod,
51616:                          active          := Active,
51617:                          msg_id          := MsgID,
51618:                          max_outstanding := MaxOutstanding,
51619:                          runtime         := RunTime,
51620:                          server_addr     := Addr,
51621:                          server_port     := Port} = State) ->
51622:                            Self   = self(),
51623:                            Notify =
51624:                                fun(Result) ->
51625:                                        ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Self, ttest, Result)
51626:                                end,                           
51627:                            case ttest_tcp_client_start(Node, Notify,
51628:                                                        Domain, Mod,
51629:                                                        {Addr, Port},
51630:                                                        Active,
51631:                                                        MsgID, MaxOutstanding,
51632:                                                        RunTime) of
51633:                                {ok, {Pid, _MRef}} ->
51634:                                    {ok, State#{rclient => Pid}};
51635:                                {error, {connect, Reason, ServerInfo} = EI} ->
51636:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed connecting to server: "
51637:                                                "~n   Reason: ~p"
51638:                                                "~n   Server: ~p",
51639:                                                [Reason, ServerInfo]),
51640:                                    case Reason of
51641:                                        eaddrnotavail ->
51642:                                            {skip, Reason};
51643:                                        network_unreachable ->
51644:                                            {skip, Reason};
51645:                                        _ ->
51646:                                            {error, EI}
51647:                                    end;
51648:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51649:                                    ERROR
51650:                            end
51651:                    end},
51652:          #{desc => "await ttest ready",
51653:            cmd  => fun(#{tester  := Tester,
51654:                          rclient := RClient} = State) ->
51655:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(RClient, rclient, ttest, 
51656:                                                  [{tester, Tester}]) of
51657:                              {ok, Result} ->
51658:                                  {ok, State#{result => Result}};
51659:                              {error, _} = ERROR ->
51660:                                  ERROR
51661:                          end
51662:                    end},
51663:          #{desc => "await ttest (remote) client termination",
51664:            cmd  => fun(#{rclient := RClient} = State) ->
51665:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(RClient),
51666:                            State1 = maps:remove(rclient, State),
51667:                            {ok, State1}
51668:                    end},
51669:          #{desc => "announce ready (ttest)",
51670:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester,
51671:                          result := Result} = State) ->
51672:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, ttest, Result),
51673:                            {ok, maps:remove(result, State)}
51674:                    end},
51675: 
51676: 
51677:          %% *** Termination ***
51678:          #{desc => "await terminate (from tester)",
51679:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
51680:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
51681:                                ok ->
51682:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
51683:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51684:                                    ERROR
51685:                            end
51686:                    end},
51687:          #{desc => "(maybe) stop (client) node",
51688:            cmd  => fun(#{peer := Peer} = State) when (Peer =/= undefined) ->
51689:                            {ok,
51690:                             try peer:stop(Peer) of
51691:                                 ok ->
51692:                                     State#{node_stop => ok};
51693:                                 {error, Reason} ->
51694:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
51695:                                                 "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
51696:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
51697:                             catch
51698:                                 C:E:S ->
51699:                                     ?SEV_EPRINT("Unexpected node stop result: "
51700:                                                 "~n   Class: ~p"
51701:                                                 "~n   Error: ~p"
51702:                                                 "~n   Stack: ~p",[C, E, S]),
51703:                                     State#{node_stop => error}
51704:                             end};
51705: 		      (_) ->
51706: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51707: 			   ok
51708:                    end},
51709:          #{desc => "(maybe) await (client) node termination",
51710:            cmd  => fun(#{node := Node, node_stop := ok} = State)
51711: 			 when (Node =/= node()) ->
51712:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Success node stop - await nodedown"),
51713:                            receive
51714:                                {nodedown, Node} ->
51715:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("nodedown received - cleanup"),
51716:                                    State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
51717:                                    {ok, State1}
51718:                            end;
51719:                       (#{node_stop := error} = State) ->
51720:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("Failed node stop - cleanup"),
51721:                            State1 = maps:remove(node, State),
51722:                            {ok, State1};
51723: 		      (_) ->
51724: 			   ?SEV_IPRINT("nothing"),
51725: 			   ok
51726:                    end},
51727: 
51728: 
51729:          %% *** We are done ***
51730:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
51731:         ],
51732: 
51733:     TesterSeq =
51734:         [
51735:          %% *** Init part ***
51736:          #{desc => "monitor server",
51737:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
51738:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
51739:                            ok
51740:                    end},
51741:          #{desc => "monitor client",
51742:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Pid} = _State) ->
51743:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
51744:                            ok
51745:                    end},
51746: 
51747:          %% Start the server
51748:          #{desc => "order server start",
51749:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Pid} = _State) ->
51750:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
51751:                            ok
51752:                    end},
51753:          #{desc => "await server ready (init)",
51754:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
51755:                          server := Pid} = State) ->
51756:                            {ok, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
51757:                            {ok, State#{server_path => Path}};
51758:                       (#{server := Pid} = State) ->
51759:                            {ok, {Addr, Port}} =
51760:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, server, init),
51761:                            {ok, State#{server_addr => Addr,
51762:                                        server_port => Port}}
51763:                    end},
51764: 
51765: 
51766:          %% Start the client
51767:          #{desc => "order client start",
51768:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local,
51769:                          client      := Pid,
51770:                          server_path := Path} = _State) ->
51771:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, Path),
51772:                            ok;
51773:                       (#{client      := Pid,
51774:                          server_addr := Addr,
51775:                          server_port := Port} = _State) ->
51776:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, {Addr, Port}),
51777:                            ok
51778:                    end},
51779:          #{desc => "await client ready (init)",
51780:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
51781:                            ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, init)
51782:                    end},
51783:  
51784:          %% The actual test
51785:          #{desc => "order client continue (ttest)",
51786:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
51787:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Client, ttest),
51788:                            ok
51789:                    end},
51790:          #{desc => "await client ready (ttest)",
51791:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server,
51792:                          client := Client} = State) ->
51793:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Client, client, ttest,
51794:                                                  [{server, Server}]) of
51795:                                {ok, Result} ->
51796:                                    {ok, State#{result => Result}};
51797:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
51798:                                    ERROR
51799:                            end
51800:                    end},
51801: 
51802: 
51803:          %% *** Terminate server ***
51804:          #{desc => "order client terminate",
51805:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = _State) ->
51806:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Client),
51807:                            ok
51808:                    end},
51809:          #{desc => "await client down",
51810:            cmd  => fun(#{client := Client} = State) ->
51811:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Client),
51812:                            State1 = maps:remove(client,    State),
51813:                            {ok, State1}
51814:                    end},
51815:          #{desc => "order server terminate",
51816:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
51817:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Server),
51818:                            ok
51819:                    end},
51820:          #{desc => "await server down",
51821:            cmd  => fun(#{server := Server} = _State) ->
51822:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Server),
51823:                            ok
51824:                    end},
51825: 
51826:          
51827:          %% Present the results
51828:          #{desc => "present the results",
51829:            cmd  => fun(#{result        := Result,
51830:                          domain        := Domain,
51831:                          server_mod    := ServerTrans,
51832:                          server_active := ServerActive,
51833:                          client_mod    := ClientTrans,
51834:                          client_active := ClientActive,
51835:                          msg_id        := MsgID} = State) ->
51836:                            case Result of
51837:                                #{status  := ok,
51838:                                  runtime := RunTime,
51839:                                  cnt     := Cnt,
51840:                                  bcnt    := BCnt} ->
51841:                                    ttest_report(Domain,
51842:                                                 ServerTrans, ServerActive,
51843:                                                 ClientTrans, ClientActive,
51844:                                                 MsgID,
51845:                                                 RunTime, BCnt, Cnt),
51846:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT(
51847:                                       "TTest results: "
51848:                                       "~n   Run Time:                    ~s"
51849:                                       "~n   Byte Count:                  ~s"
51850:                                       "~n   Number of message exchanges: ~s"
51851:                                       "~n~n",
51852:                                       [
51853:                                        ?TTEST_LIB:format_time(RunTime),
51854:                                        if ((BCnt =:= 0) orelse (RunTime =:= 0)) ->
51855:                                                ?TTEST_LIB:format("~w, ~w",
51856:                                                                  [BCnt, RunTime]);
51857:                                           true ->
51858:                                                ?TTEST_LIB:format("~p => ~p byte / ms",
51859:                                                                  [BCnt, BCnt div RunTime])
51860:                                        end,
51861:                                        if (RunTime =:= 0) ->
51862:                                                "-";
51863:                                           true ->
51864:                                                ?TTEST_LIB:format("~p => ~p iterations / ms",
51865:                                                                  [Cnt, Cnt div RunTime])
51866:                                        end
51867:                                       ]),
51868:                                    {ok, maps:remove(result, State)};
51869: 
51870:                                #{status  := Failure,
51871:                                  runtime := RunTime,
51872:                                  sid     := SID,
51873:                                  rid     := RID,
51874:                                  scnt    := SCnt,
51875:                                  rcnt    := RCnt,
51876:                                  bcnt    := BCnt,
51877:                                  num     := Num} ->
51878:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("Time Test failed: "
51879:                                                "~n   ~p"
51880:                                                "~n"
51881:                                                "~nwhen"
51882:                                                "~n"
51883:                                                "~n   Run Time:       ~s"
51884:                                                "~n   Send ID:        ~p"
51885:                                                "~n   Recv ID:        ~p"
51886:                                                "~n   Send Count:     ~p"
51887:                                                "~n   Recv Count:     ~p"
51888:                                                "~n   Byte Count:     ~p"
51889:                                                "~n   Num Iterations: ~p",
51890:                                                [Failure,
51891:                                                 ?TTEST_LIB:format_time(RunTime),
51892:                                                 SID, RID, SCnt, RCnt, BCnt, Num]),
51893:                                    {error, Failure}
51894:                            end
51895:                    end},
51896: 
51897:          %% This is just so that the printout above shall have time to come
51898:          %% out before then end of the test case.
51899:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
51900: 
51901:          %% *** We are done ***
51902:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
51903:         ],
51904: 
51905:     Domain = maps:get(domain, InitState),
51906:     LHost  = local_host(),
51907:     LAddr  = which_local_addr(Domain),
51908: 
51909:     i("start server evaluator"),
51910:     ServerInitState = #{host   => LHost,
51911: 			addr   => LAddr,
51912:                         domain => Domain,
51913:                         mod    => maps:get(server_mod,    InitState),
51914:                         active => maps:get(server_active, InitState)},
51915:     Server          = ?SEV_START("server", ServerSeq, ServerInitState),
51916: 
51917:     i("start client evaluator"),
51918:     ClientInitState = #{host            => LHost,
51919: 			addr            => LAddr,
51920:                         domain          => Domain,
51921:                         mod             => maps:get(client_mod,      InitState),
51922:                         active          => maps:get(client_active,   InitState),
51923:                         msg_id          => maps:get(msg_id,          InitState),
51924:                         max_outstanding => maps:get(max_outstanding, InitState),
51925:                         runtime         => maps:get(runtime,         InitState)},
51926:     Client          = ?SEV_START("client", ClientSeq, ClientInitState),
51927:     
51928:     i("start 'tester' evaluator"),
51929:     TesterInitState = #{domain        => Domain,
51930: 			msg_id        => maps:get(msg_id,        InitState),
51931:                         client        => Client#ev.pid,
51932: 			client_mod    => maps:get(client_mod,    InitState),
51933: 			client_active => maps:get(client_active, InitState),
51934:                         server        => Server#ev.pid,
51935:                         server_mod    => maps:get(server_mod,    InitState),
51936:                         server_active => maps:get(server_active, InitState)},
51937:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
51938: 
51939:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
51940:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([Server, Client, Tester]).
51941: 
51942: 
51943: 
51944: ttest_tcp_server_start(Node, Domain, gen, Active) ->
51945:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_gen,
51946:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain}},
51947:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_server:start_monitor(Node, Transport, Active);
51948: ttest_tcp_server_start(Node, Domain, gs, Active) ->
51949:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_gs,
51950:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain}},
51951:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_server:start_monitor(Node, Transport, Active);
51952: ttest_tcp_server_start(Node, Domain, sock, Active) ->
51953:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_socket,
51954:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain,
51955:                                     async  => true,
51956:                                     method => plain}},
51957:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_server:start_monitor(Node, Transport, Active).
51958: 
51959: ttest_tcp_server_stop(Pid) ->
51960:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_server:stop(Pid).
51961: 
51962: ttest_tcp_client_start(Node,
51963:                        Notify,
51964:                        Domain, gen,
51965:                        ServerInfo, Active, MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime) ->
51966:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_gen,
51967:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain}},    
51968:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_client:start_monitor(Node,
51969:                                                Notify,
51970:                                                Transport,
51971:                                                ServerInfo,
51972:                                                Active,
51973:                                                MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime);
51974: ttest_tcp_client_start(Node,
51975:                        Notify,
51976:                        Domain, gs,
51977:                        ServerInfo, Active, MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime) ->
51978:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_gs,
51979:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain}},    
51980:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_client:start_monitor(Node,
51981:                                                Notify,
51982:                                                Transport,
51983:                                                ServerInfo,
51984:                                                Active,
51985:                                                MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime);
51986: ttest_tcp_client_start(Node,
51987:                        Notify,
51988:                        Domain, sock,
51989:                        ServerInfo, Active, MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime) ->
51990:     TransportMod = socket_test_ttest_tcp_socket,
51991:     Transport    = {TransportMod, #{domain => Domain,
51992:                                     async  => true,
51993:                                     method => plain}},
51994:     socket_test_ttest_tcp_client:start_monitor(Node,
51995:                                                Notify,
51996:                                                Transport,
51997:                                                ServerInfo,
51998:                                                Active,
51999:                                                MsgID, MaxOutstanding, RunTime).
52000: 
52001: 
52002: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52003: 
52004: -define(TTEST_MANAGER, esock_ttest_manager).
52005: 
52006: -record(ttest_report_id,
52007:         {domain        :: socket:domain(),
52008:          serv_trans    :: gen | sock,
52009:          serv_active   :: once | boolean(),
52010:          client_trans  :: gen | sock,
52011:          client_active :: once | boolean(),
52012:          msg_id        :: small | medium | large}).
52013: 
52014: -record(ttest_report, {id    :: #ttest_report_id{},
52015:                        time  :: non_neg_integer(),
52016:                        bytes :: non_neg_integer(),
52017:                        msgs  :: non_neg_integer()}).
52018: 
52019: -spec ttest_report(Domain      :: socket:domain(),
52020:                    ServTrans   :: gen | sock, ServActive   :: once | boolean(),
52021:                    ClientTrans :: gen | sock, ClientActive :: once | boolean(),
52022:                    MsgID       :: 1 | 2 | 3,
52023:                    RunTime     :: non_neg_integer(),
52024:                    NumBytes    :: non_neg_integer(),
52025:                    NumMsgs     :: non_neg_integer()) -> ok.
52026: 
52027: ttest_report(Domain,
52028:              ServTrans,   ServActive,
52029:              ClientTrans, ClientActive,
52030:              MsgID,
52031:              RunTime,
52032:              NumBytes,
52033:              NumMsgs) ->
52034:     ID = #ttest_report_id{domain        = Domain,
52035:                           serv_trans    = ServTrans,
52036:                           serv_active   = ServActive,
52037:                           client_trans  = ClientTrans,
52038:                           client_active = ClientActive,
52039:                           msg_id        = ttest_msg_id_num_to_name(MsgID)},
52040:     Report = #ttest_report{id    = ID,
52041:                            time  = RunTime,
52042:                            bytes = NumBytes,
52043:                            msgs  = NumMsgs},
52044:     %% If we run just one test case, the group init has never been run
52045:     %% and therefore the ttest manager is not running (we also don't actually
52046:     %% care about collecting reports in that case).
52047:     (catch global:send(?TTEST_MANAGER, Report)),
52048:     ok.
52049: 
52050: ttest_msg_id_num_to_name(1) ->
52051:     small;
52052: ttest_msg_id_num_to_name(2) ->
52053:     medium;
52054: ttest_msg_id_num_to_name(3) ->
52055:     large.
52056:     
52057: ttest_manager_start() ->
52058:     Self = self(),
52059:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> ttest_manager_init(Self) end),
52060:     receive
52061:         {ttest_manager_started, Pid} ->
52062:             erlang:demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
52063:             ok;
52064:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
52065:             exit({failed_starting, ttest_manager, Reason})
52066:     after 5000 ->
52067:             exit(Pid, kill),
52068:             exit({failed_starting, ttest_manager, timeout})
52069:     end.
52070: 
52071: ttest_manager_stop() ->
52072:     case global:whereis_name(?TTEST_MANAGER) of
52073:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
52074:             erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52075:             global:send(?TTEST_MANAGER, stop),
52076:             receive
52077:                 {'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, _} ->
52078:                     ok
52079:             after 10000 ->
52080:                     exit(Pid, kill),
52081:                     ok
52082:             end;
52083:         _ ->
52084:             ok
52085:     end.
52086: 
52087: ttest_manager_init(Parent) ->
52088:     yes = global:register_name(?TTEST_MANAGER, self()),
52089:     ets:new(?TTEST_MANAGER, 
52090:             [{keypos, #ttest_report.id}, named_table, protected, ordered_set]),
52091:     Parent ! {ttest_manager_started, self()},
52092:     ttest_manager_loop().
52093: 
52094: ttest_manager_loop() ->
52095:     receive
52096:         stop ->
52097:             ?LOGGER:format("manager stopping~n", []),
52098:             ttest_manager_done();
52099: 
52100:         #ttest_report{id    = _ID,
52101:                       time  = _RunTime,
52102:                       bytes = _NumBytes,
52103:                       msgs  = _NumMsgs} = Report ->
52104:             true = ets:insert_new(?TTEST_MANAGER, Report),
52105:             ttest_manager_loop()
52106:     end.
52107: 
52108: %% We are supposed to pretty print the result here...
52109: ttest_manager_done() ->
52110:     format_reports(inet),
52111:     %% format_reports(inet6),
52112:     ets:delete(?TTEST_MANAGER),
52113:     exit(normal).
52114: 
52115: format_reports(Domain) ->
52116:     ?LOGGER:format("Domain ~w reports:~n~n", [Domain]),
52117:     format_reports(Domain, small),
52118:     format_reports(Domain, medium),
52119:     format_reports(Domain, large).
52120:     
52121: format_reports(Domain, MsgID) when is_atom(MsgID) ->
52122:     case which_ttest_reports(Domain, MsgID) of
52123:         [] ->
52124:             ?LOGGER:format("   No ~w reports~n~n", [MsgID]);
52125:         Reports ->
52126:             ?LOGGER:format("   ~w reports: ~n", [MsgID]),
52127:             lists:foreach(fun(R) -> format_report(R) end, Reports)
52128:     end.
52129: 
52130: %% This should really be a table like this:
52131: %%
52132: %%             client
52133: %% server      gen(false)  gen(once)  gen(true)  sock(false)  sock(once)  sock(true)
52134: %% gen(false)  nnn
52135: %% gen(once)   nnn
52136: %% gen(true)   nnn
52137: %% sock(false) nnn
52138: %% sock(once)  nnn
52139: %% sock(true)  nnn
52140: %%
52141: format_report(#ttest_report{id    = #ttest_report_id{serv_trans    = STrans,
52142:                                                      serv_active   = SActive,
52143:                                                      client_trans  = CTrans,
52144:                                                      client_active = CActive},
52145:                             time  = RunTime,
52146:                             bytes = BCnt,
52147:                             msgs  = MCnt}) ->
52148:     ?LOGGER:format("      server ~w[~w] - client ~w[~w] => "
52149:                    "~n         Run Time: ~s"
52150:                    "~n         Bytes:    ~s"
52151:                    "~n         Messages: ~s"
52152:                    "~n", [STrans, SActive, CTrans, CActive,
52153:                           ?TTEST_LIB:format_time(RunTime),
52154:                           if ((BCnt =:= 0) orelse (RunTime =:= 0)) ->
52155:                                   ?TTEST_LIB:format("~w, ~w",
52156:                                                     [BCnt, RunTime]);
52157:                              true ->
52158:                                   ?TTEST_LIB:format("~p => ~p byte / ms",
52159:                                                     [BCnt, BCnt div RunTime])
52160:                           end,
52161:                           if (RunTime =:= 0) ->
52162:                                   "-";
52163:                              true ->
52164:                                   ?TTEST_LIB:format("~p => ~p iterations / ms",
52165:                                                     [MCnt, MCnt div RunTime])
52166:                           end]),
52167:     ok.
52168: 
52169: 
52170: which_ttest_reports(Domain, all) ->
52171:     [R || R = #ttest_report{id = #ttest_report_id{domain = D}} <- 
52172:               ets:tab2list(?TTEST_MANAGER), Domain =:= D];
52173: which_ttest_reports(Domain, MsgID) ->
52174:     [R || R = #ttest_report{id = #ttest_report_id{domain = D, msg_id = MID}} <- 
52175:               ets:tab2list(?TTEST_MANAGER), (Domain =:= D) andalso (MsgID =:= MID)].
52176: 
52177: 
52178: 
52179: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52180: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52181: %%                                                                     %%
52182: %%                            TICKETS                                  %%
52183: %%                                                                     %%
52184: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52185: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52186: 
52187: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52188: 
52189: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
52190: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
52191: %% TCP, IPv4.
52192: otp16359_maccept_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
52193:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
52194:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcp4,
52195:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
52196:            fun() ->
52197:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
52198:                                  protocol => tcp},
52199:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
52200:            end).
52201: 
52202: 
52203: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52204: 
52205: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
52206: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
52207: %% TCP, IPv6.
52208: otp16359_maccept_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
52209:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
52210:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcp6,
52211:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
52212:            fun() ->
52213:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
52214:                                  protocol => tcp},
52215:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
52216:            end).
52217: 
52218: 
52219: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52220: 
52221: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
52222: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
52223: %% TCP, UNix Domain Sockets.
52224: otp16359_maccept_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
52225:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
52226:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcpL,
52227:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
52228:            fun() ->
52229:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
52230:                                  protocol => default},
52231:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
52232:            end).
52233: 
52234: 
52235: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52236: 
52237: otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState) ->
52238:     PrimAcceptorSeq =
52239:         [
52240:          %% *** Init part ***
52241:          #{desc => "await start",
52242:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
52243:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
52244:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
52245:                    end},
52246:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
52247:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
52248:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52249:                            ok
52250:                    end},
52251:          #{desc => "which local address",
52252:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
52253:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
52254:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
52255:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
52256:                    end},
52257:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
52258:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
52259:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
52260:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
52261:                                {ok, Sock} ->
52262:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
