52263:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52264:                                    ERROR
52265:                            end
52266:                    end},
52267:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
52268:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
52269:                          lsock  := LSock,
52270:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
52271:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
52272:                                ok ->
52273:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
52274:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52275:                                    ERROR
52276:                            end;
52277:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
52278:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
52279:                                ok ->
52280:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
52281:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
52282:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52283:                                    ERROR
52284:                            end
52285:                    end},
52286:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
52287:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
52288:                            socket:listen(LSock)
52289:                    end},
52290:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
52291:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
52292:                          tester := Tester,
52293:                          lsock  := LSock,
52294:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}}) ->
52295:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, {LSock, Path}),
52296:                            ok;
52297:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lport := LPort, tester := Tester}) ->
52298:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, {LSock, LPort}),
52299:                            ok
52300:                    end},
52301: 
52302:          %% *** The actual test ***
52303:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
52304:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52305:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
52306:                    end},
52307:          #{desc => "attempt to accept (with success)",
52308:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
52309:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
52310:                                {ok, Sock} ->
52311:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected (accept) success: "
52312:                                                "~n   ~p", [Sock]),
52313:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
52314:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52315:                                    ERROR
52316:                            end
52317:                    end},
52318:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
52319:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
52320:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
52321:                            ok
52322:                    end},
52323: 
52324:          %% *** Terminate ***
52325:          #{desc => "await terminate",
52326:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52327:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester),
52328:                            ok
52329:                    end},
52330:          %% *** Close (connect) socket ***
52331:          #{desc => "close (connect) socket",
52332:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
52333:                            sock_close(Sock),
52334:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
52335:                    end},
52336:          %% *** Close (listen) socket ***
52337:          #{desc => "close (listen) socket",
52338:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
52339:                          lsock  := Sock,
52340:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
52341:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
52342:                            State1 =
52343:                                unlink_path(Path,
52344:                                            fun() ->
52345:                                                    maps:remove(lsa, State)
52346:                                            end,
52347:                                            fun() -> State end),
52348:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
52349:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
52350:                            sock_close(LSock),
52351:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
52352:                    end},
52353: 
52354:          %% *** We are done ***
52355:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
52356:         ],
52357: 
52358:     SecAcceptorSeq =
52359:         [
52360:          %% *** Init part ***
52361:          #{desc => "await start",
52362:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
52363:                            {Tester, LSock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
52364:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester,
52365:                                        lsock  => LSock}}
52366:                            
52367:                    end},
52368:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
52369:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
52370:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52371:                            ok
52372:                    end},
52373:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
52374:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52375:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
52376:                            ok
52377:                    end},
52378: 
52379:          %% *** The actual test part ***
52380:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
52381:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52382:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
52383:                    end},
52384:          #{desc => "attempt to accept",
52385:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
52386:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
52387:                                {ok, Sock} ->
52388:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected (accept) success: "
52389:                                                "~n   ~p", [Sock]),
52390:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
52391:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52392:                                    ERROR
52393:                            end
52394:                    end},
52395:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
52396:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52397:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
52398:                            ok
52399:                    end},
52400: 
52401:          %% *** Terminate ***
52402:          #{desc => "await terminate",
52403:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
52404:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
52405:                                ok ->
52406:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
52407:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52408:                                    ERROR
52409:                            end
52410:                    end},
52411:          %% *** Close (connect) socket ***
52412:          #{desc => "close (connect) socket",
52413:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
52414:                            sock_close(Sock),
52415:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
52416:                    end},
52417: 
52418:          %% *** We are done ***
52419:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
52420:         ],
52421: 
52422:     ClientSeq =
52423:         [
52424:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
52425:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
52426:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
52427:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
52428:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
52429:                       (State) ->
52430:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
52431:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
52432:                    end},
52433:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
52434:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
52435:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
52436:                            ok
52437:                    end},
52438: 
52439:          %% *** The init part ***
52440:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
52441:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
52442:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
52443:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
52444:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
52445:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
52446:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
52447:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
52448:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
52449:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
52450:                    end},
52451:          #{desc => "create socket",
52452:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
52453:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
52454:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
52455:                                {ok, Sock} ->
52456:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
52457:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52458:                                    ERROR
52459:                            end
52460:                    end},
52461:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
52462:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA} = _State) ->
52463:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
52464:                                ok ->
52465:                                    ok;
52466:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52467:                                    ERROR
52468:                            end
52469:                    end},
52470:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
52471:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
52472:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
52473:                            ok
52474:                    end},
52475: 
52476:          %% *** The actual test ***
52477:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
52478:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
52479:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
52480:                    end},
52481:          #{desc => "connect to server",
52482:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
52483:                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
52484:                                ok ->
52485:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("connected", []),
52486:                                    ok;
52487:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
52488:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed connect: "
52489:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
52490:                                    ERROR
52491:                            end
52492:                    end},
52493:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
52494:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
52495:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
52496:                            ok
52497:                    end},
52498: 
52499:          %% *** Termination ***
52500:          #{desc => "await terminate",
52501:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
52502:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
52503:                                ok ->
52504:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
52505:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52506:                                    ERROR
52507:                            end
52508:                    end},
52509:          #{desc => "close socket",
52510:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
52511:                          sock   := Sock,
52512:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
52513:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
52514:                            State1 =
52515:                                unlink_path(Path,
52516:                                            fun() ->
52517:                                                    maps:remove(lsa, State)
52518:                                            end,
52519:                                            fun() -> State end),
52520:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
52521:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
52522:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
52523:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
52524:                    end},
52525: 
52526:          %% *** We are done ***
52527:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
52528:         ],
52529: 
52530:     TesterSeq =
52531:         [
52532:          %% Init part
52533:          #{desc => "monitor prim-acceptor",
52534:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
52535:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52536:                            ok
52537:                    end},
52538:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 1",
52539:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52540:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52541:                            ok
52542:                    end},
52543:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 2",
52544:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52545:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52546:                            ok
52547:                    end},
52548:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
52549:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52550:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52551:                            ok
52552:                    end},
52553:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
52554:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52555:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52556:                            ok
52557:                    end},
52558:          #{desc => "monitor client 3",
52559:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
52560:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
52561:                            ok
52562:                    end},
52563: 
52564: 
52565:          %% Start the prim-acceptor
52566:          #{desc => "start prim-acceptor",
52567:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
52568:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
52569:                            ok
52570:                    end},
52571:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (init)",
52572:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
52573:                            {ok, {Sock, Port}} =
52574:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, init),
52575:                            {ok, State#{lsock => Sock, lport => Port}}
52576:                    end},
52577: 
52578:          %% Start sec-acceptor-1
52579:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 1",
52580:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
52581:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
52582:                            ok
52583:                    end},
52584:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (init)",
52585:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52586:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, init)
52587:                    end},
52588: 
52589:          %% Start sec-acceptor-2
52590:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 2",
52591:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
52592:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
52593:                            ok
52594:                    end},
52595:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (init)",
52596:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52597:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, init)
52598:                    end},
52599: 
52600:          %% Start client-1
52601:          #{desc => "start client 1",
52602:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
52603:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
52604:                            ok
52605:                    end},
52606:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
52607:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52608:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
52609:                    end},
52610: 
52611:          %% Start client-2
52612:          #{desc => "start client 2",
52613:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
52614:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
52615:                            ok
52616:                    end},
52617:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
52618:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52619:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
52620:                    end},
52621: 
52622:          %% Start client-3
52623:          #{desc => "start client 3",
52624:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
52625:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
52626:                            ok
52627:                    end},
52628:          #{desc => "await client 3 ready (init)",
52629:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
52630:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
52631:                    end},
52632: 
52633:          %% Activate the acceptor(s)
52634:          #{desc => "active prim-acceptor",
52635:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
52636:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
52637:                            ok
52638:                    end},
52639:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 1",
52640:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52641:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
52642:                            ok
52643:                    end},
52644:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 2",
52645:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52646:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
52647:                            ok
52648:                    end},
52649: 
52650:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
52651: 
52652:          %% Activate the client(s)
52653:          #{desc => "active client 1",
52654:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52655:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
52656:                            ok
52657:                    end},
52658: 
52659:          ?SEV_SLEEP(100),
52660: 
52661:          #{desc => "active client 2",
52662:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52663:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
52664:                            ok
52665:                    end},
52666: 
52667:          ?SEV_SLEEP(100),
52668: 
52669:          #{desc => "active client 3",
52670:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
52671:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
52672:                            ok
52673:                    end},
52674: 
52675:          %% Await acceptor(s) completions
52676:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (accept)",
52677:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
52678:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, accept)
52679:                    end},
52680:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (accept)",
52681:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52682:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, accept)
52683:                    end},
52684:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (accept)",
52685:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52686:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, accept)
52687:                    end},
52688:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (connect)",
52689:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52690:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, connect)
52691:                    end},
52692:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (connect)",
52693:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52694:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, connect)
52695:                    end},
52696:          #{desc => "await client 3 ready (connect)",
52697:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
52698:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, connect)
52699:                    end},
52700: 
52701:          %% Terminate
52702:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
52703:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52704:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52705:                            ok
52706:                    end},
52707:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
52708:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
52709:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52710:                                ok ->
52711:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
52712:                                    {ok, State1};
52713:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52714:                                    ERROR
52715:                            end
52716:                    end},
52717:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
52718:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52719:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52720:                            ok
52721:                    end},
52722:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
52723:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
52724:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52725:                                ok ->
52726:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
52727:                                    {ok, State1};
52728:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52729:                                    ERROR
52730:                            end
52731:                    end},
52732:          #{desc => "order client 3 to terminate",
52733:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
52734:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52735:                            ok
52736:                    end},
52737:          #{desc => "await client 3 termination",
52738:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
52739:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52740:                                ok ->
52741:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client3, State),
52742:                                    {ok, State1};
52743:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52744:                                    ERROR
52745:                            end
52746:                    end},
52747:          #{desc => "order prim-acceptor to terminate",
52748:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
52749:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52750:                            ok
52751:                    end},
52752:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor termination",
52753:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
52754:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52755:                                ok ->
52756:                                    State1 = maps:remove(prim_acceptor, State),
52757:                                    {ok, State1};
52758:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52759:                                    ERROR
52760:                            end
52761:                    end},
52762:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 1 to terminate",
52763:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
52764:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52765:                            ok
52766:                    end},
52767:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 termination",
52768:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = State) ->
52769:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52770:                                ok ->
52771:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor1, State),
52772:                                    {ok, State1};
52773:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52774:                                    ERROR
52775:                            end
52776:                    end},
52777:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 2 to terminate",
52778:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
52779:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
52780:                            ok
52781:                    end},
52782:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 termination",
52783:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = State) ->
52784:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
52785:                                ok ->
52786:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor2, State),
52787:                                    {ok, State1};
52788:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
52789:                                    ERROR
52790:                            end
52791:                    end},
52792:          
52793:          %% *** We are done ***
52794:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
52795:         ],
52796: 
52797: 
52798: 
52799:     i("create prim-acceptor evaluator"),
52800:     PrimAInitState = InitState,
52801:     PrimAcceptor = ?SEV_START("prim-acceptor", PrimAcceptorSeq, PrimAInitState),
52802: 
52803:     i("create sec-acceptor 1 evaluator"),
52804:     SecAInitState1 = maps:remove(domain, InitState),
52805:     SecAcceptor1 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-1", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState1),
52806: 
52807:     i("create sec-acceptor 2 evaluator"),
52808:     SecAInitState2 = SecAInitState1,
52809:     SecAcceptor2 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-2", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState2),
52810: 
52811:     i("create client 1 evaluator"),
52812:     ClientInitState1 = InitState,
52813:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, ClientInitState1),
52814: 
52815:     i("create client 2 evaluator"),
52816:     ClientInitState2 = InitState,
52817:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, ClientInitState2),
52818: 
52819:     i("create client 3 evaluator"),
52820:     ClientInitState3 = InitState,
52821:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, ClientInitState3),
52822: 
52823:     i("create tester evaluator"),
52824:     TesterInitState = #{prim_acceptor => PrimAcceptor#ev.pid,
52825:                         sec_acceptor1 => SecAcceptor1#ev.pid,
52826:                         sec_acceptor2 => SecAcceptor2#ev.pid,
52827:                         client1       => Client1#ev.pid,
52828:                         client2       => Client2#ev.pid,
52829:                         client3       => Client3#ev.pid},
52830:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
52831: 
52832:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
52833:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([PrimAcceptor, SecAcceptor1, SecAcceptor2,
52834:                             Client1, Client2, Client3,
52835:                             Tester]).
52836: 
52837: 
52838: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52839: 
52840: %% This test case is to verify that we do not leak monitors.
52841: otp18240_accept_mon_leak_tcp4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
52842:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
52843:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
52844:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
52845:            fun() ->
52846:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet,
52847:                                  protocol  => tcp,
52848:                                  num_socks => 10},
52849:                    ok = otp18240_accept_tcp(InitState)
52850:            end).
52851: 
52852: 
52853: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52854: 
52855: %% This test case is to verify that we do not leak monitors.
52856: otp18240_accept_mon_leak_tcp6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
52857:     ?TT(?SECS(30)),
52858:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
52859:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
52860:            fun() ->
52861:                    InitState = #{domain    => inet6,
52862:                                  protocol  => tcp,
52863:                                  num_socks => 10},
52864:                    ok = otp18240_accept_tcp(InitState)
52865:            end).
52866: 
52867: 
52868: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
52869: 
52870: otp18240_accept_tcp(#{domain    := Domain,
52871:                       protocol  := Proto,
52872:                       num_socks := NumSocks}) ->
52873:     Self = self(),
52874:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
52875:                                        otp18240_acceptor(Self,
52876:                                                          Domain, Proto,
52877:                                                          NumSocks)
52878:                                end),
52879:     otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon).
52880: 
52881: otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon) ->
52882:     receive
52883: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, ok} ->
52884: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
52885:             ok;
52886: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
52887: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
52888:             exit(SKIP);
52889:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Info} ->
52890:             i("acceptor unexpected termination: "
52891:               "~n   ~p", [Info]),
52892:             exit({unexpected_result, Info})
52893:     after 5000 ->
52894: 	    i("acceptor process (~p) info"
52895: 	      "~n   Refs: ~p"
52896: 	      "~n   Info: ~p",
52897: 	      [Pid, monitored_by(Pid), erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
52898: 	    otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon)
52899:     end.
52900: 
52901: otp18240_acceptor(Parent, Domain, Proto, NumSocks) ->
52902:     i("[acceptor] begin with: "
52903:       "~n   Parent:   ~p"
52904:       "~n   Domain:   ~p"
52905:       "~n   Protocol: ~p", [Parent, Domain, Proto]),
52906:     MonitoredBy0 = monitored_by(),
52907:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
52908:     Addr = case ?LIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
52909:                {ok, #{addr := A}} ->
52910:                    A;
52911:                {error, Reason} ->
52912:                    exit({skip, Reason})
52913:            end,
52914:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto,
52915:                               #{use_registry => false}),
52916:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
52917:     ok = socket:listen(LSock, NumSocks),
52918:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
52919:     MonitoredBy1 = monitored_by(),
52920:     i("[acceptor]: listen socket created"
52921:       "~n   'Montored By' before listen socket: ~p"
52922:       "~n   'Montored By' after listen socket:  ~p",
52923:       [MonitoredBy0, MonitoredBy1]),
52924: 
52925:     [LSockMon] = MonitoredBy1 -- MonitoredBy0,
52926: 
52927:     i("[acceptor]: "
52928:       "~n   Listen Socket Monitor: ~p"
52929:       "~n   Listen Socket info:    ~p",
52930:       [LSockMon, socket:info(LSock)]),
52931: 
52932:     {ok, #{port := Port}} = socket:sockname(LSock),
52933: 
52934:     i("[acceptor] create ~w clients (connectors)", [NumSocks]),
52935:     _Clients = [spawn_link(fun() ->
52936:                                    otp18240_client(CID,
52937:                                                    Domain, Proto,
52938:                                                    Addr, Port)
52939:                            end) || CID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
52940: 
52941:     i("[acceptor] accept ~w connections", [NumSocks]),
52942:     ServSocks = [otp18240_do_accept(AID, LSock) ||
52943:                     AID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
52944: 
52945:     i("[acceptor] close accepted connections when: "
52946:       "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p", [socket:info(LSock)]),
52947:     _ = [otp18240_do_close(S) || S <- ServSocks],
52948: 
52949:     %% at this point in time there should be no monitors from NIFs,
52950:     %% because we're not accepting anything
52951:     i("[acceptor] check monitor status"),
52952:     MonitoredBy2 = monitored_by(),
52953:     MonitoredBy3 = MonitoredBy2 -- [Parent, LSockMon],
52954:     i("[acceptor] monitor status: "
52955:       "~n   UnRefs:       ~p"
52956:       "~n   MonitoredBy2: ~p"
52957:       "~n   MonitoredBy3: ~p",
52958:       [[Parent, LSockMon], MonitoredBy2, MonitoredBy3]),
52959:     if
52960:         ([] =:= MonitoredBy3) ->
52961:             i("[acceptor] done"),
52962:             socket:close(LSock),
52963:             exit(ok);
52964:         true ->
52965:             socket:close(LSock),
52966:             i("[acceptor] Unexpected monitors: "
52967:               "~n   ~p", [MonitoredBy2]),
52968:             exit({unexpected_monitors, MonitoredBy2})
52969:     end.
52970: 
52971: 
52972: otp18240_client(ID, Domain, Proto, Addr, PortNo) ->
52973:     i("[connector ~w] try create connector socket", [ID]),
52974:     {ok, Sock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto, #{use_registry => false}),
52975:     ok = socket:bind(Sock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
52976:     %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
52977:     i("[connector ~w] try connect", [ID]),
52978:     case socket:connect(Sock,
52979:                         #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => PortNo}) of
52980:         ok ->
52981:             i("[connector ~w] connected - now try recv", [ID]),
52982:             case socket:recv(Sock) of
52983:                 {ok, Data} ->
52984:                     i("[connector ~w] received unexpected data: "
52985:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Data]),
52986:                     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
52987:                     exit('unexpected data');
52988:                 {error, closed} ->
52989:                     i("[connector ~w] expected socket close", [ID]);
52990:                 {error, Reason} ->
52991:                     i("[connector ~w] unexpected error when reading: "
52992:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
52993:                     (catch socket:close(Sock))
52994:             end;
52995:         {error, {completion_status, #{info := invalid_netname = R} = Reason}} ->
52996:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
52997:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
52998:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
52999:             exit({skip, R});
53000:         {error, {completion_status, invalid_netname = Reason}} ->
53001:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
53002:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
53003:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
53004:             exit({skip, Reason});
53005:         {error, enetunreach = Reason} ->
53006:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
53007:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
53008:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
53009:             exit({skip, Reason});
53010: 
53011:         {error, Reason} ->
53012:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
53013:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
53014:             (catch socket:close(Sock))
53015:     end,
53016:     i("[connector ~w] done", [ID]),
53017:     ok.
53018: 
53019: 
53020: otp18240_do_accept(ID, LSock) ->
53021:     i("[acceptor ~w] try accept", [ID]),
53022:     {ok, Sock} = socket:accept(LSock),
53023:     i("[acceptor ~w] accepted: ~p", [ID, Sock]),
53024:     {ID, Sock}.
53025: 
53026: 
53027: otp18240_do_close({ID, Sock}) ->
53028:     i("[acceptor ~w] try close ~p", [ID, Sock]),
53029:     case socket:close(Sock) of
53030: 	ok ->
53031: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] socket closed", [ID]),
53032: 	    ok;
53033: 	{error, Reason} ->
53034: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] failed close socket: "
53035: 	      "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
53036: 	    error
53037:     end.
53038: 
53039: 
53040: 
53041: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53042: 
53043: %% This test case is to verify that we do not leak monitors.
53044: otp18635(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
53045:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
53046:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
53047:            fun() ->
53048:                    is_not_windows(),
53049:                    has_support_ipv4()
53050:            end,
53051:            fun() ->
53052:                    InitState = #{},
53053:                    ok = do_otp18635(InitState)
53054:            end).
53055: 
53056: 
53057: do_otp18635(_) ->
53058:     Parent = self(),
53059: 
53060:     ?P("try create (listen) socket when"
53061:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
53062:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
53063:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
53064: 
53065:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
53066:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
53067: 
53068:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(inet, stream, #{use_registry => true}),
53069: 
53070:     ?P("bind (listen) socket to: "
53071:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
53072:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, LSA),
53073: 
53074:     ?P("make listen socket"),
53075:     ok = socket:listen(LSock),
53076: 
53077:     ?P("get sockname for listen socket"),
53078:     {ok, SA} = socket:sockname(LSock),
53079: 
53080:     %% ok = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
53081: 
53082:     % show handle returned from nowait accept
53083:     ?P("try accept with timeout = nowait - expect select when"
53084:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
53085:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
53086:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
53087:     {select, {select_info, _, Handle}} = socket:accept(LSock, nowait),
53088:     ?P("expected select result: "
53089:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
53090:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
53091:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
53092:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
53093: 
53094:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
53095: 
53096:     %% perform a blocking accept that will fail (timeout)
53097:     ?P("attempt accept with timeout = 500 - expect failure (timeout)"),
53098:     {error, timeout} = socket:accept(LSock, 500),
53099: 
53100:     ?P("await abort message for the first accept call: "
53101:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
53102:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
53103:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
53104:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
53105:     receive
53106:         {'$socket', LSock, abort, {Handle, cancelled}} ->
53107:             ?P("received expected abort message"),
53108:             ok
53109:     end,
53110: 
53111:     %% spawn a client to connect
53112:     ?P("spawn connector when"
53113:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
53114:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
53115:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
53116:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
53117:     {Connector, MRef} =
53118:         spawn_monitor(
53119:           fun() ->
53120:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
53121:                   {ok, CSock} = socket:open(inet, stream),
53122:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
53123:                        "~n   (server) ~p", [SA]),
53124:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock, SA),
53125:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
53126:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
53127:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
53128:                   receive
53129:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
53130:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
53131:                           (catch socket:close(CSock)),
53132:                           exit(normal)
53133:                   end
53134:               end),
53135: 
53136:     ?P("await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)", [Connector]),
53137:     receive
53138:         {Connector, connected} ->
53139:             ?P("connector connected"),
53140:             ok
53141:     end,
53142: 
53143:     %% We should *not* get *any* select messages;
53144:     %% since the second call (that *replaced* the current active request)
53145:     %% timeout out
53146:     ?P("wait for a select message that should never come"),
53147:     Result =
53148:         receive
53149:             {'$socket', LSock, select, AnyHandle} ->
53150:                 ?P("received unexpected select message when"
53151:                    "~n   Unexpected Handle:  ~p"
53152:                    "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
53153:                    "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
53154:                    "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
53155:                    [AnyHandle,
53156:                     socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
53157:                 error
53158:         after 5000 ->
53159:                 ?P("expected timeout"),
53160:                 ok
53161:         end,
53162: 
53163:     ?P("try accept the waiting connection when"
53164:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
53165:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
53166:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
53167:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
53168: 
53169:     {ok, ASock} = socket:accept(LSock),
53170: 
53171:     ?P("connection accepted"
53172:        "~n   (gen socket) info:    ~p"
53173:        "~n   Accepted socket:      ~p"
53174:        "~n   Accepted Socket info: ~p"
53175:        "~n   Listen Socket info:   ~p"
53176:        "~n   Sockets:              ~p",
53177:        [socket:info(),
53178:         ASock,
53179:         socket:info(ASock),
53180:         socket:info(LSock),
53181:         socket:which_sockets()]),
53182: 
53183:     ?P("cleanup"),
53184:     socket:close(LSock),
53185:     socket:close(ASock),
53186:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
53187:     receive
53188:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
53189:             ?P("connector terminated"),
53190:             ok
53191:     end,
53192: 
53193:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
53194: 
53195:     ?P("done when"
53196:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
53197:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p", [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
53198: 
53199:     Result.
53200: 
53201: 
53202: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53203: 
53204: %% This test case is to verify recv on UDP with timeout zero (0) on Windows.
53205: otp19063(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
53206:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
53207:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
53208:            fun() ->
53209:                    %% is_windows(),
53210:                    has_support_ipv4()
53211:            end,
53212:            fun() ->
53213:                    InitState = #{},
53214:                    ok = do_otp19063(InitState)
53215:            end).
53216: 
53217: 
53218: do_otp19063(_) ->
53219:     Parent = self(),
53220: 
53221:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
53222:     LSA0 = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
53223:     LSA  = LSA0#{port => 0},
53224:     
53225: 
53226: 
53227:     %% --- recv ---
53228: 
53229:     ?P("[recv] - create (listen) socket"),
53230:     {ok, LSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
53231: 
53232:     ?P("[recv] bind (listen) socket to: "
53233:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
53234:     ok = socket:bind(LSock1, LSA),
53235: 
53236:     ?P("[recv] make listen socket"),
53237:     ok = socket:listen(LSock1),
53238: 
53239:     ?P("[recv] get sockname for listen socket"),
53240:     {ok, SA1} = socket:sockname(LSock1),
53241: 
53242:     ?P("[recv] attempt a nowait-accept"),
53243:     {Tag, Handle} =
53244:         case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
53245:             {select, {select_info, _, SH}} ->
53246:                 {select, SH};
53247:             {completion, {completion_info, _, CH}} ->
53248:                 {completion, CH}
53249:         end,
53250: 
53251:     ?P("[recv] spawn the connector process"),
53252:     {Connector, MRef} =
53253:         spawn_monitor(
53254:           fun() ->
53255:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
53256:                   {ok, CSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
53257:                   ?P("[connector] bind socket to: "
53258:                      "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
53259:                   ok = socket:bind(CSock1, LSA),
53260:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
53261:                      "~n   (server) ~p", [SA1]),
53262:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock1, SA1),
53263:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
53264:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
53265:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
53266:                   receive
53267:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
53268:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
53269:                           (catch socket:close(CSock1)),
53270:                           exit(normal)
53271:                   end
53272:           end),
53273: 
53274:     ?P("[recv] await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)",
53275:        [Connector]),
53276:     receive
53277:         {Connector, connected} ->
53278:             ?P("[recv] connector connected"),
53279:             ok
53280:     end,
53281: 
53282:     ?P("[recv] receive the accepted socket"),
53283:     ASock1 =
53284:         receive
53285:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {ok, AS}}}
53286:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
53287:                 AS;
53288:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {error, Reason1C}}}
53289:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
53290:                 exit({accept_failed, Reason1C});
53291:            {'$socket', LSock1, select, Handle}  ->
53292:                 case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
53293:                     {ok, AS} ->
53294:                         AS;
53295:                     {error, Reason1S} ->
53296:                         exit({accept_failed, Reason1S})
53297:                 end
53298:         end,
53299: 
53300:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
53301: 
53302:     ?P("[recv] try read"),
53303:     case socket:recv(ASock1, 0, 0) of
53304:         {error, timeout} ->
53305:             ok;
53306:         Any1             ->
53307:             ?P("Unexpected result: ~p", [Any1]),
53308:             exit({unexpected_recv_result, Any1})
53309:     end,
53310: 
53311: 
53312:     %% --- recvfrom ---
53313: 
53314:     ?P("[recvfrom} create socket"),
53315:     {ok, Sock2} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
53316: 
53317:     ?P("[recvfrom} bind socket to: "
53318:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
53319:     ok = socket:bind(Sock2, LSA),
53320: 
53321:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
53322: 
53323:     ?P("[recvfrom] try read"),
53324:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvfrom(Sock2, 1024, 0),
53325: 
53326: 
53327:     %% --- recvmsg ---
53328: 
53329:     ?P("[recvmsg] create socket"),
53330:     {ok, Sock3} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
53331: 
53332:     ?P("[recvmsg] bind socket to: "
53333:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
53334:     ok = socket:bind(Sock3, LSA),
53335: 
53336:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
53337: 
53338:     ?P("[recvmsg] try read"),
53339:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvmsg(Sock3, 0),
53340: 
53341: 
53342:     ?P("cleanup"),
53343: 
53344:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
53345:     receive
53346:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
53347:             ?P("connector terminated"),
53348:             ok
53349:     end,
53350:     _ = socket:close(ASock1),
53351:     _ = socket:close(LSock1),
53352:     _ = socket:close(Sock2),
53353:     _ = socket:close(Sock3),
53354: 
53355:     ?P("done"),
53356: 
53357:     ok.
53358: 
53359: 
53360: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53361: 
53362: sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto) ->
53363:     try socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
53364:         {ok, Socket} ->
53365:             Socket;
53366:         {error, Reason} ->
53367:             ?FAIL({open, Reason})
53368:     catch
53369:         C:E:S ->
53370:             ?FAIL({open, C, E, S})
53371:     end.
53372: 
53373: 
53374: sock_bind(Sock, LSA) ->
53375:     try socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
53376:         ok = OK ->
53377:             OK;
53378:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
53379:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Address not available"),
53380:             throw({skip, Reason});
53381:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
53382:             ERROR
53383:     catch
53384:         C:E:S ->
53385:             ?FAIL({bind, C, E, S})
53386:     end.
53387: 
53388: sock_connect(Sock, SockAddr) ->
53389:     try socket:connect(Sock, SockAddr) of
53390:         ok ->
53391:             ok;
53392:         {error, Reason} ->
53393:             ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
53394:     catch
53395:         C:E:S ->
53396:             ?FAIL({connect, C, E, S})
53397:     end.
53398:     
53399: sock_sockname(Sock) ->
53400:     try socket:sockname(Sock) of
53401:         {ok, SockAddr} ->
53402:             SockAddr;
53403:         {error, Reason} ->
53404:             ?FAIL({sockname, Reason})
53405:     catch
53406:         C:E:S ->
53407:             ?FAIL({sockname, C, E, S})
53408:     end.
53409:     
53410: sock_close(Sock) ->
53411:     try socket:close(Sock) of
53412:         ok ->
53413:             ok;
53414:         {error, Reason} ->
53415:             i("sock_close -> error: ~p", [Reason]),
53416:             ?FAIL({close, Reason})
53417:     catch
53418:         C:E:S ->
53419:             i("sock_close -> failed: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C, E, S]),
53420:             ?FAIL({close, C, E, S})
53421:     end.
53422: 
53423: 
53424: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53425: 
53426: local_host() ->
53427:     try net_adm:localhost() of
53428:         Host when is_list(Host) ->
53429: 	    %% Convert to shortname if long
53430: 	    case string:tokens(Host, [$.]) of
53431: 		[H|_] ->
53432: 		    list_to_atom(H)
53433: 	    end
53434:     catch
53435:         C:E:S ->
53436:             erlang:raise(C, E, S)
53437:     end.
53438: 
53439: 
53440: %% The point of this is to "ensure" that paths from different test runs
53441: %% don't clash.
53442: 
53443: mk_unique_path() ->
53444:     ?LIB:mk_unique_path().
53445: 
53446: 
53447: which_local_socket_addr(local = Domain) ->
53448:     #{family => Domain,
53449:       path   => mk_unique_path()};
53450: 
53451: %% This gets the local socket address (not 127.0...)
53452: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
53453: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
53454: which_local_socket_addr(Domain) ->
53455:     case ?KLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
53456:         {ok, [#{addr := Addr}|_]} ->
53457:             #{family => Domain,
53458:               addr   => Addr};
53459:         {error, Reason} ->
53460:             ?FAIL(Reason)
53461:     end.
53462: 
53463: which_local_host_info(Domain) ->
53464:     case ?KLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
53465:         {ok, [Info|_]} ->
53466:             {ok, Info#{family => Domain}};
53467:         {error, Reason} ->
53468:             ?FAIL(Reason)
53469:     end.
53470: 
53471: 
53472: 
53473: which_local_addr(local = _Domain) ->
53474:     mk_unique_path();
53475: 
53476: %% This gets the local address (not 127.0...)
53477: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
53478: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
53479: which_local_addr(Domain) ->
53480:     ?KLIB:which_local_addr(Domain).
53481: 
53482: 
53483: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53484: 
53485: monitored_by() ->
53486:     monitored_by(self()).
53487: monitored_by(Pid) ->	
53488:     {monitored_by, Refs} = erlang:process_info(Pid, monitored_by),
53489:     Refs.
53490: 
53491: 
53492: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53493: 
53494: %% Here are all the *general* test case condition functions.
53495: 
53496: %% We also need to (be able to) figure out the multicast address,
53497: %% which we only support for some platforms (linux and sunos).
53498: %% We don't do that here, but since we can only do that (find a
53499: %% multicast address) for specific platforms, we check that we are
53500: %% on of those platforms here.
53501: has_support_ip_multicast() ->
53502:     case os:type() of
53503:         {unix, OsName} when (OsName =:= linux) orelse
53504:                             (OsName =:= sunos) ->
53505:             case ?LIB:which_local_host_info(inet) of
53506:                 {ok, #{flags := Flags}} ->
53507:                     case lists:member(multicast, Flags) of
53508:                         true ->
53509:                             ok;
53510:                         false ->
53511:                             not_supported(multicast)
53512:                     end;
53513:                 {error, Reason} ->
53514:                     not_supported({multicast, Reason})
53515:             end;
53516:         {unix, OsName} ->
53517:             skip(?F("Not Supported: platform ~w", [OsName]));
53518:         Type ->
53519:             skip(?F("Not Supported: platform ~p", [Type]))
53520:     end.
53521: 
53522: 
53523: %% --- SOCK socket option test functions ---
53524: 
53525: has_support_sock_acceptconn() ->
53526:     has_support_socket_option_sock(acceptconn).
53527: 
53528: has_support_sock_bindtodevice() ->
53529:     has_support_socket_option_sock(bindtodevice).
53530: 
53531: has_support_sock_broadcast() ->
53532:     has_support_ipv4(),
53533:     has_support_socket_option_sock(broadcast),
53534:     case ?LIB:which_local_host_info(inet) of
53535:         {ok, #{flags := Flags}} ->
53536:             case lists:member(broadcast, Flags) of
53537:                 true ->
53538:                     ok;
53539:                 false ->
53540:                     not_supported({broadcast, Flags})
53541:             end;
53542:         {error, Reason} ->
53543:             not_supported({broadcast, Reason})
53544:     end.
53545: 
53546: has_support_sock_debug() ->
53547:     has_support_socket_option_sock(debug).
53548: 
53549: has_support_sock_domain() ->
53550:     has_support_socket_option_sock(domain).
53551: 
53552: has_support_sock_dontroute() ->
53553:     has_support_socket_option_sock(dontroute).
53554: 
53555: has_support_sock_keepalive() ->
53556:     has_support_socket_option_sock(keepalive).
53557: 
53558: has_support_sock_reuseaddr() ->
53559:     has_support_socket_option_sock(reuseaddr).
53560: 
53561: has_support_sock_bsp_state() ->
53562:     has_support_socket_option_sock(bsp_state).
53563: 
53564: has_support_sock_exclusiveaddruse() ->
53565:     has_support_socket_option_sock(exclusiveaddruse).
53566: 
53567: has_support_sock_maxdg() ->
53568:     has_support_socket_option_sock(maxdg).
53569: 
53570: has_support_sock_max_msg_size() ->
53571:     has_support_socket_option_sock(max_msg_size).
53572: 
53573: has_support_sock_oobinline() ->
53574:     has_support_socket_option_sock(oobinline).
53575: 
53576: has_support_sock_passcred() ->
53577:     has_support_socket_option_sock(passcred).
53578: 
53579: has_support_sock_peek_off() ->
53580:     has_support_socket_option_sock(peek_off).
53581: 
53582: has_support_sock_peercred() ->
53583:     has_support_socket_option_sock(peercred).
53584: 
53585: has_support_sock_priority() ->
53586:     has_support_socket_option_sock(priority).
53587: 
53588: has_support_sock_rcvbuf() ->
53589:     has_support_socket_option_sock(rcvbuf).
53590: 
53591: has_support_sock_rcvlowat() ->
53592:     has_support_socket_option_sock(rcvlowat).
53593: 
53594: has_support_sock_rcvtimeo() ->
53595:     has_support_socket_option_sock(rcvtimeo).
53596: 
53597: has_support_sock_sndbuf() ->
53598:     has_support_socket_option_sock(sndbuf).
53599: 
53600: has_support_sock_sndlowat() ->
53601:     has_support_socket_option_sock(sndlowat).
53602: 
53603: has_support_sock_sndtimeo() ->
53604:     has_support_socket_option_sock(sndtimeo).
53605: 
53606: has_support_sock_timestamp() ->
53607:     has_support_socket_option_sock(timestamp).
53608: 
53609: 
53610: %% --- IP socket option test functions ---
53611: 
53612: has_support_ip_add_membership() ->
53613:     has_support_socket_option_ip(add_membership).
53614: 
53615: has_support_ip_drop_membership() ->
53616:     has_support_socket_option_ip(drop_membership).
53617: 
53618: has_support_ip_pktinfo() ->
53619:     has_support_socket_option_ip(pktinfo).
53620: 
53621: has_support_ip_recvopts() ->
53622:     has_support_socket_option_ip(recvopts).
53623: 
53624: has_support_ip_recvorigdstaddr() ->
53625:     has_support_socket_option_ip(recvorigdstaddr).
53626: 
53627: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
53628:     has_support_socket_option_ip(recvtos).
53629: 
53630: has_support_ip_recvtos_and_or_sock_timestamp() ->
53631:     case (socket:is_supported(options, ip, recvtos) orelse 
53632:           socket:is_supported(options, socket, timestamp)) of
53633:         true ->
53634:             ok;
53635:         false ->
53636:             skip(?F("Neither needed opts "
53637:                     "ip:recvtos or socket:timestamp supported", []))
53638:     end.
53639: 
53640: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
53641:     has_support_socket_option_ip(recvttl).
53642: 
53643: has_support_ip_tos() ->
53644:     has_support_socket_option_ip(tos).
53645: 
53646: has_support_ip_recverr() ->
53647:     has_support_socket_option_ip(recverr).
53648: 
53649: 
53650: %% --- IPv6 socket option test functions ---
53651: 
53652: has_support_ipv6_flowinfo() ->
53653:     has_support_socket_option_ipv6(flowinfo).
53654: 
53655: has_support_ipv6_hoplimit_or_recvhoplimit() ->
53656:     %% case (socket:is_supported(options, ipv6, recvhoplimit) orelse
53657:     %%       socket:is_supported(options, ipv6, hoplimit)) of
53658:     case is_any_options_supported([{ipv6, recvhoplimit}, {ipv6, hoplimit}]) of
53659: 	true ->
53660: 	    ok;
53661: 	false ->
53662: 	    skip(?F("Neither recvhoplimit or hoplimit supported", []))
53663:     end.
53664: 
53665: has_support_ipv6_recvpktinfo() ->
53666:     has_support_socket_option_ipv6(recvpktinfo).
53667: 
53668: 
53669: has_support_ipv6_tclass_or_recvtclass() ->
53670:     case is_any_options_supported([{ipv6, recvtclass}, {ipv6, tclass}]) of
53671: 	true ->
53672: 	    ok;
53673: 	false ->
53674: 	    skip(?F("Neither recvtclass or tclass supported", []))
53675:     end.
53676: 
53677: 
53678: has_support_ipv6_recverr() ->
53679:     has_support_socket_option_ipv6(recverr).
53680: 
53681: 
53682: %% --- TCP socket option test functions ---
53683: 
53684: has_support_tcp_congestion() ->
53685:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(congestion).
53686: 
53687: has_support_tcp_cork() ->
53688:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(cork).
53689: 
53690: has_support_tcp_maxseg() ->
53691:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(maxseg).
53692: 
53693: has_support_tcp_nodelay() ->
53694:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(nodelay).
53695:

53697:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(keepcnt).
53698:

53700:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(keepidle).
53701:

53703:     has_support_socket_option_tcp(keepintvl).
53704: 
53705:

53707: 
53708: has_support_udp_cork() ->
53709:     has_support_socket_option_udp(cork).
53710: 
53711: 
53712: %% --- General purpose socket option test functions ---
53713: 
53714: has_support_socket_option_sock(Opt) ->
53715:     has_support_socket_option(socket, Opt).
53716: 
53717: has_support_socket_option_ip(Opt) ->
53718:     has_support_socket_option(ip, Opt).
53719: 
53720: has_support_socket_option_ipv6(Opt) ->
53721:     has_support_socket_option(ipv6, Opt).
53722: 
53723: has_support_socket_option_tcp(Opt) ->
53724:     has_support_socket_option(tcp, Opt).
53725: 
53726: has_support_socket_option_udp(Opt) ->
53727:     has_support_socket_option(udp, Opt).
53728: 
53729: 
53730: has_support_socket_option(Level, Option) ->
53731:     case socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option) of
53732:         true ->
53733:             ok;
53734:         false ->
53735:             skip(?F("Not Supported: ~w option ~w", [Level, Option]))
53736:     end.
53737: 
53738: is_any_options_supported(Options) ->
53739:     Pred = fun({Level, Option}) -> socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option) end,
53740:     lists:any(Pred, Options).
53741: 
53742: 
53743: %% --- Send flag test functions ---
53744: 
53745: has_support_msg_flag(Flag) ->
53746:     case socket:is_supported(msg_flags, Flag) of
53747:         true ->
53748:             ok;
53749:         false ->
53750:             skip(?F("Message flag ~w *Not* Supported", [Flag]))
53751:     end.
53752: 
53753: 
53754: %% Checks that the version is "good enough" (of the specified platform).
53755: 
53756: is_good_enough_linux(CondVsn) ->
53757:     is_good_enough_platform(unix, linux, CondVsn).
53758: 
53759: is_good_enough_darwin(CondVsn) ->
53760:     is_good_enough_platform(unix, darwin, CondVsn).
53761: 
53762: is_good_enough_montavista(_Vsn) ->
53763:     %% We have *one* old M, which have kernel version 2.6.10.
53764:     %% So if its that kernel version, we only need to check
53765:     %% if its M (no need to figure out the version of M).
53766:     case os:type() of
53767:         {unix, linux} ->
53768:             case os:version() of
53769:                 {2,6,10} ->
53770:                     case string:trim(os:cmd("cat /etc/issue")) of
53771:                         "MontaVista" ++ _ = V -> % Stone age MontaVista => Skip
53772:                             skip(V);
53773:                         _ ->
53774:                             ok
53775:                     end;
53776:                 _ ->
53777:                     ok
53778:             end;
53779:         _ ->
53780:             ok
53781:     end.
53782:                     
53783: 
53784: is_good_enough_platform(Family, Name, CondVsn) ->
53785:     case os:type() of
53786: 	{Family, Name} ->
53787: 	    ID = fun() -> ?F("~w:~w", [Family, Name]) end,
53788: 	    is_good_enough_platform2(os:version(), CondVsn, ID);
53789: 	_ ->
53790: 	    ok
53791:     end.
53792: 
53793: is_good_enough_platform2(Vsn, CondVsn, _) when (Vsn > CondVsn) ->
53794:     ok;
53795: is_good_enough_platform2(Vsn, CondVsn, ID) ->
53796:     skip(?F("Not 'good enough' ~s (~p <= ~p)", [ID(), Vsn, CondVsn])).
53797: 
53798: is_not_freebsd() ->
53799:     is_not_platform(freebsd, "FreeBSD").
53800: 
53801: is_not_openbsd() ->
53802:     is_not_platform(openbsd, "OpenBSD").
53803: 
53804: is_not_netbsd() ->
53805:     is_not_platform(netbsd, "NetBSD").
53806: 
53807: is_not_darwin() ->
53808:     is_not_platform(darwin, "Darwin").
53809: 
53810: is_not_windows() ->
53811:     case os:type() of
53812:         {win32, nt} ->
53813:             skip("This does not work on Windows");
53814:         _ ->
53815:             ok
53816:     end.
53817: 
53818: %% is_windows() ->
53819: %%     case os:type() of
53820: %%         {win32, nt} ->
53821: %%             ok;
53822: %%         _ ->
53823: %%             skip("This does not work on *non* Windows")
53824: %%     end.
53825: 
53826: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
53827:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
53828:       case os:type() of
53829:           {unix, Platform} ->
53830:               skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
53831:         _ ->
53832:             ok
53833:     end.
53834:   
53835: 
53836: unix_domain_socket_host_cond() ->
53837:     unix_domain_socket_host_cond(os:type(), os:version()).
53838: 
53839: unix_domain_socket_host_cond({unix, linux}, {M, _, _}) when (M < 3) ->
53840:     skip("TC may not work on this version");
53841: unix_domain_socket_host_cond(_, _) ->
53842:     ok.
53843: 
53844: has_support_unix_domain_socket() ->
53845:     case socket:is_supported(local) of
53846: 	true ->
53847: 	    ok;
53848: 	false ->
53849: 	    skip("Not supported")
53850:     end.
53851: 
53852: has_support_sctp() ->
53853:     case os:type() of
53854:         {win32, _} ->
53855:             skip("Not supported");
53856:         {unix, netbsd} ->
53857:             %% XXX We will have to investigate this later...
53858:             skip("Not supported");
53859:         _ ->
53860:             case socket:is_supported(sctp) of
53861:                 true ->
53862:                     ok;
53863:                 false ->
53864:                     skip("Not supported")
53865:             end
53866:     end.
53867: 
53868: 
53869: %% The idea is that this function shall test if the test host has 
53870: %% support for IPv4 or IPv6. If not, there is no point in running corresponding tests.
53871: %% Currently we just skip.
53872: has_support_ipv4() ->
53873:     ?KLIB:has_support_ipv4().
53874: 
53875: has_support_ipv6() ->
53876:     ?KLIB:has_support_ipv6().
53877: 
53878: inet_or_inet6() ->
53879:     try
53880:         has_support_ipv4(),
53881:         inet
53882:     catch
53883:         throw:{skip, _Reason} ->
53884:             has_support_ipv6(),
53885:             inet6
53886:     end.
53887: 
53888: has_support_sendfile() ->
53889:     try socket:is_supported(sendfile) of
53890:         true ->
53891:             ok;
53892:         false ->
53893:             skip("Not supported: sendfile")
53894:     catch
53895:         error : notsup ->
53896:             skip("Not supported: socket")
53897:     end.
53898: 
53899: 
53900: has_support_net_if_names() ->
53901:     try net:if_names() of
53902:         {ok, N} when is_list(N) ->
53903:             ok;
53904:         _ ->
53905:             skip("Not supported: net:if_names()")
53906:     catch
53907:         error : notsup ->
53908:             skip("Not supported: net")
53909:     end.
53910: 
53911: has_support_ioctl_requests() ->
53912:     try socket:supports(ioctl_requests) of
53913:         Reqs when is_list(Reqs) ->
53914:             ok;
53915:         _ ->
53916:             skip("Not supported: ioctl_requests")
53917:     catch
53918:         error : notsup ->
53919:             skip("Not supported: socket")
53920:     end.
53921: 
53922: has_support_ioctl_gifconf() ->
53923:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifconf).
53924: 
53925: has_support_ioctl_nread() ->
53926:     has_support_ioctl_request(nread).
53927: 
53928: has_support_ioctl_gifname() ->
53929:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifname).
53930: 
53931: has_support_ioctl_gifindex() ->
53932:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifindex).
53933: 
53934: has_support_ioctl_gifaddr() ->
53935:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifaddr).
53936: 
53937: has_support_ioctl_gifdstaddr() ->
53938:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifdstaddr).
53939: 
53940: has_support_ioctl_gifbrdaddr() ->
53941:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifbrdaddr).
53942: 
53943: has_support_ioctl_gifnetmask() ->
53944:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifnetmask).
53945: 
53946: has_support_ioctl_gifmtu() ->
53947:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifmtu).
53948: 
53949: has_support_ioctl_gifhwaddr() ->
53950:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifhwaddr).
53951: 
53952: has_support_ioctl_giftxqlen() ->
53953:     has_support_ioctl_request(giftxqlen).
53954: 
53955: has_support_ioctl_gifflags() ->
53956:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifflags).
53957: 
53958: has_support_ioctl_gifmap() ->
53959:     has_support_ioctl_request(gifmap).
53960: 
53961: has_support_ioctl_tcp_info() ->
53962:     has_support_ioctl_request(tcp_info).
53963: 
53964: has_support_ioctl_request(Req) when is_atom(Req) ->
53965:     try socket:is_supported(ioctl_requests, Req) of
53966:         true ->
53967:             ok;
53968:         false ->
53969:             skip(f("Not supported: ioctl_request: ~w", [Req]))
53970:     catch
53971:         error : notsup ->
53972:             skip("Not supported: socket")
53973:     end.
53974: 
53975: 
53976: %% has_support_ioctl_flags() ->
53977: %%     try socket:supports(ioctl_flags) of
53978: %%         Reqs when is_list(Reqs) ->
53979: %%             ok;
53980: %%         _ ->
53981: %%             skip("Not supported: ioctl_flags")
53982: %%     catch
53983: %%         error : notsup ->
53984: %%             skip("Not supported: socket")
53985: %%     end.
53986: 
53987: 
53988: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
53989: 
53990: unlink_path(Path) ->
53991:     unlink_path(Path, fun() -> ok end, fun() -> ok end).
53992: 
53993: unlink_path(Path, Success, Failure)
53994:   when is_function(Success, 0), is_function(Failure, 0) ->
53995:     case Path of
53996:         undefined ->
53997:             ?SEV_IPRINT("not a path to unlink"),
53998:                     Success();
53999:         _ ->
54000:             ?SEV_IPRINT("try unlink path: "
54001:                         "~n   ~s", [Path]),
54002:             case file:delete(Path) of
54003:                 ok ->
54004:                     ?SEV_IPRINT("path unlinked: "
54005:                                 "~n   Path: ~s", [Path]),
54006:                     Success();
54007:                 Error ->
54008:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("unlink failed: "
54009:                                 "~n   Path: ~s"
54010:                                 "~n   Res:  ~p", [Path, Error]),
54011:                     Failure()
54012:             end
54013:     end.
54014: 
54015: 
54016: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54017: 
54018: not_supported(What) ->
54019:     skip({not_supported, What}).
54020: 
54021: not_yet_implemented() ->
54022:     skip("not yet implemented").
54023: 
54024: skip(Reason) ->
54025:     throw({skip, Reason}).
54026: 
54027: 
54028: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54029: 
54030: lookup(Key, Default, Config) ->
54031:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
54032:         {value, {Key, Value}} ->
54033:             Value;
54034:         _ ->
54035:             Default
54036:     end.
54037: 
54038: 
54039: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54040: 
54041: t() ->
54042:     ts(ms).
54043: 
54044: ts(ms) ->
54045:     erlang:monotonic_time(milli_seconds).
54046: 
54047: tdiff({A1, B1, C1} = _T1x, {A2, B2, C2} = _T2x) ->
54048:     T1 = A1*1000000000+B1*1000+(C1 div 1000), 
54049:     T2 = A2*1000000000+B2*1000+(C2 div 1000), 
54050:     T2 - T1.
54051: 
54052: 
54053: formated_timestamp() ->
54054:     format_timestamp(os:timestamp()).
54055: 
54056: format_timestamp({_N1, _N2, _N3} = TS) ->
54057:     {_Date, Time}   = calendar:now_to_local_time(TS),
54058:     %% {YYYY,MM,DD}   = Date,
54059:     {Hour,Min,Sec} = Time,
54060:     %% FormatTS = 
54061:     %%     io_lib:format("~.4w-~.2.0w-~.2.0w ~.2.0w:~.2.0w:~.2.0w.~w",
54062:     %%                   [YYYY, MM, DD, Hour, Min, Sec, N3]),  
54063:     FormatTS = io_lib:format("~.2.0w:~.2.0w:~.2.0w", [Hour, Min, Sec]),  
54064:     lists:flatten(FormatTS).
54065: 
54066:    
54067: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54068: 
54069: set_tc_name(N) when is_atom(N) ->
54070:     set_tc_name(atom_to_list(N));
54071: set_tc_name(N) when is_list(N) ->
54072:     put(tc_name, N).
54073: 
54074: %% get_tc_name() ->
54075: %%     get(tc_name).
54076: 
54077: tc_begin(TC) ->
54078:     OldVal = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
54079:     put(old_trap_exit, OldVal),
54080:     set_tc_name(TC),
54081:     tc_print("begin ***",
54082:              "~n----------------------------------------------------~n", "").
54083:     
54084: tc_end(Result) when is_list(Result) ->
54085:     OldVal = erase(old_trap_exit),
54086:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldVal),
54087:     tc_print("done: ~s", [Result], 
54088:              "", "----------------------------------------------------~n~n"),
54089:     ok.
54090: 
54091: %% *** tc_try/2,3 ***
54092: %% Case:      Basically the test case name
54093: %% TCCondFun: A fun that is evaluated before the actual test case
54094: %%            The point of this is that it can performs checks to
54095: %%            see if we shall run the test case at all.
54096: %%            For instance, the test case may only work in specific
54097: %%            conditions.
54098: %% FCFun:     The test case fun
54099: tc_try(Case, TCFun) ->
54100:     TCCondFun = fun() -> ok end,
54101:     tc_try(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun).
54102: 
54103: tc_try(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun) 
54104:   when is_atom(Case) andalso
54105:        is_function(TCCondFun, 0) andalso
54106:        is_function(TCFun, 0) ->
54107:     tc_begin(Case),
54108:     try TCCondFun() of
54109:         ok ->
54110:             try 
54111:                 begin
54112:                     TCFun(),
54113:                     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
54114:                     tc_end("ok")
54115:                 end
54116:             catch
54117:                 C:{skip, _} = SKIP when ((C =:= throw) orelse (C =:= exit)) ->
54118:                     %% i("caught[tc] (skip): "
54119:                     %%   "~n   C:    ~p"
54120:                     %%   "~n   SKIP: ~p"
54121:                     %%   "~n", [C, SKIP]),
54122:                     tc_end( f("skipping(caught,~w,tc)", [C]) ),
54123:                     SKIP;
54124:                 C:E:S ->
54125:                     %% i("caught[tc]: "
54126:                     %%   "~n   C: ~p"
54127:                     %%   "~n   E: ~p"
54128:                     %%   "~n   S: ~p"
54129:                     %%    "~n", [C, E, S]),
54130:                     tc_end( f("failed(caught,~w,tc)", [C]) ),
54131:                     erlang:raise(C, E, S)
54132:             end;
54133:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
54134:             tc_end("skipping(tc)"),
54135:             SKIP;
54136:         {error, Reason} ->
54137:             tc_end("failed(tc)"),
54138:             exit({tc_cond_failed, Reason})
54139:     catch
54140:         C:{skip, _} = SKIP when ((C =:= throw) orelse (C =:= exit)) ->
54141:             %% i("caught[cond] (skip): "
54142:             %%   "~n   C:    ~p"
54143:             %%   "~n   SKIP: ~p"
54144:             %%   "~n", [C, SKIP]),
54145:             tc_end( f("skipping(caught,~w,cond)", [C]) ),
54146:             SKIP;
54147:         C:E:S ->
54148:             %% i("caught[cond]: "
54149:             %%   "~n   C: ~p"
54150:             %%   "~n   E: ~p"
54151:             %%   "~n   S: ~p"
54152:             %%   "~n", [C, E, S]),
54153:             tc_end( f("failed(caught,~w,cond)", [C]) ),
54154:             erlang:raise(C, E, S)
54155:     end.
54156: 
54157: 
54158: tc_print(F, Before, After) ->
54159:     tc_print(F, [], Before, After).
54160: 
54161: tc_print(F, A, Before, After) ->
54162:     Name = tc_which_name(),
54163:     FStr = f("*** [~s][~s][~p] " ++ F ++ "~n", 
54164:              [formated_timestamp(),Name,self()|A]),
54165:     io:format(user, Before ++ FStr ++ After, []).
54166: 
54167: tc_which_name() ->
54168:     case get(tc_name) of
54169:         undefined ->
54170:             case get(sname) of
54171:                 undefined ->
54172:                     "";
54173:                 SName when is_list(SName) ->
54174:                     SName
54175:             end;
54176:         Name when is_list(Name) ->
54177:             Name
54178:     end.
54179:     
54180:    
54181: 
54182: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54183: 
54184: %% start_node(Name) ->
54185: %%     start_node(Name, 5000).
54186: 
54187: start_node(Name, Timeout) when is_integer(Timeout) andalso (Timeout > 0) ->
54188:     try ?CT_PEER(#{name => Name, wait_boot => Timeout}) of
54189:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
54190:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Started node ~p", [Name]),
54191:             {Peer, Node};
54192:         {error, Reason} ->
54193:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed starting node ~p (=> SKIP):"
54194:                         "~n   ~p", [Name, Reason]),
54195:             skip(Reason)
54196:     catch
54197:         Class:Reason:Stack ->
54198:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed starting node: "
54199:                         "~n   Class:  ~p"
54200:                         "~n   Reason: ~p"
54201:                         "~n   Stack:  ~p",
54202:                         [Class, Reason, Stack]),
54203:             skip({node_start, Class, Reason})
54204:     end.
54205: 
54206:             
54207: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54208: 
54209: mq() ->
54210:     mq(self()).
54211: 
54212: mq(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
54213:     {messages, MQ} = process_info(Pid, messages),
54214:     MQ.
54215: 
54216:              
54217: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
54218: 
54219: nowait(Config) ->
54220:     case lists:member({select_handle, true}, Config) of
54221:         true ->
54222:             make_ref();
54223:         false ->
54224:             nowait
54225:     end.
54226: 
54227: sock_port(S) ->
54228:     case socket:sockname(S) of
54229:         {ok, #{port := Port}} -> Port;
54230:         {ok, #{}}             -> undefined
54231:     end.
54232: 
54233: l2b(L) when is_list(L) ->
54234:     list_to_binary(L).
54235: 
54236: b2l(B) when is_binary(B) ->
54237:     binary_to_list(B).
54238: 
54239: f(F, A) ->
54240:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format(F, A)).
54241: 
54242: i(F) ->
54243:     i(F, []).
54244: 
54245: i(F, A) ->
54246:     FStr = f("[~s] " ++ F, [formated_timestamp()|A]),
54247:     io:format(user, FStr ++ "~n", []),
54248:     io:format(FStr, []).
54249:
